description_en:
Achieve unstoppable hairstyles with **Taft Ultra Hair Hold Spray 250ml**. This ultra-strong spray delivers unwavering hold and exceptional shine, keeping your hair free from stickiness and frizz. Enjoy a perfect, long-lasting hairstyle, protected from humidity and wind without weighing your hair down or leaving residues. Whether you're aiming for a firm set or adding volume and vitality, **Taft Ultra Hair Hold Spray 250ml** is your ultimate choice. Easy to use, easy to wash out, and suitable for all hair types, for both men and women.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Taft Ultra Hair Hold Spray 250ml**
â­ Spray from a 30 cm distance evenly all over your style for total hold.
â­ For an individual look, spray selectively on separated hair strands.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Taft Ultra Hair Hold Spray 250ml**
â­ Advanced formula for strong hold and frizz resistance.
â­ Ingredients that protect hair from drying and provide natural shine.
â­ Easy to clean and wash out without leaving any residue.

#Taft #HairSpray #HairHold #Hairstyles #StrongHair #HairShine #HairCare #HairStyling #SaudiArabia #Makeup

description_en:
Unlock ultimate styling potential with **Taft Ultra Wax 75 ml**, the perfect solution for sculpting your hair with a glossy, strong finish. Its unique wax-gel consistency provides flexible hold, while the liquid crystal effect adds luxurious shine to your locks. Fortified with caffeine, **Taft Ultra Wax** boosts your hair's strength by 100% and protects against dryness, ensuring your style stays put all day without residue. Suitable for both men and women, it delivers salon-like shiny hair, is easy to distribute and wash out, and holds your hairstyle for 48 hours. Ideal for various styling needs like wrap styling, hot curling, and blow-drying.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Taft Ultra Wax 75 ml**
â­ Dispense a small amount into your palm.
â­ Spread evenly through hair.
â­ Style as desired with your fingers.
â­ Leaves hair looking healthy and vibrant.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Taft Ultra Wax 75 ml**
â­ Caffeine-rich formula for enhanced hold.
â­ Liquid crystal effect for increased shine.
â­ Protects hair from dryness.
â­ Easy to distribute and wash out.
â­ 48-hour hold.
â­ Suitable for all hair styling needs.

description_en:
Achieve a long-lasting, powerful style with **Taft Hair Gel Marathon Power**. It delivers an intense 48-hour strong hold, perfect for unmanageable hair and extreme spikes. Its intensely thick, fast-drying formula is resistant to humid climates, making it ideal for hot summer days. **Taft Hair Gel Marathon Power** ensures no residues or stickiness, while instantly hydrating and nourishing your hair without flaking. It's easy to distribute and wash out, keeping your hairstyle in place all day long. Suitable for all styling needs like wrap styling, hot curling, and blow-drying, it's the perfect choice for both men and women for everyday hair grooming.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Taft Hair Gel Marathon Power**
â­ Squirt some gel into your palm.
â­ Spread it evenly over your hair.
â­ Comb to your desired style or shape with your fingers.
â­ Enjoy healthy and vibrant-looking hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Taft Hair Gel Marathon Power**
â­ Intensely thick formula for extreme hold.
â­ Fast-drying and humidity-resistant.
â­ Hydrates and nourishes hair.
â­ Flake-free formula.
â­ Easy to distribute and wash out.

description_en:
Achieve the perfect sculpted look for your hair with **Taft Ultimate Wax 75ml**. This innovative wax offers very firm hold with a smooth gel-like consistency, giving your hair a healthy shine and a fresh, glossy appearance without making it dry or rough. **Taft Ultimate Wax 75ml** is ideal for all daily hair styling needs, maintaining your style for up to 48 hours, and is suitable for both men and women to achieve salon-like shiny hair. Easy to distribute and wash out, it's your ultimate choice for various styles such as wrap styling, hot curling, and blow-drying.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Taft Ultimate Wax 75ml**:
â­ Dispense a suitable amount of wax into your palm.
â­ Distribute evenly over the hair.
â­ Style the hair with your fingers into the desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Taft Ultimate Wax 75ml**:
â­ Wax formulation with a smooth gel consistency.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients that protect hair from dryness.
â­ Fixing agents that ensure long-lasting hold.

title_ar: ØªØ±ÙŠØ³ÙŠÙ…ÙŠ Ø¨Ø®Ø§Ø® Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ø­Ø±Ø§Ø±Ø© 300 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Achieve healthy, shiny hair with **Tresemme Heat Defence Spray**! It protects your hair from damage caused by heat styling tools up to 230Â°C, leaving it incredibly smooth and radiant. Enjoy a professional styling experience at home.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Heat Defence Spray**
â­ Spray generously 15-20 cm away from hair, from mid-length to ends.
â­ Use a brush to straighten hair and blow-dry from roots to ends.
â­ Can be used on damp hair before blow-drying, or on dry hair before curling or straightening with an iron.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Heat Defence Spray**
â­ Water, Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol.
â­ AmoDimethicone, Polyethylene Glycol Diamine, Cetrimonium Chloride.
â­ Panthenyl Phosphate, Sodium Cocoyl Amino Acids, Trideceth-12.
â­ Disodium EDTA, Quaternium-26, Benzophenone-4.
â­ Fragrance, Iodo-Propenyl Butylcarbamate, Sodium Benzoate, Amyl Cinnamal.
â­ Benzyl Alcohol, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
Say goodbye to dull, dry hair with **Tresemme Keratin Smooth & Straight Shampoo**. Formulated with Keratin and Argan oil, this shampoo provides 72 hours of frizz control, detangles knots, boosts shine, adds softness, and tames flyaways, leaving you with silky smooth hair that's full of natural movement.

For the best results, try our complete **Tresemme Keratin Smooth & Straight Shampoo** range.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Keratin Smooth & Straight Shampoo**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply a generous amount of shampoo and gently massage your scalp and roots with your fingertips to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse your hair completely with water.
â­ For optimal results, follow with Tresemme Keratin Smooth & Straight Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Keratin Smooth & Straight Shampoo**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Parfum
â­ Dimethiconol
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Carbomer
â­ Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride
â­ TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate
â­ TEA-Sulfate
â­ Citric acid
â­ Mica
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ PEG-45M
â­ Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil
â­ Hydrolyzed Keratin
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ PPG-9
â­ Silica
â­ Geraniol
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool
â­ CI 77891

description_en:
Say goodbye to frizzy, dry hair with **TRESemmÃ© Keratin Smooth Anti-Frizz Conditioner**! Specially formulated to combat the frustration of dull, damaged hair. Infused with Keratin and Argan Oil, **TRESemmÃ© Keratin Smooth Anti-Frizz Conditioner** delivers 72 hours of frizz control while detangling knots, boosting shine, adding softness, and taming flyaways. Achieve silky smooth hair with effortless movement.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **TRESemmÃ© Keratin Smooth Anti-Frizz Conditioner**:
â­ Start with TRESemmÃ© Keratin Smooth & Straight Shampoo.
â­ Squeeze a generous amount of conditioner into your palm and rub your hands together.
â­ Apply to damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths to ends.
â­ Work any remaining conditioner up towards the roots. Leave in for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **TRESemmÃ© Keratin Smooth Anti-Frizz Conditioner**:
â­ Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Behentrimonium Chloride, Parfum, Dipropylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Amodimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Phenoxyethanol, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
Achieve beautifully smooth and shiny hair with the **Tresemme Keratin Smooth Hair Mask**. This intensive hair mask is infused with Keratin to deeply moisturize and nourish your strands, helping to seal the hair cuticle and fight frizz. Say goodbye to dry, frizzy hair and hello to a salon-smooth finish that lasts. It's the perfect weekly treatment to revitalize your locks and restore their natural shine without weighing them down.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Keratin Smooth Hair Mask**:
â­ Start your styling routine with TRESemmÃ© Keratin Smooth Shampoo and Conditioner.
â­ Apply a generous amount of **Tresemme Keratin Smooth Hair Mask** evenly from the mid-lengths to the ends of damp hair. Avoid the roots.
â­ Use a wide-tooth comb or your fingers to smooth and detangle your hair.
â­ Leave on for 3-5 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.
â­ Use once a week or as needed for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Keratin Smooth Hair Mask**:
â­ Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glycerin.
â­ Hydrolyzed Keratin, Amodimethicone, Petrolatum, Paraffinum Liquidum, Cetrimonium Chloride.
â­ Perfume, Sodium Chloride, Hydroxyethylcellulose, PEG-150 Distearate, PEG-180 M, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether.
â­ Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Disodium EDTA, DMDM Hydantoin, Phenoxyethanol.
â­ Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Potassium Sorbate, Benzyl Alcohol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

#Tresemme #KeratinSmooth #HairMask #HairCare #SmoothHair #ShinyHair #FrizzControl #HealthyHair #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Say goodbye to dry, frizzy hair with **Tresemme** Salon Smooth Shampoo! Specially formulated to deliver deep moisture, this shampoo tames frizz and leaves your hair with salon-like smoothness and shine. Enriched with silk proteins, **Tresemme** Salon Smooth Shampoo gently cleanses and effectively combats frizz and flyaways, promoting healthy, vibrant, and silky-smooth hair. Enjoy exceptionally soft and manageable hair every day. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme** Salon Smooth Shampoo:
â­ Apply to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ For best results, follow with Tresemme Salon Smooth & Shine Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme** Salon Smooth Shampoo:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Dimethiconol, Silk Amino Acids, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Glycol Distearate, Carbomer, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Citric acid, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Mica, Disodium EDTA, PEG-45M, Phenoxyethanol, PPG-9, Silica, Sodium Hydroxide, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 77891.

description_en:
Discover the nourishing power of nature with **Tresemme Nourish & Replenish Shampoo 600 ml**. Infused with hair-quenching coconut milk and aloe vera, this system revitalizes your hair without the harshness of parabens, dyes, or silicones. When your hair craves nourishment, natural ingredients are the best way to replenish it, free from damaging chemicals. This professional-quality formula gently cleanses and quenches every strand, leaving you with beautifully soft, healthy-looking hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Nourish & Replenish Shampoo 600 ml**:
â­ Apply to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage the scalp and roots with your fingertips to work into a lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ For best results, follow with TRESemmÃ© Botanique Nourish & Replenish Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Nourish & Replenish Shampoo 600 ml**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract.
â­ Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Polyquaternium 10, Nonfat Dry Milk.
â­ Citric Acid, Isopropyl Alcohol, Sodium Acetate, Disodium EDTA.
â­ Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, PPG-9.
â­ Coumarin, Linalool.

#Tresemme #Shampoo #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairNourishment #CoconutMilk #AloeVera #HairMoisture #HairProducts #SoftHair

description_en:
Achieve silky, smooth hair with **Tresemme Keratin Smooth Oil**. Its non-greasy formula calms unruly hair for a perfectly polished look, full of natural movement.

âœ¨ **Tresemme Keratin Smooth Oil** Features:
â­ Delivers 5 smoothing benefits: Fights frizz, detangles knots, boosts shine, adds softness, and tames fly-aways.
â­ Infused with Keratin and African Marula Oil for ultimate smoothness.
â­ Suitable for colored hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Keratin Smooth Oil**:
â­ Start with TRESemmÃ© Keratin Smooth Shampoo and Conditioner.
â­ Apply to damp or dry hair.
â­ Dispense into hands and work evenly throughout hair, avoiding roots.
â­ Style your hair as usual with your favorite TRESemmÃ© styling products.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Keratin Smooth Oil**:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane, Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil), Dimethiconol, Amodimethicone, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Phenyl Trimethicone, Prunus Amygdalus (Sweet Almond) Dulcis Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea (Marula) Seed Oil, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
Say goodbye to dry, frizzy hair and hello to the smooth, shiny locks you've always dreamed of with **Tresemme Smooth & Silky Hair Conditioner**. This advanced smoothing system, enriched with silk proteins, delivers deep moisture where your hair needs it most, taming frizz and flyaways while maintaining a healthy, vibrant look. **Tresemme Smooth & Silky Hair Conditioner** cleanses and helps manage unruly hair, leaving it salon-soft and smooth, and is light enough for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Smooth & Silky Hair Conditioner**:
â­ Start with your favorite TRESemmÃ© shampoo.
â­ Squeeze a generous amount of conditioner into your palm and rub your hands together.
â­ Apply to damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths to ends.
â­ Work any remaining conditioner up towards the roots.
â­ Use a wide-tooth comb or your fingers to detangle and distribute the conditioner evenly from roots to ends.
â­ Leave on for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Style as usual with your preferred TRESemmÃ© styling products.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Smooth & Silky Hair Conditioner**:
â­ Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Chloride, Silk Amino Acids, Parfum, Dipropylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Amodimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Phenoxyethanol, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

#Tresemme #HairConditioner #SmoothHair #SilkyHair #HairCare #HairMoisture #BeautyProducts #SaudiBeauty #HomeSalon #HealthyHair

title_en: Tresemme Conditioner with Coconut & Aloe Vera for Hair Nourishment & Hydration - 400ml

description_en:
**Tresemme Conditioner Coconut & Aloe Vera 400Ml** is the ultimate solution for dry, frizzy hair craving intense hydration and deep nourishment. This conditioner is specifically formulated to blend the power of natural botanical ingredients, like refreshing coconut milk and soothing aloe vera extract, with professional-grade formulas for a superior care experience.

**Tresemme Conditioner Coconut & Aloe Vera 400Ml** features a unique formula free from parabens, dyes, and silicones, making it gentle on your hair while providing superior hydration and deep nourishment. It works to detangle hair, transforming dry and brittle locks into a healthy, silky-smooth mane that radiates natural vitality. Enjoy soft, shiny, and easily manageable hair with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Conditioner Coconut & Aloe Vera 400Ml**:
â­ Wash your hair with the appropriate shampoo.
â­ Squeeze a generous amount of conditioner into palm and rub hands together.
â­ Apply on damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths to ends.
â­ Work any remaining conditioner up towards the roots. Leave in for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Conditioner Coconut & Aloe Vera 400Ml**:
â­ Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Behentrimonium Chloride.
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract.
â­ Parfum, Dipropylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Glycerin.
â­ Sodium Chloride, Non Fat Dry Milk.
â­ Disodium EDTA, Pentylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol.
â­ Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone.
â­ Magnesium Chloride, Coumarin, Linalool.

shortdescription_en: Tresemme Conditioner with Coconut & Aloe Vera for dry, frizzy hair. Hydrates, nourishes, and leaves hair soft, shiny, and vibrant.

title_en: Tresemme Keratin Smooth Shampoo for Frizz Control | Silky Smooth Hair for 72 Hours
title_ar: ØªØ±ÙŠØ³ÙŠÙ…ÙŠ Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ø§Ù„ÙƒÙŠØ±Ø§ØªÙŠÙ† Ù„ØªØ·Ø§ÙŠØ± Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± | Ù†Ø§Ø¹Ù… ÙˆØ­Ø±ÙŠØ±ÙŠ Ù„Ù…Ø¯Ø© 72 Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø©
description_en:
Indulge your hair with **Tresemme Keratin Smooth Shampoo**, specifically designed to combat dry, dull hair damaged by styling appliances and other external factors.

Our unique formula, enriched with Keratin and Argan Oil, provides your hair with up to 72 hours of frizz control. **Tresemme Keratin Smooth Shampoo** detangles knots, boosts shine, and adds superior softness, while taming flyaways for a smoother, more vibrant look.

For optimal results, we recommend trying the complete **Tresemme** Keratin Smooth & Straight hair product range.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Keratin Smooth Shampoo**:

â­ Apply to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to work into a lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Follow with Tresemme Keratin Smooth & Straight Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Keratin Smooth Shampoo**:

â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Dimethiconol, Sodium Benzoate, Carbomer, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Citric acid, Mica, Disodium EDTA, PEG-45M, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Phenoxyethanol, PPG-9, Silica, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 77891.

description_en:
Give your colored hair the care it deserves with **TRESemmÃ© Pro Color Shampoo**.

The new TRESemmÃ© Pro Color range is designed to gently cleanse, hydrate, and provide long-lasting vibrancy and shine to colored hair. Formulated with Shineplex Technologyâ„¢ and Camellia Oil, **TRESemmÃ© Pro Color Shampoo** delivers shinier, more vibrant, and lasting hair color for up to 12 weeks. Our advanced formula is sulphate, parabens, and dye-free, offering the gentle care your hair craves. Transform your dull and dry hair into an effortlessly shiny and vibrant mane that's easy to manage and style in any weather.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **TRESemmÃ© Pro Color Shampoo**:
â­ Apply shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Massage gently into the scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, follow with TRESemmÃ© Pro Color Conditioner or 1 Minute Super Conditioner for intense hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **TRESemmÃ© Pro Color Shampoo**:
â­ Shineplex Technologyâ„¢
â­ Camellia Oil
â­ Sulphate, Parabens, and Dye-Free Formula

title_en: Tresemme Platinum Strength Shampoo for Hair - 400ml
title_ar: ØªØ±ÙŠØ³ÙŠÙ…ÙŠ Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ù‚ÙˆØ© Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ù„Ø§ØªÙŠÙ†ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± - 400 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the power of **Tresemme Platinum Strength** shampoo, expertly formulated to fortify your hair and protect it from daily heat styling damage. Infused with the power of biotin, **Tresemme Platinum Strength** shampoo nourishes your hair from root to tip, helping to restructure the hair fiber and fortify it. 

This advanced formula leads to hair that is 3x stronger with visibly reduced hair fall. Enjoy silky smooth, healthy-looking hair with the confidence of knowing it's protected from everyday styling.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Platinum Strength**:
â­ Apply to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to work into a lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ For best results, follow with Tresemme Platinum Strength Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Platinum Strength**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Biotin, Parfum.
â­ Dimethiconol, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Glycerin.
â­ Glycol Distearate, Carbomer, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid.
â­ TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Mica, Disodium EDTA.
â­ C10-40 Isoalkylamidopropylethyldimonium Ethosulfate, Dipropylene Glycol, Methylarachidic Acid, PEG-45M.
â­ Phenoxyethanol, PPG-9, Sodium Hydroxide, Silica.
â­ Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 77891.

#Shampoo #HairCare #Tresemme #HairStrength #StrongHair #AntiHairFall #HealthyHair #HairProducts #ShinyHair #SaudiArabia

Achieve silky smooth, manageable hair with **Tresemme Keratin Smooth Shampoo 200ml**. Formulated with Keratin and Argan oil, this shampoo provides up to 72 hours of frizz control. It detangles knots, boosts shine, adds softness, and tames flyaways, leaving your hair beautifully smooth and full of natural movement.

â­ 72-hour frizz control
â­ Detangles knots and smooths hair strands
â­ Enhances shine and adds softness
â­ Tames flyaways for a polished look
â­ Ideal for dry, damaged, and frizzy hair

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Keratin Smooth Shampoo 200ml**
â­ Apply an adequate amount to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, follow with Tresemme Keratin Smooth & Straight Conditioner.

â­ Aqua

description_en:
Achieve fuller, more voluminous hair with **Tresemme 24 Hour Body Shampoo for Volume**. This shampoo is expertly crafted to give your hair the lift and body you desire, leaving it looking healthy and vibrant all day long. Its unique formula, enriched with collagen and silk protein, works to boost your hair's volume without weighing it down, providing unparalleled flexibility and strength. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme 24 Hour Body Shampoo for Volume**:
â­ Apply to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to work into a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, follow with **Tresemme 24 Hour Body Shampoo for Volume** Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme 24 Hour Body Shampoo for Volume**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Hydrolyzed Collagen
â­ Parfum
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Polyquaternium 10
â­ Polyvinylpyrrolidone
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ VP/Methacrylamide/Vinyl Imidazole Copolymer
â­ PPG-9
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Sodium Acetate
â­ Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
Say goodbye to dry, damaged hair with **Tresemme Shampoo Split Remedy For Split Ends 400ml**. This innovative formula, enriched with Biotin & Pro-Bond Complex, penetrates deep into hair fibers to restore broken bonds and strengthen hair structure. It effectively repairs 7 common signs of damage, from heat styling and bleaching to daily wear and tear. It strengthens and protects your hair from root to tip, giving you the freedom to style without worry.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Shampoo Split Remedy For Split Ends 400ml**:

â­ Apply to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage the scalp and roots to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Follow with a suitable Tresemme conditioner for enhanced results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Shampoo Split Remedy For Split Ends 400ml**:

â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Dimethiconol.
â­ Hydrolyzed Keratin, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Glycerin, Glycol Distearate.
â­ Carbomer, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Citric acid.
â­ TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate.
â­ PVM/MA Copolymer, Lecithin, Polyquaternium-28, Caprylyl Glycol.
â­ Vitamins and nourishing ingredients like Biotin and Panthenol.

title_ar: ØªØ±ÙŠØ³ÙŠÙ…ÙŠ Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ù…Ù† ØªÙ‚ØµÙ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø·Ø±Ø§Ù - Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± 400 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Tired of dry, damaged hair? Discover **Tresemme Split End Protection Conditioner**, formulated with Biotin & Pro-Bond Complex. This advanced formula penetrates hair fibers to restore broken bonds and reinforce the protein structure of each strand. **Tresemme Split End Protection Conditioner** visibly repairs 7 types of damage, whether your hair is subjected to blow-drying, bleaching, brushing, straightening, coloring, braiding, or curling. It strengthens every strand, inside and out, providing the protection you need to style freely without the worry of damage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Split End Protection Conditioner**:
â­ Start with TRESemmÃ© Shampoo.
â­ Squeeze a generous amount of conditioner into your palm and rub your hands together.
â­ Apply to damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths to ends.
â­ Work any remaining conditioner up towards the roots. Leave in for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Split End Protection Conditioner**:
â­ Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Behentrimonium Chloride, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Parfum, Polyquaternium-28, Dipropylene Glycol, Amodimethicone, Cetrimonium Chloride, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, PVM/MA Copolymer, Lecithin, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Hydroxide, Lactic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Ascorbic Acid, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Biotin, Magnesium Nitrate, Magnesium Chloride, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool.

description_en:
The new **TRESemmÃ© Conditioner Pro Keratin** is specially formulated to gently cleanse and moisturize dry, frizzy hair, delivering superior smoothness and long-lasting manageability. This conditioner combines hydrolyzed keratin with nourishing marula oil to give your hair a supremely soft, silky feel, while providing impressive frizz control for up to 72 hours. Harnessing cutting-edge technology, our new formula is free from sulfates, parabens, and dyes, ensuring gentle care for your hair. Transform your dry, frizzy hair into an effortlessly sleek and frizz-free mane that is easy to manage and style in any weather with **TRESemmÃ© Conditioner Pro Keratin**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **TRESemmÃ© Conditioner Pro Keratin**

â­ Apply to damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths to ends.
â­ Leave in for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water for best results.
â­ For intense moisturization, leave in slightly longer.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **TRESemmÃ© Conditioner Pro Keratin**

â­ Contains hydrolyzed keratin for hair strengthening and smoothing.
â­ Enriched with nourishing marula oil for deep hair hydration.
â­ Formula is free from sulfates, parabens, and dyes.

#HairConditioner #Keratin #SmoothHair #HairCare #HairMoisture #HealthyHair #HairStyling #SaudiBeauty #RiyadhFashion #JeddahStyle

title_ar: ØªØ±ÙŠØ³Ù…ÙŠ Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ø¨Ø¬ÙˆØ² Ø§Ù„Ù‡Ù†Ø¯ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø£Ù„ÙˆÙÙŠØ±Ø§ Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± - 200 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Indulge your hair with **Tresemme Shampoo Coconut & Aloe Vera**, expertly crafted to nourish and revitalize. This botanical formula, rich in creamy coconut milk and pure aloe vera, is free from parabens, dyes, and silicones, ensuring a gentle yet effective cleanse without compromising your hair's health.

Experience silky-soft, healthy-looking hair with every wash, thanks to a unique natural blend that combines freshness with a luxurious fragrance. **Tresemme Shampoo Coconut & Aloe Vera** is your perfect choice for transforming dull hair into a radiant, vibrant mane.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Shampoo Coconut & Aloe Vera**
â­ Wet hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Apply a generous amount of shampoo to the scalp and roots.
â­ Gently massage with fingertips to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, follow with Tresemme Botanix Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Shampoo Coconut & Aloe Vera**
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract.
â­ Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Polyquaternium 10.
â­ Nonfat Dry Milk, Citric Acid, Isopropyl Alcohol.
â­ Sodium Acetate, Disodium EDTA, Glycerin.
â­ Pentylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, PPG-9.
â­ Coumarin, Linalool.

#Tresemme #TresemmeShampoo #HairCare #HealthyHair #Coconut #AloeVera #HairProducts #SaudiBeauty #HairNourishment #MoisturizedHair

description_en:
Dreaming of fuller, more voluminous hair? Achieve the bouncy, vibrant look you desire with **TRESemmÃ© 24 Hour Volume & Body Conditioner**. This expertly formulated conditioner is designed to provide your hair with incredible body and volume that lasts up to 24 hours, without any heavy residue. Infused with collagen, it helps to boost your hair's natural bounce and vitality, leaving it feeling soft, manageable, and visibly fuller. Perfect for daily use, **TRESemmÃ© 24 Hour Volume & Body Conditioner** is your secret to salon-quality volume at home.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **TRESemmÃ© 24 Hour Volume & Body Conditioner**:
â­ Start with TRESemmÃ© 24H Volume & Body Shampoo.
â­ Squeeze a generous amount of conditioner into palm and rub hands together.
â­ Apply on damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths to ends.
â­ Work any remaining conditioner up towards the roots. Leave in for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **TRESemmÃ© 24 Hour Volume & Body Conditioner**:
â­ Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Behentrimonium Chloride, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Parfum, Dipropylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Amodimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Polyvinylpyrrolidone, VP/Methacrylamide/Vinyl Imidazole Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Magnesium Nitrate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

#TRESemme #HairCare #VoluminousHair #HairVolume #HairConditioner #HealthyHair #HairGoals #BeautySaudi #SaudiBeauty #HairTreatment

description_en:
Discover superior hair strength with **TRESemmÃ© Platinum Strength Conditioner**. Specifically designed to fortify your hair and protect it from everyday styling damage, even with heat appliances reaching up to 230Â°C! The Strength & Fall Control system, infused with the power of biotin, nourishes hair from root to tip, helping to restructure and fortify the hair fiber. The result? Hair that grows 3x stronger with visibly less hair fall. Enjoy silky smooth, healthy-looking hair today, with the peace of mind that it's protected from future styling damage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **TRESemmÃ© Platinum Strength Conditioner**:
â­ Start with TRESemmÃ© Strength & Fall Control Shampoo.
â­ Squeeze a generous amount of conditioner into your palm and rub hands together.
â­ Apply to damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths to ends.
â­ Work any remaining conditioner up towards the roots.
â­ Leave in for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **TRESemmÃ© Platinum Strength Conditioner**:
â­ Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Behentrimonium Chloride, Biotin, Parfum.
â­ Dipropylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Amodimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA.
â­ Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Phenoxyethanol.
â­ C10-40 Isoalkylamidopropylethyldimonium Ethosulfate, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone.
â­ Methylisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Methylarachidic Acid, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
Experience the nourishing power of **TRESemmÃ© Shampoo Coconut & Aloe Vera**, expertly formulated to revitalize and replenish your hair. Infused with natural coconut milk and aloe vera, this shampoo gently cleanses and deeply moisturizes, leaving your hair beautifully soft, healthy-looking, and full of life. Free from parabens, dyes, and silicones, itâ€™s the perfect choice for achieving salon-quality hair at home.

â­ Enriched with coconut milk and aloe vera for ultimate hydration.
â­ Free from parabens, dyes, and silicones.
â­ Cleanses and quenches hair with every wash.
â­ Promotes soft, shiny, and healthy-looking hair.
â­ Features an indulgent fragrance with notes of creamy coconut and fresh aloe vera.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **TRESemmÃ© Shampoo Coconut & Aloe Vera**:
â­ Apply generously to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ For best results, follow with TRESemmÃ© Botanique Nourish & Replenish Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **TRESemmÃ© Shampoo Coconut & Aloe Vera**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine.
â­ Sodium Chloride, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice.
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Cocos Nucifera Extract.
â­ Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Polyquaternium 10.
â­ Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid.
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol, Sodium Acetate.
â­ Disodium EDTA, Glycerin.
â­ Pentylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol.
â­ Sodium Hydroxide, PPG-9.
â­ Coumarin, Linalool.

description_en:
Introducing **Tresemme Super Pro Keratin** Conditioner, your ultimate solution for dry and frizzy hair. Expertly formulated to gently cleanse and moisturize, it delivers long-lasting smoothness and effortless manageability.

â­ Features a powerful blend of hydrolyzed keratin and nourishing marula oil for stunning results.
â­ Provides impressive frizz control for up to 72 hours, leaving your hair softer and silkier.
â­ Our advanced formula is sulphate, paraben, and dye-free, ensuring the utmost gentle care.
â­ Transforms dry, frizzy hair into a sleek, frizz-free mane that's easy to style in any weather.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Super Pro Keratin**:
â­ Apply to damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths to ends.
â­ Leave in for 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.
â­ For intense moisturization, leave in for an extended period for exceptionally soft and hydrated hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Super Pro Keratin**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Hydrolyzed Keratin
â­ Marula Oil
â­ Aloe Vera Extract (for softening)
â­ Glycerin (for nourishment)
â­ Refreshing natural fragrances

Discover the power of **Tresemme Pro Keratin Shampoo**, the ultimate solution for your dry and frizzy hair. This innovative formula is designed to gently cleanse and moisturize your hair, delivering long-lasting smoothness and manageability. Formulated with a rich blend of hydrolyzed keratin and nourishing marula oil, **Tresemme Pro Keratin Shampoo** provides softer, silkier hair with exceptional frizz control for up to 72 hours. Enjoy frizz-free, easily manageable hair in any weather, as our new formula is completely free of sulphates, parabens, and dyes, offering maximum care for your hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Pro Keratin Shampoo**:
â­ Apply the shampoo to wet hair.

â­ Hydrolyzed Keratin.

Unlock the secret to healthy, defined curly hair with the **Tresemme Super Conditioner Pro Curls**. â­ Gentle formula, free from sulfates, parabens, and dyes.

â­ Delivers 2x more hydrated curls, easy to manage and style.
â­ Leaves hair soft and manageable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Super Conditioner Pro Curls**:

description_en:
Keep your colored hair vibrant and radiant with **Tresemme Colour Shineplex Conditioner 400ml**. This intensive conditioner is expertly formulated to provide professional care for your hair. Free from sulfates and enriched with luxurious Camellia Oil, it delivers deep hydration and superior nourishment. Enjoy soft, shiny, healthy-looking hair with long-lasting color protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Colour Shineplex Conditioner 400ml**:
â­ Step 1: Always start your hair care routine with Tresemme Colour Shineplex Shampoo.
â­ Step 2: Apply the conditioner generously from mid-lengths to ends, working any remaining product through the roots.
â­ Step 3: Run a wide-tooth comb or your fingers through your hair to detangle and fully coat the strands.
â­ Step 4: Leave on for 3-5 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Colour Shineplex Conditioner 400ml**:
â­ Luxurious Camellia Oil.
â­ Sulfate-free, paraben-free, and dye-free formula.
â­ Concentrated moisturizing agents.
â­ Gentle ingredients for colored hair.

description_en:
Curly hair is naturally drier and requires extra hydration to look its best and combat frizz. The TRESemmÃ© Botanix Curl Hydration Shampoo is specifically formulated to provide your curls with the essential moisture they crave. Featuring a botanical blend of shea butter and hibiscus, this expert formula gently cleanses and revitalizes your hair, leaving it manageable, softer, and beautifully defined from the first wash.

Free from dyes and low in sulfates, this anti-frizz shampoo is also safe for color-treated hair, making the TRESemmÃ© Botanix Curl Hydration range perfect for managing your natural texture and achieving a healthy-looking bounce.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **TRESemmÃ©**:
â­ Apply to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to create a lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ For best results, follow with TRESemmÃ© Botanix Curl Hydration Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **TRESemmÃ©**:
â­ Water
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Hibiscus Flower Extract
â­ Fragrance
â­ Glycerin
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Dye-Free and Low Sulphate Formula

description_en:
Keep your coloured hair vibrant and shiny with **Tresemme Colour Shineplex Shampoo for Vibrant, Long-Lasting Colour - 400ml**. Specially formulated to protect and nourish, this shampoo ensures your dyed hair maintains its dazzling colour and shine for longer. Its sulphate-free, paraben-free, and dye-free formula gently cleanses without stripping colour or lustre. Enriched with luxurious Camellia oil, it works to renew your hair, revealing its natural beauty. Enjoy vibrant, glossy hair colour for up to 12 weeks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Colour Shineplex Shampoo for Vibrant, Long-Lasting Colour - 400ml**:
â­ Step 1: Wet hair thoroughly.
â­ Step 2: Apply a generous amount of shampoo to your scalp and hair.
â­ Step 3: Gently massage to create a rich lather.
â­ Step 4: Rinse hair thoroughly, ensuring all shampoo residue is removed.
â­ Step 5: Follow with your favourite Tresemme conditioner and styling aids for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Colour Shineplex Shampoo for Vibrant, Long-Lasting Colour - 400ml**:
â­ Luxurious Camellia Oil.
â­ Sulphate-Free Formula.
â­ Paraben-Free Formula.
â­ Dye-Free Formula.
â­ Gentle ingredients for colour-treated hair care.

#TresemmeShampoo #ColouredHairCare #ShinyHair #VibrantHairColour #TresemmeKSA #SulphateFreeShampoo #HairMoisture #HairBeauty #HairProducts #HairCare

title_en: TRESemmÃ© Botanics Shea Butter Curl Hydration Conditioner - 400ml
title_ar: ØªØ±ÙŠØ³ÙŠÙ…ÙŠ Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… Ø¨Ø²Ø¨Ø¯Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙŠØ§ Ù„ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„ÙƒÙŠØ±Ù„ÙŠ - 400 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Curly hair naturally tends to be drier and requires extra hydration to look its best and stay manageable. Introducing **TRESemmÃ© Botanics Shea Butter Curl Hydration Conditioner**, expertly formulated with a rich blend of nourishing shea butter and hibiscus to provide your curls with the deep hydration and softness they need. Experience effortlessly manageable, frizz-free curls with a healthy, attractive shine from the very first use.

This dye-free, low-sulfate conditioner is also safe for colored hair, making it the perfect choice for your daily hair care routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **TRESemmÃ© Botanics Shea Butter Curl Hydration Conditioner**:
â­ Wash your hair with a suitable shampoo.
â­ Squeeze a generous amount of conditioner into your palm and rub your hands together.
â­ Apply the conditioner to damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths to ends.
â­ Work any remaining conditioner up towards the roots and leave in for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **TRESemmÃ© Botanics Shea Butter Curl Hydration Conditioner**:
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Hibiscus Extract
â­ Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Behentrimonium Chloride, Fragrance, Dipropylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Amodimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Glycol, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

#HairCare #HairConditioner #HairHydration #CurlyHair #SheaButter #TRESemmÃ© #HairProducts #HealthyHair #ShinyHair #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Keep your colored hair vibrant and lustrous with **Tresemme Colour Shineplex Hair Mask**. Specially formulated to protect and preserve the shine of colored hair, it's part of Tresemme's first-ever sulfate-free care system. This intensive mask provides deep nourishment and superior care with its formula enriched with camellia oil, known for its regenerative properties. Enjoy vibrant hair color that lasts up to 12 weeks, with effective hydration and advanced protection without parabens or sulfates.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Tresemme Colour Shineplex Hair Mask**:
â­ Always start your hair care routine with TRESemmÃ© Pro Collection Colour Shineplex Shampoo and Conditioner.
â­ Apply a generous amount, distributing evenly from the middle to the ends of your hair.
â­ Use a wide-tooth comb or your fingers to smooth and detangle.
â­ Leave on for 3-5 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.
â­ Use weekly or as needed for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Tresemme Colour Shineplex Hair Mask**:
â­ Camellia oil, known for its hair-regenerating properties.
â­ Concentrated conditioning actives for deep nourishment.
â­ Paraben and sulfate-free formula for color protection.

#Tresemme #HairCare #HairColor #HairMask #HealthyHair #ShinyHair #ColorProtection #HairHydration #HairProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Restore your hair's vitality with **CHI Shampoo with Argan Oil Plus Moringa Oil**, a magical blend that gently cleanses and rejuvenates dry, damaged hair. This unique shampoo works to restore moisture, essential vitamins, antioxidants, and strengthening proteins, giving your hair exceptional health and shine. Free from harmful parabens and sulfates, and lovingly made in the USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Shampoo with Argan Oil Plus Moringa Oil**
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage hair from roots to ends to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with warm water.
â­ For best results, follow with CHI Argan Oil conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Shampoo with Argan Oil Plus Moringa Oil**
â­ Argan Oil: Deeply nourishes and moisturizes.
â­ Moringa Oil: Promotes scalp health and adds shine.
â­ Vitamin A: Aids in healthy hair growth.
â­ Vitamin E: Combats dryness and strengthens hair.
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk: Provides ultimate softness.
â­ Lemon Fruit Extract, Pineapple Extract, Grape Fruit Extract, Sunflower Oil: For added nourishment and natural protection.

Experience superior softness and healthy shine with **CHI Silk Infusion Serum 177ml**. This lightweight serum works to restore your hair's vitality, providing incredible smoothness, manageability, and brilliant shine without the build-up of other products. Say goodbye to frizz and hello to healthy, beautiful hair.

Product Features:
â­ Delivers exceptional softness and manageability.
â­ Enhances hair's healthy shine.
â­ Moisturizes and strengthens hair strands.
â­ Leaves no greasy or heavy build-up.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Silk Infusion Serum 177ml**:
â­ Can be used as a leave-in treatment after shampooing.
â­ Apply to dry hair to aid in styling and combat frizz.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Silk Infusion Serum 177ml**:
â­ Wheat and Soy Proteins.
â­ Bio-Silk.

Nourish and repair dry, dull hair with **CHI Argan Oil plus Moringa Oil**. This lightweight, quick-absorbing blend is infused with Argan and Moringa oils, delivering essential vitamins and antioxidants to replenish moisture, restore shine, tame frizz, and enhance overall hair appearance. **CHI Argan Oil plus Moringa Oil** is free from Parabens and Sulfates.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Argan Oil plus Moringa Oil**
â­ Apply a small amount to hands.
â­ Distribute evenly onto wet or dry hair.
â­ Style as usual.
â­ For external use only. If product gets in eyes, rinse thoroughly with cool water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Argan Oil plus Moringa Oil**
â­ Argan Oil
â­ Moringa Oil
â­ Vitamin A
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk
â­ Sunflower Extract

Enriched with Rose Hip Oil, Vitamin C, and antioxidants, the **CHI Rose Hip Oil Protecting Shampoo for Color-Treated Hair** combats color loss and boosts shine and vibrancy. Free from parabens and sulfates, this premium shampoo is made in the USA.

â­ Antioxidants

â­ Made in USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Argan Oil + Moringa Oil Conditioner**:
â­ After shampooing with CHI Argan Oil Shampoo, apply conditioner to damp hair and work evenly from mid-hair to ends.
â­ Leave on for 1-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with cool water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Argan Oil + Moringa Oil Conditioner**:
â­ Argan Oil.
â­ Moringa Oil.
â­ Vitamin A.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Vitamin B.
â­ Sunflower Seed Extract.
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk.

description_en:
Discover the transformative power of **CHI Keratin Reconstructing Shampoo**, designed to replenish and protect your hair's natural keratin protein. This formula enhances elasticity and prevents future breakage, while delivering intense hydration for restored softness and shine. Ideal for dry and damaged hair, it's free from parabens and sulfates. Proudly made in the USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Keratin Reconstructing Shampoo**:

â­ Apply a generous amount to wet hair.
â­ Gently lather from scalp to ends, ensuring even distribution.
â­ Rinse thoroughly and repeat if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Keratin Reconstructing Shampoo**:

â­ Keratin Amino Acids
â­ Jojoba Seed Oil
â­ Argan Oil
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk
â­ Panthenol (Vitamin B5)
â­ Hydrolyzed Ceratonia Siliqua Seed Extract
â­ Zea Mays (Corn) Starch
â­ Propanediol (Natural)
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Limonene

description_en:
Indulge your hair with **CHI Black Seed Oil Shampoo for Hair Fortification 355 ml**.

This luxurious shampoo offers a deep yet gentle cleansing experience, effectively removing impurities with a rich lather that nourishes the scalp. Black Seed Oil is renowned for its remarkable hair-revitalizing properties, contributing to fuller, thicker strands. This formula fortifies hair structure and enhances its texture, bestowing incredible shine and radiance. Specially formulated for weak and thinning hair, it is completely free from harmful parabens and sulfates, ensuring optimal care for your locks. Made in USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Black Seed Oil Shampoo for Hair Fortification 355 ml**:
â­ Apply an adequate amount to wet hair.
â­ Gently lather from roots to ends.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
â­ For best results, follow with CHI Luxury Black Seed Oil Moisture Replenish Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Black Seed Oil Shampoo for Hair Fortification 355 ml**:
â­ Black Seed Oil.
â­ Retinyl (Vitamin A) Palmitate.
â­ Tocopheryl (Vitamin E) Acetate.
â­ Sunflower Seed Oil.
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk.

Unveil vibrant, healthy-looking colored hair with the **CHI Rose Hip Oil Protecting Conditioner - For Colored Hair 340 ml**. This luxurious conditioner is specially formulated to restore moisture and revitalize color-treated hair, eliminating dullness and dryness. description_en:
Experience revitalized, healthy hair with the **CHI Hair Revitalizing Mask with Argan & Moringa Oil** (237 ml). This mask deeply nourishes and repairs dry hair, infused with Argan and Moringa oils to provide essential vitamins and antioxidants. Replenish moisture, restore shine, smooth frizz, and improve your hair's overall luster and appearance. Free from parabens and sulfates, and proudly made in the USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Hair Revitalizing Mask with Argan & Moringa Oil**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to wet hair.
â­ Distribute evenly from mid-shaft to ends.
â­ Leave on for 3-5 minutes for intense moisture and softness.
â­ Repeat as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Hair Revitalizing Mask with Argan & Moringa Oil**:
â­ Argan Oil
â­ Moringa Oil
â­ Retinyl (Vitamin A) Palmitate
â­ Tocopheryl (Vitamin E) Acetate
â­ Sunflower Seed Oil
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)

#HairMask #HairCare #ArganOil #MoringaOil #HealthyHair #HairMoisture #HairShine #HairHealth #CHI #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Unlock your hair's potential with **CHI Curl Defining Cream Gel with Black Seed Oil**. This lightweight styling cream effectively controls frizz while helping to tame, shape, and define your curls and waves into perfectly controlled styles. Enriched with nourishing Black Seed Oil, **CHI Curl Defining Cream Gel with Black Seed Oil** fortifies and revitalizes your hair, adding radiance and shine for a glamorous finish. It's free from parabens and sulfates.

â­ Defines and shapes curls and waves for consistent styles.
â­ Controls frizz for smoother, more manageable hair.
â­ Fortifies and revitalizes hair with Black Seed Oil.
â­ Adds radiance and shine for a glamorous look.
â­ Paraben and sulfate-free formula.
â­ Made in USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Curl Defining Cream Gel with Black Seed Oil**

â­ Apply desired amount onto palms.
â­ Work through damp hair to scrunch and create curls.
â­ Let hair air dry or use a diffuser and hair dryer.
â­ Can be used on dry hair to define curls.

#CHI #HairGel #Hairstyles #BlackSeedOil #HealthyHair #HairCare #HairProducts #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Experience the nurturing power of nature with **Chi Aloe Vera Curls Defined Curl Enhancing Shampoo - 340ml**, expertly crafted for curly hair. This shampoo provides a gentle cleansing experience that preserves your natural curl pattern and essential oils, leaving your curly hair perfectly defined and manageable. Its unique formula is free from sulfates and parabens, making it the ideal choice for healthy, vibrant hair.

â­ Gently cleanses curly hair without stripping natural oils.
â­ Maintains natural curl definition and bounce.
â­ Provides deep hydration and leaves hair soft and manageable.
â­ Sulfate and paraben-free formula.
â­ Made in the USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Chi Aloe Vera Curls Defined Curl Enhancing Shampoo - 340ml**:
â­ Apply a generous amount of shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Work through hair evenly from roots to ends.
â­ Gently massage to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
â­ For best results, follow with a Chi conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Chi Aloe Vera Curls Defined Curl Enhancing Shampoo - 340ml**:
â­ Aloe Vera Extract for hydration and nourishment.
â­ Organic Silk Oil for enhanced shine and smoothness.
â­ Gentle ingredients that effectively cleanse the hair.

description_en:
Discover the secret to shiny, healthy hair with **CHI Infra Shampoo**. This lightweight formula is specifically designed for heat-damaged hair, working to repair and restore your hair's natural moisture, leaving it silky smooth and easy to manage without weighing it down.

**CHI Infra Shampoo** provides the perfect balance of hydration and shine, protecting against dryness and brittleness for progressively stronger, healthier hair. Suitable for all hair types, **CHI Infra Shampoo** gently cleanses your scalp, leaving it refreshed without residue, and features a sulfate and paraben-free formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Infra Shampoo**:
â­ Use as a magic solution for your hair before special occasions, after coloring and highlighting, when frequently using heat styling tools, and for defining curly hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Infra Shampoo**:
â­ Hydrolyzed wheat and soy proteins.
â­ Silk proteins.

Indulge your hair with **CHI Infra Conditioner**, the ultimate solution for heat-damaged hair. This lightweight conditioner restores your hair's natural moisture and repairs damage, leaving it incredibly soft and easy to manage without weighing it down. Enjoy shiny, healthy hair with a silky texture with every use, and leave dryness and frizz behind. **CHI Infra Conditioner** provides the perfect balance of hydration and shine, making it suitable for all hair types.

â­ Gently cleanses without drying the scalp.
â­ Deeply moisturizes and nourishes.
â­ Leaves the scalp feeling refreshed and revitalized.
â­ Free from sulfates and parabens.
â­ Provides a silky texture and improves manageability.
â­ Protects hair from dryness and frizz.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Infra Conditioner**
â­ Use **CHI Infra Conditioner** with CHI Infra Serum as a magic solution to save your hair before important occasions, after coloring and bleaching, to protect your hair from high heat damage, and also to define curly hair strands.

â­ Hydrolyzed Silk and Wheat Proteins.

description_en:
Introducing the **CHI** Aloe Vera Curls Defined Detangling Conditioner, a luxurious formula designed to nurture and enhance your natural curls. This exceptional conditioner deeply moisturizes, locking in essential hydration to combat frizz and reveal beautifully defined, healthy-looking, and radiant curls. Free from sulfates and parabens, this conditioner ensures gentle yet effective care for your precious locks. Proudly made in the USA.

â­ Replenishes and locks in natural moisture.
â­ Defines curls and reduces frizz.
â­ Enhances shine and promotes healthy hair.
â­ Sulfate-free and paraben-free formula.
â­ Made in the USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI** Aloe Vera Curls Defined Detangling Conditioner:
â­ After shampooing, apply generously from mid-shaft to ends.
â­ Distribute evenly and massage into hair.
â­ Leave on for 1-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse with cool water to seal the cuticle and enhance shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI** Aloe Vera Curls Defined Detangling Conditioner:
â­ Aloe Vera.
â­ Organic Silk Oil.

description_en:
Revitalize your hair with **CHI Keratin Conditioner for Dry & Damaged Hair** (355 ml). This reconstructive conditioner replenishes moisture levels with natural essential oils and keratin, strengthening and sealing the hair's cuticle to protect against future damage. It's free from parabens and sulfates for optimal hair care. Made in the USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Keratin Conditioner for Dry & Damaged Hair**:
â­ After shampooing, apply a generous amount of the conditioner to your hair, focusing on the damaged areas and ends.
â­ Leave it on for 3-5 minutes to allow for deep absorption.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Keratin Conditioner for Dry & Damaged Hair**:
â­ Jojoba Seed Oil
â­ Argan Oil
â­ Keratin Amino Acids
â­ Hydrolyzed Ceratonia Siliqua Seed Extract
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk
â­ Panthenol (Vitamin B5)
â­ Fragrance

description_en:
Revitalize and strengthen weak and thin hair with **CHI Black Seed Oil Fortifying Conditioner**. This potent conditioner is specially formulated to infuse strands with essential vitamins and antioxidants, restoring depleted moisture and protecting against future damage. Experience hair that is not only fortified but also incredibly soft, tangle-free, manageable, and adorned with a shiny, frizz-free finish. Free from parabens and sulfates, it's proudly made in the USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Black Seed Oil Fortifying Conditioner**:
â­ After shampooing, apply the conditioner to damp hair.
â­ Distribute evenly from mid-lengths to ends.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Black Seed Oil Fortifying Conditioner**:
â­ Black Seed Oil
â­ Vitamin A
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Vitamin B5
â­ Sunflower Seed Extract
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk

description_en:
Revitalize your silver blonde hair with **Chi Ionic Color Conditioner Silver Blonde**. This color-enhancing conditioner is expertly formulated to boost and refresh silver and grey hair tones, offering salon-quality results between salon visits. Featuring the exclusive Silk Amino Complex, which includes ceramic, amino acids, and silk, **Chi Ionic Color Conditioner Silver Blonde** penetrates deep into the hair cuticle for ultimate color and moisture delivery. It's recommended for both natural and color-treated hair to achieve perfect silver blonde tones on levels 7-10. It also works wonders on grey hair to neutralize brassy tones, leaving your hair vibrant, healthy, and beautifully conditioned.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Chi Ionic Color Conditioner Silver Blonde**:
â­ After shampooing, towel dry hair to remove excess water.
â­ Wearing gloves, apply the conditioner evenly from roots to ends.
â­ Leave in for 5 minutes on low heat, then cool down for 10 minutes at room temperature (or 30 minutes at room temperature without heat).
â­ Rinse hair with cool water to seal the cuticle and lock in color results.
â­ Repeat as desired for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Chi Ionic Color Conditioner Silver Blonde**:
â­ Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil.
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk.
â­ Panthenol.
â­ Silk Amino Acids.
â­ Colorants (for silver tone).

#Chi #HairConditioner #HairCare #SilverBlondeHair #HairColor #HairDye #HairMoisture #HealthyHair #HairExperts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover the **CHI Powerplus** Trio Kit, a 3-step system designed to combat hair fall and revitalize your scalp.

â­ Exfoliates and cleanses hair and scalp, removing buildup and impurities.
â­ Resists hair fall and strengthens hair roots.
â­ Nourishes hair and scalp with essential vitamins (A, C, D, E).
â­ Soothes and refreshes the scalp for thicker-looking hair.
â­ Free from sulfates and parabens.
â­ Made in the USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Powerplus**:
â­ Shampoo: Apply to wet hair, gently massaging into scalp and hair. Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Conditioner: After shampooing, distribute onto scalp and throughout hair. Leave on for 1-3 minutes. Rinse well.
â­ Revitalize Vitamin Treatment: Apply directly onto the scalp and massage with fingertips. Do not rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Powerplus**:
â­ Nettle.
â­ Lavender.
â­ Natural Botanicals.
â­ Organic Silk.

title_ar: Ù…Ø¬Ù…ÙˆØ¹Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„ØªØ§Ù„Ù Ù…Ù† ØªØ´ÙŠ: Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ ÙˆØ¨Ù„Ø³Ù… ÙˆØ³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… Ø§Ù†ÙØ±Ø§
description_en:
Achieve healthy, radiant hair with the **CHI Shampoo Conditioner & Serum Infra Trio Care Kit for Damaged Hair**. This comprehensive set provides deep hydration and thermal protection for damaged hair in three simple steps.

â­ CHI Infra shampoo: With organic silk oil & proteins, it offers gentle cleansing for all hair types while balancing moisture for softness and proteins for strength.
â­ CHI Infra moisturizer & thermal protective conditioner: Enriched with organic silk oil, it's a superior moisturizing and protecting treatment that leaves hair manageable with incredible shine.
â­ CHI Silk Infusion reconstructing complex: A rich leave-in treatment with silk, wheat, and soy proteins that penetrates, moisturizes, strengthens, and protects hair, providing incredible shine and softness.

Free from sulfates and parabens.
Made in the USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Shampoo Conditioner & Serum Infra Trio Care Kit for Damaged Hair**:
â­ Shampoo: Apply to wet hair, work evenly from roots to ends, and rinse with warm water. Follow with conditioner.
â­ Conditioner: After shampooing, apply from mid-shafts to ends, distribute evenly, and massage into hair. Rinse with cool water.
â­ Serum: Apply a small amount to hands and distribute evenly onto wet or dry hair. Style as usual.

Experience a refreshing and awakening sensation with CHI Tea Tree Oil Conditioner, a lightweight formula designed to normalize and nourish both hair and scalp. This invigorating **CHI Tea Tree Oil Conditioner** harnesses the power of tea tree oil and peppermint oil to effectively balance scalp oils and maintain optimal moisture levels. Ideal for oily hair and free from parabens and sulfates, it leaves your hair feeling revitalized and healthy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Tea Tree Oil Conditioner**:
â­ Apply a small amount to palms and distribute evenly from scalp to ends.
â­ Rinse with warm water.

â­ Hydrolyzed Silk

description_en:
Enhance your dark brown hair color with a single step using **Chi Ionic Color Conditioner Dark Chocolate**. This innovative conditioner revitalizes and adds shine between salon visits, offering deep nourishment with its Silk Amino Complex, ceramic, amino acids, and silk. It penetrates the hair cuticle for ultimate color and moisture delivery, perfect for natural or color-treated hair to achieve deep, warm brown tones. Recommended for levels 4-6, it intensifies color and adds a touch of warmth and moisture.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Chi Ionic Color Conditioner Dark Chocolate**:
â­ After shampooing and towel-drying hair, wear gloved hands.
â­ Apply evenly from roots to ends.
â­ Leave in for 5 minutes on low heat and cool down for 10 minutes (or 20 minutes at room temperature).
â­ Rinse with cool water to seal the cuticle and lock in color.
â­ Repeat as needed, considering hair's starting tone, level, and porosity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Chi Ionic Color Conditioner Dark Chocolate**:
â­ Olive Oil
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk
â­ Vitamin B
â­ Amino Acids
â­ Color

#Chi #HairConditioner #HairCare #HairDye #HairColor #BrownHair #HairMoisture #HairShine #HealthyHair #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience the transformative power of **CHI Keratin Silk Serum**, expertly designed to heal and hydrate dry, damaged hair. This potent formula revitalizes your locks, leaving them healthier and more manageable.

â­ A powerful reconstructing complex that heals and hydrates dry, damaged hair.
â­ Natural keratin rebuilds the hair's cuticle, while silk penetrates deep to retain moisture and smoothness.
â­ Dramatically improves elasticity, preventing future breakage.
â­ Restores intense softness and shine.
â­ Replenishes essential keratin proteins lost due to chemical treatments and heat styling.
â­ Can be used on damp or dry hair to reduce frizz and flyaways.
â­ Provides protection and a luminous finish when used before heat styling.
â­ Free from parabens & sulfates.
â­ Made in USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Keratin Silk Serum**
â­ Apply a small amount into the palm of your hand.
â­ Work evenly through the hair.
â­ Leave in and proceed with styling.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Keratin Silk Serum**
â­ Keratin Amino Acids
â­ Argania Oil
â­ Jojoba Oil
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk
â­ Hydrolyzed Ceratonia Siliqua Seed Extract
â­ Zea Mays (Corn) Starch

#HairCare #KeratinTreatment #HairSerum #HealthyHair #DamagedHair #DryHair #SilkSerum #HairRepair #Shine #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**CHI Keratin Silk Infusion Serum** is a powerful reconstructing complex that heals and hydrates dry, damaged hair. Natural keratin rebuilds the hairâ€™s cuticle, while silk penetrates deep into the hair to retain moisture and smooth the cuticle. This unique combination dramatically improves elasticity, preventing future breakage, while adding intense hydration that restores softness and shine. It replenishes essential keratin proteins lost due to chemical treatments and heat styling. Use **CHI Keratin Silk Infusion Serum** on dry or damp hair to reduce frizz and flyaways, or before heat styling for protection and a glossy finish. Free from parabens and sulfates.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Keratin Silk Infusion Serum**
Apply a small amount into the palm of your hand.
Work evenly through the hair.
Leave in and proceed with styling.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Keratin Silk Infusion Serum**
Keratin Amino Acids
Argan Oil
Jojoba Oil
Hydrolyzed Silk
Hydrolyzed Ceratonia Siliqua Seed Extract
Zea Mays (Corn) Starch
Fragrance (Parfum)
Limonene

#hair #keratin #serum #CHI #haircare #hairhydration #silkinfusion #healthyhair #hairtreatment #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience unparalleled softness and shine with **CHI Silk Infusion Serum**, a rich leave-in treatment infused with organic silk, wheat, and soy proteins. This reconstructing complex penetrates your hair strands to strengthen them, delivering incredible softness and manageability with deep hydration and shine, all without build-up or a greasy texture. You can use **CHI Silk Infusion Serum** on damp or dry hair to eliminate frizz, or before thermal styling for superior protection and a stunning finish. It's suitable for daily use, free from parabens and sulfates, and proudly made in the USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Silk Infusion Serum**:
â­ Apply a small amount into the palm of your hand.
â­ Work evenly throughout the hair from roots to ends.
â­ Can be used on damp or dry hair as needed.
â­ Leave in and proceed with styling.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Silk Infusion Serum**:
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk
â­ Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein
â­ Hydrolyzed Soy Protein

title_ar: ØªØ´ÙŠ Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ù„Ø§ØªÙŠÙ†ÙŠ 251 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Enhance your platinum blonde hair color with **CHI Ionic Color Conditioner Platinum Blonde**. This unique conditioner replenishes hair's vibrancy and shine between salon visits, thanks to its Silk Amino Complex containing ceramic, amino acids, and silk that deeply penetrate the hair cuticle for ultimate color and moisture delivery. Recommended for both natural and color-treated hair to achieve cool blonde, silver, and grey tones, it also helps neutralize yellow tones in grey hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Ionic Color Conditioner Platinum Blonde**:
â­ After shampooing, towel dry hair to remove excess water.
â­ Using gloved hands, apply the conditioner evenly from roots to ends.
â­ Leave in for 5 minutes with low heat, then cool down for 10 minutes at room temperature (or 20 minutes without heat).
â­ Rinse hair with cool water to seal the cuticle and lock in color.
â­ Repeat as desired.
â­ Consider the hair's starting tone, level, and porosity when determining the timing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Ionic Color Conditioner Platinum Blonde**:
â­ Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk
â­ Panthenol (Vitamin B)
â­ Silk Amino Acids
â­ Ext. Violet 2 (Colorant)

Experience revitalizing strength with **CHI Hair Serum Tea Tree Oil**, a fast-absorbing blend of Tea Tree and Peppermint Oil. description_en:
Reveal the secret to healthy, radiant hair with **CHI Argan Oil Plus Moringa Oil for Dry Hair**. This luxurious serum is a harmonious blend of organic Silk Oil, precious Argan Oil, and nourishing Moringa Oil. It works effectively to feed and repair hair strands, providing essential vitamins and antioxidants that renew moisture, restore shine, eliminate frizz, and improve the overall appearance of your hair.

**CHI Argan Oil Plus Moringa Oil for Dry Hair** can be used on damp or dry hair to combat frizz and flyaways, and it's also ideal for use before thermal styling to provide superior protection and incredible shine. Its formula is completely free from harmful parabens and sulfates, and it is proudly made in the USA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CHI Argan Oil Plus Moringa Oil for Dry Hair**:
â­ Apply a small amount to your hands.
â­ Distribute evenly onto wet or dry hair.
â­ Style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CHI Argan Oil Plus Moringa Oil for Dry Hair**:
â­ Argan Oil
â­ Moringa Oil
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk
â­ Vitamin A
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Sunflower Extract

description_en:
Experience the secret to soft, radiant skin with **Jergens Body Lotion Shea Butter**. Enriched with pure African Shea Butter and illuminating extracts, this lotion provides instant 24-hour hydration, leaving your skin visibly refreshed and revitalized. Its unique formula melts seamlessly into the skin, revealing its natural glow for skin that is three times more radiant and deeply conditioned. Enjoy healthier, moisturized, and vibrant skin with every application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Jergens Body Lotion Shea Butter**
â­ For best results, apply to clean skin after showering or before bedtime.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Can be used as a daily moisturizer for continuous hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Jergens Body Lotion Shea Butter**
â­ Pure African Shea Butter: For deep hydration and restoring skin's elasticity.
â­ Illuminating Hydralucence Blend: To enhance skin's natural radiance.
â­ Natural Moisturizers: To maintain skin moisture and prevent dryness.

description_en:
Revitalize and replenish aging dry skin with **Jergens Body Lotion Skin Age Defying**. Regular use visibly reduces early signs of aging like dullness and fine lines. **Jergens Body Lotion Skin Age Defying** is a multi-vitamin formula that refreshes and energizes tired, aging skin, absorbing easily. Enriched with Vitamins A, C, E, skin-nourishing antioxidants, and essential moisturizers, it deeply nourishes and hydrates, reducing dryness to leave your skin feeling revitalized and luminous. Use regularly to restore and boost your skin's natural moisture.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Jergens Body Lotion Skin Age Defying**:
â­ Dispense lotion onto palms.
â­ Gently rub between palms and apply to hands, legs, and body.
â­ Use as much or as little as your body needs.
â­ Pay special attention to hands, feet, elbows, and knees.
â­ Use daily after showering, both morning and evening.
â­ For best results, use with a Shea Butter infused body wash.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Jergens Body Lotion Skin Age Defying**:
â­ Water, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Petrolatum, Mineral Oil, Ceteareth-20.
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Lecithin.
â­ Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, Glycerin Dilaurate, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate.
â­ Stearic Acid, Carbomer, Methylparaben, Alcohol, DMDM Hydantoin.
â­ Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance.

#Jergens #BodyLotion #Skincare #SkinHydration #AgeDefying #HealthySkin #DeepMoisture #VitaminsForSkin #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience soft, hydrated skin with **Jergens Musk Body Lotion**.

Are you struggling with dry skin? **Jergens Musk Body Lotion** is the perfect solution for healthy, moisturized skin.

âœ¨ **Product Features:**
â­ Effectively treats dry skin, giving it a more radiant appearance.
â­ Features a luxurious musk essence for a beautiful, long-lasting fragrance.
â­ Moisturizes and soothes dry skin with a fast-absorbing formula for a refreshing feel.
â­ Improves skin tone and texture for softer, brighter-looking skin.
â­ Enriched with Vitamin E and Jergens' unique HYDRALUCENCE blend for natural skin luminosity.
â­ Dermatologist-tested and ideal for normal to dry skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Jergens Musk Body Lotion**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to the body and massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ For best results, use on damp skin after showering.
â­ Recommended for twice-daily use on clean, dry skin, or whenever your skin feels dry.
â­ Focus on drier areas like elbows, knees, and knuckles.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Jergens Musk Body Lotion**:
â­ Water (Aqua), Alcohol Denat., Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Esters, Glyceryl Dilaurate, Stearic Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Lanolin Oil, Dimethicone, Methylparaben, DMDM Hydantoin, Carbomer, Propylparaben, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Eugenol, Coumarin, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Citronellol.

#Jergens #BodyLotion #SkinMoisturizer #DrySkinRelief #MuskFragrance #Hydration #SkincareRoutine #VitaminE #BeautyTips #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Jergens Body Lotion Moisturizing Aloe Relief 600 ml**, the perfect solution to maintain your skin's hydration and radiance. 

This lotion features a unique formula combining soothing aloe vera gel and refreshing cucumber extract to deeply moisturize, even skin tone, and impart a healthy, vibrant appearance. Its lightweight, non-greasy, and fast-absorbing formula locks in moisture for up to 24 hours, making it the ideal choice for dry and tired skin.

â­ Provides instant hydration and improves skin texture.
â­ Contains aloe vera and cucumber extract to revitalize the skin.
â­ Unique hydrating technology for a healthy skin glow.
â­ Absorbs quickly and delivers long-lasting moisture.
â­ Suitable for daily use for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Jergens Body Lotion Moisturizing Aloe Relief 600 ml**:
â­ Take an appropriate amount of lotion and gently massage it onto clean, dry skin.
â­ Distribute the lotion evenly over the body, focusing on dry areas like elbows and knees.
â­ Allow it to absorb into the skin for a few minutes.
â­ It is recommended to use after showering to enhance moisturizing benefits.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Jergens Body Lotion Moisturizing Aloe Relief 600 ml**:
â­ Water, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Esters, Cetyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Myristate, Ceteareth-20, Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil.
â­ Vegetable Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, DMDM Hydantoin, Allantoin, Methylparaben, Fragrance, Polyacrylamide.
â­ Propylparaben, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Powder, Stearic Acid, C13-14 Isoparaffin.
â­ Sodium PCA, Laureth-7, Citric Acid, Propylene Glycol, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract, Arginine.
â­ Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Yellow 10, Green 5.

#Jergens #BodyLotion #Moisturizer #AloeVera #CucumberExtract #DrySkinRelief #Skincare #Hydration #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience visibly healthier and smoother skin with **Jergens Ultra Healing Body Lotion**. 

Suffering from severe dryness? Specially formulated for extra dry skin, this luxurious lotion absorbs deeply to provide exceptional hydration. **Jergens Ultra Healing Body Lotion** penetrates five layers of skin to combat dryness at its source, leaving rough areas like heels, elbows, and knees soft and smooth.

Enjoy skin that looks and feels visibly healthier over time with consistent use. Its unique formulation, featuring the HYDRALUCENCE blend of ingredients combined with Vitamins C, E, and B, imparts a natural radiance and deep nourishment to your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Jergens Ultra Healing Body Lotion**:
â­ For best results, apply daily to clean, dry skin.
â­ Gently massage the lotion all over your body until fully absorbed.
â­ Recommended for very dry skin and rough patches.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Jergens Ultra Healing Body Lotion**:
â­ HYDRALUCENCE blend.
â­ Vitamin C.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Vitamin B.
â­ Other moisturizing ingredients.

#Jergens #BodyLotion #UltraHealing #DrySkin #Skincare #SaudiArabia #Moisturizer #HealthySkin #SkinCareRoutine #DeepHydration

title_ar: Ø¬Ø±Ø¬Ù†Ø² Ù„ÙˆØ´Ù† Ù„Ù„Ø¬Ø³Ù… ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ ÙŠÙˆÙ…ÙŠ - 400 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Jergens Body Lotion Daily Moisture 400 ml**, specifically designed to provide superior smoothness and combat dry, rough skin. This lotion is enriched with moisturizing skin proteins and a refreshing blend of citrus extracts like grapefruit, lemon, and pineapple. Featuring HYDRALUCENCEâ„¢ technology, it delivers deep, long-lasting hydration, leaving your skin soft, supple, and radiant all day long. Enjoy healthy, protected skin free from dryness thanks to its multi-layer moisture system. **Jergens Body Lotion Daily Moisture** is perfect for daily use, offering immediate and noticeable improvement for dry skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Jergens Body Lotion Daily Moisture**:
â­ Gently pull and twist the cap to open the bottle.
â­ Apply liberally all over the body, preferably after bathing.
â­ For best results, use the lotion on clean, towel-dried skin.
â­ Focus on rough or dry areas such as knees, elbows, and heels.
â­ Can be used anytime.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Jergens Body Lotion Daily Moisture**:
â­ Water, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearic Acid, Cetyl Esters, Glyceryl Dilaurate, Dimethicone, Mineral Oil.
â­ C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Fragrance, Ceteareth-20, DMDM Hydantoin, Methylparaben, Arginine.
â­ Propylparaben, Carbomer, Sodium Citrate, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Juice.
â­ Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Juice, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Juice, Hydrolyzed Silk.

#Jergens #BodyLotion #DailyMoisture #SkinCare #Moisturizer #SoftSkin #Hydration #SaudiBeauty #DrySkinRelief #HealthySkin

description_en:
Experience visibly renewed and luminous skin with **Jergens Overnight Repair** Body Lotion. This potent formula is enriched with a unique blend of antioxidants and evening primrose, specifically designed to repair a week's worth of dry skin damage in just one night. **Jergens Overnight Repair** restores your skin's deep luminosity, revealing a beauty that has never looked so radiant. Enjoy softer, smoother, and healthier-looking skin with every application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Jergens Overnight Repair**
â­ For best results, apply generously to clean, dry skin.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Use daily, especially before bed for an overnight repair experience.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Jergens Overnight Repair**
â­ Antioxidants to boost skin health.
â­ Evening primrose for deep hydration and renewal.
â­ Intensive moisturizing ingredients to repair dry skin.

description_en:
Experience ultimate skin softness with **Jergens Musk Body Lotion 400 ml**. Expertly crafted, Jergens moisturizers are designed to transform your skin, leaving it feeling silky smooth, incredibly soft, and radiantly luminous. Whether your skin is dry or simply in need of a hydration boost, **Jergens Musk Body Lotion 400 ml** is the perfect solution to enhance your skin's vitality and restore its natural glow. Indulge in the captivating musk scent that provides a lasting sense of confidence and distinction throughout your day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Jergens Musk Body Lotion 400 ml**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to clean, dry skin.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ For best results, use twice daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Jergens Musk Body Lotion 400 ml**:
â­ Illuminating HYDRALUCENCE blend.
â­ Natural Musk essence.
â­ Nourishing Vitamin E.
â­ Water, Alcohol Denat., Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Esters, Glyceryl Dilaurate, Fragrance (Parfum), Stearic Acid, Lanolin Oil, Dimethicone, Methylparaben, DMDM Hydantoin, Propylparaben, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Arginine, Tocopher.

#Jergens #BodyLotion #Musk #SkinHydration #SoftSkin #Skincare #SaudiArabia #Moisturizer #MuskFragrance #BeautySkin
