title_ar: Ù„ÙˆØ´Ù† Ø¬Ø±Ø¬Ù†Ø² Ù„ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø¨Ø§Ù„ØµØ¨Ø§Ø± - 400 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience superior skin refreshment with **Jergens Body Lotion Moisturizing Aloe Relief 400 ml**. Specifically designed to combat the effects of pollution, dust, and weather changes, this lotion revitalizes dry and dull skin. Its unique formula infused with Aloe Vera deeply hydrates, improves skin texture and tone, and provides a healthy glow. Regain your confidence with soft, moisturized, and protected skin all day long. **Jergens Body Lotion Moisturizing Aloe Relief 400 ml** is your ultimate solution for renewed, vibrant skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Jergens Body Lotion Moisturizing Aloe Relief 400 ml**
â­ Take a small amount of lotion and gently massage it into your body.
â­ Focus on larger, consistently exposed areas like arms and legs.
â­ Apply after showering once the skin is completely dry and clean.
â­ Use twice daily for best results.
â­ Do not rinse the product after application for optimal benefits.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Jergens Body Lotion Moisturizing Aloe Relief 400 ml**
â­ Aloe Vera: For deep hydration and skin cell regeneration.
â­ Intense Moisturizing Formula: Provides instant refreshment for dry skin.
â­ Hydralucence Blend: Enhances natural skin luminosity.
â­ 24-Hour Moisturization: Keeps skin soft and hydrated.
â­ Fast-Absorbing Formula: Lightweight formula locks in moisture for 24 hours.

#Jergens #BodyLotion #SkinMoisturizer #AloeVera #Skincare #HealthySkin #24HourHydration #DailyCare #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia

Experience deeply nourished and visibly softer skin with **Jergens Nourishing Honey Body Lotion**. This luxurious moisturizer features a unique blend of naturally moisturizing honey and soothing orange blossom essence. It provides long-lasting hydration, leaving your skin incredibly smooth and radiating a healthy glow for up to 24 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Jergens Nourishing Honey Body Lotion**

â­ Generously apply to clean, dry skin.
â­ Use daily or as needed for optimal hydration.
â­ Ideal for normal to dry skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Jergens Nourishing Honey Body Lotion**

â­ Nourishing natural honey.
â­ Soothing orange blossom extract.
â­ Unique Hydralucence blend for enhanced luminosity.
â­ Essential oils for dry skin relief.

description_en:
Discover ultimate softness with **Glysolid** Cream, the perfect solution for radiant and healthy skin. This cream forms a protective layer that shields your skin from dryness and preserves its natural oils, providing deep, long-lasting hydration. Ideal for the driest areas like knees and elbows, **Glysolid** Cream restores your skin's beauty and silky smoothness, gently soothing irritated skin. Enjoy soft, moisturized skin all day long.

â­ Provides high moisturization and silky smoothness to your skin.
â­ Helps restore the beauty and smoothness of your skin.
â­ Deeply moisturizes the body, even in the driest areas.
â­ Gently calms and relieves irritated skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Glysolid** Cream
â­ Apply a suitable amount of the cream into your palm.
â­ Spread the cream with circular motions on the targeted area from the bottom up.
â­ Leave it on your skin for complete absorption and enjoy soft, moisturized skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Glysolid** Cream
â­ Contains a unique formula for deep hydration and superior protection.
â­ Enhances the skin's natural barrier to retain moisture.
â­ High-quality ingredients for soothing irritated skin.

description_en:
Experience soft, hydrated skin with **Glysolid Cream Family 400 ml**. Formulated with an advanced European formula, this cream moisturizes and softens dry, chapped skin, making it the perfect choice for every family member. Its non-greasy texture absorbs quickly, leaving your skin refreshed and light. **Glysolid Cream Family 400 ml** provides comprehensive skin protection and improves skin appearance from the very first application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Glysolid Cream Family 400 ml**:
â­ Dispense a generous amount of cream onto your palm.
â­ Gently massage and rub the product into your hands, legs, and body until fully absorbed.
â­ Pay special attention to dry and rough patches with additional layers.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Glysolid Cream Family 400 ml**:
â­ Glycerin: An effective humectant that draws water into skin layers to restore natural hydration balance.
â­ Advanced European formula.
â­ Odorless and colorless.
â­ Derivative of vegetable oil/animal fats.

description_en:
Experience ultimate softness with **Glysolid Cream**, the perfect solution for dry and chapped skin. Rich in 50% glycerin and allantoin, this cream deeply moisturizes and nourishes your skin, restoring its vitality and elasticity. Its advanced European formula absorbs quickly, providing your skin with a protective shield against dryness, promoting cell regeneration, and leaving it silky smooth. Ideal for hands, feet, and elbows, **Glysolid Cream** deeply hydrates and soothes irritated skin, restoring your natural beauty. Enjoy healthy, soft, and supple skin with regular use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Glysolid Cream**:
â­ Open the lid and take the required amount of product.
â­ Apply it directly to the dry areas of your skin.
â­ Gently massage your skin in a circular motion until fully absorbed.
â­ Use for hands, feet, and elbows.
â­ Regular use is recommended for best results and soft skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Glysolid Cream**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Glycerin (50%)
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Decyl Oleate
â­ Ceteareth-12
â­ Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate
â­ Ceteareth-20
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Silica
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Allantoin
â­ Methylparaben
â­ Parfum
â­ 2-Bromo-2-Nitrophopane-1, 3 Diol
â­ Propylparaben
â­ Coumarin
â­ Benzyl Salicylate
â­ Linalool
â­ Limonene
â­ Citronellol
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Benzyl Benzoate
â­ Geraniol
â­ Isoelgence.

description_en:
Indulge your hands with **Glysolid Hand Cream**, featuring an advanced European formula for superior hydration. This effective cream provides your hands, feet, and body with exceptional smoothness and continuous moisture throughout the day. **Glysolid Hand Cream** offers intensive care that deeply penetrates the skin, delivering exceptional hydration, and is ideal for dry skin, leaving it soft and smooth. Its formula is free from mineral oils, parabens, petroleum derivatives, and fillers, as well as artificial colors and fragrances.

â­ **High Performance:** Specially formulated for sensitive and dry skin, it helps heal and leaves skin moisturized and feeling smooth.
â­ **Deep Care:** It doesn't just protect the skin's outermost layer but penetrates all skin layers for deep moisturization.
â­ **One Application Magic:** Contains high levels of Allantoin and Glycerin to improve the look and feel of dry skin from the first application.
â­ **Long-Lasting Effect:** A single application in the morning is enough to maintain your skin's hydration all day.
â­ **Healthy-Looking Skin:** Glycerin provides the skin with a healthy appearance and performs wonders for its moisture levels.
â­ **Non-Greasy:** Leaves skin feeling refreshed without any greasy residue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Glysolid Hand Cream**
â­ Step 1: Clean the area you wish to moisturize and ensure it is dry.
â­ Step 2: Take the appropriate amount of cream onto your palm.
â­ Step 3: Gently massage the cream onto the skin with your fingertips until fully absorbed.
â­ Step 4: Use regularly for best results, achieving smooth and healthy skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Glysolid Hand Cream**
â­ Glycerin: For superior hydration and skin protection.
â­ Allantoin: To promote cell renewal and soothe the skin.
â­ Advanced European skincare formula.

#Glysolid #HandCream #SkinMoisturizer #Skincare #DrySkin #DeepHydration #SkincareProducts #BodyCare #HandMoisture #SkinHealth

description_en:
Experience deep hydration with **Glysolid Body Lotion Classic**, expertly formulated to nurture dry, normal, and even sensitive skin. Enriched with glycerin, a powerful humectant, and soothing chamomile oil, this lotion attracts moisture to your skin while reducing inflammation and irritation. Its pH-balanced formula helps maintain your skin's natural barrier, leaving it feeling soft, supple, and healthy-looking.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Glysolid Body Lotion Classic**:
â­ For best results, apply **Glysolid Body Lotion Classic** liberally to clean, dry skin after showering or bathing.
â­ Massage the lotion gently into your skin until absorbed.
â­ You can use it daily, all over your body, as often as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Glysolid Body Lotion Classic**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil)
â­ Palmitic Acid
â­ Stearic Acid
â­ Triethanolamine
â­ Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract (Chamomile Extract)
â­ Parfum (Fragrance)
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Methylparaben
â­ Propylparaben

#Glysolid #BodyLotion #SkinHydration #BodyCare #SoftSkin #HealthySkin #MoisturizingLotion #SkincareProducts #SaudiArabia #DailyHydration

description_en:
Give your skin superior care with **Glysolid Musk Body Lotion 500 ml**, specially formulated for dry and normal skin. This lotion deeply hydrates your skin, leaving it silky smooth. Enriched with chamomile oil, it works to reduce irritation and skin disturbances, while the vegetable-derived, eco-friendly blend of Glycerin and Allantoin helps restore skin cells and heal minor wounds and scratches. **Glysolid Musk Body Lotion 500 ml** provides optimal pH balance for your skin, with a delicate musk aroma that lasts. Enjoy smoother, revitalized, and more supple skin with every use. Perfect for dry areas like hands, elbows, knees, and feet.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Glysolid Musk Body Lotion**:

â­ Wash your face and body with lukewarm water to prepare the skin for hydration.
â­ Gently pat your skin dry with a clean towel, avoiding harsh rubbing.
â­ Take an appropriate amount of lotion (about a quarter-sized portion) and gently apply it to your skin in circular motions using your fingertips.
â­ Focus on areas requiring extra moisture such as hands, elbows, knees, and feet.
â­ Use the lotion all over your body after showering for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Glysolid Musk Body Lotion**:

â­ Vegetable Glycerin: For deep, eco-friendly hydration.
â­ Chamomile Oil: To soothe and reduce irritation.
â­ Allantoin: To stimulate skin cell regeneration and aid in healing minor wounds.
â­ A blend of moisturizing ingredients for superior smoothness.

description_en:
Experience soft, healthy skin with **Glysolid Cream Large Tube**. This effective cream helps to smoothen, moisturize, and protect dry and chapped skin on your hands, feet, and entire body, leaving it with a silky feel from the very first application. Thanks to its rich glycerin formula, **Glysolid Cream Large Tube** works to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and maintain the skin's natural moisture balance, making it look more youthful and radiant. Ideal for daily care of areas prone to dryness such as elbows, knees, and ankles.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Glysolid Cream Large Tube**:
â­ Apply a suitable amount to your palms and moisturize smoothly.
â­ Distribute the cream all over the body, focusing on dry areas like elbows, knees, ankles, feet, and hands.
â­ Massage the skin until fully absorbed.
â­ Reapply as needed for extra hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Glysolid Cream Large Tube**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Decyl Oleate, Ceteareth-12, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Ceteareth-20, Dimethicone, Silica, Phenoxyethanol, Allantoin, Methylparaben, Parfum, Coumarin, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Limonene, Citronellol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Benzoate, Geraniol, Isoeugenol.

#Glysolid #GlysolidCream #SkinMoisturizer #Skincare #SoftSkin #DrySkinRelief #BodyLotion #BeautyProducts #SaudiBeauty #SkincareSaudi

description_en:
Discover superior softness and deep hydration with **Glysolid Cream 125ml**. This ideal cream maintains your skin's beauty and provides a silky-smooth feel. **Glysolid Cream 125ml** forms a protective layer that shields your skin from dryness and preserves its natural oils, making it the perfect solution for dry areas like knees and elbows.

â­ Provides deep moisturization and silky smoothness.
â­ Helps restore skin's vitality and beauty.
â­ Offers long-lasting protection and hydration.
â­ Calms and soothes irritated skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Glysolid Cream 125ml**:
â­ Apply a small amount to your palm.
â­ Spread the cream with circular motions on the targeted area from bottom to top.
â­ Leave it on your body and enjoy soft, moisturized skin all day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Glysolid Cream 125ml**:
â­ Rich formula for effective moisturization.
â­ Gentle ingredients for ideal skin soothing.
â­ Preserves the skin's natural moisture.

Glysolid Cream, the ultimate solution for soft, hydrated skin. This cream, rich in glycerin, provides your skin with deep, long-lasting moisture, helping to maintain its smoothness and radiance. Its advanced formula with allantoin soothes the skin and reduces irritation, making it suitable for all skin types, even the driest.

â­ Advanced formula to moisturize and soften dry to very dry skin.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ Effectively nourishes and moisturizes the body.
â­ Ideal for use on hands, feet, and elbows.
â­ DeepCare technology for deeper skin hydration.
â­ Provides long-lasting softness and suppleness to the skin.
â­ Contains allantoin to soothe skin and accelerate healing.
â­ Gives skin a healthy and attractive appearance.
â­ A distinctive fragrance enhances the user experience.

â­ Apply daily to dry, clean skin.

â­ Glycerin: For superior hydration and guaranteed softness.
â­ Allantoin: To soothe and rejuvenate skin cells.

description_en:
Experience superior hydration and freshness with **Glysolid Body Lotion Classic**, specially formulated to provide exceptional care for your dry, normal, and even sensitive skin. It deeply nourishes thanks to its rich formula with glycerin, a humectant that draws moisture to the skin, and chamomile oil to soothe any irritation. **Glysolid Body Lotion Classic** features a pH-balanced formula that maintains your skin's protective barrier, leaving you with lasting softness and suppleness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Glysolid Body Lotion Classic**:
â­ For best results, apply **Glysolid Body Lotion Classic** liberally to clean, dry skin after showering or bathing.
â­ Gently massage the lotion into your skin until fully absorbed.
â­ Use daily all over your body as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Glysolid Body Lotion Classic**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil), Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Triethanolamine, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract (Chamomile Extract), Parfum (Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Propylparaben.

#Glysolid #BodyLotion #SkinHydration #Skincare #Moisturizer #HealthySkin #DeepHydration #DailyCare #SkincareProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate softness with **Glysolid Soft Cream** Classic 200ml, your ultimate daily skin care solution. Its rich formula provides deep hydration and instant protection for dry, rough, or chapped skin. **Glysolid Soft Cream** penetrates effectively to restore your skin's natural elasticity and softness without any greasy residue. Perfect for all skin types, including sensitive skin, for a healthy and radiant complexion all day long.

Product Features:
â­ Deeply hydrates and nourishes the skin effectively.
â­ Lightweight, non-greasy formula for quick absorption.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, especially sensitive skin.
â­ Promotes the restoration of skin softness and natural elasticity.
â­ Provides long-lasting protection and moisture.
â­ Ideal for daily routine use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Glysolid Soft Cream**:
â­ Cleanse and dry the area to be treated.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of cream to the skin.
â­ Gently massage the skin until the cream is fully absorbed.
â­ Use as needed, especially after washing hands or exposure to harsh weather conditions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Glysolid Soft Cream**:
â­ Contains an effective blend of natural moisturizers.
â­ Enriched with Glycerin for superior hydration.
â­ Free from harmful chemicals for the skin.

description_en:
Begin your skin's journey with **Glysolid Musk Body Lotion**. This luxurious lotion provides deep hydration and an enchanting, long-lasting musk fragrance, perfect for normal to dry skin types. Enriched with Camomile oil and Glycerin, it soothes the skin, reduces inflammation, and imparts suppleness and vitality. Its unique, pH-balanced formula maintains your skin's natural balance, delivering effective moisturization to the driest areas like elbows, knees, and heels.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Glysolid Musk Body Lotion**:
â­ Wash your body thoroughly with water before applying the lotion.
â­ Use a pea-sized amount and gently massage it into your skin using slow, anticlockwise circular motions.
â­ Leave the skin slightly damp before application for better absorption.
â­ Best used after showering for maximum hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Glysolid Musk Body Lotion**:
â­ Camomile Oil for skin soothing and reducing irritation.
â­ Glycerin for deep moisturization and increased skin suppleness.
â­ Luxurious Musk fragrance for lasting freshness.
â­ pH-balanced formula to maintain natural skin health.
â­ Free from thin or slippery ingredients, making it thick and smooth.

#GlysolidLotion #BodyMoisturizer #MuskFragrance #DeepHydration #SoftSkin #SkinCare #MoisturizingLotion #DailyHydration #SkincareProducts #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
**Johnson Vita-Rich** Pampering Body Wash nourishes your skin with an elegant and unique scent of jasmine and white flowers, blended with precious musk and sandalwood. Enriched with jojoba oil & vitamin E, this clinically proven formula gently cleanses your skin while leaving it with superior hydration and silky softness that lasts. Enjoy a refreshing shower experience that pampers your senses and leaves your skin feeling soft as silk.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Johnson Vita-Rich**:

â­ For the best lather, place a small amount of the body wash onto a shower puff or directly onto the body.
â­ Gently massage onto the skin to cleanse and hydrate.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Keep away from direct sunlight and in a cool, dry place.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Johnson Vita-Rich**:

â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Citric Acid, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Glycol Distearate, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose.
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Limonene, Coumarin, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate.

#Johnson #BodyWash #SkinHydration #BodyCare #SoftSkin #Jasmine #VitaminE #JojobaOil #Shower #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and softness with **Johnson Vita-Rich Moisturizing Hand Wash with Cotton Milk 300ml**. Its unique pH-balanced formula, enriched with Cotton Milk, provides intense hydration and long-lasting relief for dry skin. **Johnson Vita-Rich Moisturizing Hand Wash with Cotton Milk 300ml** helps restore the skin's natural moisture barrier with its skin-friendly ingredients that gently care for and leave your hands super soft for a long time. Enriched with glycerin, it boosts skin hydration, relieves dryness, and refreshes the skin's surface, while keeping your skin moisturized and balanced for 24 hours, so you feel fresh and beautiful all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Johnson Vita-Rich Moisturizing Hand Wash with Cotton Milk 300ml**:
â­ Apply on the skin.
â­ Lather and rinse well.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Johnson Vita-Rich Moisturizing Hand Wash with Cotton Milk 300ml**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Gossypium Herbaceum Seed Oil (Cotton Milk), Polyquaternium-7, Cinnamic Acid, Levulinic Acid, Sodium Levulinate, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Glycol Distearate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Phytate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum.

#Johnson #HandWash #Moisturizing #CottonMilk #SoftSkin #Skincare #24HourHydration #JohnsonsProducts #BodyCare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Johnson Vita-Rich Revitalizing Body Wash**. Indulge your skin with an elegant and unique scent inspired by orange blossom and jasmine, with hints of sandalwood for an unparalleled sensory experience. This advanced formula, enriched with aloe vera and vitamin E, deeply cleanses your skin while providing superior hydration and lasting softness, leaving your skin healthy and radiant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Johnson Vita-Rich Revitalizing Body Wash**:
â­ For the best lather, place a small amount of the body wash onto a shower puff and massage onto the body.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact, rinse thoroughly.
â­ Keep away from sunlight and out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Johnson Vita-Rich Revitalizing Body Wash**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Citric Acid, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Glycol Distearate, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Limonene, Coumarin, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate.

#JohnsonKSA #BodyWash #Skincare #Hydration #Freshness #GreatScent #OrangeBlossom #Jasmine #SoftSkin #JohnsonBabyKSA

description_en:
Experience deep hydration and effective repair with **Johnson's Glycerin Cream for Skin**, specially formulated to treat dry and cracked skin. Its rich glycerin formula helps restore the skin's natural moisture barrier, providing superior softness and long-lasting comfort. Whether it's your hands, feet, or any other area suffering from dryness, **Johnson's Glycerin Cream for Skin** is the ideal solution to revitalize and restore elasticity to your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Johnson's Glycerin Cream for Skin**:
â­ Apply an adequate amount to clean, dry skin.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use as needed, especially after washing hands or bathing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Johnson's Glycerin Cream for Skin**:
â­ Water
â­ Mineral Oil
â­ Glycerine
â­ Petrolatum
â­ Steareth-2
â­ Stearate-21
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Isopropyl Palmitate
â­ Cetyl Alcohol
â­ Stearyl Alcohol
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Carbomer
â­ Fragrance
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract

#Johnson #GlycerinCream #SkinHydration #Skincare #DrySkin #SoftSkin #SaudiArabia #DeepMoisture #BodyMoisturizer #SkinHealth

description_en:
Experience ultimate softness with **Johnson Vita-Rich Hand Wash Replenishing Raspberry**. It effectively removes dirt and impurities without drying out your skin, leaving you feeling refreshed and healthy. Enriched with the goodness of wild berries, raspberry extracts, and antibacterial peony, this hand wash hydrates and helps to smooth your skin, leaving it soft and healthy. The thick, foamy lather provides a refreshing and invigorating sensation.

â­ Effectively removes dirt and impurities without drying.
â­ Hydrates and smooths skin with raspberry extracts.
â­ Leaves skin feeling healthy and refreshed with a rich lather.
â­ Gentle enough for multiple uses throughout the day.
â­ Promotes lasting smoothness and soft, healthy skin.
â­ Provides 24 hours of gentle hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Johnson Vita-Rich Hand Wash Replenishing Raspberry**:
â­ Apply to skin.
â­ Lather well.
â­ Rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Johnson Vita-Rich Hand Wash Replenishing Raspberry**:
â­ Aqua.
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate.
â­ Rubus Idaeus Fruit Extract.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Paeonia Officinalis Root Extract.
â­ Propylene Glycol.
â­ Glycol Distearate.
â­ Parfum.

description_en:
Discover the secret to perfect skin with **Johnson Skin Balance Face & Body Cream**. This innovative cream is specially formulated to deeply moisturize your skin and restore its natural pH balance, leaving you with balanced, hydrated, and healthy-looking skin. Enjoy soft, radiant skin that lasts with every application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Johnson Skin Balance Face & Body Cream**:
â­ Absorbs quickly, making it perfect for daily use on both face and body.
â­ Gently massage onto clean face and body until fully absorbed.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Johnson Skin Balance Face & Body Cream**:
â­ Aqua, glycerin, paraffin liquidum, cetyl alcohol, caprylyl glycol, dimethicone, potassium cetyl phosphate, hydrogenated palm hydroxide, phenoxyethanol, perfume.

description_en:
Indulge your senses with **Johnson Vita-Rich Hand Wash Indulging Peach**. This luxurious hand wash effectively removes dirt and impurities without drying out your skin, leaving it soft and delicately fragranced with the sweet scent of peach. Enriched with natural extracts, it nourishes dry skin and provides long-lasting hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Johnson Vita-Rich Hand Wash Indulging Peach**
â­ Apply to skin.
â­ Lather and rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Johnson Vita-Rich Hand Wash Indulging Peach**
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Glycerin
â­ Prunus Persica Fruit Extract
â­ Polyquaternium-7
â­ Glycol Distearate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Sodium Benzoate

description_en:
Experience ultimate care with **Johnson Glycerine Cream**, specially formulated to rescue your skin from dryness and cracking. Rich in glycerine, this deeply moisturizing cream works to restore your skin's natural moisture barrier, providing instant comfort and long-lasting softness. Ideal for areas prone to dryness like hands, feet, and elbows, **Johnson Glycerine Cream** improves skin texture and nourishes deeply, leaving your skin feeling soft, supple, and healthy. Enjoy replenished and revitalized skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Johnson Glycerine Cream**:
â­ Apply generously to clean, dry skin.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use as needed, especially after washing hands or bathing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Johnson Glycerine Cream**:
â­ Water
â­ Mineral Oil
â­ Glycerine
â­ Petrolatum
â­ Steareth-2
â­ Stearate-21
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Isopropyl Palmitate
â­ Cetyl Alcohol
â­ Stearyl Alcohol
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Carbomer
â­ Fragrance
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract

#Johnson #GlycerineCream #SkinMoisturizer #Skincare #DrySkin #CrackedSkin #DeepHydration #BodyCare #Moisturizer #SaudiArabia

**Johnson Skin Balance Body Lotion** helps to intensively moisturize your skin and restore its natural pH balance, leaving you with balanced, hydrated, and healthy-looking skin. title_ar: ÙØ±Ø´Ø§Ø© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø®Ø´Ø¨ÙŠØ© Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠØ© Ù…Ù† Ø¬ÙˆÙ†Ø³ÙˆÙ† 286
description_en:
Discover excellence with the **Johnson** Professional Wood Hair Brush. This brush is designed to suit all hair types and provide you with an exceptional styling experience. The round brush gives you complete control over your hair styling, whether you desire added volume, waves, or even straight hair.

The **Johnson** wood hair brush is crafted from high-quality materials to ensure durability and performance. Its bristles are designed to distribute natural hair oils and reduce frizz, giving your hair a healthy shine and a smooth appearance. The comfortable wooden handle offers a secure and easy grip, making daily use extremely comfortable. It's also heat-resistant, making it the perfect companion for your hairdryer.

â­ Heat-resistant and ideal for use with a hairdryer.
â­ Well-balanced and flexible bristles that promote blood circulation to the scalp.
â­ Sleek and portable design, easily fitting into your handbag.
â­ Easy to clean and conforms to hygiene standards.
â­ Comfortable wooden handle for a firm grip.
â­ Lightweight for comfortable daily use.
â­ Helps distribute natural hair oils and reduce frizz.
â­ Suitable for all hair types.
â­ Wooden finish ensures durability and high quality.
â­ Contributes to achieving smooth, frizz-free hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Johnson Wood Hair Brush Profesional 286**:
â­ Always dry your hair with cold air before starting to comb or style.
â­ It's recommended to use a wide-tooth comb to remove any tangles before brushing.
â­ Section your hair into four parts for better control during styling.
â­ For wavy styles, wrap a section of hair around the brush and blow-dry, keeping the hairdryer 10-12 cm away.
â­ Use long, steady strokes for best results and to prevent hair breakage.
â­ Apply hair serum to remove any frizz or flyaways.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Johnson Wood Hair Brush Profesional 286**:
â­ High-quality heat-resistant bristles.
â­ Brush body made of durable natural wood.
â­ Comfortable wooden handle for easy grip.
â­ Safe materials for hair use.

#HairBrush #StylingBrush #Johnson #HairCare #HairStyling #HealthyHair #Hairstyles #HairProducts #HairHealth #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Achieve salon-quality styling with the **Johnson Wood Hair Brush W/ Rubber Handle Medium 346**. This expertly designed brush is perfect for daily hairstyling, adding volume, and creating beautiful waves or curls, making it an essential addition to your hair care routine.

â­ Premium quality brush designed to style all hair textures.
â­ Ideal for adding volume, body, and creating curls and soft waves.
â­ Features an attractive, heat-resistant wooden barrel for comfortable and safe styling.
â­ Well-balanced, flexible bristles distribute natural hair oils, reduce frizz, and add maximum shine.
â­ Sleek, portable design fits easily into your handbag for on-the-go touch-ups.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Johnson Wood Hair Brush W/ Rubber Handle Medium 346**:
â­ Always air-dry your hair before styling.
â­ Use a wide-tooth comb to detangle hair to prevent breakage.
â­ Section your hair into manageable parts.
â­ For curls, wrap hair around the brush and blow-dry, keeping the dryer 10-12 cm away.
â­ Use slow, long strokes for best results and to avoid hair breakage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Johnson Wood Hair Brush W/ Rubber Handle Medium 346**:
â­ High-quality, heat-resistant bristles.
â­ Durable wooden handle with a comfortable rubber grip.
â­ Eco-friendly and easy-to-clean design.

description_en: Achieve salon-quality hairstyles at home with the **Johnson** Wooden Handle Hair Styling Brush 345. Designed for optimal performance, this brush features a comfortable rubber grip for a secure and effortless hold. Its flexible bristles are crafted to gently massage your scalp, promoting better blood circulation for healthier, fuller hair. The durable wooden finish ensures longevity and heat resistance, making it your perfect partner for blow-drying and styling. Lightweight and easy to clean, the **Johnson** brush is ideal for all hair types, whether you're aiming for added volume, curls, or simply smooth, frizz-free results. Experience comfortable styling and stunning, long-lasting results with **Johnson**.

description_en:
Achieve professional styling with the **Johnson Hair Brush 285**. This brush features an elegant, heat-resistant design, making it the perfect tool for blow-drying your hair and achieving a smooth, frizz-free look. The **Johnson Hair Brush 285** is designed to add volume, root lift, and beautiful waves when used with a blow dryer. Its well-balanced bristles promote scalp blood flow and distribute natural oils to reduce frizz, making it suitable for all hair types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Johnson Hair Brush 285**
â­ Always dry your hair with cold air before styling.
â­ Section your hair for easier styling.
â­ For curls, wrap a section of hair around the brush and blow-dry it, maintaining a suitable distance.
â­ Use steady, long strokes for best results.
â­ Clean the brush regularly for hygiene.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Johnson Hair Brush 285**
â­ Heat-resistant bristles for safe styling.
â­ Comfortable wooden handle for a firm grip.
â­ Durable design with an elegant wooden finish.
â­ Intelligently distributed bristles to distribute natural hair oils.

â­ Handle crafted from durable, non-slip rubber.
â­ Bristles made from high-quality, heat-resistant materials.

description_en:
Experience an elegant touch for your hair styling with the **Johnson** Wood Hair Brush with Rubber Handle, designed to offer an exceptional styling experience. This brush provides you with perfect control and even heat distribution while using a hairdryer, helping to reduce frizz and impart natural shine. The comfortable rubber handle ensures a firm grip and ease of use, even during long styling sessions. Make your hair look professional and radiant every day with **Johnson**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Johnson** Wood Hair Brush with Rubber Handle 336:
â­ Begin by gently detangling hair with a wide-tooth comb before using the brush.
â­ Use the brush to direct the airflow from the hairdryer towards the hair ends.
â­ Rotate the brush while drying to achieve added volume and shine.
â­ Clean the brush regularly by removing loose hair and using mild soap and warm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Johnson** Wood Hair Brush with Rubber Handle 336:
â­ High-quality wood for durability and natural styling effectiveness.
â­ Durable bristles designed for even heat distribution.
â­ Ergonomic rubber handle for maximum comfort during use.

title_ar: Ø¹Ø¯Ø³Ø§Øª Ø¬ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø¢ÙŠ ÙƒØ§Ù†Ø¯ÙŠ Ù„Ø§ØµÙ‚Ø© - Ø¬Ø§Ù‚ÙˆØ§Ø± B3
description_en:
**Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Jaguar B3**: Enhance your gaze with the captivating **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Jaguar B3**. These lenses feature a beautiful light sand tone beautifully blended with a sharp, dark black contour, creating an alluring and deep look for your eyes. Designed for ultimate comfort and a natural beauty that lasts all day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Jaguar B3**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before touching the lenses.
â­ Gently place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Using another finger, lift your upper eyelid up gently.
â­ Pull your lower eyelid down gently.
â­ Look aside and place the lens on the sclera (white area) of your eye.
â­ Look forward until the lens is centered correctly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Jaguar B3**
â­ Lens Material: PolyMACON
â­ Water Content: 38%
â­ Diameter: 14.2 mm
â­ Base Curve: 8.6 mm
â­ Usage Period: Monthly (after opening)
â­ FDA Approved

#ContactLenses #ColoredContacts #JoelleLenses #Joelle #Makeup #Eyes #Beauty #Fashion #SaudiArabia #Style

title_ar: Ø¬ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø¢ÙŠ ÙƒØ§Ù†Ø¯ÙŠ Ø¹Ø¯Ø³Ø§Øª Ù„Ø§ØµÙ‚Ø© ÙˆØ§ÙŠØª ØªØ§ÙŠÙ‚Ø± B8 - Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ø³Ø§Ø­Ø±Ø© Ù„Ø¹ÙŠÙ†ÙŠÙƒ
description_en:
Add a touch of mystery and allure to your eyes with **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens White Tiger B8**. These lenses feature a deep marine blue color that bestows a unique sparkle and unparalleled attractiveness upon your eyes. Designed for all-day comfort, they are the perfect choice for a refreshed and distinctive look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens White Tiger B8**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before handling the lenses.
â­ Carefully place the lens on the tip of your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid using a finger from your other hand.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the white part of your eye (sclera).
â­ Look forward until the lens centers correctly.
â­ Avoid direct exposure of the eye to dust.
â­ Avoid getting soap or cosmetics inside the eye.
â­ Use the lenses only for the permitted period and do not exceed the expiry date.
â­ Always store the lenses in their dedicated care solution after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens White Tiger B8**:
â­ High-quality materials ensuring comfort and clear vision.
â­ Innovative design for a deep marine blue color.
â­ Monthly lenses for repeated use.
â­ One pair included in the package.
â­ Produced by the trusted Joelle brand.

title_ar: Ø¹Ø¯Ø³Ø§Øª Ø¬ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø¢ÙŠ ÙƒØ§Ù†Ø¯ÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ù„Ø§ØµÙ‚Ø© Ø²ÙŠØ¨Ø±Ø§ B5 - Ù…Ø²ÙŠØ¬ Ø¹Ø³Ù„ÙŠ Ø³Ø§Ø­Ø±
description_en:
Discover enchanting eyes with **Joelle Eyecandy Zebra B5 Contact Lens**, designed to give you a captivating look with a unique blend of light and dark hazel. These monthly lenses offer superior comfort and a noticeable change to your eye color.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Zebra B5 Contact Lens**:

â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before touching the lenses.
â­ Place the lens on your index finger for easy application.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid with one finger.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid with another finger.
â­ Look aside and place the lens on the white part of your eye (the sclera).
â­ Slowly look forward until the lens settles in the correct position.
â­ Avoid direct exposure of the eye to dust.
â­ Be careful not to get soap or cosmetics into your eye.
â­ Do not wear the lenses for longer than the specified period (monthly).
â­ Do not use the lenses after the expiry date.
â­ Always store the lenses in their dedicated solution after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Zebra B5 Contact Lens**:

â­ Expertly crafted blend of light and dark hazel colors.
â­ High-quality materials ensuring all-day comfort.
â­ Design that follows the latest fashion trends.
â­ One pair of monthly contact lenses.
â­ Trusted brand: Joelle.

#JoelleLenses #ContactLenses #ColoredLenses #HazelLenses #ZebraB5 #EyeMakeup #NaturalBeauty #SaudiFashion #EyeCare #JoelleEyecandy

description_en:
Enhance the vibrancy of your colored hair with the **Joelle Paris Color Protect Mask 250 ml**. This nourishing mask deeply revitalizes colored hair, strengthens it, and helps retain pigment for longer-lasting color, bestowing a magnificent silky and shiny look. Its sulfate-free formula is completely safe for color-treated hair, providing deep hydration for soft, supple, and manageable strands. It preserves color depth and shine, polishing hair fibers from root to tip for a smooth, lustrous finish. Protect your hair from oxidative aggressors and premature color fading.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Color Protect Mask 250 ml**:
â­ Apply a quarter-sized amount to clean, towel-dried hair.
â­ Massage through the hair strands, avoiding the scalp.
â­ Leave it on for 5 to 10 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Color Protect Mask 250 ml**:
â­ Quinoa and Amber Extracts: Protects the brightness and shine of the hair color.
â­ Sunflower Seed Oil: Deeply nourishes and soothes dry hair and scalp.
â­ Glycerin: Provides antioxidant and moisturizing properties.

#ColoredHairCare #HairMask #JoelleParis #HairTreatment #HairShine #HealthyHair #Beauty #SalonQuality #SaudiBeauty #HairGoals

description_en:
Experience ultimate nourishment and smoothness with **Joelle Paris Liss Keratin Mask**. 

This revitalizing mask, enriched with Mango Oil, Silk Protein, and Keratin, deeply restores and rejuvenates your hair after any treatment.

The **Joelle Paris Liss Keratin Mask** is suitable for all hair types, is sulphate-free, and safe for colored and keratin-treated hair. It provides deep conditioning and superior protection for your strands.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Liss Keratin Mask**

â­ Apply a quarter-sized amount to clean, towel-dried hair.
â­ Massage throughout the hair, avoiding the roots.
â­ Leave on for 5 to 10 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Liss Keratin Mask**

â­ Silk Protein and Keratin: Reinforce the strength and structure of weakened hair, improve elasticity against breakage, and form a protective barrier for enhanced shine and moisture.
â­ Mango Oil: A powerful moisturizer that softens hair and shields it from environmental damage.

#JoelleParis #HairMask #KeratinTreatment #HealthyHair #HairCare #MangoOil #HairProtein #HairMoisture #ShinyHair #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover the allure of your eyes with **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens C7 Exotic**, in a captivating Slate Grey hue that offers a natural, deep look with a hint of blue. These cosmetic lenses are designed for 3-month wear, allowing you to enjoy a refreshed and enchanting appearance for an extended period.

â­ Slate Grey color, inspired by the natural beauty of slate rock with subtle blue undertones.
â­ Comfortable for daily wear for up to 3 months.
â­ Grants eyes an unparalleled natural and deep look.
â­ Adds a touch of mystery and elegance to your appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens C7 Exotic**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before touching the lenses.
â­ Place the lens on your index finger, ensuring it's the correct way.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid upwards.
â­ Gently pull your lower eyelid downwards.
â­ Look aside and place the lens on the sclera (white part of the eye).
â­ Look forward until the lens centers correctly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens C7 Exotic**:
â­ High-quality hydrogel material for optimal hydration.
â­ Safe and comfortable design for the eyes.
â­ Advanced technology for clear vision.

#JoelleLenses #Eyecandy #ExoticLenses #GreyLenses #NaturalLenses #ColoredLenses #EyeFashion #EyeCare #SaudiBeauty #YourBeauty

description_en:
**Joelle Paris Liss Keratin Shampoo for Treated Hair** is your ultimate solution to revitalize your hair after any treatment. Enriched with Silk Protein and Keratin, this shampoo deeply nourishes and activates your hair, bestowing unparalleled shine and smoothness. Its gentle formula is perfect for all hair types, especially sensitive or chemically treated hair, providing discipline and optimal nourishment without weighing it down. It helps prolong the results of keratin treatments with its unique sulfate-free complex. Completely safe for colored and treated hair.

â­ Enriched with Silk Protein and Keratin to revitalize hair.
â­ Very mild on the scalp.
â­ Adds shine and a smooth effect.
â­ Sulphate Free.
â­ Safe for treated and colored hair.
â­ Provides discipline and optimal nourishment for sensitized or chemically-treated hair.
â­ Prolongs the life of keratin-treated hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Liss Keratin Shampoo for Treated Hair**:
â­ Apply a quarter-sized amount to wet hair and scalp.
â­ Massage the scalp and hair.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Liss Keratin Shampoo for Treated Hair**:
â­ Silk Protein and Keratin: Reinforce the strength and structure of weakened hair strands, improve elasticity against breakage, and form a protective barrier for enhanced shine and moisture.

title_ar: Ø¬ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ³ ØªÙŠÙƒ ÙƒÙˆÙØ± ÙØ§ÙˆÙ†Ø¯ÙŠØ´Ù† - Ù…Ø§Ø±Ø´Ù…ÙŠÙ„Ùˆ 50 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Joelle Paris Tech Cover Foundation - Marshmallow 50ml**. This lightweight, oil-free foundation offers complete coverage with superior SPF 30 sun protection, giving you a long-lasting matte finish that enhances your natural beauty. It's a 4-in-1 product that combines moisturizing, sunblocking, concealing, and foundation benefits.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Tech Cover Foundation - Marshmallow 50ml**
â­ Apply to a thoroughly cleansed face 15 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Start from the center of the face and blend outwards.
â­ Reapply every 2 hours for maximum results.
â­ Use a very thin layer for a natural look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Tech Cover Foundation - Marshmallow 50ml**
â­ UVA / UVB 30+ Filters.
â­ Vitamin E Acetate: Antioxidant properties that help prevent damage to the skin caused by UV exposure.
â­ Glycerin: Antioxidant and hydration properties for ultimate moisture.

#JoelleParis #Foundation #TechCover #Marshmallow #SunProtection #SPF30 #SaudiMakeup #SkincareKSA #BeautySaudi #FullCoverage

title_en: Joelle Eyecandy C8 Fashion Icon Contact Lenses - Turquoise Blue
title_ar: Ø¬ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø¹Ø¯Ø³Ø§Øª Ø§ÙŠ ÙƒØ§Ù†Ø¯ÙŠ ÙØ§Ø´Ù† Ø§ÙŠÙƒÙˆÙ† - Ø§Ù„Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø²Ø±Ù‚ Ø§Ù„ÙÙŠØ±ÙˆØ²ÙŠ
description_en:
Experience captivating beauty with **Joelle Eyecandy C8 Fashion Icon** contact lenses, featuring a unique turquoise blue hue that imbues your eyes with unparalleled depth and allure. This exquisite color allows light to scatter, reflecting various shades of blue, from light azure to a deeper, more intense blue, offering you a look that is both natural and striking. The **Joelle Eyecandy C8 Fashion Icon** lenses are monthly cosmetic contact lenses, designed for comfort and beauty throughout their usage period.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy C8 Fashion Icon**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before handling the lenses.
â­ Place the lens on the tip of your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid upwards.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the sclera (white part) of your eye.
â­ Look straight ahead until the lens centers correctly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy C8 Fashion Icon**:
â­ Gradient turquoise blue color design.
â­ High-quality materials for all-day comfort.
â­ Cosmetic lenses for monthly wear.

#ContactLenses #ColoredContacts #JoelleLenses #Beauty #Makeup #Eyes #Fashion #SaudiBeauty #ContactLensSaudi #EyeCare

title_en: JOELLE PARIS MAGIC WAND Eyelash & Eyebrow Enhancer (Colored)
title_ar: Ø¬ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ³ Ù…Ø§Ø¬ÙŠÙƒ ÙˆÙ†Ø¯ Ù„ØªÙƒØ«ÙŠÙ Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù…ÙˆØ´ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø­ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨ (Ù…Ù„ÙˆÙ†)
description_en:
Unveil the magic of your lashes and brows with the **JOELLE PARIS MAGIC WAND**, a clinically proven conditioning serum for enhanced density. Witness up to a 66% increase in the thickness, length, and nourished appearance of your lashes and brows in just 4 weeks. Its unique formula transforms your lashes and brows, revealing beautiful, healthy-looking eyes. The **JOELLE PARIS MAGIC WAND** is available in a colored option, featuring a black wand for lashes and a brown wand for brows, along with a transparent wand for dual use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **JOELLE PARIS MAGIC WAND**:
â­ Remove all traces of eye make-up or creams.
â­ Apply the wand to the base of the eyebrows and the upper and lower lashes.
â­ For a better result, use it regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **JOELLE PARIS MAGIC WAND**:
â­ Arginine: Helps protect from free radicals and boosts collagen production.
â­ Citric Acid: Provides an exfoliating effect.
â­ Castor Oil: Fatty acids extremely nourish the lashes and brows.
â­ Panthenol: Offers moisturizing properties.
â­ Biotinoyl Tripeptide-1: Helps in reducing hair fall and in providing a longer and fuller lashes and brows appearance.

#EyelashSerum #LashEnhancer #LongLashes #ThickBrows #JoelleParis #EyeMakeup #LashCare #BeautyEyes #SaudiArabia #Cosmetics

description_en:
Transform your look with **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Snake B9**, exquisite monthly colored contact lenses in a captivating Emerald Green shade with a dark contour, designed to add depth and allure to your eyes. Experience the perfect blend of natural beauty and striking elegance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Snake B9**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before handling the lenses.
â­ Carefully place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid upwards.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the white part of your eye (the sclera).
â­ Look straight ahead until the lens centers correctly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Snake B9**:
â­ High-quality materials for superior comfort.
â­ Oxygen-permeable design for healthy eyes.
â­ Enchanting Emerald Green color with a dark contour.
â­ Monthly lenses for regular wear.
â­ One pair per package.

#JoelleLenses #ContactLenses #ColoredLenses #EmeraldEyes #EyeMakeup #MonthlyLenses #EyeJewelry #GulfStyle #SaudiFashion #NaturalBeauty

description_en:
Discover the allure of your eyes with **Joelle Eyecandy C1 Jet Setter** contact lenses, uniquely designed to give you a rare green gaze with an attractive dark contour. Enjoy a captivating look that lasts for 3 months with these high-quality cosmetic contact lenses.

â­ Features a rare green color with a dark contour to enhance your eyes' beauty.
â­ Designed for 3 months of use, offering a consistently refreshed look.
â­ Provides superior comfort for extended wear.
â­ Grants you an attractive and natural appearance simultaneously.
â­ Perfect for special occasions or adding a distinctive touch to your daily look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy C1 Jet Setter**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before handling the lenses.
â­ Place the lens on the tip of your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid with one finger.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid with another finger.
â­ Look aside and gently place the lens on the white part of your eye (sclera).
â­ Look forward until the lens is centered correctly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy C1 Jet Setter**:
â­ High-quality material ensuring eye comfort and safety.
â­ Easy-to-wear and remove design.
â­ Distinctive green color with a dark contour.
â­ Contains a preservative solution to maintain lens moisture and purity.

#JoelleLenses #Eyecandy #JetSetter #ContactLenses #CosmeticLenses #GreenEyes #EyeMakeup #Jeddah #Riyadh #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Enhance your eyes with **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Fox B7**, featuring captivating dark sandy hazel tones with a sharp black contour for a striking and alluring gaze. These monthly lenses are designed for exceptional comfort and a natural, beautiful look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Fox B7**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before handling the lenses.
â­ Place the lens gently on your index fingertip.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and carefully place the lens on the sclera (white part of the eye).
â­ Look forward until the lens centers correctly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Fox B7**:
â­ High-quality material for all-day comfort.
â­ Monthly wear design for regular use.
â­ Dark sandy hazel tones with a sharp black contour to enhance eye beauty.
â­ One pair of lenses.

description_en:
Say goodbye to hair loss with the **Joelle Paris Anti Hair Loss Lotion 100 ml**. This innovative formula, enriched with stimulating plant extracts like Gingko Biloba, Lemon, and Thyme, effectively combats hair fall and encourages healthy hair growth. The **Joelle Paris Anti Hair Loss Lotion 100 ml** nourishes hair bulbs with essential nutrients and energy, promoting natural hair growth and delivering visibly denser and thicker hair from the roots. Experience stronger, more vibrant hair with this powerful treatment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Anti Hair Loss Lotion 100 ml**

â­ Spray approximately 10 pumps daily directly onto the hair roots.
â­ Gently massage for 5 minutes to boost blood circulation to the scalp.
â­ Do not rinse the hair after application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Anti Hair Loss Lotion 100 ml**

â­ Gingko Biloba: Increases and maintains blood circulation, ultimately improving and maintaining hair growth.
â­ Lemon: Rich in Vitamin C that boosts collagen production, which improves hair growth.
â­ Thyme: Promotes hair growth by stimulating the scalp and actively preventing hair loss.

#hairlosstreatment #healthyhair #joelleparis #haircare #hairgrowth #hairloss #hairtreatment #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Experience pure refreshment with **Joelle Paris Jglow Refreshing Face Wash 150 ml**. This deep cleansing, refreshing face wash is ideal for normal to oily skin types. It effectively removes impurities and pore-clogging bacteria, leaving your skin clean and revitalized. Enjoy long-lasting hydration and soothing effects, while controlling excess shine. Perfect for morning and evening use, this clinically-tested formula is non-comedogenic and pH-balanced for optimal skin care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Jglow Refreshing Face Wash 150 ml**
â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening.
â­ Apply a sufficient amount to your palm and gently massage onto your skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For very oily skin, leave on for an additional 1-2 minutes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Jglow Refreshing Face Wash 150 ml**
â­ Menthol: Refreshes and cools the skin, helping to minimize pores and oil production.
â­ Alpaflor Alp Extract: Treats oily skin by regulating oil production, soothes, and hydrates.
â­ Caffeine: Helps reduce inflammation and puffiness.

#JoelleParis #FaceWash #SkinCare #OilySkin #HealthySkin #Jglow #SkinRadiance #SkinHydration #AcneControl #SkincareProducts

description_en:
Refresh your skin with **Joelle Paris Its Cool Toner**, a luxurious rose water facial mist and toner designed to revive tired skin. Whether you need a quick hydration boost throughout the day, want to set your makeup, or desire a refreshing and comforting sensation for your hair and body, this versatile mist is your perfect solution.

**Joelle Paris Its Cool Toner** features a unique formula suitable for normal to dry skin, and it's gentle enough for sensitive skin. It can be used morning and night as an essential part of your skincare routine. It not only sets makeup but also purifies the skin, refines pores, deeply hydrates, and protects it from pollution with its antioxidant properties.

â­ Purifies skin and refines pores.
â­ Protects the skin, keeping it hydrated, revitalized, and moisturized.
â­ Eases the effects of stress and dullness on the skin.
â­ Acts as an antioxidant to protect the skin from pollution.
â­ Can be used as a skin primer and makeup fixer.
â­ Ideal for normal, dry, and sensitive skin.
â­ Suitable for use morning and night.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Its Cool Toner**:
â­ Spray onto the face, body, and hair anytime for a refreshing and moisturizing feel.
â­ Store in the refrigerator for the best cooling and invigorating results.
â­ Can be used as a skin primer to prepare skin before makeup, and as a final spritz to set your makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Its Cool Toner**:
â­ Rosa Damascus Flower Water: Hydrates, tones, soothes, and refreshes the skin.

#JoelleParis #RoseWaterToner #Skincare #SkinHydration #SkinRefresh #BeautyProducts #SaudiBeauty #Beauty #HealthySkin #SkincareRoutine

title_en: Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lenses - Snow Leopard B2 (Deep Teal Blue)
title_ar: Ø¹Ø¯Ø³Ø§Øª Ø¬ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø¢ÙŠ ÙƒØ§Ù†Ø¯ÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ù„Ø§ØµÙ‚Ø© - Ø³Ù†Ùˆ Ù„ÙŠÙˆØ¨Ø§Ø±Ø¯ B2 (Ø£Ø²Ø±Ù‚ Ù…Ø®Ø¶Ø±)
description_en:
Transform your look with the captivating **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Snow Leopard B2**, designed to give your eyes a mesmerizing deep teal blue hue that lasts all day. These monthly lenses offer a unique and striking appearance, ensuring you stand out with comfort and style. Experience effortless beauty and a captivating gaze with **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Snow Leopard B2**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Snow Leopard B2**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before handling the lenses.
â­ Place the lens gently on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid with your other hand.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the white part of your eye (sclera).
â­ Look forward slowly until the lens centers correctly.
â­ Avoid direct dust exposure to the eyes and prevent soap or cosmetics from entering.
â­ Do not wear lenses longer than the recommended period or after the expiry date.
â­ Store lenses in the appropriate solution after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Snow Leopard B2**
â­ High-quality monthly contact lenses.
â­ Natural and alluring deep teal blue color.
â­ Designed for maximum comfort.
â­ One pair included per pack.

#JoelleLenses #ColorContactLenses #ContactLenses #Riyadh #Jeddah #SaudiArabia #EyeFashion #EyeCare #Lashes #Beauty

title_ar: Ø¬ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ³ Ù…Ø§Ø³Ùƒ Ù„ØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„ØªØ§Ù„Ù 250 Ù…Ù„ - Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø§Ù ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù„Ø¬
description_en:
Experience the restorative power of nourishment with the **Joelle Paris Intensive Nutritive Mask**. Specially formulated for dry and damaged hair, this mask delivers essential nutrients to revitalize your strands. Infused with Babassu Oil and Silk Proteins, it penetrates deep into the hair fiber to nourish, protect, and restructure it from root to tip, restoring vitality and health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Intensive Nutritive Mask**:
â­ Apply a quarter-sized amount of the mask to towel-dried hair.
â­ Leave it on your hair for 5 to 10 minutes to allow the potent ingredients to work their magic.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Intensive Nutritive Mask**:
â­ Babassu Oil: Renowned for its deep moisturizing and nourishing properties, leaving hair exceptionally soft.
â­ Silk Protein: Contributes to hair's moisture retention, enhancing shine and elasticity for a healthier, more vibrant appearance.

#JoelleParis #HairMask #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairMoisture #DamagedHairTreatment #DryHair #BabassuOil #SilkProtein #HairHealth

description_en:
Transform your look with **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Tiger B1**. These monthly contact lenses feature a captivating blend of cool bluish-grey and striking deep yellow stripes, designed to mesmerize and enhance your natural beauty.

â­ Offers a unique, multi-toned color for a stunning effect.
â­ Ensures exceptional comfort for all-day wear.
â­ Perfect for special occasions or to elevate your everyday style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Tiger B1**:
â­ Wash hands thoroughly with soap and water before handling lenses.
â­ Place the lens gently on the tip of your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the white part of your eye (sclera).
â­ Look straight ahead until the lens centers correctly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Tiger B1**:
â­ High-quality monthly contact lenses.
â­ Crafted from safe and comfortable eye-friendly materials.
â­ Requires proper storage in contact lens solution.

description_en:
Experience the transformative power of **Joelle Paris Intensive Nutritive Shampoo**, designed to nourish dry and weakened hair with the potent combination of Babassu Oil and Silk Proteins. This luxurious shampoo gently cleanses while delivering deep nutrition, strengthening your strands to restore vitality, softness, and a healthy sheen.

â­ Nourishes and moisturizes dry, weakened hair.
â­ Strengthens damaged hair for improved resilience.
â­ Restores vitality and natural bounce.
â­ Enhances shine and leaves hair feeling incredibly soft.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Intensive Nutritive Shampoo**:
â­ Apply a quarter-sized amount to wet hair and scalp.
â­ Gently massage the scalp and hair.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Intensive Nutritive Shampoo**:
â­ Babassu Oil: Known for its deeply moisturizing and nourishing properties.
â­ Silk Protein: Adds moisture, boosts shine, and improves hair elasticity.

description_en:
Discover flawless skin with the **Joelle Paris Take Cover Foundation 50ml - Olive**. This lightweight, oil-free foundation offers full coverage and a long-lasting matte finish, while its SPF 30 protection safeguards your natural beauty, giving you a radiant glow. It's a versatile 4-in-1 product: moisturizer, sunblock, concealer, and foundation, making it your perfect everyday essential.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Take Cover Foundation 50ml - Olive**:
â­ Apply a very thin layer to a fully cleansed face 15 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Start from the center of your face and blend outwards for an even, seamless application.
â­ For maximum results and continuous protection, re-apply every 2 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Take Cover Foundation 50ml - Olive**:
â­ UVA / UVB 30+ Filters: Providing comprehensive protection against sun damage.
â­ Vitamin E Acetate: Antioxidant properties that help prevent skin damage caused by UV exposure.
â­ Glycerin: Delivers hydration and antioxidant benefits for supple, healthy-looking skin.

#JoelleParis #Foundation #Makeup #Sunscreen #Skincare #Beauty #FullCoverage #SPF30 #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover the captivating beauty of your eyes with **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Crocodile B4**, a mesmerizing blend of multi-toned greys and blues that add a unique and alluring touch. These monthly lenses are designed for comfort and distinction, making them the perfect choice for an unforgettable look. The **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Crocodile B4** features an innovative design that mimics natural colors, granting your eyes special depth and sparkle. Enjoy a comfortable and safe experience with Joelle lenses that meet the highest quality standards.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Crocodile B4**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water.
â­ Place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift the upper eyelid.
â­ Gently pull down the lower eyelid.
â­ Look aside and place the lens on the white of your eye (sclera).
â­ Look forward until the lens is centered.
â­ Store the lenses in solution after each use.
â­ Avoid direct dust exposure to the eyes and avoid soap or cosmetics.
â­ Do not use lenses beyond the allowed period or after expiry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Crocodile B4**:
â­ A mix of multi-toned greys and blues.
â­ High-quality material for comfort and clear vision.
â­ Monthly design for convenient use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Color Protect Shampoo 250 ml**

description_en:
Enhance your gaze with **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Lynx B6**, featuring captivating dark sandy hazel tones with a sharp black contour for a dramatic and alluring look. These monthly lenses from Joelle are designed for comfort and exceptional style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Lynx B6**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before handling the lenses.
â­ Place the lens gently on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid upwards.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look sideways and place the lens on the white part of your eye (sclera).
â­ Look forward until the lens settles correctly in the center.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Lynx B6**
â­ Comfortable, high-quality monthly contact lenses.
â­ Offers striking dark sandy hazel with a black contour.
â­ Quantity: 1 Pair.
â­ Brand: Joelle.

description_en:
Discover captivating beauty with **Joelle Eyecandy Social Butterfly** contact lenses. These lenses feature a unique Hazel Grey color, a dynamic blend of golden hues and slate grey, giving you an irresistible, mesmerizing look. Designed for cosmetic use over 3 months, they offer long-lasting comfort and beauty.

â­ Mesmerizing Hazel Grey color with golden and dark grey undertones.
â­ High-quality cosmetic contact lenses.
â­ Usable for up to 3 months.
â­ Provides exceptional comfort for extended wear.
â­ Enhances eyes with an attractive and distinct appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Social Butterfly**:
â­ Wash hands thoroughly with soap and water before use.
â­ Gently place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid and pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the white part of your eye (sclera).
â­ Look straight ahead until the lens centers correctly.
â­ Store lenses in the designated solution after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Social Butterfly**:
â­ Polymacon material.
â­ Water Content: 38%.
â­ Base Curve: 8.7.
â­ Diameter: 14.2 mm.

#JoelleLenses #Eyecandy #SocialButterfly #GreyLenses #HazelLenses #ContactLenses #EyeMakeup #EyeFashion #BeautyEyes #SaudiArabia

title_ar: Ø¬ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø¹Ø¯Ø³Ø§Øª Ø§ÙŠ ÙƒØ§Ù†Ø¯ÙŠ ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ± C2 - Ø¹Ø¯Ø³Ø§Øª ØªØ¬Ù…ÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ© Ø´Ù‡Ø±ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Enhance your eyes with **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens C2 Traveller**. These monthly cosmetic lenses feature a unique Golden Marble color, blending the warmth of gold with the radiance of amber for a captivating look. Designed for daily comfort and safety, they offer a distinctive style change every month.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens C2 Traveller**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before handling the lenses.
â­ Place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid upwards.
â­ Gently pull your lower eyelid downwards.
â­ Look aside and place the lens on the white part of your eye (sclera).
â­ Look forward until the lens centers correctly.
â­ Avoid direct eye exposure to dust or entry of soap and cosmetics.
â­ Do not use the lenses after their expiry date or exceeding the allowed period (one month).
â­ Lenses must be stored in the designated lens solution after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens C2 Traveller**:
â­ High-quality hydrogel materials for long-lasting hydration.
â­ Safe cosmetic pigments for a natural and attractive color.
â­ Free from harsh preservatives.

description_en:
Discover the secret to revitalized skin with **Joelle Paris Good Night 30 ml**. This luxurious night cream is infused with essential oils that work diligently to repair and renew your skin while you sleep, leaving it noticeably smoother and more radiant. Clinically tested, fast-absorbing, and non-sticky, it's the perfect addition to your nighttime skincare routine. It can also be used as an ideal primer for evening makeup, giving you a luminous finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Good Night 30 ml**:
â­ Wash your face with a cleanser suitable for your skin type.
â­ Apply to clean skin 20 minutes before bedtime.
â­ Gently massage onto the face and neck.
â­ For best results, follow with Joelle Paris day cream and sunscreen.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Good Night 30 ml**:
â­ Primrose Oil: Moisturizes, soothes, enhances skin texture and elasticity, and addresses dryness, irritation, roughness, and wrinkles.
â­ Extracts of Brown Algae, White Lily, Red Sorrel, Tiare, Mandarin, Bamboo, and Pearl Proteins: Exfoliate, moisturize, regenerate, tone, and restructure the skin.
â­ Liquorice Extract: Prevents skin pigmentation by inhibiting melanin production.
â­ Vitamin C: An antioxidant that boosts collagen production and brightens the skin.

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Joelle Paris Shampoo Detox**, specially designed to deeply cleanse and exfoliate sensitive scalps. **Joelle Paris Shampoo Detox** improves blood circulation and promotes scalp health, giving your hair unparalleled shine and vitality.

â­ Ideal for all hair types.
â­ Helps repair hair follicles and promote healthy growth.
â­ Safe and gentle for sensitive scalps.
â­ Eliminates dandruff and reduces itchiness.
â­ Moisturizes and strengthens hair from root to tip.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Shampoo Detox**:
â­ Apply a quarter-sized amount to wet hair and scalp.
â­ Gently massage the scalp and hair for a few minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Shampoo Detox**:
â­ Citric Acid: Improves scalp conditions by getting rid of dandruff, increases blood flow, and repairs hair follicles necessary for healthy hair growth. It also helps soothe itchy scalps.
â­ Glycerin: Moisturizes and strengthens hair from within, which helps in treating and preventing split ends.

description_en:
Experience ultimate refreshment and renewal with the **Joelle Paris Mask Detox 200ml**. This purifying mask, infused with Eucalyptus Extract and Coconut Oil, deeply cleanses your hair and scalp, providing a revitalizing and healthy foundation. Reveal stronger, more vibrant hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Mask Detox 200ml**:
â­ Apply to hair after using the 'Detox Shampoo'.
â­ Massage gently throughout the hair and scalp.
â­ Leave on for 5 to 10 minutes to purify and nourish.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Mask Detox 200ml**:
â­ Coconut Oil and Eucalyptus Leaf Extract: For deep purification and a healthy, fresh scalp.
â­ Rosemary Leaf Extract: Prevents follicle starvation, reducing hair loss, and combats dandruff and premature graying.
â­ Lamium Album Flower Extract: With anti-hair loss and anti-dandruff properties.
â­ Citric Acid: Improves scalp condition by eliminating dandruff, increasing blood flow for healthy hair growth, and soothing itchy scalps.

description_en:
Transform your damaged and treated hair with **Joelle Paris Intensive Leave-In Cream**. This luxurious cream is specially formulated for thick, dry, and unruly hair, providing ultimate nourishment and manageability. It deeply penetrates the hair fiber, leaving it feeling weightless, silky, soft, and incredibly easy to comb. Safe for children and sensitive scalps, **Joelle Paris Intensive Leave-In Cream** is your secret to healthier, more radiant hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Intensive Leave-In Cream**:
â­ Apply 2 to 4 drops to towel-dried hair before combing or fully drying.
â­ Distribute the cream evenly throughout the hair.
â­ Style as usual; do not rinse out.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Intensive Leave-In Cream**:
â­ Babassu Oil: Renowned for its deeply moisturizing and nourishing properties.
â­ Silk Protein: Provides essential hydration, enhancing hair shine and elasticity.

shortdescription_en: Nourish and revitalize dry, thick hair with Joelle Paris Intensive Leave-In Cream. Enjoy silky softness and effortless styling.

title_en: Joelle Paris Wash Away Foam 150 ml - Gentle & Effective Facial Cleanser
title_ar: Ø¬ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ³ ØºØ³ÙˆÙ„ Ù„Ø¬Ù…ÙŠØ¹ Ø£Ù†ÙˆØ§Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© 150 Ù…Ù„ - Ù…Ù†Ø¸Ù Ù„Ø·ÙŠÙ ÙˆÙØ¹Ø§Ù„
description_en:
Discover purity and freshness with **Joelle Paris Wash Away Foam 150 ml**. This gentle, luscious facial foam cleanser is expertly formulated for all skin types, including sensitive skin. It effectively and gently removes makeup and daily impurities, leaving your skin clean, pure, and beautifully moisturized. Use it morning and night as an essential step in your skincare routine. It's also clinically tested to ensure maximum safety and efficacy.

â­ Gently removes all traces of makeup and trapped dirt from the skin's surface.
â­ Leaves your skin feeling clean, pure, refreshed, and moisturized.
â­ Suitable for all skin types and sensitive skin.
â­ Ideal for use in the morning and evening.
â­ Clinically tested for quality and performance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Wash Away Foam 150 ml**
1. Wash your face with the foam cleanser at least twice daily as part of your morning and night routine.
2. Gently massage the foam onto damp skin for a thorough cleanse and makeup removal.
3. Rinse your face thoroughly with water to remove any residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Wash Away Foam 150 ml**
â­ Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract: Boosts the immune system, increases collagen production, and improves skin texture and appearance.
â­ Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract: Prevents aging, promotes skin tightness, and increases hydration within the skin.
â­ Arnica Montana Flower Extract: Possesses astringent, antiseptic, and anti-inflammatory properties to reduce skin oils.
â­ Citric Acid: An antioxidant and anti-aging agent that exfoliates dead skin cells, cleans pores, evens skin tone, and softens the skin.
â­ Glycerin: Keeps the skin hydrated, soft, and supple, protecting it from harmful environmental aggressors and improving its texture.

#JoelleParis #FacialCleanser #SkinCare #HealthySkin #SkinHydration #MakeupRemover #BeautyProducts #SkincareRoutine #SaudiBeauty #CleanSkin

title_ar: Ø¬ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ³ Ù…Ø³ØªØ­Ù„Ø¨ Ù„ØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„ØªØ§Ù„Ù 50 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the restorative power with **Joelle Paris Intensive Nutritive Elixir 50 ml**. This rich elixir, infused with Babassu Oil and Silk Protein, breathes new life into damaged hair, from scalp to ends.

â­ Deeply regenerates damaged hair.
â­ Leaves hair looking healthy and vibrant.
â­ Multi-use oil for pre and post-styling.
â­ Restores strength and enhances hair's softness.
â­ Delivers ultimate shine and deep conditioning.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Intensive Nutritive Elixir 50 ml**:

*   **General use:** Apply 2 to 4 pumps, depending on hair length.
*   **Option 1: For nourishment:** Apply to brushed, dry hair. Leave for 20 minutes, massaging your scalp. Rinse out before applying shampoo.
*   **Option 2: For very dry scalp and dandruff-prone hair:** Soak the hair and leave it overnight. Wash the hair the next day.
*   **Option 3: Looking for wax and serum replacements:** Apply to towel-dried hair.
*   **Option 4: For shiny hair:** Apply to the ends and length of the hair after blow-drying.
*   **Option 5: The touch-up:** Apply throughout the day to add a touch of shine as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Intensive Nutritive Elixir 50 ml**:

*   **Babassu Oil:** For its moisturizing and nourishing properties.
*   **Silk Protein:** For its moisturizing properties that help improve hair shine while adding elasticity.

description_en:
Discover the secret to a sculpted physique with **Joelle Paris I Care Body Contouring Cream**. This innovative cream is expertly formulated to firm and define your body's contours, giving you the confidence of a fitter-looking silhouette. It soothes and tones the skin in targeted areas, delivering noticeable results that improve with regular use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris I Care Body Contouring Cream**:
â­ Apply 1 pump to the needed area using the integrated massage applicator on the bottle.
â­ For optimal absorption and a rapid firming effect, massage each area in a circular motion for 5 minutes to boost blood circulation and combat stubborn under-skin fats.
â­ Do not wash off after application.
â­ Apply morning and night for best results.
â­ Caution: Temporary redness may appear on massaged areas for 20-45 minutes, depending on skin sensitivity.
â­ Do not use after waxing, scrubbing, Moroccan bath, or sunburn.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris I Care Body Contouring Cream**:
â­ Papaya Fruit Extract: Acts as an anti-cellulite agent, working to smooth and refine skin texture.
â­ Citrus Fruit Extracts: Provides a firming and lifting effect by enhancing blood circulation for improved skin appearance.

#BodyContouring #BodyFirming #BodyCare #Cellulite #Slimming #Beauty #TonedSkin #JoelleParis #Skincare #SaudiArabia

title_ar: Ø¬ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ³ ØªÙˆÙ†Ø± Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ Ø¬ÙŠ Ø¬Ù„Ùˆ Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¯Ù‡Ù†ÙŠØ© - 200 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
The **Joelle Paris Jglow Facial Toner 200 ml** fights bacteria and breakouts, leaving your skin clear, balanced, and incredibly refreshed. It's formulated to be non-comedogenic with a balanced pH, making it ideal for normal to oily skin types.

â­ Leaves skin clear, plumped, and glowing with health.
â­ Features an antiseptic effect on the skin.
â­ Non-comedogenic, ensuring it won't clog pores.
â­ Clinically-tested for maximum safety and efficacy.
â­ Helps control oil production, reduce acne, and prevent blackheads and whiteheads.
â­ Enhances the penetration of active ingredients from the JGLOW Balancing Cream.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Jglow Facial Toner 200 ml**:
â­ Use after cleansing with a suitable face wash, day and night.
â­ Avoid the eye area during application.
â­ Apply the toner onto a cotton pad and gently wipe it across your skin.
â­ Do not rinse. If dryness or peeling occurs, reduce usage to once a day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Jglow Facial Toner 200 ml**:
â­ Menthol: Refreshes and cools the skin.
â­ Zinc Gluconate: Reduces excess sebum production.
â­ Bisabolol (German Chamomile): An anti-inflammatory that reduces redness and calms the skin.

#JoelleParis #OilySkinToner #Skincare #AcneTreatment #ClearSkin #GlowingSkin #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Achieve naturally fuller, shinier lips with **Joelle Paris What A Pout Lip Gloss**. This gloss delivers results better than cosmetic injections, with effects appearing in just 3 minutes and sustaining with regular use for plump, shiny, and clear lips. Enjoy a slight tingling and warm sensation, normal for 10-15 minutes, indicating its efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris What A Pout Lip Gloss**
â­ Clean your lips thoroughly before application.
â­ Use it alone for a natural look or before applying lip color to enhance volume and shine.
â­ For best and long-lasting results, reapply as needed.
â­ The full plumping effect will last from 30 minutes to 1 hour.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris What A Pout Lip Gloss**
â­ Castor Oil: Restores the skin's natural moisture balance.
â­ Carnauba Wax: Provides a smooth application and a glossy finish.
â­ Orchid Flower Leaf Extract: Possesses antioxidant properties and reduces the appearance of lip lines.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates and gives lips a fuller, plumper appearance.
â­ Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38: Acts as a collagen-stimulating peptide and botanical blend to minimize lip lines while increasing volume, giving a tingling sensation and boosting blood circulation.

#JoelleParis #LipGloss #PlumpLips #LipCare #LipHydration #Beauty #LipMakeup #SaudiBeauty #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Discover the secret to shiny, healthy hair with **Joelle Paris Blow Shine Spray**. This unique spray is formulated to protect your hair from styling tool heat and environmental aggressors, while providing deep nourishment and superior moisture for a healthy, vibrant look. It imparts a brilliant shine that turns heads.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Blow Shine Spray**:
â­ Apply to towel-dried, damp hair.
â­ Spray evenly throughout the lengths of your hair for optimal coverage.
â­ Can be used on dry hair for easy combing and a final glossy finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Blow Shine Spray**:
â­ Quinoa Extract: Rich in 9 essential amino acids that strengthen hair follicles, repair hair by nourishing, and hydrating the scalp.
â­ Amber Oil Extract: Nourishes and moisturizes the hair deeply, granting exceptional softness and shine.
