description_en:
Discover the secret to stunning lashes and brows with **JOELLE PARIS MAGIC WAND (Set 1 Transparent)**, a clinically proven conditioning serum that enhances the overall density of thin eyelashes and eyebrows. In just 4 weeks, reveal thicker, longer, and more nourished lashes and brows by up to 66%, giving your eyes a beautiful, healthy-looking appearance. Its unique formula transforms your lashes and brows for a truly captivating look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **JOELLE PARIS MAGIC WAND (Set 1 Transparent)**
â­ Remove all traces of eye make-up or creams.
â­ Apply the transparent wand to the base of your eyebrows and the upper and lower lashes.
â­ For a better result, use it regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **JOELLE PARIS MAGIC WAND (Set 1 Transparent)**
â­ Arginine: Helps protect from free radicals and boosts collagen production.
â­ Citric Acid: Provides an exfoliating effect.
â­ Castor Oil: Its fatty acids extremely nourish the lashes and brows.
â­ Panthenol: Offers moisturizing properties.
â­ Biotinoyl Tripeptide-1: Helps in reducing hair fall and in providing a longer and fuller lashes and brows appearance.

#JoelleParis #MagicWand #LashSerum #EyebrowEnhancer #LongLashes #ThickBrows #EyeCare #BeautySaudi #MakeupAddict #SkincareRoutine

description_en:
Discover the secret to refreshed and revitalized skin with **Joelle Paris Rescue Me 50 ml**. This luxurious cream is infused with soothing and hydrating properties, featuring a fast-absorbing texture that controls excess oil, making it ideal for normal to dry skin.

â­ Infused with soothing and hydrating properties.
â­ Fast-absorbing texture that controls oils on the skin.
â­ Recommended for dry, stressed, and dull skin.
â­ Boosts collagen and elastin production for stronger, more youthful-looking skin.
â­ Keeps the skin hydrated throughout the day.
â­ Can be used as a perfect make-up primer.
â­ Clinically tested for efficacy and safety.
â­ Non-sticky, suitable for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Rescue Me 50 ml**:
â­ Step 1: Cleanse your skin with your preferred cleanser suitable for your skin type.
â­ Step 2: Apply a suitable amount to the face and neck, massaging gently.
â­ Step 3: For best results, it is recommended to use with sunscreen.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Rescue Me 50 ml**:
â­ Vitamin C: A potent antioxidant that boosts collagen production and brightens the skin.
â­ Natural Extracts (Sweet Orange, Red Grape, Kiwi, Guava, Fig Tree): They work to exfoliate, remineralize, moisturize, and tone the skin.

description_en:
**Joelle Paris So White Cream 50 ml** provides a new radiance to your skin, melting into it to inhibit melanin production and reduce skin pigmentation, leaving it silky and smooth. Enjoy a brighter, more even-toned complexion with this effective cream.

â­ Suitable for all skin types
â­ Contains Glycolic Acid for gentle exfoliation and skin cell renewal
â­ Can be used morning and evening
â­ Non-Comedogenic, as its light and non-greasy formula does not cause breakouts
â­ Clinically-Tested for efficacy and safety
â­ Fast-absorbing, it effectively moisturizes and smoothens the skin
â­ Brightens and unifies skin tone for a more youthful and radiant appearance

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris So White Cream 50 ml**
â­ Step 1: Wash your face with your preferred face cleanser suitable for your skin type.
â­ Step 2: Apply the brightening cream twice daily to a clean, dry face.
â­ Step 3: See noticeable results in just 2 weeks.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris So White Cream 50 ml**
â­ Bearberry Extract: Lightens and brightens the skin tone, corrects hyperpigmentation problems, and reduces acne scars.
â­ Alpine Plants: Possess effective antioxidant and anti-aging properties that limit collagen loss and protect the skin from environmental factors.
â­ Vitamin PP or B3 (Niacinamide): Works on improving the skin barrier function, offers environmental protection, prevents water loss, and retains the skin's moisture content.

#JoelleParis #SoWhiteCream #SkinBrightening #SkinWhitening #Skincare #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia #SaudiBeauty #BeautyProducts #EvenSkinTone

description_en:
Experience radiant skin with **Joelle Paris Good Day Cream**. This lightweight, non-greasy day cream deeply nourishes your skin, providing continuous moisture and a protective shield against harmful external factors. Enriched with SPF 50+, it effectively safeguards your skin, giving it a healthy and luminous appearance.

â­ Offers high sun protection with SPF 50+
â­ Lightweight, non-greasy, and fast-absorbing formula
â­ Provides deep and lasting skin hydration
â­ Protects the skin from damaging environmental factors
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin, leaving no white cast
â­ Water-resistant for all-day protection

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Good Day Cream**
â­ Apply an adequate amount 20 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Re-apply as needed, especially after sweating or swimming.
â­ Use a small amount to reduce the appearance of oils on the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Good Day Cream**
â­ Lumiskin: Provides a whitening effect, reducing skin pigmentation by inhibiting melanin production.
â­ Gigawhite: A blend of seven alpine plants that aids in skin whitening, anti-aging, and reducing pigmentation.
â­ Viapure Liquorice White: Acts as a whitening agent by inhibiting melanin production, thereby preventing skin pigmentation.

#JoelleParis #DayCream #Sunscreen #SkinCare #SunProtection #HealthySkin #SkinWhitening #Moisturizing #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia

title_en: Joelle Paris 24K Gold Face Lift & Brightening Mask 25g
title_ar: Ø¬ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ³ Ù‚Ù†Ø§Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø°Ù‡Ø¨ Ù„Ø´Ø¯ Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ ÙˆØªÙØªÙŠØ­ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© 25 Ø¬Ø±Ø§Ù…
description_en:
Reveal your skin's radiant secret with the **Joelle Paris Face Lift Gold Mask**.

This innovative cellulose sheet mask immerses your skin in a unique blend of active ingredients, leaving it shining and glowing like gold from the very first use. Its firming action targets the forehead and T-Zone to give your facial features a more contoured profile.

â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ Hypo-allergenic and clinically tested.
â­ Deeply hydrates, leaving skin toned, nourished, smooth, and glowing.
â­ Promotes blood circulation, increasing skin elasticity for a smoother, healthier complexion.
â­ Ideal for use at least twice a week as part of your skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Face Lift Gold Mask**:
â­ Gently unfold and place the mask onto a thoroughly cleansed face.
â­ Adjust over the mouth, nose, and eyes for a perfect fit before removing the protective cover.
â­ Relax for 10-20 minutes, then remove the mask sheet.
â­ Massage the remaining serum into your face and neck; no rinsing is required.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Face Lift Gold Mask**:
â­ 24K Gold: Possesses antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.
â­ Boswellia Serrata Resin Extract: Offers anti-aging benefits.
â­ Blueberry, Blackberry, Strawberry, Ursi Leaf Extract, and Aloe Fruits Extract: Antioxidant-rich ingredients that hydrate and brighten the skin.
â­ Hydrolyzed Collagen: Enhances skin hydration, combats wrinkles, and improves elasticity.
â­ Cellulose Gum: Beneficial bacteria that converts glucose into cellulose for skin health.

#JoelleParis #GoldMask #Skincare #FaceLift #SkinBrightening #Hydration #AntiAging #HealthySkin #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Joelle Paris Love Eyes Eye Contour Cream 20 ml** offers a unique blend of ingredients to treat the delicate eye contour area, delivering brighter, firmer, and more youthful-looking skin. This fast-absorbing, non-sticky formula is perfect for all skin types, suitable for both day and night use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Love Eyes Eye Contour Cream 20 ml**:
â­ Apply around the eyes morning and night on clean skin.
â­ Gently massage in a circular motion.
â­ Can be used as a pre-makeup contour for a flawless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Love Eyes Eye Contour Cream 20 ml**:
â­ Delesseria Sanguinea: Activates blood circulation to reduce puffiness.
â­ Lipidami Centella Asiatica: Accelerates skin healing and regeneration.
â­ Gingko Leaf: Provides antioxidant properties and reduces collagen loss.
â­ Red Vine: Promotes microcirculation and reduces under-eye bags.

#JoelleParis #EyeCream #EyeCare #BeautySkin #FaceMoisture #EyeMakeup #Skincare #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #DarkCircleTreatment

description_en:
Give your eyes the care they deserve with **Joelle Paris So White Eyes** eye brightening cream.

This intensely hydrating and whitening cream for the eye contour works instantly to inhibit the appearance of pigmentation and dark circles, giving your eyes a refreshed and vibrant look. Enriched with advanced brightening technology, **Joelle Paris So White Eyes** instantly revives tired skin.

â­ Provides instant brightening for the under-eye area.
â­ Prevents the formation of pigmentation and dark circles.
â­ Calms, smoothes, moisturizes, and lightens the delicate eye skin.
â­ Can be used as an ideal make-up primer.
â­ Non-comedogenic and non-greasy.
â­ Clinically tested for the highest safety standards.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris So White Eyes**:
â­ Gently apply to the delicate eye contour area.
â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening.
â­ See noticeable results within just 2 weeks.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris So White Eyes**:
â­ Shitake Mushrooms Extract: For its calming and whitening properties.
â­ Liquorice Extract: For an effective whitening effect that inhibits melanin production and combats skin pigmentation.

Discover more from the complete **Joelle Paris So White** range.

#JoelleParis #EyeBrightening #DarkCircles #Skincare #SkinBrightening #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #Beauty #HealthySkin #InstantBrightening

description_en:
Achieve flawless skin with **Joelle Paris Take Cover Foundation 50ml - Cocoa**. This lightweight, oil-free foundation provides full coverage and a long-lasting matte finish, while offering superior sun protection with SPF 30.

â­ It's a 4-in-1 product: moisturizer, sunblock, concealer, and foundation.
â­ Gives your skin a natural glow with a shine-free finish.
â­ Available in three beautiful shades: Marshmallow, Cocoa, and Olive.
â­ Protects your skin from UVA and UVB rays with SPF 30.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Paris Take Cover Foundation 50ml - Cocoa**:
â­ Apply a very thin layer to a fully cleansed face 15 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Start from the center of the face and blend it outwards.
â­ Re-apply every 2 hours for maximum results and long-lasting protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Paris Take Cover Foundation 50ml - Cocoa**:
â­ UVA / UVB 30+ Filters.
â­ Vitamin E Acetate: Antioxidant properties that help prevent damage to the skin caused by UV exposure.
â­ Glycerin: Antioxidant and hydration properties.

description_en:
Enhance your eyes with **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Wild Cat B10**. These lenses feature striking streaked slate grey tones with a soft dark contour, providing a captivating and unique look. Perfect for making a statement.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Wild Cat B10**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before handling the lenses.
â­ Place the lens gently on your index finger.
â­ Lift your upper eyelid up gently.
â­ Pull your lower eyelid down gently.
â­ Look aside and place the lens on the sclera (white area) of your eye.
â­ Look forward until the lens centers correctly.
â­ Avoid direct eye exposure to dust and prevent soap or cosmetics from entering the eye.
â­ Do not exceed the allowed wearing period and expiry date.
â­ Always store the lenses in the appropriate solution after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens Wild Cat B10**
â­ High-quality monthly contact lenses.
â­ Streaked slate grey tones with a soft dark contour.
â­ Designed for comfort and clear vision.
â­ Trusted brand: Joelle.
â­ Quantity: 1 Pair.

#JoelleLenses #EyecandyLenses #WildCatLenses #ContactLenses #ColoredLenses #BeautifulEyes #EyeMakeup #MonthlyLenses #EyeBeauty #KSA

title_en: Joelle Eyecandy Explorer C4 - Sky Blue
title_ar: Ø¹Ø¯Ø³Ø§Øª Ø§ÙŠ ÙƒØ§Ù†Ø¯ÙŠ Ø§ÙƒØ³Ø¨Ù„ÙˆØ±ÙŠØ± C4 Ù…Ù† Ø¬ÙˆÙŠÙ„ - Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø²Ø±Ù‚ Ø§Ù„Ø³Ù…Ø§ÙˆÙŠ
description_en:
Discover the allure of natural blue eyes with **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens C4 Explorer**, in its stunning sky blue shade that mirrors the purity of a clear sky. Enjoy an captivating and attractive look for three months with these high-quality cosmetic lenses.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens C4 Explorer**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before touching the lenses.
â­ Gently place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Lift the upper eyelid gently upwards.
â­ Pull the lower eyelid gently downwards.
â­ Look aside and place the lens on the white area of the eye (sclera).
â­ Look forward until the lens is centered correctly.
â­ Ensure your hands are washed thoroughly when using lenses.
â­ Avoid direct exposure of your eyes to dust or dirt.
â­ Be careful not to let soap or cosmetics enter your eye.
â­ Do not exceed the allowed usage period (three months).
â­ Do not use lenses after their expiry date.
â­ Always store lenses in the dedicated solution after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Contact Lens C4 Explorer**:
â­ High-quality hydrogel material for maximum comfort.
â­ Natural and enchanting sky blue color.
â­ Comfortable design allowing oxygen permeability to the eye.
â­ Ideal for daily wear and special occasions.

#JoelleLenses #EyeCandy #NaturalLenses #BlueEyes #AttractiveEyes #EyeMakeup #Beauty #EyeCare #SaudiArabia #Fashion

description_en:
Experience the allure of Denim Blue with **Joelle Eyecandy Billionaire** contact lenses. This intense, deep blue shade masterfully shifts with light, transforming from a dark blue to a captivating, rich blue, granting your eyes a unique and mesmerizing gaze. These cosmetic contact lenses are designed for comfortable wear for up to 3 months.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Joelle Eyecandy Billionaire**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before handling lenses.
â­ Place the lens carefully on the tip of your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid to open your eye.
â­ Gently pull your lower eyelid down.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the white part of your eye (the sclera).
â­ Look forward until the lens centers correctly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Joelle Eyecandy Billionaire**:
â­ High-quality material ensuring comfort and clear vision.
â­ Oxygen-permeable design for all-day eye comfort.
â­ Deep and attractive Denim Blue color.
â­ Suitable for 3 months of use.
â­ Available in all prescription strengths.

#JoelleLenses #EyecandyLenses #ContactLenses #ColoredLenses #EyeMakeup #Lashes #SaudiMakeup #RiyadhBeauty #MakeupDeals #KSAContacts

title_ar: Ø¬ÙŠÙˆÙØ§Ù†ÙŠ Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ø´Ø¬Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø§ÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù†Ø´Ø· - 250Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience ultimate refreshment with **Giovanni Teatree Triple Treat Shampoo**, designed to cleanse your hair and scalp thoroughly. Its blend of invigorating ingredients rejuvenates every strand, leaving you feeling clean and energized from head to toe. This gentle shampoo will not dull, strip color, or damage your hair, and it's color-safe, paraben-free, and cruelty-free.

â­ Invigorating ingredients deliver unmatched clarity and rejuvenation for hair and scalp.
â­ Increases scalp circulation for a refreshed, renewed feel.
â­ Strengthens hair with a three-organic-oil blend to stimulate, condition, and clarify.
â­ Color-Safe.
â­ Vegan-Friendly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Teatree Triple Treat Shampoo**:
â­ Massage the shampoo into wet hair, rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Teatree Triple Treat Shampoo**:
â­ Aqua (Purified Water), Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Menthol, Glycerin, Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Leaf Oil, Lauryl Glucoside, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Decyl Glucoside, Polyquaternium-7, Polysorbate 20, Fragrance, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract.

#GiovanniShampoo #TeaTreeShampoo #HairCare #HealthyHair #ScalpCare #Invigorating #HairRejuvenation #ShinyHair #NaturalHairProducts #SaudiHairCare

description_en:
Transform your hair into a silky, touchable dream with Giovanni's SMOOTH AS SILKâ„¢ Deep Moisture Shampoo.

This pearlized formula, enriched with Apple and Aloe extracts from our new and improved Eco ChicÂ® technology, glistens and transforms your hair into a silky palette. Experience enhanced moisturizers for even silkier hair that's softer, smoother, and more manageable.

Giovanni SMOOTH AS SILKâ„¢ Deep Moisture Shampoo provides a luxurious lather that gently cleanses, soothes dry and chemically processed hair, calms unruly strands to alleviate frizz, and increases shine. It's color-safe, paraben-free, and cruelty-free, ensuring you receive the best natural care for your hair.

Product Features:
â­ Luxurious lather soothes dry, chemically processed hair.
â­ Cleanses gently for manageable smoothness.
â­ Calms unruly hair to alleviate frizz.
â­ Increases shine while smoothing dry or damaged hair.
â­ Lauryl sulfate-free.
â­ Color-Safe.
â­ Vegan Friendly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Smooth As Silk**:
â­ Massage rich lather into wet hair and rinse thoroughly.
â­ For best results, we recommend following up with our SMOOTH AS SILKâ„¢ Deeper Moisture Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Smooth As Silk**:
â­ Aqua (Purified Water), Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Lauryl Glucoside, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Glycerin, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Leaf Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Valencia Orange) Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus (Lemongrass) Extract, Echinacea Purpurea Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Sea Kelp) Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Extract, Salix Alba (Willow Bark) Extract, Xanthan Gum, Glycol Distearate, Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Natural Fragrance.

#GiovanniShampoo #GiovanniHair #SilkyHair #HairMoisture #SmoothHair #HairCare #HealthyHair #NaturalShampoo #HairProducts #SaudiBeauty

title_ar: Ø¬ÙŠÙˆÙØ§Ù†ÙŠ Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ù„Ø§ ÙŠÙØªØ±Ùƒ Ø¹Ù„Ù‰ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ù„Ø¬Ù…ÙŠØ¹ Ø£Ù†ÙˆØ§Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± 250 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience weightless hydration with the **Giovanni Direct Leave-In Conditioner** for all hair types. This advanced formula penetrates each strand to deliver targeted moisture, leaving your hair feeling thicker and fuller with effortless styling. It's the perfect way to achieve beautiful, manageable hair without any heaviness. This **Giovanni** leave-in conditioner is color-safe, paraben-free, and cruelty-free.

Product Features:
â­ Restores strength and luster to damaged and dull hair.
â­ Moisturizes and builds body for healthier-looking hair.
â­ Detangles for easy comb-out and effortless styling.
â­ Color-safe to protect your vibrant hair color.
â­ Vegan-friendly and never tested on animals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Direct Leave-In Conditioner**:
â­ Apply to freshly shampooed, towel-dried, damp hair.
â­ Comb through to distribute evenly from roots to ends.
â­ Do not rinse. Air dry or blow dry for added body.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Direct Leave-In Conditioner**:
â­ Purified Water, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5).
â­ Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract.
â­ Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil.
â­ Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Extract, Cetrimonium Bromide, Natural Fragrance, Citric Acid.
â­ Phenoxyethanol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol

#Giovanni #LeaveInConditioner #HairCare #Moisturize #HairHealth #SaudiBeauty #HairStyle #VeganHaircare #Beauty #SalonQuality

title_ar: Ø¬ÙŠÙˆÙØ§Ù†ÙŠ Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… Ø§Ù„ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù…ÙŠÙ‚ Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„ØªØ§Ù„Ù - 250 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover unparalleled smoothness with Giovanni's **Giovanni Smooth As Silk Deep Moisture Conditioner**. 

This conditioner provides the silky hair you've always dreamed of, detangling and smoothing your hair for incredible shine and manageability. This color-safe formula works where needed to create a silky-smooth palette, nourishing your hair without dulling or stripping its color. It leaves your hair looking healthy and vibrant.

â­ Infuses deep moisture for manageable smoothness.
â­ Detangles while protecting against split ends.
â­ Calms unruly hair to alleviate frizz.
â­ Increases shine while smoothing dry or damaged hair.
â­ 100% color-safe.
â­ Vegan-friendly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Smooth As Silk Deep Moisture Conditioner**:
â­ Apply daily after using SMOOTH AS SILKâ„¢ Deep Moisture Shampoo.
â­ Massage through to ends before rinsing thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Smooth As Silk Deep Moisture Conditioner**:
â­ Aqua (Purified Water), Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Valencia Orange) Fruit Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Sea Kelp) Extract, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus (Lemongrass) Extract, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Phenoxyethanol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cetrimonium Bromide, Natural Fragrance, Ethylhexylglycerin.

#Giovanni #HairCare #SmoothHair #DeepMoisture #SilkyHair #HealthyHair #HairShine #FrizzControl #DamagedHair #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience the secret to hydrated, healthy hair with **Giovanni Balanced Shampoo 250ml**. This luxurious shampoo is meticulously crafted to provide your hair with the deep hydration it craves, balancing effective cleansing with supreme protection. As a signature product from Giovanni's Eco ChicÂ® collection, it offers a unique experience to revitalize dull hair and impart superior shine. Its gentle formula is safe for daily use, paraben-free, and cruelty-free, making it the ideal choice for over-processed and stressed hair. It leaves your hair feeling refreshed and clean while preserving hair color and enhancing manageability.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Balanced Shampoo 250ml**
â­ Massage rich lather into wet hair and rinse thoroughly.
â­ For optimal results, follow with Giovanni's 50:50 BALANCEDâ„¢ Hydrating-Calming Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Balanced Shampoo 250ml**
â­ Features hydrating botanical extracts to smooth frizz.
â­ Leaves hair perfectly pH balanced and clean.
â­ Color-safe and vegan-friendly.
â­ Paraben-free and cruelty-free.
â­ Packaged in recyclable materials.

description_en:
Elevate your hair to new heights with **Giovanni Root Max Volume Shampoo**. Specifically formulated for fine, limp hair lacking vitality, this volumizing shampoo boosts hair fullness and maximizes volume without weighing strands down. Infused with Horsetail Extract, a nutrient-rich herb high in silica, it works to strengthen hair from root to tip. It's the perfect choice for fine, oily, and lifeless hair seeking renewed bounce and body. Achieve visibly thicker, more vibrant hair with this color-safe, paraben-free, and cruelty-free formula.

**Product Features:**

â­ Increases volume in limp, lifeless hair.
â­ Cleanses and adds weightless bounce.
â­ Strengthens thin, fragile hair.
â­ Protects fine hair from damage while building body.
â­ Lauryl and laureth sulfate-free.
â­ Color-Safe.
â­ Vegan-Friendly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Root Max Volume Shampoo**:

â­ Lather this sulfate-free volumizing shampoo into wet hair.
â­ Rinse. Repeat for maximum volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Root Max Volume Shampoo**:

â­ Aqua (Water), Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Acrylates Copolymer, Decyl Glucoside, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Chloride (Sea Salt), Natural Fragrance, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Benzyl Benzoate, Glyceryl Citrate/Lactate/Linoleate/Oleate, Alcohol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide.

#Giovanni #GiovanniShampoo #HairVolume #ThickerHair #HealthyHair #StrongHair #HairCare #NaturalShampoo #FineHair #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience perfect hair balance with **Giovanni 50:50 Balanced Conditioner**. This luxurious conditioner is specially formulated to reawaken dry hair, providing deep hydration and effective clarifying. With its unique blend of organic ingredients and protection factors, **Giovanni 50:50 Balanced Conditioner** revitalizes dull hair and imparts a healthy shine. It's 100% color-safe, paraben-free, and cruelty-free, offering your hair the care it deserves.

â­ Deep moisturizing properties help calm & restore dry hair.
â­ A blend of organic oils and botanical extracts help revitalize dull hair.
â­ Adds moisture and manageability.
â­ Hydrating botanical extracts smooth frizz.
â­ Leaves hair perfectly pH balanced and conditioned.
â­ Ideal for overprocessed, environmentally stressed hair.
â­ Color-Safe.
â­ Vegan-Friendly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni 50:50 Balanced Conditioner**:
â­ Massage the moisture-rich formula into drenched hair.
â­ Rinse thoroughly and style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni 50:50 Balanced Conditioner**:
â­ Aqua (Purified Water), Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Polysorbate 60, Phenoxyethanol, Cetearyl Alcohol.
â­ Hydroxypropyl Guar, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol, Cetrimonium Chloride.
â­ Citric Acid, Natural Fragrance, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice.
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Betula Alba (Birch) Extract, Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Extract.
â­ Achillea Millefolium Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Equisetum Arvense Extract.
â­ Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Extract.
â­ Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract, Tussilago Farfara (Coltsfoot) Flower Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract.

#GiovanniHair #HairCare #HairMoisture #HealthyHair #OrganicProducts #DryHair #CalmingConditioner #HairStyle #DeepHydration #SaudiArabia

title_en: Giovanni Frizz Be Gone Shampoo for Taming Flyaways - 250ml
title_ar: Ø¬ÙŠÙˆÙØ§Ù†ÙŠ Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ù…Ø¶Ø§Ø¯ Ø§Ù„ØªØ¬Ø¹Ø¯ Ù„ØªØ±ÙˆÙŠØ¶ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„Ù…ØªØ·Ø§ÙŠØ± - 250 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Say goodbye to frizz and flyaways with **Giovanni Frizz Be Gone Shampoo**, your ultimate solution for smooth, silky hair. This luxurious shampoo works to tame your mane and improve its smoothness with its rich formula of organic essential oils. **Giovanni Frizz Be Gone Shampoo** features our innovative Dual Smoothing Complex, a blend of Shea Butter and Sweet Almond oil, specifically designed to control frizz and flyaways without weighing down your strands.

It boasts a unique mix of Argan, Jojoba, and Coconut Oils that wrap every strand in deep hydration, effectively conquering even the most stubborn frizz. **Giovanni Frizz Be Gone Shampoo** is safe for color-treated hair, won't dull or strip color, and is paraben-free and cruelty-free.

â­ Gently cleanses hair and enhances its softness.
â­ Effectively controls frizz for a sleek, polished look.
â­ Boosts hair's shine and revitalizes its appearance.
â­ Deeply hydrates and nourishes hair strands.
â­ Safe for color-treated hair.
â­ Provides humidity control and tames flyaways.
â­ Silkens hair, restoring its vibrancy and elasticity.
â­ Helps strengthen hair strands and prevent breakage.
â­ Banishes impurities and renews hair's health.
â­ Aids in preventing split ends.
â­ Disciplines flyaway hair and improves manageability.
â­ Lightly conditions for a refreshed feel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Frizz Be Gone Shampoo**:
â­ Massage this anti-frizz shampoo into wet hair, creating a rich lather. Rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Frizz Be Gone Shampoo**:
â­ Aqua (Purified Water), Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Glycol Distearate, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Coconut Alkanes, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, *Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Seed Oil, Lauryl Glucoside, Fragrance, *Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Laureth-4, Polyquaternium-7, *Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol.

#GiovanniShampoo #HairCare #SmoothHair #AntiFrizz #HairHydration #HealthyHair #HairProducts #ShinyHair #DailyCare #SaudiArabia

title_ar: Ø¬ÙŠÙˆÙØ§Ù†ÙŠ Nutra Fix Ù„Ø¥Ø¹Ø§Ø¯Ø© Ø¨Ù†Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„ØªØ§Ù„Ù 200 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Don't fight your hair's battle with damage alone! Introducing **Giovanni Nutra Fix Hair Reconstructor**, the ultimate solution for hair suffering from over-processing and heat styling. This product is carefully formulated to penetrate deeply and address damage from within, restoring your hair's strength, vitality, and shine. Rich in proteins, **Giovanni Nutra Fix Hair Reconstructor** works to fill porosity and boost hair density, making it thicker and more voluminous. It's color-safe, paraben-free, and cruelty-free. Revive your hair's health with every use.

Product Features:
â­ Re-energizes tired, damaged hair and protects it from the damage of processing and heat styling.
â­ Encourages natural hair thickness and volume.
â­ Fills porous hair strands with nourishing proteins for deep repair.
â­ Completely safe for colored hair and preserves its color.
â­ A vegan formula that has not been tested on animals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Nutra Fix Hair Reconstructor**:
â­ Massage **Giovanni Nutra Fix Hair Reconstructor** into wet hair.
â­ Leave on the hair for 10 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Nutra Fix Hair Reconstructor**:
â­ Aqua (Purified Water), Cetyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Chloride, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Natural Fragrance, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Betula Alba Extract, Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Extract, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Equisetum Arvense Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract, Tussilago Farfara (Coltsfoot) Flower Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract.

#Giovanni #HairCare #DamagedHairTreatment #HealthyHair #HairMoisture #StrongHair #HairProducts #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Introducing Giovanni Root 66 Max Volume Conditioner 250ml, the ultimate solution for fine, limp hair lacking vitality.

This innovative conditioner revitalizes and adds fullness from the roots with its unique formula.

â­ Boosts volume in limp hair, giving it thickness.
â­ Detangles and smooths hair, making it easy to style.
â­ Contains Horsetail Extract, rich in Silica to strengthen hair from within.
â­ Protects fine hair from damage while building body for a luxurious result.
â­ Color-safe and vegan-friendly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Root 66 Max Volume Conditioner**:

â­ Apply **Giovanni Root 66 Max Volume Conditioner** after shampooing with Root 66â„¢ Max Volume Shampoo for maximum root volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Root 66 Max Volume Conditioner**:

â­ Aqua (Purified Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil.
â­ Cetrimonium Methosulfate, Polyquaternium-7, Quaternium-91, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract.
â­ Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Calendula Officinalis (Marigold) Flower Extract, Natural Fragrance, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol.

title_ar: Ø¬ÙŠÙˆÙØ§Ù†ÙŠ Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… Ù…Ù†Ø¹Ø´ Ø¨Ø´Ø¬Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø§ÙŠ - 250 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience invigorating hydration with **Giovanni Teatree Triple Treat Conditioner**. This luxurious conditioner not only moisturizes, smooths, and detangles your hair, but also provides a unique invigorating tingling sensation thanks to its rich blend of stimulating ingredients. It offers a true treat for your hair and dry scalp, boosting circulation for a renewed feel. It strengthens hair with a blend of three natural organic oils, promoting natural shine and resilience without dulling, stripping color, or damaging your hair. It's color-safe, paraben-free, and completely vegan-friendly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Teatree Triple Treat Conditioner**:
â­ Massage into hair for 3-5 minutes for optimal tingle.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Teatree Triple Treat Conditioner**:
â­ Aqua (Purified Water), Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Menthol, Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Leaf Oil, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Propanediol, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol, Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Cetrimonium Bromide, Ethylhexylglycerin.

#GiovanniTeaTree #TeaTreeConditioner #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairRefresh #HairMoisture #SaudiBeauty #HairFragrance #NaturalConditioner #ScalpCare

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless hair with Giovanni 2chicÂ® Repairing Hair Oil Serum. This exclusive potion, powered by our Dual Repairing Complex, blends the potent goodness of freshly picked Blackberries with the sweet, delicate nectar of Coconut Oil to strengthen and smooth your hair. Say goodbye to dry, frizzy, and over-processed hair. Use this finishing serum to make your hair look and feel immaculate. Itâ€™s formulated to not dull, strip color, or damage your hair, making it 100% color-safe, paraben-free, and cruelty-free.

Products Features:
â­ Smooths and deeply moisturizes your hair.
â­ Effectively tames frizz and flyaways.
â­ Adds a brilliant shine while enhancing color vibrancy.
â­ Prevents breakage and protects against split ends.
â­ Color-safe to maintain hair's vibrant hue.
â­ Vegan-friendly formula for conscious care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni 2chic Repairing Hair Oil Serum with Blackberry & Coconut 81ml**:
â­ Dispense a small amount onto your palms.
â­ Smooth evenly onto damp or dry hair.
â­ Designed to add shine, moisturize, and defrizz.
â­ Do not rinse.
â­ Style as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni 2chic Repairing Hair Oil Serum with Blackberry & Coconut 81ml**:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil.
â­ Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil.
â­ Macadamia Ternifolia (Macadamia) Seed Extract.
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Extract.
â­ Hydrolyzed Keratin.
â­ Rubus Fruticosus (Blackberry) Fruit Extract.
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract.
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E).
â­ Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5).
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Fruit Extract.
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract.
â­ Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Extract.
â­ Fragrance.

#Giovanni #HairSerum #HairCare #Blackberry #CoconutOil #HealthyHair #ShinyHair #HairMoisture #SaudiArabia #RiyadhBeauty

description_en:
Say goodbye to frizz and hello to smooth, shiny hair with **Giovanni Frizz Be Gone Conditioner**. This unique conditioner is carefully formulated to provide effective solutions for frizzy and flyaway hair, giving your hair the healthy look it deserves. It features an exceptional blend of organic essential oils that work in harmony to tame unmanageable hair and significantly improve its smoothness.

The **Giovanni Frizz Be Gone Conditioner** contains our Dual Smoothing Complex of Shea Butter and Sweet Almond oil, specifically designed to control frizz and flyaways without weighing down your hair. The result? Dramatically smoother hair, free from frizz. Perfect for dry, frizzy hair, this conditioner wraps every strand in ultimate hydration thanks to a rich blend of Argan, Jojoba, and Coconut Oils, effectively conquering even the most stubborn frizz. For best results, it's recommended to use after our 2chicÂ® Frizz Be Goneâ„¢ Shampoo. This conditioner is safe for color-treated hair, won't dull or damage it, and is paraben-free and cruelty-free.

â­ Conditions and moisturizes hair with an exotic oil blend.
â­ Significantly reduces frizz and flyaways.
â­ Tames unmanageable hair for superior smoothness.
â­ Enhances healthy shine.
â­ Seals in moisture within hair strands.
â­ Protects color-treated hair.
â­ Prevents flyaways and controls static electricity.
â­ Smooths hair and makes it easy to manage.
â­ Helps strengthen hair fibers and prevent split ends.
â­ Won't weigh hair down, leaving it light and refreshed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Frizz Be Gone Conditioner**
â­ Slowly massage the conditioner into wet hair from roots to ends.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Enjoy instantly smooth and shiny hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Frizz Be Gone Conditioner**
â­ Aqua (Purified Water), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Behenyl Alcohol, Steartrimonium Chloride, Dicetyldimonium Chloride, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Seed Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Fragrance, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.

#Giovanni #HairConditioner #HairCare #HealthyHair #SmoothHair #ShinyHair #AntiFrizz #HairMoisture #NaturalOils #SaudiArabia

title_ar: Ø¬ÙŠÙˆÙØ§Ù†ÙŠ Ø±ØºÙˆØ© ØªØµÙÙŠÙ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± AIR-TURBO CHARGED 207Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Elevate your style to exciting new heights with **Giovanni AIR-TURBO CHARGED Hair Styling Foam**. This innovative mousse provides your hair with superior volume, texture, and body, making your hair styling easier and faster than ever. Its unique formula revitalizes hair, giving it long-lasting hold without dulling, stripping color, or damaging your hair. Enjoy healthier, more vibrant hair with every use.

â­ Delivers superior volume, texture, and body to your hair.
â­ Specially formulated ingredients to spring hair into action and build height.
â­ Long-lasting hold for unparalleled hairstyles.
â­ Distributes easily for smooth moves in style.
â­ Enhances hair's texture and natural shine.
â­ Color-safe and preserves hair color.
â­ Vegan-friendly and cruelty-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni AIR-TURBO CHARGED Hair Styling Foam**
â­ Depress pump to dispense rich hair foam into palm.
â­ Distribute through damp or dry hair.
â­ Blow dry or air dry for turbo-charged style.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni AIR-TURBO CHARGED Hair Styling Foam**
â­ Aqua (Purified Water), VP/VA Copolymer, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Betula Alba Extract, Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Extract, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Equisetum Arvense Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract, Tussilago Farfara (Coltsfoot) Flower Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Natural Fragrance.

#Giovanni #HairStyling #HairMousse #VoluminousHair #HairVolume #ShinyHair #HairCare #HairProducts #HealthyHair #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Flaunt the ultimate sleek style with Giovanni's **Straight Fast Straightening Elixir**. 

Temporarily straightens hair until your next wash to smooth curls, relax waves, and control unruly hair. Promote hair health with certified organic botanicals. This lightweight hair straightening gel combats the effects of humidity and offers the perfect silky shine. Hair stays sleek and pleasant to the touch. Perfect for all hair types.

This elixir will not dull, strip color, or damage your hair. Itâ€™s color-safe, paraben-free, and cruelty-free.

â­ Smooths curls, relaxes waves, and controls the unruliest hair.
â­ Adds silky shine while repelling humidity.
â­ Smoothes and soothes hair for the ultimate sleek style.
â­ Temporarily straightens hair until your next shampoo.
â­ Botanicals protect hair from heat-styling.
â­ Color-Safe.
â­ Vegan-Friendly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Straight Fast Straightening Elixir**:
â­ Distribute hair straightening gel evenly through damp, towel-dried hair.
â­ Pull hair straight with a brush while blow-drying.
â­ To finish, smooth a small amount onto dry hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Straight Fast Straightening Elixir**:
â­ Aqua (Purified Water), Glycerin, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone.
â­ Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Phenoxyethanol.
â­ Fragrance (Includes Essential Oils), Eschscholtzia Californica Leaf Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract.
â­ Rosa Canina Fruit Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract.
â­ Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Extract.

#Giovanni #HairStraightening #HairCare #HealthyHair #SoftHair #ShinyHair #HairGel #HairStyling #SaudiArabia #BeautyProducts

description_en:
Discover the transformative power of **Giovanni Smooth As Silk Xtreme Protein Hair Infusion**, expertly formulated to smooth and help repair extreme damage. This protein-packed treatment infuses your hair with body, shine, and the smooth-as-silk texture you desire.

Product Features:

â­ Combs through hair to smooth extreme damage.
â­ Adds body, shine, and a smooth-as-silk slip.
â­ Revitalizes frayed, raspy, damaged, over-processed, or coarse hair.
â­ Used by hair care professionals.
â­ Color-Safe.
â­ Vegan-Friendly.
â­ Cruelty-Free.
â­ Paraben-Free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Smooth As Silk Xtreme Protein Hair Infusion**:

â­ Massage the treatment through freshly shampooed hair.
â­ Leave on for 3 to 10 minutes, depending on the amount of hair damage.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Can be used daily as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Smooth As Silk Xtreme Protein Hair Infusion**:

â­ Aqua (Purified Water), Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Cetrimonium Bromide.
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Polysorbate 60, Phenoxyethanol, Natural Fragrance.
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Macadamia Ternifolia (Macadamia Nut) Oil, Aleurites Moluccana (Kukui Nut) Oil.
â­ Punica Granatum (Pomegranate), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice.
â­ Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Leaf Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Valencia Orange) Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus (Lemongrass) Extract.
â­ Echinacea Purpurea Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract.
â­ Macrocystis Pyrifera (Sea Kelp) Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Extract, Salix Alba (Willow Bark) Extract.

title_en: Giovanni Deep Hydration Conditioner 250ml
title_ar: Ø¬ÙŠÙˆÙØ§Ù†ÙŠ Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø¹Ù…ÙŠÙ‚ 250 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the nourishing power of **Giovanni Deep Hydration Conditioner 250ml**. Specially formulated for dry and damaged hair, this luxurious conditioner deeply infuses every strand with essential moisture and intense nourishment. Featuring a delectable botanical blend of buttery Avocado and golden Olive Oil, **Giovanni Deep Hydration Conditioner 250ml** helps replenish hair that feels dull, lifeless, and brittle, leaving it incredibly soft and radiantly healthy. Its paraben-free, color-safe formula, enriched with Aloe Vera and Shea Butter, balances moisture levels and promotes overall hair health without stripping or damaging your color.

**Product Features:**
â­ Deeply conditions for lustrous shine.
â­ Leaves hair smooth & supple.
â­ Silkens hair with softness & shine.
â­ Drenches each tress in hydration.
â­ Helps prevent split ends & breakage.
â­ Color-Safe.
â­ Vegan-Friendly & Cruelty-Free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Deep Hydration Conditioner 250ml**
â­ Massage this color-safe deep conditioner from roots to ends to capture nutrients, moisture, and shine in every strand.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Deep Hydration Conditioner 250ml**
â­ Aqua (Purified Water), Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Fragrance, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Litchi (Lychee) Chinensis Fruit Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Chlorophyllin- Copper Complex.

#Giovanni #HairConditioner #HairHydration #HealthyHair #HairCare #OliveOil #SheaButter #AvocadoOil #SoftHair #SaudiBeauty #HairTreatment #VeganHairCare

title_ar: Ø¬ÙŠÙˆÙØ§Ù†ÙŠ Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¶Ø§Ø¯ Ù„Ù„ØªØ¬Ø¹Ø¯ØŒ 81 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Say goodbye to frizz with **Giovanni Frizz Be Gone Hair Serum**. This innovative formula delivers superior smoothness, healthy shine, and deep hydration to your hair. **Giovanni Frizz Be Gone Hair Serum** controls flyaways, adds incredible brilliance, and helps lock in hair color, making it the perfect solution for multiple hair concerns. Its formula is safe for color-treated hair, paraben-free, and cruelty-free, ensuring hair care that bridges the gap between natural quality and salon-quality results.

**Product Features:**
â­ Controls frizz and flyaways.
â­ Adds exceptional shine and hair health.
â­ Provides deep hydration and humidity control.
â­ Smoothes hair and detangles easily.
â­ Helps stop hair breakage and strengthens.
â­ Protects hair from high heat damage.
â­ Improves hair elasticity and resilience.
â­ Seals in hair color.
â­ Vegan-Friendly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Frizz Be Gone Hair Serum**:
â­ Rub a few silky drops of this luxurious hair serum onto the palm of your hands.
â­ Distribute evenly through wet or dry hair.
â­ Can be used with a blow dryer for straightening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Frizz Be Gone Hair Serum**:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Fragrance (Includes Essential Oils).
â­ *Eschscholtzia Californica Leaf Extract, *Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract.
â­ *Rosa Canina (Rose Hips) Fruit Extract, *Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract.
â­ *Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Wild Bergamot) Fruit Extract.

#Giovanni #HairSerum #HairCare #SmoothHair #ShinyHair #AntiFrizz #HealthyHair #HairProducts #HairMoisture #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Giovanni Golden Wheat Deep Cleanse Shampoo is your ideal solution for oily hair, offering a deep cleanse without stripping essential natural oils. Achieve a beautiful, lustrous mane by effectively removing excess oil and impurities. This shampoo is not only safe for color-treated hair but also enhances volume and shine, creating a perfect canvas for styling. Embrace a gentle, vegan-friendly formula that bridges the gap between natural efficacy and salon-quality results.

â­ Ideal for removing excess oils while contributing to a beautiful head of hair.
â­ Effectively cleanses hair and scalp, leaving them refreshed.
â­ Helps encourage volume and shine for a more vibrant look.
â­ Creates a clean palette for effortless styling.
â­ Free from lauryl sulfate for a gentle cleansing experience.
â­ Color-safe to maintain hair dye vibrancy.
â­ Vegan-friendly for conscious beauty choices.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Giovanni Golden Wheat** Deep Cleanse Shampoo
â­ Massage into wet hair and rinse thoroughly.
â­ Follow with the Giovanni Conditioner that best suits your hair type for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Giovanni Golden Wheat** Deep Cleanse Shampoo
â­ Aqua (Purified Water), Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Lauryl Glucoside, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Glycerin, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Leaf Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Valencia Orange) Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus (Lemongrass) Extract, Echinacea Purpurea Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Sea Kelp) Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Extract, Salix Alba (Willow Bark) Extract, Xanthan Gum, Glycol Distearate, Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Natural Fragrance.

#GiovanniShampoo #HealthyHair #HairCare #OilyHair #DeepCleanse #ShinyHair #NaturalHairProducts #VeganShampoo #BeautifulHair #GiovanniKSA

description_en:
Repair and restore your hair with **Dabur Vatika** Shampoo, enriched with the natural goodness of Honey and Egg. 

This unique herbal recipe from **Dabur Vatika** intensely nourishes your hair from root to tip, helping to repair damage and revive its vitality. Honey coats and seals essential moisture into hair, while Egg, known as a rich source of protein, helps make hair stronger and healthy from root to tip. This **Dabur Vatika** shampoo is designed specifically for damaged, split ends hair.

â­ Effectively repairs damaged and split ends.
â­ Enriched with natural Vatika Oils.
â­ Intense nourishment with a unique herbal recipe.
â­ Promotes stronger, healthier, and more vibrant hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika**:
â­ Massage gently into wet hair & scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Repeat if necessary.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika**:
â­ Egg and Honey.

description_en:
Experience stronger, healthier hair with **Dabur Vatika Shampoo Hair Fall Control with Cactus & Gergir**. 

This shampoo, enriched with natural extracts like Cactus, Gergir, and Garlic, is specifically formulated to address weak, brittle, and thinning hair. **Dabur Vatika Shampoo Hair Fall Control with Cactus & Gergir** works to strengthen hair follicles and nourish them deeply, leaving you with soft, shiny, and vibrantly healthy hair from root to tip.

Enjoy the benefits of nature for your daily hair care with this effective product.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Shampoo Hair Fall Control with Cactus & Gergir**:
â­ Massage gently into wet hair & scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Repeat if necessary.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Shampoo Hair Fall Control with Cactus & Gergir**:
â­ Cactus (for strengthening and moisturizing).
â­ Gergir (to nourish hair from root to tip).
â­ Garlic (to help control hair fall).

description_en:
Discover **Dabur Vatika Garlic Enriched Hair Oil for Hair Growth**, your ultimate solution for weak and falling hair. This enriching hair oil, infused with natural garlic extracts, is designed to boost hair growth and strengthen it from root to tip.

â­ Promotes natural hair growth
â­ Strengthens hair follicles and reduces hair fall
â­ Imparts shine and vitality to hair
â­ Suitable for weak and damaged hair

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Garlic Enriched Hair Oil for Hair Growth**
â­ Apply a generous amount to the scalp and hair.
â­ Gently massage for 5-10 minutes.
â­ Leave it on for 15-20 minutes, wrapping hair with a warm towel.
â­ Wash hair with shampoo and water.
â­ Use twice weekly for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Garlic Enriched Hair Oil for Hair Growth**
â­ Natural Garlic Extract.
â­ Nourishing Hair Vitamins (e.g., Vitamin E & B5).
â­ Moisturizing Natural Oils.

description_en:
Experience the power of nature with **Dabur Vatika Nourish & Protect Shampoo with Olive & Henna**. This herbal recipe is enriched with natural extracts to intensively nourish your hair from root to tip, leaving it incredibly soft and vibrant. Enjoy healthy, shiny, and protected hair from root to tip with its unique formula.

â­ Intensively nourishes hair from root to tip.
â­ Imparts superior softness and natural shine.
â­ Protects and strengthens hair with natural ingredients.
â­ Suitable for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Nourish & Protect Shampoo with Olive & Henna**

â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo and gently lather onto scalp and hair.
â­ Rinse your hair well with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Nourish & Protect Shampoo with Olive & Henna**

â­ Olive: Rich in antioxidants and vitamins A & E, it helps retain moisture, promotes hair growth, prevents hair fall, and maintains scalp health.
â­ Henna: Coats the hair fiber, giving it superior shine.
â­ Aloe Vera: Helps retain essential moisture, imparting superior softness to the hair.

Give your hair the ultimate care with **Dabur Vatika Garlic Enriched Hair Oil**, specially formulated to promote hair growth and strength. Enriched with natural vitamins, this garlic hair oil nourishes hair follicles from root to tip, giving it the strength and shine it deserves. Say goodbye to breakage and welcome healthy, strong, and shiny hair with this exceptional oil.

â­ Fortifies hair strands to control hair breakage.
â­ Revitalizes and infuses the hair with extra strength, shine, and smoothness.
â­ Ideal for breaking, falling & weak hair.
â­ Promotes Hair Growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Garlic Enriched Hair Oil**:
â­ Massage Oil from Scalp to tip.
â­ Leave it for 20 minutes.
â­ Wash & Get Nourished Problem Free beautiful hair.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Garlic Enriched Hair Oil**:
â­ Garlic
â­ Vitamins A, E, and F
â­ Other natural hair nourishing ingredients

description_en:
Revitalize your hair with **Dabur Vatika Olive & Almond Hot Oil Hair Treatment**. This rich hot oil treatment deeply moisturizes dry, dull, and lifeless hair, restoring its natural shine and vitality. Infused with the goodness of olive and almond, it nourishes your scalp and strengthens hair strands from root to tip, leaving your hair soft, manageable, and beautifully healthy.

â­ Deeply moisturizes dry and dull hair.
â­ Restores shine and healthy vitality.
â­ Enriched with natural ingredients for hair and scalp nourishment.
â­ Leaves hair soft, strong, and easy to manage.
â­ Ideal for all hair types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Olive & Almond Hot Oil Hair Treatment**:
â­ After shampooing, apply the treatment to your hair.
â­ Gently massage from root to tips.
â­ Leave on for 15 minutes, wrapping your hair with a warm towel.
â­ Rinse your hair with water as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Olive & Almond Hot Oil Hair Treatment**:
â­ Olive Extract.
â­ Almond Extract.
â­ Henna Extract.
â­ Vitamins A, E, and F.

#DaburVatika #HotOilTreatment #HairOil #HairMoisture #OliveOil #AlmondOil #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairBeauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover your hair's natural beauty with **Dabur Vatika Henna Black**. The perfect hair color that gives you rich, long-lasting vibrancy, with an ammonia-free formula to protect your hair and cover it completely from root to tip. Enjoy a natural and bold color without worrying about harmful chemicals, as henna acts as a natural conditioner that strengthens your hair and gives it a healthy shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Henna Black**:
â­ Preparation:
â­ Empty one sachet of coloring powder into a non-metallic bowl.
â­ Add 40 ml of water and mix thoroughly to form a lump-free, uniform mixture.
â­ Use the mixture immediately after mixing.
â­ Application:
â­ Wear gloves and cover your clothes and shoulders with a towel or cape.
â­ Using an applicator brush, apply the mixture evenly to the hair from root to tip, focusing on gray areas.
â­ Leave the mixture on your hair for 30 minutes for the desired color.
â­ Rinsing and Conditioning:
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with lukewarm water until the water runs clear and colorless.
â­ Apply Dabur Vatika conditioner to your hair, leave it on for 5 minutes, then rinse again with lukewarm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Henna Black**:
â­ Natural Henna Powder.
â­ Water.
â­ Dabur Vatika Conditioner (additional conditioner ingredients may vary).

#Henna #DaburVatika #HairDye #HealthyHair #NaturalColor #AmmoniaFree #HairCare #Beauty #Hairstyle #HairFashion

description_en:
Say goodbye to dandruff with **Dabur Vatika Shampoo Dandruff Guard With Lemon & Yoghurt**! This innovative herbal recipe is the perfect solution for dandruff-prone hair, effectively eliminating dandruff without harming your hair or scalp. Enriched with refreshing lemon extract and nourishing yogurt, this shampoo deeply cleanses and moisturizes your scalp, leaving a long-lasting fresh feeling. Achieve healthy, dandruff-free hair from the first wash with **Dabur Vatika Shampoo Dandruff Guard With Lemon & Yoghurt**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Shampoo Dandruff Guard With Lemon & Yoghurt**
â­ Gently massage the shampoo onto wet hair and scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Shampoo Dandruff Guard With Lemon & Yoghurt**
â­ Lemon: Its astringent action controls excess sebum, helping to prevent dandruff.
â­ Yoghurt: Cleanses and nourishes hair and scalp, maintaining their essential moisture balance.
â­ Mint: Provides a refreshing sensation and soothes the scalp, contributing to overall hair health.

description_en:
Discover the nourishing power for your hair with **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream with Henna, Almond & Aloe**. Enriched with Henna, Almond, and Aloe extracts, this cream deeply nourishes your hair and protects it from harmful external factors like dust and heat, giving it a healthy shine and renewed vitality.

**Product Features:**
â­ Imparts a healthy shine and natural beauty to your hair.
â­ Smoothes hair, making it easy to style.
â­ Restores hair's vitality and strength.
â­ Suitable for both men and women.
â­ Helps you achieve professional salon-like hairstyles.
â­ Easy to apply and wash out.
â­ Ideal for all hair types.
â­ Henna, Almond, and Aloe help restore hair nourishment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream with Henna, Almond & Aloe**:
â­ For Deep Nourishment: Apply a generous amount on dry hair. Leave it on as long as you wish, then shampoo.
â­ For Styling: Apply a small amount on your hands, then distribute it through your hair, starting from the tips and continuing along the lengths.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream with Henna, Almond & Aloe**:
â­ Henna Extract.
â­ Almond Extract.
â­ Aloe Vera Extract.
â­ Moisturizing and nourishing hair ingredients.

#DaburVatika #HairCream #Henna #Almond #AloeVera #HairCare #HealthyHair #Hairstyling #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Nourish your special hair strands with **Dabur Vatika Hair Oil Almond**.

This enriched hair oil provides concentrated care without leaving any greasy residue, making your hair soft, moisturized, and easy to style. With its unique, nature-inspired formulation, **Dabur Vatika Hair Oil Almond** treats damage and gives your hair healthy shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Oil Almond**:
â­ Massage oil from scalp to tip.
â­ Leave it for 20 minutes.
â­ Wash and get nourished, problem-free beautiful hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Oil Almond**:
â­ Almond
â­ Sesame
â­ Coconut Oil
â­ Vitamins (A, E, F)

description_en:
**Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Argan 500 gm** is the ultimate hot oil treatment from Vatika Naturals, specifically formulated to strengthen and deeply nourish your hair. The natural Argan oil energizes your hair with its rich blend of nourishing Vatika Oils, effectively helping to control hair fall. Whether you're looking for argan oil for hair growth for men or women, this product will give you stronger hair, reduce breakage, repair dryness and damage, and protect it from external factors. Infused with 100% natural Argan oil, **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Argan 500 gm** is the perfect finishing styling product for healthy, high-gloss hair! Embrace your natural texture and express your personal style with confidence. Vatika Naturals offers innovative hair styling solutions to make it easy to maintain or change your look as you desire. Say goodbye to all hair problems with the complete range of Vatika Naturals products!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Argan**:
â­ After shampooing, apply the hot oil treatment generously to your hair, from roots to tips.
â­ Gently massage your scalp and hair to ensure even distribution of the product.
â­ Wrap your hair in a clean towel and leave the treatment on for 15 minutes. For enhanced results, you can warm the towel using a hair dryer or a steamer.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water until all the oil is washed off.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Argan**:
â­ Pure Argan Oil.

#Vatika #HotOilTreatment #ArganOil #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairShine #HairFallControl #HairNourishment #HairProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Introducing the **Dabur Vatika** Conditioner, a revitalizing formula crafted for damaged and split-end hair. Enriched with a powerful blend of natural ingredients like Egg, Castor, and Honey, this conditioner provides intensive nourishment to restore your hair's vitality. It works to repair brittle hair, strengthen strands, and promote a healthy, beautiful shine, leaving your hair soft and manageable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika**:
â­ After shampooing, rinse your hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply the conditioner evenly throughout your hair.
â­ Leave on for 2 minutes.
â­ Rinse well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika**:
â­ Egg: A rich source of protein that strengthens hair, reduces split ends, and adds shine.
â­ Castor: Known for promoting hair growth and strengthening follicles.
â­ Honey: Deeply moisturizes hair, smoothing rough and frizzy strands.

Elevate your hair experience with **Vatika Hair Cream Argan**, delivering unmatched softness for a smooth and silky finish. Transform dry, dull, and unmanageable hair into a spectacle of silkiness and hydration with our unique formula featuring Moroccan argan oil.

â­ Apply on hair post hair wash.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Cream Argan**:
â­ Moroccan Argan Oil

description_en:
Restore your hair's vitality with **Dabur Vatika** Hot Oil Treatment, your ultimate solution for damaged, split, and limp hair. This intensive formula, enriched with the goodness of egg and honey, provides deep nourishment, strengthening your hair from root to tip. Experience a spa-like treatment that revitalizes your strands, leaving them soft, shiny, and full of volume.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika**:
â­ Apply generously to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage the treatment into your hair and scalp.
â­ Cover your hair with a warm towel and leave it on for 15-20 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ Use once or twice a week for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika**:
â­ Egg: For strengthening hair follicles and providing essential nutrients.
â­ Honey: For deep hydration and adding a natural shine.
â­ Castor Oil: To stimulate hair growth and combat hair fall.
â­ Marrow: To repair damaged hair and restore its strength.

description_en:
Revitalize your hair and boost its volume with **Dabur Vatika Hair Oil Coconut Castor Oil 300 ml**. This enriching hair oil is infused with the goodness of Coconut, Castor, and Henna, designed to nourish, strengthen, and add significant thickness to your hair. Its unique formula works from root to tip, combating thinning hair and restoring its natural volume and shine. Say goodbye to limp, dull hair and hello to bouncy, healthy locks!

â­ Enriched with Coconut, Castor, and Henna for ultimate hair nourishment.
â­ Promotes hair thickness and adds visible volume.
â­ Strengthens hair follicles from the roots to the tips.
â­ Revitalizes dull and thinning hair, restoring shine and bounce.
â­ Free from parabens, sulfates, and silicones for a natural approach to hair care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Oil Coconut Castor Oil 300 ml**:
â­ Gently massage the oil into your scalp and hair, ensuring full coverage from root to tip.
â­ Leave the oil on for at least 20 minutes to allow the nutrients to penetrate.
â­ Wash your hair thoroughly with shampoo and conditioner for soft, manageable, and revitalized hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Oil Coconut Castor Oil 300 ml**:
â­ Coconut Oil
â­ Castor Oil
â­ Henna
â­ Vitamins A, E, and F

description_en:
Revitalize your hair with **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Argan**. This nourishing treatment, infused with pure Argan oil, is designed to deeply strengthen and condition your hair, promoting vibrant health and resilience. Known for its ability to control hair fall and repair dryness, **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Argan** leaves your hair feeling softer, smoother, and visibly more lustrous. Embrace a natural, healthy shine and effortless styling. Say goodbye to damaged hair and hello to beautiful, manageable locks!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Argan**:
â­ After shampooing, apply the treatment evenly to damp hair.
â­ Gently massage from roots to tips for maximum absorption.
â­ Cover your hair with a warm towel or shower cap and leave it on for 15-20 minutes.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with lukewarm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Argan**:
â­ 100% Pure Argan Oil
â­ Nourishing Vatika Oils Blend

description_en:
Discover the secret to healthy, shiny hair with **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Coconut**. This nourishing cream, enriched with natural coconut oil, deeply moisturizes and protects your hair from external aggressors like dust and heat, bestowing it with a healthy shine and a refreshed look. **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Coconut** makes your hair soft and vibrant, helping you achieve salon-perfect styling with ease. It's suitable for all hair types and is easy to apply and wash off.

â­ Deeply nourishes and protects hair.
â­ Enriched with coconut oil for superior nourishment.
â­ Imparts a healthy shine and refreshed appearance.
â­ Softens and revitalizes hair.
â­ Ideal for both men and women.
â­ Easy to distribute and wash out.
â­ Suitable for all hair types.
â­ Helps achieve shiny, thick hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Coconut**:
â­ Spread a sufficient amount onto dry or damp hair.
â­ Leave it on as desired, or wash with shampoo for immediate results.
â­ For styling: Apply a small amount to your palms and work through your hair from tips to roots.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Coconut**:
â­ Natural nourishing coconut oil.
â­ Other natural ingredients to enhance hair health.

#Vatika #HairCream #CoconutOil #Hairstyling #HairCare #HealthyHair #ShinyHair #ThickHair #HairProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover enchanting natural brown color with **Dabur Vatika Henna Natural Brown 60 gm**. Enjoy a safe and effective hair dye that nourishes and strengthens your hair with its herbal formula. Say goodbye to harsh chemicals and hello to shiny, healthy hair with a rich, natural-looking color. **Dabur Vatika Henna Natural Brown 60 gm** provides complete grey coverage with deep conditioning for silky soft hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Henna Natural Brown 60 gm**:
â­ Mix the contents of the sachet with 40 ml of water to form a uniform paste.
â­ Wear gloves and cover your body with a towel.
â­ Apply the mixture to hair from root to tip using a brush.
â­ Leave on for 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with lukewarm water until the water runs clear.
â­ Apply Dabur Vatika conditioner, leave for 5 minutes, then rinse.
â­ Tip: For a deeper shade, leave on for an additional 10 minutes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Henna Natural Brown 60 gm**:
â­ Natural Henna (Lawsonia inermis)
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Herbal Extracts
â­ Parfum

#DaburVatikaHenna #NaturalHairDye #HealthyHair #BrownHair #HairCare #AmmoniaFreeDye #VatikaHair #HennaForHair #ShinyHair #SaudiBeautyProducts

description_en:
**Dabur Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Cream - Garlic 1 Kg** is your ultimate solution for weak and falling hair. This rich oil, infused with essential garlic extracts, strengthens hair follicles and boosts blood circulation in the scalp, promoting healthy hair growth. Say goodbye to damaged and brittle hair with **Dabur Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Cream - Garlic 1 Kg**!

â­ Fortifies hair strands and promotes natural hair growth for weak, slow-growing hair.
â­ Eliminates scalp dryness and flakes due to its anti-inflammatory and anti-fungal properties.
â­ Vitamins B5 & E help repair and nourish hair along the entire length, leaving it soft and silky smooth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Cream - Garlic 1 Kg**
â­ Massage the oil onto the scalp and hair.
â­ Leave it on for 15-20 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use once or twice a week for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Cream - Garlic 1 Kg**
â­ Garlic.
â­ Vitamin B5.
â­ Vitamin E.

description_en:
Worried about fine, limp, and weak hair? Introducing **Dabur Vatika Shampoo** for Volume and Thickness, infused with the goodness of Coconut and Castor oil. This expertly crafted formula works wonders to nourish your hair, giving it a visibly fuller and healthier look. **Dabur Vatika Shampoo** is designed to revitalize your hair, making it feel stronger and look more voluminous from root to tip. 

â­ Boosts hair volume for a fuller appearance.
â­ Nourishes hair from root to tip.
â­ Enhances shine and promotes healthy hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Shampoo**
â­ Gently massage into wet hair and scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Shampoo**
â­ Coconut: Penetrates into the hair shaft, making it strong and thick.
â­ Castor Oil: Known to make hair thicker.
â­ Henna: Coats and conditions the hair shaft, boosting its value.

#VatikaShampoo #DaburVatika #ThickHair #HairCare #HealthyHair #NaturalOils #StrongHair #HairProducts #ShampooForThinHair #HairNourishment

description_en:
Say goodbye to dandruff and welcome healthy hair with **Dabur Vatika Shampoo Anti Dandruff** in a 400 ml size. This unique shampoo is formulated with the goodness of lemon, yogurt, and mint to deeply nourish your scalp, giving your hair freshness and strength from the very first wash. Lemon helps control sebum production and prevent dandruff formation, while yogurt maintains essential moisture balance for your scalp and hair. Mint provides an instant soothing and refreshing sensation. Discover the natural beauty of your hair and vibrant strands with complete confidence.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Shampoo Anti Dandruff**
â­ Massage gently into wet hair & scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Repeat if necessary.
â­ For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Shampoo Anti Dandruff**
â­ Lemon.
â­ Yogurt.
â­ Mint.

Discover the power of **Vatika Onion Enriched Hair Oil**, the natural oil that strengthens your hair from the inside out.

This oil, enriched with onion extract from Vatika Naturals and its trusted natural ingredients, works wonders for your everyday hair care routine.

Bid goodbye to hair issues and welcome happy, healthy, and shiny hair with **Vatika Onion Enriched Hair Oil**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Onion Enriched Hair Oil**:
â­ Massage the oil from the roots of your hair to the tips.
â­ Leave it on for 20 minutes to allow multivitamins to be absorbed into the scalp.
â­ Apply at least twice a week for the best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Onion Enriched Hair Oil**:
â­ Onion

Experience revitalized hair with **Dabur Vatika Shampoo For Falling|Weak Hair**. This potent formula, enriched with the nourishing power of cactus, gergir, and garlic, is your ultimate solution for hair fall and breakage. Designed to strengthen your hair from root to tip, **Dabur Vatika Shampoo For Falling|Weak Hair** delivers intensive nourishment, promoting healthier, thicker, and shinier strands. Say goodbye to weak hair and welcome a cascade of beautiful strength.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Shampoo For Falling|Weak Hair**:
â­ Gently massage into wet hair and scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

description_en:
Struggling with dry, damaged hair leading to breakage and split ends? **Vatika** Garlic Enriched Hair Oil is your perfect solution to deeply nourish your hair from the scalp, boosting its strength, vibrancy, and healthy growth. Achieve strong, lustrous hair in just 20 minutes with Vitamins A, E, F, and natural ingredients like Garlic and essential minerals. This oil improves hair growth, reduces damage and dryness, leaving you with fuller, healthier-looking hair. Its 100% natural formula is free from parabens, sulfates, and silicones, strengthening your hair from root to tip.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika**:
â­ Gently massage the scalp and hair strands from root to tip using your fingertips.
â­ Leave the oil on your hair for at least 20 minutes to allow the vitamins to deeply penetrate.
â­ Wash your hair as usual to enjoy healthy, silky hair all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika**:
â­ Garlic
â­ Vitamin A
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Vitamin F

description_en:
Say goodbye to hair fall with **Dabur Vatika Hair Oil Cactus Hair Fall Control**! This natural formula is designed to strengthen and nourish your hair from root to tip.

Enriched with the goodness of Cactus, Ghergir, and Garlic, **Dabur Vatika Hair Oil Cactus Hair Fall Control** works to prevent breakage and promote healthier, stronger hair. Experience a significant reduction in hair fall and enjoy naturally vibrant and lustrous locks.

â­ Nourishes the scalp and hair follicles.
â­ Reduces hair breakage and thinning.
â­ Leaves hair feeling soft, smooth, and revitalized.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Oil Cactus Hair Fall Control**:
â­ Gently massage the oil into your scalp, ensuring even distribution from root to tip.
â­ Leave the oil on for at least 20 minutes to allow the nutrients to penetrate.
â­ Wash your hair with shampoo as usual for clean, nourished hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Oil Cactus Hair Fall Control**:
â­ Cactus: Helps prevent hair loss and repair the hair shaft.
â­ Gergir: Nourishes hair from roots to the tip.
â­ Garlic: Works with other ingredients to combat hair fall and promote strength.

description_en:
Experience the transformative power of **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Color Protect with Almond & Honey**, designed to nourish and protect your hair, leaving it vibrant and healthy. Enriched with Almond & Honey, this cream deeply nourishes and shields your hair strands from external aggressors like dust and heat, bestowing a lustrous and revitalized appearance.

â­ Effectively nourishes and protects hair.
â­ Contains Almond & Honey extracts for deep hydration.
â­ Shields hair color from damage and preserves vibrancy.
â­ Imparts a healthy shine and a refreshed look.
â­ Smoothes hair and restores its vitality.
â­ Ideal for both men and women, suitable for all hair types.
â­ Easy to apply and wash out, delivering salon-like results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Color Protect with Almond & Honey**:
â­ For Deep Nourishment: Apply a generous amount to dry hair, leave on as long as desired, and then shampoo.
â­ For Styling: Take a small amount in your hand and apply to your hair, starting from the tips and working along the lengths for perfect styling.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Color Protect with Almond & Honey**:
â­ Almond: Nourishes hair and provides softness.
â­ Honey: Moisturizes hair and retains essential moisture.
â­ Other natural ingredients to enhance hair health and protection.

#VatikaHairCare #HairCream #ColorProtect #AlmondHoney #HairCare #ShinyHair #HealthyHair #HairProducts #HairStyling #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Indulge your hair with **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Olive| Henna & Almond**, the ultimate solution for healthy, shiny, and manageable hair. This cream, enriched with the goodness of Olive, Henna, and Almond extracts, deeply nourishes your hair strands and protects them from harmful external factors like dust, heat, and pollution.

**Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Olive| Henna & Almond** bestows upon you silky-smooth hair, restoring its vitality and natural shine. It's perfect for daily use by both men and women. Achieve that desired salon-like shiny hair effortlessly, with easy distribution and wash-out.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Olive| Henna & Almond**
â­ For dry hair: Apply a generous amount to your hair and leave it on for as long as you wish before shampooing.
â­ For styling: Apply a small amount to your hands then distribute through your hair, starting from the tips and working along the lengths.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Olive| Henna & Almond**
â­ Olive Oil: Deeply nourishes and moisturizes hair.
â­ Henna: Strengthens hair and imparts a healthy shine.
â­ Almond: Enhances hair softness and protects against breakage.
â­ Aloe Vera: Helps to moisturize the scalp and hair.

#DaburVatika #HairCream #OliveOil #Henna #Almond #HairCare #HealthyHair #ShinyHair #HairStyling #SaudiArabia
