description_en:
Worried about hair damage from coloring and heat styling? Enriched with natural henna and Vatika essential oils, blended with a unique herbal recipe, **Vatika Henna Shampoo** strengthens your hair from tip to root, leaving it looking healthy and vibrant all day. Washing your hair 2-3 times a week with an adequate amount of shampoo infused with henna extracts significantly improves hair growth and thickness. With **Vatika Henna Shampoo**, say goodbye to damaged hair and hello to healthy, lively strands!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Henna Shampoo**:
â­ Take an adequate amount of shampoo on your palm.
â­ Massage gently into wet hair and scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Henna Shampoo**:
â­ Henna

description_en:
**Dabur Vatika Wet Look Hair Gel Cream** is your ultimate solution for achieving unique and attractive hairstyles without worrying about sticky or greasy residue. Enjoy stylish and shiny hair all day long with **Dabur Vatika Wet Look Hair Gel Cream**, which provides strong hold and a modern wet look. This product is perfect for anyone seeking long-lasting styling while maintaining healthy and vibrant hair.

â­ Delivers an attractive and trendy wet look to your hair.
â­ Strong, long-lasting hold without being sticky or greasy.
â­ Waterproof to maintain your style in all conditions.
â­ Features an advanced formula providing superior moisture and a shiny effect.
â­ Keeps hair curls intact for 24 hours.
â­ Suitable for all hair types.
â­ Maintains incredible manageability without flaking.
â­ Perfect for wrap styling, hot curling, blow-drying, and other modern hairstyles.
â­ Features a distinctive fragrance that adds freshness to your hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Wet Look Hair Gel Cream**

â­ Squeeze a suitable amount of gel into the palm of your hand.
â­ Spread the gel evenly throughout your hair.
â­ Style your hair with fingers or a comb into your desired shape.
â­ Gently cleanses and leaves hair looking healthy and vibrant.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Wet Look Hair Gel Cream**

â­ Comprised of an advanced formula that provides strong hold, moisturizing, and a sheen effect.
â­ (Full ingredients listed on the packaging)

For Warnings and Cautions: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children.

description_en:
Discover the nourishing power of **Dabur Vatika Hair Food Shea Butter & Castor Oil 150 gm**. This natural formula, enriched with Shea Butter and Castor Oil, deeply repairs and restores your hair. **Dabur Vatika Hair Food Shea Butter & Castor Oil 150 gm** features 100% natural oils, free from Petrolatum, Parabens, Paraffins, and Sulphates, for incredibly soft, smooth, and healthy hair. It effectively prevents hair fall and revitalizes dry, frizzy, or damaged hair by providing essential nutrients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Food Shea Butter & Castor Oil 150 gm**
â­ Spread a pea-sized amount on your palm.
â­ Apply on your hair starting from the root to the tip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Food Shea Butter & Castor Oil 150 gm**
â­ Shea Butter: Locks in moisture, making hair soft and smooth.
â­ Castor Oil: Provides conditioning and prevents hair fall.
â­ 100% Natural Oils: Nourish the hair, helping it overcome dryness and damage.

#DaburVatika #HairCream #SheaButter #CastorOil #HairCare #HealthyHair #SoftHair #HairMoisture #HairProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience the revitalizing power of **Dabur Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Deep Conditioning for Dry & Dull Hair 1000 gm**. Enriched with Vitamin E and antioxidants, this treatment strengthens and nourishes your hair, helping to control hair fall and repair dryness and damage. Its natural Argan oil formula is perfect for hair growth and reducing breakage, leaving you with silky soft, manageable hair. Say goodbye to dry, unmanageable hair woes!

â­ Nourishes and moisturizes dry, unruly hair.
â­ Provides silky softness and shine.
â­ Strengthens hair and reduces hair fall and breakage.
â­ Rich in Vitamin E and natural antioxidants.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Deep Conditioning for Dry & Dull Hair 1000 gm**:
â­ After shampooing, apply the hot oil treatment generously to your hair.
â­ Gently massage from the roots to the tips.
â­ Leave it on for 15 minutes. For enhanced results, you can heat it using a steamer or hair dryer.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Deep Conditioning for Dry & Dull Hair 1000 gm**:
â­ Pure Argan Nut.

description_en:
Achieve a unique and bold hairstyle with **Dabur Vatika Hair Gel Wet Look**. This gel provides the perfect hold you need without leaving hair greasy or sticky, and it's waterproof to ensure your style stays put all day. With **Dabur Vatika Hair Gel Wet Look**, enjoy stylish, shiny hair with a modern look that suits the latest fashion trends.

Product Benefits:
â­ Styles and holds hair for a long time without being greasy.
â­ Distinctive and attractive masculine fragrance.
â­ Keeps hair curl for up to 24 hours.
â­ Suitable for all hair types.
â­ Comprised of an advanced formula that provides strong hold, moisturizing, and a sheen effect without flakes.
â­ Maintains incredible manageability and control.
â­ The perfect tool to get your hair the way you want it to be, ideal for wrap styling, hot curling, blow-drying, and all other hair styles you need.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Gel Wet Look**:
â­ Squirt some gel into the palm of your hand.
â­ Spread the gel evenly over your hair.
â­ Comb to your desired style or shape with your fingers.
â­ Gently cleanses and leaves hair looking healthy and vibrant.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Gel Wet Look**:
â­ Advanced formula for strong hold, moisturizing, and shine.
â­ Ingredients that prevent flaking and maintain hair moisture.
â­ Water, Alcohol Denat., PVP, Glycerin, Fragrance, Vinyl Caprolactam/VP/Dimethylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Panthenol, Vitamin E.

#Vatika #HairGel #HairStyling #HealthyHair #WetLook #DaburVatika #HairCare #Hairstyles #SaudiArabia #Riyadh

description_en:
Discover the natural beauty of your hair with **Vatika Henna Hair Color Dark Brown**. This safe and easy-to-use hair color provides a rich, attractive dark brown shade with 100% grey coverage. Our unique ammonia-free formula deeply moisturizes your hair, leaving it soft, lustrous, and radiant. Achieve a stunning look in just 30 minutes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Henna Hair Color Dark Brown**:
â­ Mix the required amount of powder with 40ml of water to form a smooth paste.
â­ Apply the paste evenly to your hair using the applicator brush.
â­ Leave the color on for 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Keep away from direct heat sources and open flames.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Henna Hair Color Dark Brown**:
â­ Pure Natural Henna Powder.

Enriched with protein, egg, and Vitamin E, this shampoo helps restore hair vitality and reduce breakage, leaving your hair stronger and healthier from root to tip.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Protein & Egg Shampoo**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo and gently massage into the scalp and hair.
â­ Rinse hair well with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary for clean, lustrous hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Protein & Egg Shampoo**:
â­ Egg protein to nourish and strengthen hair roots.
â­ Vitamin E to restore hair vitality and shine.
â­ Other natural ingredients to promote hair health.

description_en:
Achieve healthy, strong hair with **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Anti Hair Fall Olive**. This innovative cream is enriched with olive and cactus extracts, known for their nourishing and strengthening properties, helping to reduce hair fall and promote growth. **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Anti Hair Fall Olive** forms a protective layer on your hair against harmful external factors like dust and heat, giving your hair a healthy shine and a vibrant appearance. Easy to distribute and wash off, and suitable for all hair types, it provides you with soft, shiny, and easily manageable hair, just like a luxurious salon treatment.

â­ Deeply nourishes and protects hair with Olive and Cactus.
â­ Reduces hair fall and strengthens hair.
â­ Imparts a healthy shine and a vibrant, refreshed look.
â­ Softens hair and makes it easy to style.
â­ Protects hair from damaging environmental factors.
â­ Suitable for men and women and all hair types.
â­ Easy to use, distribute, and wash off.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Anti Hair Fall Olive**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to damp or dry hair.
â­ Leave it on for as long as you desire, then shampoo.
â­ For styling: Apply a small amount to your palm and then work through your hair, starting from the tips to the roots.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Anti Hair Fall Olive**:
â­ Cactus for combating hair loss.
â­ Olive Oil for deep nourishment and hydration.
â­ Henna for strengthening hair and adding shine.

#DaburVatika #HairCream #HairFallControl #HealthyHair #Cactus #OliveOil #HairCare #HairBeauty #HairLoss #SaudiArabia

title_ar: ÙØ§ØªÙŠÙƒØ§ Ø²ÙŠØª Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø±Ø¬Ø§Ù† 300 Ù…Ù„: Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø­Ø±ÙŠØ±ÙŠ ÙˆÙ„Ø§Ù…Ø¹
description_en:
Nourish your beautiful strands in 20 minutes with **Vatika Hair Oil Argan** for soft, hydrated hair with the benefits of Vitamins A, E and F. This formula of argan oil with the unique benefits of hair oil works best on dry, frizzy hair, giving you the shine and strength you need. **Vatika Hair Oil Argan** gives the hair a renewed, silky look and feel and also gives it a radiant shine. It is the perfect styling and finishing product for healthy, shiny hair. It is a non-greasy, alcohol-free hair oil that absorbs instantly to soften the skin for silky, frizz-free hair. Protects, revitalizes and eliminates frizz and knots on your natural hair, wigs and hair extensions of any texture. Strengthen your hair from roots to ends with hair-boosting vitamins!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Oil Argan**:
â­ Massage the hair oil from root to tip.
â­ Leave it on for only 20 minutes to allow multivitamins to be absorbed into the scalp.
â­ Wash your hair and get nourished and silky hair all day long.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ For external use only.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Keep away from naked flame or direct heat sources.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Oil Argan**:
â­ Argan

description_en:
Give your hair the ultimate spa-like treatment with **Dabur Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Complete Protection-Black Seed 500 ml**. This enriching hot oil therapy is designed for all hair types, strengthening your strands and preventing dryness, breakage, and split ends. It effectively locks in moisture, imparting a gorgeous glow and shine. The potent black seed extracts, rich in thymoquinone, promote longer, thicker, and faster hair growth, revitalizing thinning areas and restoring hair health.

Product Features:
â­ Acts as a spa treatment for your hair, strengthening it from root to tip.
â­ Prevents dryness, brittle hair, and split ends.
â­ Locks in moisture for a healthy, vibrant shine.
â­ Promotes hair growth, making it longer, thicker, and faster.
â­ Ideal for damaged, split-ended, or limp hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Complete Protection-Black Seed 500 ml**:
â­ After shampooing, apply the hot oil treatment to your hair.
â­ Gently massage from root to tips.
â­ Leave it on for 15 minutes. For enhanced absorption, you can heat your hair using a hair steamer or dryer.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Complete Protection-Black Seed 500 ml**:
â­ Black Seed.

#DaburVatika #HotOilTreatment #BlackSeedOil #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairStrengthening #HairGrowth #ShinyHair #SaudiArabia #KSAHairCare

description_en:
Transform your dry, frizzy hair with **Dabur Vatika Shampoo with Almond & Honey**. This intensive moisture treatment is a nourishing herbal recipe enriched with Almond, Honey, and Yogurt. It penetrates deeply to moisturize, strengthen, and add a silky shine to your hair, making it manageable and beautifully soft. Experience healthier, more vibrant hair with every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Shampoo with Almond & Honey**

â­ Gently massage the shampoo into wet hair and scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Shampoo with Almond & Honey**

â­ Almond: Nourishes and strengthens hair, leaving it with a silky shine and softness.
â­ Honey: Coats each strand to seal in essential moisture, smoothing rough and frizzy hair.
â­ Yogurt: Replenishes vital moisture and conditions dry hair, making it exceptionally soft and manageable.

#VatikaShampoo #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairMoisture #DryHair #FrizzyHair #AlmondOil #HoneyShampoo #Dabur #SaudiHairCare

description_en:
**Dabur Vatika Hair Cream - Fall Control with Olive & Cactus** is your ultimate solution for stronger, more vibrant hair. Specially formulated to deeply nourish and protect your hair from external aggressors like dust and heat, it maintains essential moisture and imparts a healthy, attractive shine.

â­ Deeply nourishes and protects hair from external factors.
â­ Imparts a healthy shine, leaving hair looking refreshed and lustrous.
â­ Ideal for dry, weak, and falling hair.
â­ Easy to distribute and wash off.
â­ Suitable for all hair types.
â­ Natural ingredients to promote hair health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream - Fall Control with Olive & Cactus**:
â­ For daily use: Apply a generous amount to dry hair, leave it on, then shampoo.
â­ For styling: Apply a small amount to your palms and distribute evenly through your hair, from roots to tips.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream - Fall Control with Olive & Cactus**:
â­ Cactus: Known for its moisturizing and hair-strengthening properties.
â­ Olive: Nourishes hair and adds shine.
â­ Other natural ingredients to boost hair health.

#Vatika #DaburVatika #HairCream #HairFallControl #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairMoisture #OliveOil #Cactus #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Instantly nourish and restore strength to weak and damaged hair with **Vatika Hair Serum Frizz Control**. This innovative serum combats frizzy ends and flyaways, giving you smooth, manageable, and silky-soft hair. Enriched with natural ingredients, it protects dry hair from dryness and frizz, making it perfect for daily styling without worrying about hair fall. Achieve a glossy shine and repel humidity, suitable for use on both wet or dry hair. Enjoy a lightweight feel and a delightful scent with every application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Serum Frizz Control**

â­ After shampooing, dispense the required amount of serum into your hands.
â­ Apply uniformly to damp or dry hair.
â­ Do not rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Serum Frizz Control**

â­ Olive
â­ Almond
â­ Henna

#Vatika #HairSerum #SmoothHair #HealthyHair #HairCare #HairStyling #ShinyHair #AntiFrizz #SilkyHair #SaudiHairCare

description_en:
Nourish your beautiful strands with **Vatika Argan Hair Conditioner 400 ml**. This rich conditioner, infused with the miraculous benefits of Argan oil, works wonders to hydrate and soften dry, frizzy hair. Enriched with vitamins "A", "E", and "F", **Vatika Argan Hair Conditioner 400 ml** delivers silky, shiny, and strong hair from root to tip. Its non-greasy, alcohol-free formula is instantly absorbed, providing a smooth texture and a healthy, attractive appearance. Ideal for daily use, it protects and revitalizes natural hair, wigs, and extensions from frizz and tangles, imparting a renewed and vibrant look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Argan Hair Conditioner 400 ml**
â­ Massage the conditioner into your hair from roots to ends and leave on for at least 20 minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly to achieve nourished, silky hair all day long.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Keep away from naked flame or direct heat sources.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Argan Hair Conditioner 400 ml**
â­ Argan Oil

title_ar: Ø¯Ø§Ø¨Ø± ÙØ§ØªÙŠÙƒØ§ ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø­Ù†Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ Ø­Ø§Ù„Ùƒ - 6 Ø£ÙƒÙŠØ§Ø³
description_en:
Discover the natural beauty of your hair with **Dabur Vatika Henna Hair Color - Deep Black**. Enjoy a rich and attractive color that gives your hair vitality and shine, with the natural benefits of henna that nourish and strengthen hair from roots to ends. Ammonia-free for a safe and comfortable coloring experience, with full coverage of white hair to achieve a renewed and natural-looking appearance. **Dabur Vatika Henna Hair Color - Deep Black** is the perfect solution for healthy, safely colored hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Henna Hair Color - Deep Black**:
â­ Mix the contents of one sachet of henna powder with 40 ml of water in a non-metallic bowl to form a smooth paste. Use the mixture immediately.
â­ Wear gloves and cover your body, then apply the mixture to hair from root to tip using an applicator brush.
â­ Leave the mixture on hair for 30 minutes for best results.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with lukewarm water until the water runs clear.
â­ Apply **Dabur Vatika** conditioner to hair for 5 minutes, then rinse with lukewarm water.
â­ Additional tips: Ensure hair is clean, apply petroleum jelly around the hairline to avoid skin staining, and for a deeper shade, leave it on for an additional 10 minutes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Henna Hair Color - Deep Black**:
â­ Natural Henna Powder.
â­ Moisturizing and nourishing hair ingredients.
â­ Ammonia-free.
â­ Full grey hair coverage.

#DaburVatika #HairColor #Henna #DeepBlack #HealthyHair #NaturalDye #HairCare #HairBeauty #Hairstyles #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Give your hair the superior care it deserves with **Dabur Vatika Olive Hair Oil**. Enriched with Virgin Olive Oil and nourishing extracts of Almonds, Cactus, and Lemon, this oil penetrates deep into your scalp, providing complete natural nourishment for problem-free, beautiful hair. **Dabur Vatika Olive Hair Oil** is specifically formulated to repair damaged hair structure, making it the ideal solution for healthy, beautiful hair. Almond coats, conditions, and softens your hair, while Cactus gives your hair volume and health. Lemon regulates sebum flow and helps keep dandruff away. Use it regularly to increase your hair's shine and protect it from daily damage and UV rays.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Olive Hair Oil**:
â­ Massage Oil from Scalp to tip.
â­ Leave it for 20 minutes.
â­ Wash & Get Nourished Problem-Free beautiful hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Olive Hair Oil**:
â­ Virgin Olive Oil.
â­ Extracts of Almonds.
â­ Extracts of Cactus.
â­ Extracts of Lemon.

description_en:
Are you bothered by split ends and damaged hair? Discover the power of **Vatika Hair Cream Repair & Restore**, the ultimate solution for stronger, healthier, and shinier hair. This luxurious cream is enriched with honey and castor extracts for deep nourishment, eliminating dryness and coarseness to give you silky smooth, split-end-free hair. **Vatika Hair Cream Repair & Restore** gently detoxifies the scalp from impurities and pollution, promoting follicle health to reduce hair fall. It's gentle enough for colored or highlighted hair, preserving its beauty and vibrancy without interference. Give your hair the healthy look and style it deserves with the Vatika Naturals range.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Cream Repair & Restore**:
â­ Spread a small amount on your palm.
â­ Apply to your hair from root to tip.
â­ For all-day protection, shine, and easy styling.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Cream Repair & Restore**:
â­ Honey
â­ Castor

description_en:
Unlock the secret to healthy, shiny hair with **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Coconut**. Enriched with natural coconut oil, this cream deeply nourishes your hair and protects it from external factors like dust and heat, bestowing a healthy shine and a fresh, attractive look. Easy to distribute and wash out, it's suitable for all hair types, leaving your hair soft, revitalized, and easily manageable, just like a salon finish. It's the perfect choice for men and women seeking shiny, thicker hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Coconut**
â­ On dry hair: Apply a generous amount, leave as desired, then shampoo.
â­ For styling: Apply a small amount to your palm and then distribute through your hair from roots to tips.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Coconut**
â­ Natural Coconut Oil: Nourishes hair and restores its vitality.

shortdescription_en: Enhance your hair's shine and smoothness with Vatika Coconut Hair Cream. Nourishes, protects, and styles easily.

description_en:
Unlock the secret to thick, healthy hair with **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Volume & Thick 500 gm**. This hot oil treatment from Vatika Naturals, enriched with Coconut Oil, Castor Oil, Vitamin E, and antioxidants, volumizes and thickens your hair, nourishing it from root to tip. It energizes your hair, adds shine, and helps control hair fall, making it the perfect solution for damaged, weak, or limp hair. The package includes a free microfiber hair towel for gentle drying, minimizing frizz and split ends.

â­ Volumizes and thickens hair with Vitamin E and antioxidants.
â­ Energizes hair with nourishing Vatika oils and helps control hair fall.
â­ Natural ingredients like coconut and castor nourish hair from root to tip.
â­ Treats damaged hair, split ends, and limp hair.
â­ Microfiber hair towel reduces frizz, breakage, and split ends.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Volume & Thick 500 gm**
â­ After shampooing, apply the treatment to your hair and gently massage from root to tips.
â­ Wrap the microfiber hair turban and keep it for 15 minutes. You can heat it using a steamer or hair dryer.
â­ Rinse off hair with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Volume & Thick 500 gm**
â­ Coconut

description_en:
Discover the secret to naturally lustrous black hair with **Vatika Henna Shampoo Hair Colour-Black 20ml**. Enjoy an effortless and quick at-home hair transformation, in just 5 minutes!

This innovative Natural Black Hair Dye Shampoo formula lasts for up to 24 washes and provides 100% grey/white coverage, delivering a rich, ammonia-free, classic black hue. Enriched with Blackseed Extracts, **Vatika Henna Shampoo Hair Colour-Black 20ml** offers natural nourishment for your hair, leaving it soft, revitalized, and healthy.

â­ Easy to use, just like regular shampoo.
â­ Delivers a natural, lustrous black colour.
â­ Complete coverage for grey and white hair.
â­ Ammonia-free for a safe colouring experience.
â­ Enriched with Blackseed Extracts for hair nourishment and conditioning.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Henna Shampoo Hair Colour-Black 20ml**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before application.
â­ Wear the provided gloves and open the sachet.
â­ Squeeze both liquids from the sachet in a 1:1 ratio into your palm and mix until homogenous.
â­ Apply evenly onto wet hair, massaging gently like a regular shampoo.
â­ Leave on hair for only 5 minutes.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Henna Shampoo Hair Colour-Black 20ml**
â­ Blackseed Extracts

description_en:
Discover the natural power for your hair with **Dabur Vatika Naturals Black Seed Conditioner**, specially formulated to promote a healthier scalp and hair. Enriched with Turkish Black Seed oil, this conditioner deeply nourishes the scalp, addresses issues like dandruff and dryness, and ensures long-lasting moisture and shine. Enjoy stronger, healthier, and more manageable hair with its unique herbal blend. For a healthy and attractive look, use **Dabur Vatika Naturals Black Seed Conditioner** regularly.

â­ Promotes scalp health and fights dandruff.
â­ Deeply moisturizes hair and prevents dryness.
â­ Restores hair strength and natural shine.
â­ Reduces frizz and improves manageability for easy detangling.
â­ Toxin-free and formulated with natural ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Naturals Black Seed Conditioner**
â­ After shampooing, apply generously to hair from root to tip.
â­ Leave on for 2 minutes to allow ingredients to penetrate.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Naturals Black Seed Conditioner**
â­ Turkish Black Seed Oil
â­ Other natural herbal ingredients

description_en:
**Dabur Vatika Hair Gel Extreme Hold** is your secret weapon to master any hairstyle! Enjoy unparalleled hold and a stylish look that lasts all day without the hassle of sticky or greasy hair. Its advanced formula gives your hair an attractive shine and makes it easy to style, making it perfect for all hair types and trendy hairstyles.

Product Features:
â­ Styles and holds hair for a long time without being greasy.
â­ Provides a distinctive and refreshing masculine fragrance.
â­ Keeps hair curl for 24 hours.
â­ Suitable for all hair types.
â­ Comprised of an advanced formula that provides strong hold, moisturizing, and a sheen effect.
â­ Maintains incredible manageability without flakes.
â­ Perfect tool to get your hair the way you want it to be.
â­ Used for wrap styling, hot curling, blow-drying, and all other hair styles you need.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Gel Extreme Hold**:
â­ Squirt some gel into the palm of your hand and spread it evenly over the hair.
â­ Comb to the desired style or shape with your fingers.
â­ Gently cleanses and leaves hair looking healthy and vibrant.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Gel Extreme Hold**:
â­ Advanced formula for strong hold, moisturizing, and shine.
â­ Gentle ingredients for hair.

description_en:
Revitalize your hair with **Vatika Repair & Restore Hair Serum 47 ml**. This powerful serum is specially formulated to nourish and restore strength in weak and damaged hair from root to tip, effectively fighting split ends. Regular use of **Vatika Repair & Restore Hair Serum 47 ml** helps you style your hair with ease and prevents hair fall issues, enhancing its natural strength, elasticity, and hydration. Give your hair unmatched natural shine and vitality, transforming dry, unmanageable hair into super-glossy, silky locks that resist humidity. It can be used on wet or dry hair, making it a perfect addition to your hair care routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Repair & Restore Hair Serum 47 ml**:
â­ After shampooing, dispense the appropriate amount of serum into your hands.
â­ Apply evenly to damp or dry hair.
â­ Leave it in your hair and do not rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Repair & Restore Hair Serum 47 ml**:
â­ Garlic
â­ Marrow
â­ Castor

title_ar: ÙØ§ØªÙŠÙƒØ§ Ø­Ù†Ø§Ø¡ Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ 20 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the secret to naturally lustrous dark brown hair with **Vatika Henna Colour Shampoo-Brown**. Expertly crafted for a luxurious at-home transformation, it delivers a stunning and rich dark brown shade in just 5 minutes. Enriched with invigorating Coffee Extracts, **Vatika Henna Colour Shampoo-Brown** not only imparts a natural hue but also provides intensive nourishment, leaving your hair irresistibly soft, silky, and manageable.

Experience 100% coverage for grey and white hair with our entirely ammonia-free formula, ensuring a gentle colouring process that preserves your hair's health and enhances its natural beauty. This colour-depositing shampoo offers vibrancy that lasts up to 24 washes, as the formula deeply penetrates each strand to create a long-lasting and captivating dark brown finish.

â­ Natural and captivating dark brown hair color.
â­ Intensive hair nourishment, leaving it soft and manageable.
â­ 100% coverage for grey and white hair.
â­ Ammonia-free formula for gentle coloring.
â­ Vibrancy and color that lasts up to 24 washes.
â­ Enhances natural hair beauty and adds shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Henna Colour Shampoo-Brown**
â­ Wash your hands before application. Wear the provided gloves and open the sachet.
â­ The sachet contains two liquids in a 1:1 mixing ratio. Squeeze out both liquids completely into your palm and mix/rub together until you achieve a homogenous content.
â­ Apply evenly on wet hair like shampoo and massage gently.
â­ Leave it on hair for 5 minutes and rinse hair thoroughly after application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Henna Colour Shampoo-Brown**
â­ Coffee Extracts

description_en: Unlock the secret to healthy, vibrant hair with **Vatika Almond Enriched Hair Oil**. This luxurious oil is crafted for all hair types, featuring a unique blend of almond, sesame, and coconut oil, enriched with vitamins A, E, and F. Its 100% natural formula is free from parabens, sulphates, and silicones, making it the perfect solution for restoring damaged hair or simply maintaining healthy, lustrous locks. Whether your hair is dry, brittle, or just needs an extra boost, this nourishing oil will provide the essential care to make it look and feel its absolute best. Give your hair the attention it deserves and enjoy soft, strong, and radiant strands.

description_en:
Experience the natural power of your hair with **Vatika Castor Enriched Hair Oil**, specially formulated for deep nourishment and strengthening your hair in just 20 minutes. This oil, rich in natural ingredients and vitamins, revitalizes your hair, giving it a healthy shine and silky texture.

â­ Promotes hair growth and reduces hair fall.
â­ Provides exceptional strength and shine to the hair.
â­ 100% Natural formula, free from parabens, sulfates, and silicones.
â­ Suitable for men and women.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Castor Enriched Hair Oil**:
â­ Gently massage your scalp and hair from root to tip with your fingertips.
â­ Leave the oil on the hair for at least 20 minutes.
â­ Wash your hair thoroughly with shampoo for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Castor Enriched Hair Oil**:
â­ Natural Castor Oil.
â­ Hair nourishing vitamins.

Fortify your hair with **Vatika Hair Cream Black Seed**, a revolutionary formula that delivers 2x stronger hair with exceptional shine. Experience the transformation as handpicked Turkish Black Seed extracts, celebrated for their remarkable properties in ancient cultures, infuse your locks with unparalleled strength and radiance. **Vatika Hair Cream Black Seed** offers complete hair care with carefully selected natural ingredients from Turkey, revealing the strong, brilliant hair you've always desired.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Cream Black Seed**

â­ Apply a suitable amount to your hair after washing.
â­ Spread a small amount on your hands for even distribution.
â­ Start from the roots and move along the lengths to unleash its natural strength.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Cream Black Seed**

â­ Turkish Black Seed
â­ Carefully selected natural ingredients

description_en:
Discover the power of nature with **Dabur Vatika Black Seed Shampoo** 400 ml. Enriched with the goodness of Turkish Blackseed oil, it nourishes your scalp completely, making it healthier for a comprehensive hair care. The essential oils from Vatika and herbal recipes address issues like dandruff and dryness. Therefore, the **Dabur Vatika Black Seed Shampoo** for hair growth keeps your hair and scalp nourished and moisturized!

â­ Moisturizes hair and maintains scalp health.
â­ Addresses dandruff and dryness thanks to the unique properties of black seed.
â­ Rich in fatty amino acids that help seal in moisture in individual hair shafts.
â­ Antibacterial, antifungal, anti-inflammatory, and antioxidant properties to strengthen and beautify your hair.
â­ Regulates hair growth, increases shine and volume, and eliminates scalp dryness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Black Seed Shampoo**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo to your scalp and hair.
â­ Gently massage to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse well with water.
â­ Repeat as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Black Seed Shampoo**:
â­ Turkish Black Seed.

#VatikaShampoo #BlackSeedShampoo #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairMoisture #DandruffTreatment #HairGrowth #HairProducts #DaburVatika #ShinyHair

description_en:
**Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Complete Protection-Black Seed** offers a spa-like hot oil treatment for all hair types, strengthening hair and preventing dryness, brittleness, and split ends. It locks in moisture, adding a gorgeous glow and shine. This treatment, enriched with Black Seed Oil, promotes longer, thicker, and faster hair growth, thanks to thymoquinone, a powerful antihistamine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Complete Protection-Black Seed**:

â­ After shampooing, apply **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Complete Protection-Black Seed** to your Hair.
â­ Gently massage from root to tips.
â­ Keep it for 15 minutes, during which you can heat it using a steamer or hair dryer and then rinse the hair with water.
â­ For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Complete Protection-Black Seed**:

â­ Blackseed Oil

description_en:
Achieve your dream hairstyle with **Dabur Vatika Gel Cream Strong Hold**. This innovative gel provides a strong hold without leaving your hair greasy or sticky, and is waterproof to ensure your style stays put, no matter your day. Enjoy hair that is stylish, shiny, and healthy all day long. Perfect for various hairstyles, from wrap styling to hot curling, **Dabur Vatika Gel Cream Strong Hold** gives you the modern look you desire.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Gel Cream Strong Hold**:
â­ Dispense a suitable amount of gel into your palm.
â­ Spread the gel evenly throughout your hair.
â­ Style your hair with your fingers or a comb into the desired shape.
â­ Enjoy clean, healthy, and vibrant-looking hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Gel Cream Strong Hold**:
â­ Advanced formula providing strong hold and moisture.
â­ Delivers a shiny and attractive hair effect.
â­ Maintains incredible manageability without flakes.
â­ Leaves hair with a distinctive and attractive fragrance.
â­ Suitable for all hair types.

description_en:
The **Dabur Vatika Conditioner Garlic 400ml** deeply nourishes your hair with the goodness of natural Spanish garlic and Vatika essential oils, strengthening hair follicles and reducing bacteria-induced hair fall. Enriched with antimicrobial properties, this conditioner combats germs and promotes a healthy scalp. Its Moisture Lock technology ensures long-lasting hydration without weighing hair down, promoting natural hair growth and volume, leaving it shiny and vibrant.

â­ Strengthens and repairs hair, preventing damage with Spanish Garlic and Vatika oils.
â­ Antimicrobial properties kill germs and bacteria, promoting healthy hair growth.
â­ Moisture Lock technology deeply nourishes hair, locking in hydration without weighing it down.
â­ Regulates hair growth and activates dormant follicles for increased volume and shine.
â­ Ideal for use with Dabur Vatika Naturals Spanish Garlic Hair Growth Shampoo for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Conditioner Garlic 400ml**:
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly after shampooing.
â­ Apply the conditioner all over your hair from root to tip.
â­ Leave for 2 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Conditioner Garlic 400ml**:
â­ Spanish Garlic
â­ Vatika Essential Oils
â­ Other Natural Ingredients

#Vatika #VatikaConditioner #HairCare #HairLoss #HairGrowth #Garlic #HairProducts #HealthyHair #SaudiBeauty #HairGoals

description_en:
Discover the secret to healthy, shiny hair with **Dabur Vatika Color Protect Hair Cream with Almond & Honey**. This unique cream is enriched with nourishing Almond & Honey extracts that deeply nourish your hair and protect it from harmful external factors like dust and heat, preserving your hair color and giving it vitality and a healthy sheen.

â­ Nourishes and protects hair strands thanks to its rich formula of Almond & Honey.
â­ Locks in essential nutrients and protects them from damage caused by environmental factors.
â­ Imparts a healthy shine and a refreshed, vibrant look to your hair.
â­ Smoothes hair and restores its vitality and softness.
â­ Suitable for all hair types, for both men and women.
â­ Helps you achieve the desired salon-like shiny hair.
â­ Easy to distribute on hair and easy to wash out after use.
â­ Almond & Honey help retain essential hair moisture.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Color Protect Hair Cream with Almond & Honey**:
â­ For nourishment and protection: Apply a generous amount on dry hair, leave it on as long as you wish, and then shampoo.
â­ For styling: Apply a small amount on your hand then distribute it to your hair, starting from the tips and continuing along the lengths.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Color Protect Hair Cream with Almond & Honey**:
â­ Natural Almond extracts.
â­ Nourishing Honey extract.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients to retain hair moisture.
â­ Natural color protectants.

description_en:
Experience the secret to captivating black hair with **Dabur Vatika Shampoo with Black Olive Extract**. This shampoo is specifically formulated to enhance your hair's health, delivering natural luster and unparalleled strength. Inspired by Mediterranean traditions, its unique formula imparts a youthful and vibrant look, combats dryness, and leaves your scalp healthy and refreshed. **Dabur Vatika Shampoo with Black Olive Extract** is your ultimate choice for transforming your hair into a source of pride and beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Shampoo with Black Olive Extract**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Gently massage a suitable amount of shampoo into your scalp and hair.
â­ Rinse hair well with clean water.
â­ Repeat if necessary for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Shampoo with Black Olive Extract**:
â­ High-quality black olive extract.
â­ Nourishing natural herbal ingredients.
â­ Multiple vitamins for enhanced hair health.
â­ Gentle formula for the scalp.

description_en:
Vatika Naturals Hot Oil Treatment with Coconut and Castor, commonly known as Hammam Zaith, volumizes and thickens your hair with its richness in Vitamin E and antioxidants. It energizes your hair with nourishing Vatika Oils that help control hair fall. The natural ingredients like coconut and castor, enriched with Vatika oils and its herbal recipe, nourish your hair from root to tip, making it healthy, shiny, and full of volume. The oil improves hair appearance by deeply penetrating your strands with moisture without leaving your hair greasy and weighted down. This hair mask is specially formulated for damaged hair, split ends, or limp hair. It's time to bid goodbye to dry, dull, and lifeless hair!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Hair Fall Control**:
â­ After shampooing, apply **Vatika** Naturals Hammam Zaith to your hair.
â­ Gently massage from root to tips.
â­ Wrap your hair in a towel and leave it on for 15 minutes.
â­ You can heat it using a steamer or hair dryer.
â­ Rinse off hair with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Hair Fall Control**:
â­ Coconut
â­ Castor
â­ Amla
â­ Aloe Vera

#Vatika #HairCare #HairFallControl #HairOils #HealthyHair #StrongHair #HairProducts #Beauty #SaudiBeauty #HairGoals

description_en:
Experience the revitalizing power of **Dabur Vatika Hammam Zaith Hot Oil Treatment Egg**, meticulously crafted to nourish and protect your hair. Enriched with Egg Protein and a potent blend of Vitamins A, C, and E, this treatment is your secret to healthier, more resilient hair. Known for its intensive conditioning, **Dabur Vatika Hammam Zaith Hot Oil Treatment Egg** penetrates each strand to repair damage and restore natural shine, leaving your hair incredibly smooth, soft, and manageable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hammam Zaith Hot Oil Treatment Egg**
â­ After shampooing, gently towel-dry your hair.
â­ Apply the hot oil treatment generously, focusing on the mid-lengths and ends.
â­ Massage gently into the scalp to ensure even distribution.
â­ Cover your hair with a warm towel for 15-20 minutes to enhance penetration.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hammam Zaith Hot Oil Treatment Egg**
â­ Amla Extract
â­ Egg Protein
â­ Vitamin E

description_en:
Achieve dandruff-free, healthy hair with **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Dandruff Guard Lemon & Tea Tree**. Specially formulated to combat dandruff, this cream combines the power of Lemon and Tea Tree for superior hair care. **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Dandruff Guard Lemon & Tea Tree** deeply nourishes your hair and protects it from external factors like dust and heat, giving it a healthy shine and lasting vitality.

â­ Imparts a healthy shine, leaving hair refreshed and lustrous.
â­ Smoothens hair, making it easy to style and manage.
â­ Revitalizes hair, restoring its strength from root to tip.
â­ Suitable for both men and women, and all hair types.
â­ Easy to distribute and rinse, making it a practical choice for daily use.
â­ Lemon and Tea Tree work together to effectively treat dandruff.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Dandruff Guard Lemon & Tea Tree**
â­ Spread a small amount on your palm and then apply to your hair, starting from the root to the tip.
â­ Can be used for daily hair styling to achieve a perfect look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Dandruff Guard Lemon & Tea Tree**
â­ Lemon: Helps cleanse the scalp and fight dandruff.
â­ Tea Tree Oil: Rich in antioxidants that protect and nourish hair.
â­ Almond: Provides essential moisture and strengthens hair.

description_en:
Discover the secret to healthy, radiant hair with **Vatika Hair Oil Argan**. This unique oil provides deep nourishment for dry and frizzy hair, enriched with Vitamins A, E, and F to give you silky smooth and strong hair.

**Vatika Hair Oil Argan** is perfect for revitalizing your hair in just 20 minutes, bestowing it with incredible shine and a silky texture. Its non-greasy, alcohol-free formula absorbs quickly into the scalp, leaving your hair frizz-free and protected. It's the ultimate styling product for natural hair, wigs, and extensions, infusing them with vitality and strength from root to tip.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Oil Argan**:
â­ Massage the oil into the scalp and hair strands from roots to tips.
â­ Leave it on for at least 20 minutes for deep penetration.
â­ Wash your hair as usual and enjoy nourished, silky hair all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Oil Argan**:
â­ Pure Argan Oil.
â­ Vitamins A, E, and F for enhanced hair health.

#Vatika #HairOil #ArganOil #HealthyHair #ShinyHair #HairCare #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh #SilkyHair

Discover the secret to healthy hair with **Vatika Hair Oil Black Seed**. Deeply nourish your hair in just 20 minutes, leveraging the amino acids, fatty acids, and minerals found in Black Seed, an ingredient known for its powerful properties across cultures for centuries.

**Vatika Hair Oil Black Seed** offers complete hair care, improving shine, texture, and volume with regular use. This 100% Natural Hair Oil, free from parabens, sulfates, and silicones, is suitable for men and women to strengthen hair from root to tip.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Oil Black Seed**:
â­ With your fingertips, massage your hair from roots to tips.
â­ Leave the oil on your hair for at least 20 minutes to penetrate deeply.
â­ Wash your hair for deep nourishment and silky hair all day long, thanks to the enriching vitamins.

â­ Black Seed

description_en:
Nourish your strands with **Vatika Hair Oil Coconut 200 ml**, the ultimate solution for healthy, voluminous hair in just 20 minutes. Infused with the goodness of Vitamins A, E, and F, this natural hair oil works to strengthen hair follicles, promoting thickness and enhancing shine. The perfect blend of coconut, castor, and henna ensures bouncy, vibrant hair, all within a 100% natural formula that is free from parabens, sulfates, and silicones. Experience superior nourishment from root to tip.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Oil Coconut 200 ml**:
â­ Gently massage the oil into your scalp and hair strands from root to tip using your fingertips.
â­ Leave the oil on for at least 20 minutes to allow for deep penetration.
â­ Wash your hair as usual to reveal nourished, silky-smooth hair all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Oil Coconut 200 ml**:
â­ Natural Coconut Oil
â­ Blend of Natural Herbs (Castor, Henna)
â­ Vitamins A, E, & F
â­ 100% Natural Formula, free from Parabens, Sulfates, and Silicones.

description_en:
Achieve thicker, stronger hair with the **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Hair Fall Control**. This therapeutic hot oil treatment, enriched with coconut, castor, vitamin E, and antioxidants, nourishes and strengthens hair follicles from root to tip, effectively reducing hair fall and imparting a healthy, shiny appearance. The oil deeply penetrates hair strands for superior moisture without any greasy or heavy residue, making it ideal for damaged, split-ended, or limp hair. Say goodbye to dry, dull, and lifeless hair!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Hair Fall Control**:
â­ After shampooing, apply an adequate amount of the hot oil treatment to your hair.
â­ Gently massage from roots to tips, ensuring even distribution.
â­ Wrap your hair with a towel for 15 minutes. You can heat the towel using a hairdryer or steamer to enhance absorption.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment Hair Fall Control**:
â­ Coconut
â­ Castor
â­ Amla
â­ Aloe Vera
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Antioxidants

#Vatika #HotOilTreatment #HairFallControl #HairCare #NaturalOils #HealthyHair #HairGoals #SaudiBeauty #HairNourishment #StrongHair

description_en:
Unlock the secret to healthy, strong hair with the **Vatika Hair Mayonnaise Repair and Restore Mask**. This potent formula is a rich source of minerals and proteins from Honey, Castor, and Marrow, working to soften hair, eliminate frizz, and strengthen damaged or dry strands. It revitalizes dull and weak hair, restoring shine and vitality, making it ideal for all hair types, including chemically treated or colored hair. Easy to use and rinse out in just 3 minutes.

â­ Enriched with Honey, Castor Oil, and Marrow for hair strengthening and nourishment.
â­ Contains Egg and Castor Oil for deep hydration and silky smoothness.
â­ Repairs damaged hair, split ends, and dullness.
â­ Moisturizes, strengthens, reduces frizz, and improves overall hair health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Mayonnaise Repair and Restore Mask**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to your hair length and scalp.
â­ Gently massage to ensure complete coverage.
â­ Leave on for 2 minutes, then shampoo and rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Mayonnaise Repair and Restore Mask**:
â­ Egg
â­ Honey
â­ Castor Oil
â­ Marrow

It revitalizes dull and fragile hair, giving it unparalleled strength and shine.

â­ Strengthens weak and brittle hair.
â­ Nourishes hair from root to tip.
â­ Contains 100% natural Hibiscus extracts.
â­ Free from parabens, phthalates, and mineral oils.
â­ Imparts healthy shine and vitality to hair.

â­ Wet your hair.

description_en:
Experience the ultimate moisturizing power with **Vatika Hair Mayonnaise Extreme Moisturizing**, specially formulated to give your hair the vitality and health it deserves. This mask, rich in essential proteins and minerals, and extracted from natural ingredients like almond, coconut, and sesame, works to nourish your hair from root to tip, imparting exceptional shine and superior strength. It gives you soft, frizz-free hair and deeply moisturizes your scalp without leaving any greasy residue or causing dryness. It's the perfect solution for healthy, attractive hair.

Product Features:
â­ Rich in natural extracts of Almond, Coconut, and Sesame for stronger, healthier hair.
â­ Deeply moisturizes hair and retains essential moisture for a super-smooth result.
â­ Reduces frizz and gives hair a sleek, attractive appearance.
â­ Protects hair from the effects of external humidity and dryness.
â­ Suitable for all hair types and free from harsh chemicals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Mayonnaise Extreme Moisturizing**:
â­ Apply generously to the length of your hair and scalp.
â­ Gently massage to ensure complete coverage.
â­ Leave it on for just 3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Mayonnaise Extreme Moisturizing**:
â­ Almond
â­ Coconut
â­ Sesame

description_en:
Achieve visibly thicker and fuller hair with **Dabur Vatika** Conditioner, specifically formulated for fine, thin, and damaged hair.

The **Dabur Vatika** Volume and Thickness Conditioner is your secret to luscious locks, offering a herbal recipe designed to boost your hair's density and volume. Infused with a blend of natural ingredients like Olive, Henna, Aloe Vera, and Almond, it works to soften your hair and bring it back to life!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika**:
â­ After shampooing, rinse your hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply the conditioner evenly to the lengths of your hair.
â­ Leave it on for two minutes to allow the nutrients to penetrate.
â­ Rinse well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika**:
â­ Henna: Coats and moisturizes hair follicles to increase hair volume.
â­ Castor: Promotes hair growth.
â­ Coconut: Penetrates deep into the hair shaft to make it thick and strong.

description_en:
Say goodbye to dull hair! Discover the secret to healthy, vibrant hair with **Dabur Vatika Nourishing Oil Shampoo with Avocado**. Specially formulated to revitalize your hair, it purifies and gently cleanses while providing intense nourishment from root to tip thanks to natural Avocado Oil.

â­ Revitalizes dull, lifeless hair and promotes vigour.
â­ Encourages hair detox and replenishes nourishment.
â­ Features 100% natural avocado extracts.
â­ Free from Parabens, Phthalates & Mineral Oils for a natural care experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Nourishing Oil Shampoo with Avocado**
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply a suitable amount of shampoo to the scalp and hair.
â­ Gently massage to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Nourishing Oil Shampoo with Avocado**
â­ Natural Avocado Oil
â­ Avocado Extract
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Fragrance
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Polyquaternium-10
â­ Citric Acid

description_en:
Achieve gravity-defying styles that last with **Dabur Vatika Hair Gel**. This powerful styling gel offers extreme, long-lasting hold and a natural shine, making it your go-to for impeccable hair. Enriched with Lemon and Olive oil, **Dabur Vatika Hair Gel** not only nourishes but also helps control hair fall, leaving your hair looking styled and feeling healthy. Our 100% alcohol-free formula prevents dryness and keeps your hair hydrated, ensuring a residue-free, no-crunch finish. Embrace the ultimate styling experience with **Dabur Vatika Hair Gel** for a confident and bold look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Gel**
â­ Apply a generous amount of gel to damp or dry hair.
â­ Distribute evenly through hair from roots to ends.
â­ Style as desired for a firm and attractive hairstyle.
â­ Use a hairdryer for added volume and definition.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Gel**
â­ Lemon: Provides natural shine and helps cleanse the hair.
â­ Olive Oil: Nourishes the hair, adds extra moisture, and contributes to its strength.
â­ Henna: Works to strengthen hair strands and improve texture.

description_en:
Vatika Hair Fall Control Mayonnaise brings you the benefits of egg proteins, olive oil, and a powerful blend of natural ingredients that naturally nourish, moisturize and treat hair. Enriched with aloe vera, garlic and watercress, it helps strengthen hair strands and prevent excessive hair loss.

Product features:
â­ Moisturizes for softer, silkier hair, ideal for frizzy and dry hair.
â­ Enhances shine and softness using natural nourishing ingredients.
â­ Reduces frizz and protects hair from humidity and dryness.
â­ Strengthens hair strands and prevents excessive hair loss.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Mayonnaise Hair Fall Control**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to the length of your hair and scalp.
â­ Gently massage it to cover it completely.
â­ Leave it for two minutes.
â­ Then rinse it with shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Mayonnaise Hair Fall Control**:
â­ Olive oil
â­ Coconut
â­ Sesame
â­ Almonds
â­ Eggs

title_ar: Ø¯Ø§Ø¨Ø± ÙØ§ØªÙŠÙƒØ§ Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… Ø¨Ø®Ù„Ø§ØµØ© Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù†Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø§Ø¹Ù… ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø­Ø±ÙŠØ±ÙŠ - 400 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience silky smoothness with **Dabur Vatika Henna Extract Conditioner**. This conditioner, enriched with natural henna extract, deeply nourishes your hair, leaving it looking healthy and vibrant. **Dabur Vatika Henna Extract Conditioner** is specially formulated to detangle hair, making it easier to comb and adding a beautiful shine. It maintains your hair's moisture, ensuring it's easy to style and has a soft, silky texture.

â­ Provides superior softness and a silky feel.
â­ Enriched with natural henna extract for deep nourishment.
â­ Detangles hair and facilitates styling.
â­ Adds healthy shine to hair.
â­ Moisturizes hair and protects it from dryness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Henna Extract Conditioner**
â­ After shampooing, lightly towel-dry your hair.
â­ Apply the conditioner evenly along the lengths of your hair, focusing on the ends.
â­ Leave it on for two to three minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Henna Extract Conditioner**
â­ Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Myristate, Dimethicone, Glycerin.
â­ Glycol Distearate, Fragrance, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetrimonium Chloride.
â­ Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Laureth-3.
â­ Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Polyquaternium-37.
â­ Lawsonia Inermis (Henna) Leaf Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate.
â­ Disodium EDTA, Magnesium Nitrate, Magnesium Chloride.
â­ Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone.
â­ Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

#DaburVatika #HennaConditioner #HairCare #HealthyHair #SoftHair #HairMoisture #HairShine #DailyCare #HairProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Nourish your hair in just 20 minutes with the New Castor enriched hair oil by **Vatika**, designed for men and women. **Vatika** Hair Oils are uniquely enriched with trusted natural ingredients. The new and improved formulation combines all-natural ingredients with Vitamins A, E, and F. One of the best hair treatment oils, Castor Oil is high in omegas and ricinoleic fatty acids, very beneficial to the follicles. Use it regularly as a nourishing hair care treatment for stronger, fuller-looking hair and added shine. The 100% Natural formula by **Vatika** Naturals Castor Oil for men and women is paraben, sulfate, and silicones free. Strengthen your hair from the root to tip with **Vatika** Naturals Castor Enriched Oil for bouncy & thick hair!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika** Hair Oil with Castor:
â­ With the help of your fingertip massage from the root of the hair strands to the tip.
â­ Leave the oil on the hair for at least 20 minutes.
â­ Vitamins deeply nourish the hair and wash your hair leaving the nourished and silky hair all day long.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ For external use only.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Keep away from naked flame or direct heat sources.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika** Hair Oil with Castor:
â­ Castor

description_en:
Discover the natural beauty of your hair with **Dabur Vatika Henna Mahogany Hair Color**. This unique formula is ammonia-free and provides complete grey coverage, giving your hair vibrant, natural-looking color. Henna is known for its conditioning and strengthening properties, making it the perfect choice for those seeking a safe and healthy alternative to traditional hair dyes. Enjoy healthy, strong, and shiny hair in a captivating mahogany shade.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Henna Mahogany Hair Color**:
*   **Mixing**: Empty one sachet of coloring powder into a non-metallic bowl. Add 40 ml of water and mix well to form a lump-free, uniform mixture. Use immediately.
*   **Applying**: Wear gloves and protect your clothing. Apply the mixture to your hair from root to tip using an applicator brush. Leave on for 30 minutes.
*   **Rinsing**: Wash your hair thoroughly with lukewarm water until the water runs clear.
*   **Conditioning**: Apply Dabur Vatika conditioner, leave for 5 minutes, then rinse.
*   **Extra Tips**: Ensure hair is clean before application. Apply petroleum jelly around the hairline to avoid skin staining. For a deeper shade, leave the mixture on for an additional 10 minutes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Henna Mahogany Hair Color**:
*   Natural Henna Leaf Powder
*   Nourishing Herbal Extracts
*   Safe Natural Colorants
*   Natural Hair Conditioner

#DaburVatika #HennaHairDye #MahoganyHair #NaturalHairColor #AmmoniaFree #HairCare #HealthyHair #BeautySaud #SaudiBeauty #HairColoring

description_en:
The **Vatika Oil Replacement Repair & Restore** will transform your damaged hair. Our formula, infused with a potent combination of Garlic, Marrow, and Castor, works to repair and strengthen your hair from the roots, leaving it healthy and revitalized.

With **Vatika Oil Replacement Repair & Restore**, say goodbye to split ends, breakage, and dull hair, and hello to strong, luscious locks. Our gentle and nourishing formula is ideal for damaged hair, designed to revive and restore your hair to its natural beauty. Don't let damaged hair hold you back any longer; transform your hair with **Vatika Oil Replacement Repair & Restore**.

â­ Repairs and strengthens hair from the roots.
â­ Combats split ends and hair breakage.
â­ Revitalizes dull hair, restoring its shine.
â­ Nourishes and softens damaged strands.
â­ Enhances hair elasticity and suppleness.
â­ Can be used as a leave-in styling product.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Oil Replacement Repair & Restore**

* Apply after washing and before styling.
* Can be used as a leave-in styling product.
* Effectively works on damaged and dull hair to improve strength and elasticity.
* Leaves hair feeling soft and nourished.

Caution & Warnings:
* For external use only.
* Avoid contact with eyes.
* Keep away from naked flame or direct heat sources.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Oil Replacement Repair & Restore**

* Garlic
* Marrow
* Castor

description_en:
Fortify your hair with **Vatika Black Seed Hair Cream**, a groundbreaking formula that unveils 2 times stronger hair. Experience the transformation as handpicked black seed extracts from Turkey infuse unparalleled strength and shine.

Embrace the centuries-old power of Turkish Black Seed, revered in ancient Asian and Middle Eastern cultures for its remarkable properties. **Vatika Black Seed Hair Cream** offers complete hair care with a unique formula.

Witness the metamorphosis of weak and dull hair into a display of strength and brilliance with **Vatika Black Seed Hair Cream**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Black Seed Hair Cream**
â­ Apply on hair post hair wash.
â­ Spread a small amount on your hands.
â­ Apply to your hair starting from the roots and continuing along the lengths.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Black Seed Hair Cream**
â­ Black Seed

#Vatika #HairCream #BlackSeed #HairCare #StrongHair #ShinyHair #HairStyling #HairMoisture #HealthyHair #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover the secret to voluminous and healthy hair with **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment for Volume & Thick Hair**. Enriched with coconut, castor oil, and Vitamin E, this Vatika Naturals hot oil treatment boosts your hair's thickness and imparts superior shine. The unique herbal formula nourishes hair from root to tip, reducing hair fall and eliminating split ends. Enjoy stronger, more vibrant hair with every use.

Additionally, the product comes with a free microfiber hair towel, a gentle and effective way to dry your hair, minimizing frizz and damage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment for Volume & Thick Hair**:

â­ After shampooing, apply a generous amount of **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment for Volume & Thick Hair** to your hair.
â­ Gently massage from root to tips.
â­ Wrap your hair with the microfiber hair towel and leave it on for 15 minutes. You can heat it for enhanced effectiveness.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment for Volume & Thick Hair**:

â­ Coconut Oil
â­ Castor Oil
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Antioxidants
â­ Natural Herbal Formula

#Vatika #HotOil #HairThickening #HealthyHair #NaturalOils #HairFallControl #ShinyHair #HairCare #SaudiArabia #OilyHairCare

description_en:
Discover **Dabur Vatika Shampoo Henna Extract**, a conditioning shampoo specially formulated to enhance your hair's health with its rich blend of natural henna extract and Shikakai. This shampoo nourishes your hair from root to tip, giving it a healthy and vibrant look throughout the day. It helps to make hair soft, silky, and lustrous without the need for harmful chemicals. Whether your hair suffers from damage caused by coloring or heat styling, this shampoo offers you a natural solution.

â­ **Product Benefits & Features**

â­ Prevents hair fall as Henna is loaded with powerful phytochemicals.
â­ Helps balance oil production on the scalp, thus enriching hair texture.
â­ Combats dandruff with its antifungal traits, treating microbial disorders on the scalp.
â­ Provides your hair with a healthy and vibrant look.
â­ Leaves hair soft, silky, and lustrous.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Shampoo Henna Extract**

â­ Gently massage into wet hair & scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Repeat if necessary.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Shampoo Henna Extract**

â­ Indian Henna
â­ Shikakai Extracts
â­ Vatika Essential Oils

#VatikaShampoo #HennaShampoo #DaburVatika #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairProducts #Henna #StrongHair #HairFall #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Achieve your perfect style with **Vatika Hair Gel Mega Hold**.

Get ready in style with the Vatika Naturals Mega Hold Stand Tough Styling Gel enriched with the goodness of Blackberry, Black Seed, and Cactus giving you the best hold, firmness, and nourishment ever. Vatika's natural Gel hair wax for men gives extreme Gravity Defying Hold for 24 hours! This Hair Gel for men gives your hair the level of hold that allows it to stay slick and look effortless the entire day. It simplifies the task of styling, setting, and managing your hair, no matter how wild, while deeply nourishing it. The Alcohol-free hair gel leaves no residue, keeping your hair Safe but Stylish!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Gel Mega Hold**:
â­ Put a generous amount of gel in hands and apply to damp or wet hair.
â­ For Rock hard spikes, twist hair upwards in small sections, pulling through hair and twisting at the ends.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Gel Mega Hold**:
â­ Blackberry
â­ Black Seed
â­ Cactus

description_en:
Achieve ultimate style and hold with **Dabur Vatika** Hair Gel Max Hold, enriched with Cactus extracts for superior strength and nourishment.

âœ¨ **Product Features:**
â­ Provides extreme hold for up to 24 hours.
â­ Leaves your hair looking sleek and effortlessly styled all day long.
â­ Simplifies hair styling, setting, and managing even the wildest hair.
â­ Deeply nourishes your hair, ensuring health and vitality.
â­ Alcohol-free formula leaves no residue, keeping your hair safe and stylish!
â­ Embrace the confidence of gravity-defying styles and shine on!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika** Hair Gel Max Hold:
â­ Apply a generous amount of gel to damp or dry hair.
â­ Distribute evenly through hair strands using your fingers or a comb.
â­ Style your hair as desired and let it set.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika** Hair Gel Max Hold:
â­ Cactus extracts

description_en:
Struggling to achieve that 'That Girl' glow without the hassle? Discover our **Vatika Hair Mask Powergreen Fruitamins**, the ultimate solution for deep hair hydration and nourishment.

Experience the benefits of a green smoothie, but for your hair! This potent blend of fruits and vitamins delivers essential nutrients, fortifying your hair from root to tip for a strong, healthy look. Redefine your hair goals and embrace a new era of vitality with **Vatika Hair Mask Powergreen Fruitamins**!

â­ Enriched with fruits and vitamins for superior nourishment.
â­ Hydrates and repairs hair from root to tip.
â­ Promotes noticeable strength and health.
â­ Leaves hair looking vibrant and revitalized.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Mask Powergreen Fruitamins**
â­ Wash your hair thoroughly with Vatika Naturals Shampoo and Conditioners.
â­ Apply the hair mask evenly.
â­ Leave on for 3 minutes.
â­ Rinse off with water for stronger, healthier-looking hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Mask Powergreen Fruitamins**
â­ Green Apples

description_en:
Introducing **Dabur Vatika Hair Food Lemon & Avocado**, a nourishing formula designed to revitalize your hair. Experience deep hydration and superior nourishment with its unique blend of 100% natural oils, completely free from petrolatum, parabens, paraffins, and sulphates. For healthy, shiny, and strong hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Food Lemon & Avocado**

â­ Dispense a small amount onto your palm.
â­ Apply the cream evenly to your hair, from roots to tips.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Food Lemon & Avocado**

â­ Avocado: Rich in multivitamins, it deeply nourishes the scalp and repairs damaged hair.
â­ Lemon: Helps cleanse the scalp of buildup and fights dandruff.

description_en:
Discover the secret to healthy, radiant hair with **Vatika Almond Enriched Hair Oil**, the ultimate solution for all hair types. Its unique blend of almond, sesame, and coconut oil, enriched with vitamins A, E, and F, provides your hair with superior nourishment. 100% free from parabens, sulphates, and silicones, **Vatika Almond Enriched Hair Oil** works to restore vitality to damaged hair, whether it's dry, brittle, or simply in need of a refresh. Achieve silky, soft, and revitalized hair with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Almond Enriched Hair Oil**
â­ Massage the scalp and hair strands from root to tip with your fingertips.
â­ Leave the oil on your hair for at least 20 minutes to allow deep penetration.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly to enjoy nourished, silky hair that lasts all day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Almond Enriched Hair Oil**
â­ Almond Oil
â­ Sesame Oil
â­ Coconut Oil
â­ Vitamin A
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Vitamin F

description_en:
Achieve healthy, flake-free hair with **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Anti Dandruff Lemon & Tea**. This innovative cream combines the power of Lemon and Tea Tree oil for superior nourishment and protection. It helps form a protective layer against external factors like dust and heat, giving your hair a healthy shine and a refreshed, vibrant look. It makes hair soft and easy to style, making it ideal for both men and women and all hair types. Get salon-like hair with easy application and washability.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Anti Dandruff Lemon & Tea**:
â­ For Styling: Spread a small amount on your palm and then apply to your hair starting from the roots to the tips.
â­ As a deep treatment: Apply a generous amount to dry hair, leave it on for as long as you wish, then wash with shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Cream Anti Dandruff Lemon & Tea**:
â­ Lemon: Helps combat dandruff with its astringent and antibacterial properties.
â­ Tea Tree Oil: Known for its antiseptic and anti-dandruff properties.
â­ Almond: Deeply nourishes hair, imparting softness and vitality.

#DaburVatika #Vatika #HairCream #AntiDandruff #DandruffTreatment #HealthyHair #ShinyHair #Hairstyling #HairProducts #HairCare

description_en:
Transform your hair with **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color Creme Dark Brown 3.0**, a rich and nourishing coloring experience that delivers a captivating dark brown hue. Indulge in the natural benefits of almond, coffee, and honey extracts, which deeply nourish your hair, leaving it with superior shine and silky-smoothness. **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color Creme Dark Brown 3.0** not only colors your hair but also protects and enhances its vitality, allowing you to feel confident and beautiful with every use. Unleash your personality with this attractive color that turns heads.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color Creme Dark Brown 3.0**:
â­ Mix the contents of the tube and developer bottle in a non-metallic bowl until a uniform mixture is formed.
â­ Wear gloves and apply the mixture evenly to your hair using an applicator brush.
â­ Focus on grey hair and leave the color on for 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with lukewarm water until the water runs clear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color Creme Dark Brown 3.0**:
â­ Almond Extract
â­ Coffee Extract
â­ Honey Extract

description_en:
Achieve your desired unique hairstyle with **Dabur Vatika Gel Cream Extreme Hold**. This powerful gel offers a non-sticky, non-greasy, and waterproof formula that creates the perfect look without compromise. Enjoy a stylish, shiny finish that lasts for hours.

â­ Provides strong hold and long-lasting styling.
â­ Non-greasy and waterproof formula for comfortable wear.
â­ Features a distinct masculine fragrance for added freshness.
â­ Keeps hair curls intact for up to 24 hours.
â­ Suitable for all hair types, offering moisture and shine.
â­ Ensures incredible manageability without flakes.
â­ The perfect tool for achieving any hairstyle, from wrap styling and blow-drying to hot curling.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Gel Cream Extreme Hold**
â­ Squirt some gel into the palm of your hand.
â­ Spread it evenly over your hair.
â­ Comb your hair into the desired style or shape using your fingers.
â­ Gently cleanses and leaves hair looking healthy and vibrant.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Gel Cream Extreme Hold**
â­ Comprised of an advanced formula that provides strong hold, moisturizing, and a sheen effect.
â­ Gentle ingredients that ensure incredible manageability without flakes.

description_en:
Keep your hair strong and healthy with **Vatika Hair Serum Thermal Protect**. This serum instantly nourishes and restores strength in weak & damaged hair from root to tip, fighting split ends. With natural ingredients like sesame, argan oil, and chamomile, **Vatika Hair Serum Thermal Protect** shields your hair from heat styling and helps manage it without hair fall. It enhances your hair's natural strength, elasticity, hydration, and shine, transforming wild, unmanageable hair into polished, silky locks. Versatile enough for wet or dry hair. Achieve soft, strong hair with this lightweight, delightful serum.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Serum Thermal Protect**:
â­ After shampooing, dispense the required amount into your hands.
â­ Apply uniformly to damp or dry hair.
â­ Do not rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Serum Thermal Protect**:
â­ Sesame
â­ Argan oil
â­ Chamomile

#Vatika #HairSerum #HeatProtection #HairCare #HealthyHair #SoftHair #ShinyHair #HairHydration #ArganOil #StrongHair

title_ar: Ø¯Ø§Ø¨Ø± ÙØ§ØªÙŠÙƒØ§ ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù†Ø§Ø¡ - Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠ Ù…Ø´Ø±Ù‚
description_en:
Discover your natural hair's beauty with **Dabur Vatika Henna Plum** hair color, featuring a gorgeous plum shade. This ammonia-free hair color offers complete grey coverage and nourishes and strengthens your hair with its herbal henna ingredients. Enjoy natural-looking color results and amazing effects without the worry of harsh chemicals. Let your hair shine with **Dabur Vatika Henna Plum**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Henna Plum**:

**Mixing:**
â­ Empty one sachet of coloring powder into a non-metallic bowl.
â­ Add 40 ml of water and mix well to form a lump-free, uniform mixture.
â­ Use the mixture immediately upon preparation.

**Applying:**
â­ Wear gloves and cover your upper body with a towel or cape.
â­ Using an applicator brush, apply the mixture to your hair from root to tip, focusing on white and grey hair.
â­ Leave the mixture on hair for 30 minutes.

**Rinsing:**
â­ Wash your hair thoroughly with lukewarm water until the water becomes clear and colorless.

**Conditioning:**
â­ Apply Dabur Vatika conditioner on hair and leave for 5 minutes.
â­ Rinse off with lukewarm water.

**Useful tips:**
â­ Ensure hair is clean before applying the mixture.
â­ Apply a little petroleum jelly on the skin around the hairline before application to avoid skin staining.
â­ For a deeper shade, let the mixture remain on hair for another 10 minutes.
â­ Keep rinsing hair until the water becomes completely clear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Henna Plum**:

â­ Natural Henna Powder.
â­ Nourishing herbal hair ingredients.
â­ Natural color fixatives.

#DaburVatika #HennaHairDye #NaturalHairColor #AmmoniaFreeHairDye #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairGoals #BeautyTips #PlumHair #VatikaBeauty

Get ready in style with **Dabur Vatika Menz Styling Hair Tonic**, designed for extreme conditioning for dry hair. This men's hair tonic with natural ingredients like Almonds & Avocado delivers intense hydration and softens dry, rough hair for easy manageability and a natural shine. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Menz Styling Hair Tonic**:
â­ Apply a small amount to damp hair.
â­ Style as required.

â­ Avocado.

description_en:
Indulge your hair with a touch of nature's goodness with the **Vatika Hair Mask Very Berry Fruitamins**. Invited to a party and wishing for flawless hair? Enriched with moistening pomegranate, the **Vatika Hair Mask Very Berry Fruitamins** bestows your strands with incredible shine and deep moisture. Its unique formula, blended with 100% natural Shea Butter, Avocado Oil, Olive Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, works to repair damage from dyeing or bleaching, leaving your hair looking flawless and healthy in just 3 minutes. It's the perfect solution for beautiful hair ready for any occasion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Mask Very Berry Fruitamins**:
â­ Wash your hair thoroughly with Vatika Naturals Shampoo and Conditioners.
â­ Apply the hair mask generously.
â­ Leave the hair mask on for 3 minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair with water for stronger, healthier-looking hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Mask Very Berry Fruitamins**:
â­ Blackberries
â­ Strawberries
â­ Cranberries

#Vatika #HairMask #HairCare #HairTreatment #HealthyHair #ShinyHair #HairProducts #MoisturizingHair #HairRepair #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience stronger, healthier hair with **Vatika Cactus Hair Oil**.

**Vatika Cactus Hair Oil** is your ultimate solution for hair strengthening and fall control, thanks to its rich formula of natural ingredients. This oil is specially designed to nourish the scalp and promote healthy hair growth, giving you thick, healthy hair.

â­ Strengthens hair follicles and prevents hair fall.
â­ Contains natural extracts like Cactus, Ghergir, and Garlic.
â­ Free from sulfates, parabens, and cruelty-free.
â­ Provides essential hydration and protects hair from dryness.
â­ Enhances hair shine, strength, and manageability.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Cactus Hair Oil**:
â­ Gently massage the oil from the roots to the tips of your hair using your fingertips.
â­ Leave the oil on your hair for at least 20 minutes.
â­ Wash your hair thoroughly for long-lasting hydration and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Cactus Hair Oil**:
â­ Cactus (Aloe Vera) Extract.
â­ Ghergir Extract.
â­ Garlic Extract.
â­ Canola Oil.
â­ Olive Oil.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Fragrance.

#HairCare #HairFallControl #HairOil #CactusOil #Vatika #HealthyHair #HairTreatment #HairGoals #SaudiBeauty #NaturalHaircare

description_en:
Embark on a dandruff-free journey with **Vatika Hair Cream Cooling Antidandruff**â€”a powerhouse that significantly reduces dandruff by an impressive 65%, leaving you feeling refreshed and confident.

Embrace the freedom from unwanted additives! **Vatika Hair Cream Cooling Antidandruff** is proudly free from alcohol, sulfates, and phthalates, committed to providing your hair with the bestâ€”without compromise.

Elevate your post-hair wash routine effortlessly. Apply a small amount, spread it on your hands, and work it into your hair, starting from the roots and continuing along the lengths for perfect hydration and styling.

Say goodbye to dandruff concerns and hello to healthy, lustrous hair with **Vatika Hair Cream Cooling Antidandruff**â€”because your hair deserves nothing but the best in the fight against dandruff.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Cream Cooling Antidandruff**
â­ Pre-treatment: Apply a generous amount on dry hair. Leave on for as long as you wish, and then shampoo.
â­ Styling: Spread a small amount on your hand, then apply to your hair starting from the roots, and continuing along the length.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Cream Cooling Antidandruff**
â­ Lemon
â­ Tea Tree
â­ Almond

#Vatika #HairCare #AntiDandruff #HairCream #HealthyHair #MensGrooming #HairProducts #SaudiArabia #Hairstyling #HairMoisture

description_en:
Transform your hair with the **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color - Natural Black** for an exquisite natural black shade. Experience the nourishing benefits of black olive, blackberry, and blackseed extracts, meticulously blended to deliver vibrant, luscious color and unparalleled moisture and vitality. Achieve a silky-smooth, radiant finish that boosts your confidence. Embrace the power of **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color - Natural Black** and let your unique personality shine through with hair that makes a statement.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color - Natural Black**:
â­ Mix the contents of the coloring tube and developer milk bottle in a non-metallic bowl until a uniform texture is formed.
â­ Wear gloves and apply the mixture evenly to your hair using an applicator brush, focusing on grey areas.
â­ Leave the color on for 30 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water until the water runs clear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color - Natural Black**:
â­ Black olive
â­ Blackberry
â­ Blackseed
