description_en:
Indulge your precious hair strands with **Vatika** Olive Enriched Hair Oil, designed to nourish and protect. Featuring a unique blend of Virgin Olive Oil with nourishing extracts of Almonds, Cactus, and Lemon, **Vatika** ensures deeper oil penetration for complete natural nourishment for your scalp and hair. This 100% Natural Hair Oil, free from parabens, sulfates, and silicones, strengthens your hair from root to tip, bestowing lasting vitality and health.

â­ Features 100% natural extracts of Olive, Almond, and Vitamin E, crafted without harmful ingredients.
â­ Almond controls hair fall, hydrates, and nourishes, enhancing hair length, strength, and density.
â­ Cactus boosts volume and health, while Lemon regulates sebum and prevents dandruff.
â­ Olive maintains elasticity, softness, and strength.
â­ Suitable for all hair types, it moisturizes, soothes, heals, and promotes manageability.
â­ Removes split ends and eliminates dandruff.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika**:
â­ With the help of your fingertip, gently massage the oil from the root of the hair strands to the tip.
â­ Leave the oil on the hair for at least 20 minutes for deep nourishment by vitamins.
â­ Wash your hair as usual, leaving you with nourished and silky smooth hair all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika**:
â­ Olive

#Vatika #HairOil #OliveOil #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairNourishment #HairGrowth #AntiDandruff #HairTreatment #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Vatika Hair Fall Control Oil Replacement** is your ultimate solution for healthy, strong hair. Our unique formula, enriched with Cactus and Ghergir, revitalizes your scalp and promotes hair growth, leading to stronger, more resilient locks. Say goodbye to hair fall and hello to luscious, attractive hair with this effective oil replacement. Enjoy healthy hair from root to tip.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Fall Control Oil Replacement**:

â­ Can be used post-wash before styling, or as a leave-on styling product.
â­ Works effectively on damaged and dull hair to improve strength, elasticity, and softness.

â­ Cactus
â­ Ghergir

description_en:
Transform your hair with **Vatika Naturals Oil Fusion Intense Red 6.6**, designed to give you a vibrant and captivating deep red hair color. Enriched with hibiscus oil, pomegranate, and garlic extracts, this hair color not only dyes your hair but also nourishes and moisturizes it, leaving it silky-smooth and radiant.

â­ Achieve intense and lustrous deep red color.
â­ Superior nourishment thanks to rich hibiscus oil.
â­ Pomegranate boosts hair health and vitality.
â­ Garlic extracts strengthen hair follicles.
â­ Leaves hair noticeably soft and moisturized.
â­ Boost your confidence with a color that reflects your personality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Naturals Oil Fusion Intense Red 6.6**
â­ Mix the contents of the coloring tube and the developer milk bottle in a non-metallic bowl.
â­ Wear gloves and, using an applicator brush, apply the mixture evenly to your hair, focusing on grey areas.
â­ Leave the color on for 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with lukewarm water until the water runs clear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Naturals Oil Fusion Intense Red 6.6**
â­ Hibiscus Oil.
â­ Pomegranate.
â­ Garlic.

#VatikaHair #HairColor #IntenseRed #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairBeauty #ShinyHair #ProfessionalHairColor #DailyUse #SaudiDeals

description_en:
Pamper your hair with **Vatika Olive Enriched Hair Oil**, the ultimate solution for healthy and attractive hair. This unique formula is enriched with virgin olive oil, renowned for its nourishing properties, along with almond, cactus, and lemon extracts for deep nourishment of hair and scalp. **Vatika Olive Enriched Hair Oil** penetrates your hair strands, bestowing unparalleled softness, shine, and health, bid farewell to dry, brittle, and damaged hair. Suitable for all hair types, whether curly, straight, or fine. Give your hair the care it deserves with **Vatika Olive Enriched Hair Oil** and enjoy vibrant, healthy, and lustrous hair!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Olive Enriched Hair Oil**
â­ Massage hair strands from root to tip with your fingertips.
â­ Leave the oil on your hair for at least 20 minutes.
â­ Wash hair afterward to enjoy nourished and silky hair all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Olive Enriched Hair Oil**
â­ Virgin Olive Oil
â­ Almond Extract
â­ Cactus Extract
â­ Lemon Extract

description_en:
Experience the power of nature with **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment with Egg**, specifically formulated to deeply strengthen and nourish your hair.

**Vatika Hot Oil Treatment with Egg** is a rich treatment packed with egg protein, Vitamin E, and antioxidants, providing your hair with the vitality and nourishment it deserves. Say goodbye to dull, split, and dry hair!

â­ Strengthens hair follicles and prevents breakage.
â­ Imparts superior softness and healthy shine.
â­ Repairs damaged hair and rebuilds split ends.
â­ Visibly boosts hair volume and vitality.
â­ Suitable for men and women for overall hair health improvement.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment with Egg**:
â­ After shampooing, apply an adequate amount to your hair.
â­ Gently massage the scalp from roots to tips.
â­ Cover your hair with a towel for 15 minutes. The towel can be heated using a steamer or hairdryer to enhance absorption.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hot Oil Treatment with Egg**:
â­ Egg Protein (A rich source of essential amino acids for hair growth).
â­ Vitamin E & Antioxidants (For protection and hydration).
â­ Nourishing Natural Oils (To add shine and strength).

description_en:
Transform your hair with the **Vatika Hair Color Creme Blue Black 1.0**, a luxurious hair coloring experience that delivers a stunning, deep blue-black hue. Infused with the nourishing power of blackberry oil, blackseed, and black olive extracts, this advanced formula not only colors your hair brilliantly but also revitalizes it from root to tip.

Experience the difference with **Vatika Hair Color Creme Blue Black 1.0**. This unique blend provides vibrant, long-lasting color while deeply moisturizing and conditioning your hair, leaving it feeling silky-smooth, soft, and incredibly radiant. Unleash your confidence with hair that speaks volumes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Color Creme Blue Black 1.0**:
â­ Mix: Empty the coloring tube and developer milk bottle into a non-metallic bowl and mix thoroughly to achieve a uniform texture.
â­ Apply: Wear the included gloves. Using an applicator brush, apply the mixture evenly onto your hair, ensuring complete coverage, especially on grey strands.
â­ Wait: Leave the color on for 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse: Rinse your hair thoroughly with lukewarm water until the water runs clear and free of color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Color Creme Blue Black 1.0**:
â­ Blackberry Oil
â­ Blackseed
â­ Black Olive Extracts

description_en:
Introducing **Vatika** Naturals Menz Anti-Hair Fall Styling Hair Cream â€“ your ultimate solution to fight hair fall and keep your hair looking stylish all day long. This innovative hair cream contains natural extracts of Bentonite Clay, which not only helps you to create your desired hairstyle but also provides an all-day hold without causing any damage to your hair. Whether you're looking to create a sleek and polished look or a tousled and textured style, this styling hair cream can help you achieve it. Discover the goodness of both bentonite clay and coffee - as bentonite clay helps lock in and hold your hair style for an ultimate all-day control, while coffee stops hair loss and stimulates hair growth. This hair cream also comes with a sustainable packaging that is 100% recyclable and PVC free, so you can be assured that you are making a responsible choice for a better tomorrow.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika** Hair Cream With Hold:
â­ For Styling: Spread a small amount on your hand, then apply to your hair starting from the roots, and continuing along the length for perfect hold.
â­ Pre-treatment: Apply a generous amount on dry hair. Leave on for as long as you wish, and then shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika** Hair Cream With Hold:
â­ Coffee: Helps to stop hair loss and stimulate hair growth.
â­ Bentonite Clay: Provides perfect hold and all-day hair control.

#VatikaForMen #MensHairCream #Hairstyling #HairCare #HealthyHair #StrongHair #MensGrooming #HairStyle #SaudiArabia #MensCare

description_en:
Transform your hair with **Vatika Hair Color Creme Light Brown 5.0**, a luxurious light brown shade designed to enhance your natural beauty. This unique formula is enriched with almond, castor oil, and blackseed extracts, delivering vibrant color and deep hydration.

Discover the transformative power of **Vatika Hair Color Creme Light Brown 5.0** and unleash your confidence with a radiant hair color that reflects your personality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Color Creme Light Brown 5.0**
â­ Mix the contents of the tube and developer bottle in a non-metallic bowl.
â­ Wear gloves and apply the mixture evenly to your hair using an applicator brush.
â­ Leave on for 30 minutes, focusing on grey hair coverage.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water until the water runs clear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Color Creme Light Brown 5.0**
â­ Almond
â­ Castor Oil
â­ Blackseed

description_en:
Indulge your hair with the natural goodness of Vatika Jasmine Coconut Hair Oil. This luxurious oil nourishes your strands deeply in just 20 minutes, leaving you with soft, silky, and moisturized hair. Enriched with Henna, Amla, and Lemon, along with 5 other trusted herbs, **Vatika Jasmine Coconut Hair Oil** strengthens your hair from root to tip. Its 100% natural formula is free from parabens, sulfates, and silicones, ensuring problem-free, healthy hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Jasmine Coconut Hair Oil**:
â­ Gently massage your scalp and hair strands from root to tip using your fingertips.
â­ Leave the oil on your hair for at least 20 minutes for deep nourishment.
â­ Wash your hair as usual and enjoy nourished, silky hair all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Jasmine Coconut Hair Oil**:
â­ Natural Coconut Oil
â­ Refreshing Jasmine Extract
â­ Blend of natural herbs including Henna, Amla, and Lemon

description_en:
Achieve soft, silky hair with **Vatika Hair Oil**. This enriched blend of coconut oil and refreshing jasmine is perfect for combating hair fall, dandruff, and scalp irritation. Its 100% herbal formula strengthens hair, promotes growth, and leaves your strands beautifully nourished without any side effects.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Oil**:
â­ With your fingertips, massage the oil from the roots to the tips of your hair strands.
â­ Leave the oil on your hair for at least 20 minutes.
â­ Wash your hair for deep nourishment and silky smooth hair all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Oil**:
â­ Jasmine
â­ Coconut

description_en:
Get ready in style with **Dabur Vatika Hair Gel** with its special H20 Splash effect. The Styling Gel for men is enriched with the goodness of Honey, Aloe Vera & Jargeer, giving you the ultimate Wet look and hold all day long. The natural hair gel by **Dabur Vatika** provides the ultimate wet look for 24 hours! The alcohol-free hair gel leaves no residue, keeping your hair safe but stylish!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Vatika Hair Gel**:
â­ Apply gel generously to damp curls.
â­ Use your hands to scrunch from the ends upwards to enhance curl shape and definition.
â­ Let curls air dry naturally for softness or use a diffuser on a low heat setting to boost volume without frizz.
â­ Once dry, lightly scrunch out any stiffness to leave curls bouncy and full.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Vatika Hair Gel**:
â­ Aloe Vera
â­ Jargeer
â­ Honey

description_en:
Get ready in style with **Vatika** Naturals Strong Hold Medium Shine wax, the first ever Silicone-Free Wax enriched with Bamboo extracts for a super strong hold with natural shine. With absolutely 0% Silicone, hair stays hydrated and prevents thinning. **Vatika** Hair Wax provides extreme Gravity-Defying Hold for 24 hours and a perfect natural shine. It treats split ends and makes hair appear thicker. It's the perfect hair wax for any hairstyle needing a medium hold. Alcohol-free, it leaves no residue, keeping your hair safe, stylish, and attractive!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika** Hair Wax

â­ Apply a generous amount to your hands.
â­ Distribute onto damp or wet hair.
â­ For sharp, sculpted styles, twist hair upwards in small sections, pulling through and twisting the ends.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika** Hair Wax

â­ Bamboo

#Vatika #HairWax #StrongHold #HealthyHair #NaturalShine #Hairstyles #HairProducts #HairCare #MensHair #DaburVatika

description_en:
Achieve an unparalleled look with **Vatika Hair Wax Extra Strong**, the first silicone-free wax enriched with cactus extracts for super strong hold and long-lasting natural shine.

**Vatika Hair Wax Extra Strong** provides extreme gravity-defying hold for up to 24 hours, while keeping your hair hydrated and preventing thinning. Its silicone and alcohol-free formula ensures no residue, for a safe and stylish styling experience. Perfect for treating split ends and giving your hair a thick, voluminous appearance, making it the ideal hair wax for any hairstyle requiring a strong hold.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Wax Extra Strong**
â­ Apply a generous amount into your palms.
â­ Distribute evenly through damp or dry hair.
â­ Style as desired for the perfect hold.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Wax Extra Strong**
â­ Cactus Extract â€“ for hair hydration and nourishment.
â­ Other natural ingredients to boost hold and shine.

description_en:
**Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color Creme Deep Red Brown 3.6** â€“ Transform your hair with the Vatika Naturals Oil Fusion Coloring Kit in the exquisite shade of Deep Red Brown. Experience the richness of beetroot, pomegranate, and coffee extracts, carefully infused to deliver vibrant and luscious color like never before. Indulge your hair with the nourishing benefits of beetroot, pomegranate, and coffee extracts, known for their remarkable properties. Not only will your hair be beautifully colored, but it will also be infused with moisture and vitality, leaving it feeling silky-smooth and radiant. Embrace the transformative power of the **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color Creme Deep Red Brown 3.6**, and unleash your inner confidence with a color that reflects your unique personality and style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color Creme Deep Red Brown 3.6**:
â­ Mix: Empty the coloring tube and developer milk bottle into a non-metallic bowl and mix to form a uniform texture.
â­ Apply: Put on gloves and using an applicator brush, apply the mixture evenly to your hair. Focus on the grey hair, and keep it for 30 mins.
â­ Rinse: Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water until water runs clear and colourless.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color Creme Deep Red Brown 3.6**:
â­ Beetroot extracts
â­ Pomegranate extracts
â­ Coffee extracts

description_en:
Transform your hair with the **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color Creme Medium Brown**. Experience a touch of natural beauty with a rich blend of almond, castor oil, and honey extracts, specially formulated to deliver vibrant and captivating medium brown color that turns heads. This unique formula not only provides perfect color but also deeply nourishes and moisturizes your hair, leaving it soft, shiny, and full of vitality. Unleash your confidence with **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color Creme Medium Brown**, and let your hair speak volumes about your style and unique personality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color Creme Medium Brown**:
â­ Mix the contents of the coloring tube and the developer milk bottle in a non-metallic bowl until uniform.
â­ Wear gloves and apply the mixture evenly to your hair using an applicator brush. Focus on covering grey hair.
â­ Leave the color on for 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with lukewarm water until the water runs completely clear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Oil Fusion Hair Color Creme Medium Brown**:
â­ Almond: Known for its moisturizing and nourishing properties for hair.
â­ Castor Oil: Helps strengthen hair and enhance its shine.
â­ Honey Extract: Acts as a natural moisturizer, providing hair with softness and vitality.

description_en:
Give your hair the care it deserves with **Vatika Hair Serum Split & Seal**. Tired of split ends and dryness from heat styling tools? **Vatika Hair Serum Split & Seal** is the perfect solution for healthy, radiant hair.

This serum features a unique formula rich in Hibiscus and Avocado. Hibiscus works to prevent hair fall and split ends, leaving hair smooth and manageable. Avocado nourishes your hair with Biotin and rich oils, making even dry and rough hair easy to tame. The **Vatika Hair Serum Split & Seal** smoothens frizz, adds shine, protects your hair from breakage, and revitalizes growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vatika Hair Serum Split & Seal**:
â­ Apply a suitable amount to shampooed, towel-dried hair, or anytime on dry hair.
â­ Distribute the serum evenly throughout the hair and its ends.
â­ Do not rinse. Let it air dry or use a blow dryer.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vatika Hair Serum Split & Seal**:
â­ HIBISCUS
â­ AVOCADO

description_en:
Do you love touch-me textures? Cashmere jumpers, velvet dresses or silk sheets... we just love that feeling of softness on our skin. Itâ€™s luxuriously comforting, just like **Dove Deo Stick Powder Soft**.

Soft as silk, **Dove Deo Stick Powder Soft** has a warm, floral scent of freesias and peonies that reminds us of that comforting baby powder scent we all know and love from our childhood. This 0% alcohol formula doesnâ€™t just feel soft â€“ it helps your skin to feel soft too, reducing irritation and helping you stay dry for up to 48 hours. And with Â¼ moisturising cream to care for delicate underarm skin, you can enjoy beautifully soft and smooth underarm skin in just three days. Experience the ultimate softness and lasting freshness with **Dove Deo Stick Powder Soft**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Deo Stick Powder Soft**
â­ For underarm use only.
â­ Do not use on broken skin.
â­ Stop use if rash or irritation occurs.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Deo Stick Powder Soft**
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex GLY
â­ Stearyl Alcohol
â­ C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate
â­ PPG-14 Butyl Ether
â­ Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ PEG-8
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Polyethylene
â­ Silica
â­ Perfume
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil
â­ Steareth-100
â­ BHT
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ Benzyl Salicylate
â­ Citronellol
â­ Coumarin
â­ Geraniol
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool

description_en:
Experience unparalleled softness with **Dove Roll On Powder Soft 50 ml**. Do you love touch-me textures? Cashmere jumpers, velvet dresses, or silk sheets... we just love that feeling of softness on our skin. This antiperspirant roll-on offers a silky feel and a warm, floral scent of freesias and peonies, reminiscent of the comforting baby powder scent we all know and love. With its alcohol-free formula and Â¼ moisturising cream, **Dove Roll On Powder Soft 50 ml** soothes delicate underarm skin, reduces irritation, and keeps you dry for up to 48 hours, leaving your underarms beautifully soft and smooth in just three days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Roll On Powder Soft 50 ml**:
â­ For underarm use only.
â­ Do not use on broken skin.
â­ Stop use if rash or irritation occurs.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Roll On Powder Soft 50 ml**:
â­ Water, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Steareth-2, Perfume, Steareth-20, Disodium EDTA, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, PEG-4, Maris Sal, Potassium Lactate, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Dove Nourishing Body Wash, Deeply Nourishing**, specifically formulated to provide superior hydration and ultimate care for your skin. This moisturizing body wash combines NutriumMoistureâ„¢ technology with mild cleansers to help your skin retain its natural moisture, leaving you with softer, smoother skin after every shower. The unique caring formula in **Dove Nourishing Body Wash, Deeply Nourishing** helps maintain your skinâ€™s moisture barrier while delivering natural skin nourishment that goes deep into the surface layers, promoting healthy and vibrant skin. Enjoy the rich lather that replenishes your skin's nutrients, ensuring it feels cared for and clean.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Nourishing Body Wash, Deeply Nourishing**
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Apply a suitable amount of the wash to a loofah or directly onto your body.
â­ Gently lather and massage for rich foam.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Nourishing Body Wash, Deeply Nourishing**
â­ Water/Aqua
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate
â­ Stearic Acid
â­ Sodium Palmitate
â­ Sodium Palm Kernelate
â­ Lauric Acid
â­ Sodium Isethionate
â­ Fragrance/Parfum
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sodium Chloride

â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Tetrasodium EDTA

â­ Alumina

â­ Decylene Glycol

â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone

â­ Butylphenyl Methylpropional
â­ Coumarin

description_en:
Experience superior freshness and cleanliness with **Dove Deo Stick Original Anti-Perspirant**. This unique formula offers up to 48 hours of antiperspirant protection with a beloved classic scent, providing unparalleled skin care. **Dove Deo Stick Original Anti-Perspirant** features Â¼ moisturizing cream to help soften delicate underarm skin and aid its recovery from shaving irritation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Deo Stick Original Anti-Perspirant**:
â­ For underarm use only.
â­ Do not apply to broken or irritated skin.
â­ Discontinue use if rash or irritation occurs.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Deo Stick Original Anti-Perspirant**:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex GLY
â­ Stearyl Alcohol
â­ C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate

â­ Butylphenyl Methylpropional

â­ Geraniol
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Hydroxycitronellal
â­ Limonene

title_ar: Ø¯ÙˆÙ Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙŠÙˆÙ…ÙŠØ© Ù„ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± - Ø¹Ø±Ø¶ Ø®Ø§Øµ 2 Ã— 350 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Achieve beautiful, healthy hair with **Dove Shampoo** Daily Care, specifically designed to moisturize dry hair and protect it from daily damage. Give your hair superior softness and a healthy, vibrant look with every use.

Product Features:
â­ New **Dove Shampoo** Daily Care hair care range deeply nourishes dry hair and protects it against daily damage.
â­ For up to 100% softer, healthy-looking hair that's full of life.
â­ With the new Dove Bio-Restore formula, a natural origin blend of Amino Acids, Nourishing Oils, and Lipids.
â­ It works with your hair's biology to repair its damage from inside out, for complete, nourishing care.
â­ **Dove Shampoo** gives smoother hair, helps detangling, and improves manageability.
â­ For best results, use after Dove Daily Care Conditioner and style with Dove Oil Replacement Cream.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Shampoo**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Apply a small, coin-sized amount of shampoo into your palm.
â­ Gently massage the shampoo into your scalp using your fingertips.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with plenty of water, ensuring no residue is left.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. If shampoo gets into your eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water.
â­ For external use only. Do not ingest or apply on broken, irritated, or inflamed skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Shampoo**:
â­ Dove Bio-Restore formula (natural origin blend of Amino Acids, Nourishing Oils, and Lipids).

#Dove #Shampoo #HairCare #HairMoisture #HealthyHair #SoftHair #DryHair #DoveProducts #SaudiDeals #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Experience ultimate softness and radiance with the **Dove Pink Beauty Bar Soap**. Specially formulated to provide your skin with natural nourishment, it helps retain its natural moisture during cleansing. The **Dove Pink Beauty Bar Soap** features our ultra-mild cleansers that don't strip skin like regular soap, leaving it softer, smoother, and more radiant. Gentle enough for your face, body, and hands, making it the perfect addition to your daily skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Pink Beauty Bar Soap**
â­ For external use only.
â­ Not edible.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Pink Beauty Bar Soap**
â­ Ultra-mild cleansers.
â­ Contains Â¼ moisturizing cream.
â­ Leaves skin softer, smoother, and more radiant.
â­ Suitable for daily use on face, body, and hands.

description_en:
Discover the power of thicker hair with **Dove Shampoo With Lavender Oil & Rosemary for Thicker Hair 400 ml**. Inspired by French beauty rituals, this shampoo blends pure lavender oil and rosemary extract, renowned for their effective properties in boosting hair thickness and imparting a fuller, more vibrant appearance.

â­ Promotes visibly thicker and fuller-looking hair.
â­ Enriched with nourishing Lavender Oil and Rosemary Extract.
â­ Inspired by traditional French hair care rituals.
â­ Gently cleanses hair, providing long-lasting freshness.
â­ Suitable for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Shampoo With Lavender Oil & Rosemary for Thicker Hair 400 ml**:
â­ Thoroughly wet your hair with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo to the scalp and hair.
â­ Gently massage the scalp to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Shampoo With Lavender Oil & Rosemary for Thicker Hair 400 ml**:
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth sulphate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Perfume, Dimethiconol, Glycol Distearate, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Cocamide MEA, Citric Acid, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulphonate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Mica, Hydroxypropyl Methyl Cellulose, TEA-Sulphate, Titanium Dioxide, Disodium EDTA, PEG-45M, Sodium Benzoate, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Phenoxyethanol, Glycerin, PPG-9, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Trehalose, Zinc Gluconate, Lysine HCl, Sodium Sulphate, Gluconolactone, Linalol, Coumarin, Alfa-Isomethyl Ionone.

#DoveHair #DoveShampoo #ThickerHair #LavenderOil #RosemaryExtract #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairBeauty #SaudiArabia #HairRoutine

Enjoy a feeling of confidence all day long with this refreshing blend of cucumber and green tea, specially formulated to protect your clothes from white marks and unpleasant sweat. This product provides up to 48 hours of dryness, making it the perfect companion for your active lifestyle. Its unique formula enriched with Â¼ moisturizing cream helps to hydrate sensitive underarm skin, leaving it softer and smoother within just three days, and aids in recovery from shaving irritation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Deo Roll On Cucumber & Green Tea 50 ml**:

description_en:
**Dove Nourishing Hand Wash Shea Butter & Vanilla scent** offers a luxurious pampering experience for your hands. Infused with the well-known skin-softening benefits of shea butter, this hand wash leaves your hands feeling incredibly soft and moisturized. Enjoy the rich, creamy lather, scented with the warm embrace of shea butter and vanilla, to leave you feeling truly relaxed and soothed.

Its mild, gentle formula, enriched with NutriumMoistureâ„¢, delivers skin-natural nutrients, helping your skin retain its natural moisture for visibly softer, smoother skin after just one use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Nourishing Hand Wash Shea Butter & Vanilla scent**:
â­ For external use only.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
â­ Dispense a small amount onto wet hands.
â­ Lather well.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Nourishing Hand Wash Shea Butter & Vanilla scent**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate
â­ Sodium Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate
â­ Lauric Acid
â­ Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter)
â­ Parfum (Fragrance)
â­ Glycerin
â­ NutriumMoistureâ„¢

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Dove Go Fresh Revive Pomegranate Shower Gel**, your perfect solution for soft and revitalized skin. This shower gel combines NutriumMoistureâ„¢ technology with nourishing ingredients to deeply hydrate your skin, leaving it with a silky-smooth feel after every shower. Enjoy the invigorating scent of pomegranate that awakens your senses and adds an extra boost of energy to your mornings, like starting your day with a revitalizing power smoothie. **Dove Go Fresh Revive Pomegranate Shower Gel** is the secret to your soft and radiant skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Go Fresh Revive Pomegranate Shower Gel**
â­ Wet a loofah or your hands.
â­ Pour a small amount of the shower gel onto the loofah or hands.
â­ Distribute the lather all over your body with gentle circular motions.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Go Fresh Revive Pomegranate Shower Gel**
â­ Water
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Glycerin
â­ Polyacrylate-1 Crosspolymer
â­ Fragrance
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Potassium Sorbate
â­ Punica Granatum Fruit Extract
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Hydroxide

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and reliable protection with **Dove Women Stick Deodorant Coconut & Jasmine**. This gentle formula glides on smoothly, leaving your underarms feeling soft, smooth, and beautifully scented with a tropical coconut aroma. **Dove Women Stick Deodorant Coconut & Jasmine** is your perfect partner for all-day confidence and a refreshing feel. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Women Stick Deodorant Coconut & Jasmine**
â­ Apply 4-6 swipes to each underarm daily.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Do not apply to inflamed or broken skin.
â­ Discontinue use if rash or irritation occurs.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Women Stick Deodorant Coconut & Jasmine**
â­ Provides effective sweat and odor protection.
â­ Moisturizing formula keeps skin soft and smooth.
â­ Refreshing coconut scent for a relaxing feel.
â­ Suitable for daily use.

description_en:
Discover the restorative power of **Dove Shampoo Intensive Repair**, meticulously crafted to treat and revitalize damaged hair. This shampoo works to repair visible signs of damage and deeply nourish your hair, leaving it stronger and more resistant to breakage for a healthier, more beautiful appearance with every wash. Its unique formula, enriched with Nutri-Keratin Repair Actives, restores your hair's natural strength and protects it from future damage caused by heat, styling, and coloring.

â­ Treats the appearance of heat-damaged hair.
â­ Strengthens hair and makes it more resistant to breakage.
â­ Deeply nourishes hair with continuous use.
â­ Repairs surface damage and imparts superior smoothness.
â­ Protects against split ends and future damage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Shampoo Intensive Repair**
â­ Apply a suitable amount to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, use with Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner.
â­ Suitable for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Shampoo Intensive Repair**
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Dimethiconol, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Glycol Distearate, Carbomer, Gluconolactone, Citric Acid, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Cocamide MEA, Sodium Sulfate, Mica, Trehalose, Disodium EDTA, PEG-45M, Phenoxyethanol, Silica, PPG-9, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 77891

#DoveShampoo #DamagedHairRepair #HairTreatment #HealthyHair #HairCare #HairRestoration #StrongHair #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

title_ar: Ø¯ÙˆÙ Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙŠÙˆÙ…ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ - 400 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience ultimate hair care with **Dove Daily Care Shampoo**. Formulated with a Pro-Moisture Complex, this shampoo provides deep hydration for your normal hair, leaving it soft and easy to manage every day. Its gentle formula nourishes your hair from root to tip, protecting it from daily damage and imparting a healthy shine. Enjoy beautiful, healthy-looking hair with every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Daily Care Shampoo**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo to your scalp and gently massage to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse your hair well with water.
â­ For daily use to achieve the best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Daily Care Shampoo**:
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Dimethiconol, Trideceth-1, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Fragrance.
â­ Glycerin, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Cocamide MEA.
â­ DMDM Hydantoin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Geraniol, Linalool.
â­ Colorants: CI 15985, CI 1914.

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and protection with **Dove Deo Stick Cucumber & Green Tea Antiperspirant**. Specially formulated to provide a feeling of dryness and confidence all day long, with up to 48 hours of antiperspirant protection. Enjoy softer underarm skin thanks to its unique formula containing Â¼ moisturizing cream. Never worry about white marks on your colorful clothes again; choose bold colors and adventure with **Dove Deo Stick Cucumber & Green Tea Antiperspirant**.

Product Features:
â­ Provides up to 48 hours of antiperspirant protection.
â­ Enriched with Â¼ moisturizing cream for soft and smooth skin.
â­ Helps underarm skin recover from shaving irritation.
â­ Features refreshing cucumber and green tea scents.
â­ Protects clothes from white marks and stains.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Deo Stick Cucumber & Green Tea Antiperspirant**:
â­ For underarm use only.
â­ Do not use on broken or irritated skin.
â­ Stop use if rash or irritation occurs.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Deo Stick Cucumber & Green Tea Antiperspirant**:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane, Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex GLY, Stearyl Alcohol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PEG-8, Dimethicone, Parfum, Polyethylene, Silica, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Steareth-100, BHT, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene.

description_en:
Discover superior softness with **Dove Pink Beauty Bar**, specially formulated to provide your skin with the natural nourishment it needs. It combines gentle cleansing power with ultimate protection, preserving your skin's natural moisture during cleansing. The **Dove Pink Beauty Bar** is the perfect choice for your daily skincare routine, being gentle enough for use on your face, body, and hands.

â­ Leaves skin softer, smoother, and more radiant.
â­ Classic moisturizing formula with Â¼ moisturizing cream and mild cleansers.
â­ Dove doesn't dry skin like soap can.
â­ Suitable for daily use on face, body, and hands.
â­ No other bar hydrates skin better than Dove.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Pink Beauty Bar**:
â­ For external use only.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
â­ Not edible.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Pink Beauty Bar**:
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Stearic Acid, Sodium Palmitate, Water/Aqua.
â­ Lauric Acid, Sodium Isethionate, Sodium Stearate.
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Palm Kernelate.
â­ Glycerin, Perfume/Parfum, Sodium Chloride.
â­ Propylene Glycol, Zinc Oxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, Tetrasodium Etidronate.
â­ Alumina, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional.
â­ Citronellol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.
â­ CI 14700, CI 17200, CI 77891.

Experience ultimate freshness with **Dove Glowing Lotus Body Wash** 500ml, specially formulated to leave your skin soft and hydrated. This moisturizing body wash combines innovative NutriumMoistureâ„¢ technology with mild cleansers to help your skin retain its natural moisture, resulting in softer, smoother skin after just one shower.

â­ Nourishing formula for softer, more radiant skin.
â­ Helps restore the skin's natural moisture barrier.
â­ Replenishes skin nutrients for a clean, refreshed feel.
â­ Rich lather for a luxurious shower experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Glowing Lotus Body Wash**:
â­ Wet a loofah or your hands and dispense a small amount of the body wash.
â­ Create a rich lather and gently massage all over your body.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Glowing Lotus Body Wash**:

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Dove Go Fresh Pomegranate & Shea Butter Shower Gel 250ml with Loofah**. Experience a refreshing shower that leaves your skin feeling silky smooth and moisturized.

â­ A unique blend of Pomegranate extract and Shea Butter for deep nourishment.
â­ Gentle, soap-free cleansers that maintain your skin's moisture.
â­ Helps maintain your skinâ€™s moisture barrier as you cleanse.
â­ Suitable for daily use on all skin types.
â­ Comes with a convenient loofah to enhance your shower experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Go Fresh Pomegranate & Shea Butter Shower Gel 250ml with Loofah**:
â­ Wet the loofah and apply an appropriate amount of the gel.
â­ Gently lather the loofah to create a rich foam.
â­ Massage the foam onto your wet body skin.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water.
â­ For external use only. Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight. Not for consumption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Go Fresh Pomegranate & Shea Butter Shower Gel 250ml with Loofah**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Parfum, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Acrylates Copolymer, PPG-7, Sodium Gluconate, Citric Acid, PPG-6, Polyquaternium-7, Mica, Tin Oxide, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract, Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Tocopherol, Linalool, Limonene, Citronellol, Eugenol, CI 17200, CI 42090, CI 77891.

description_en:
Achieve stronger, fuller-looking hair with **Dove Hair Fall Rescue Shampoo**, specially formulated to combat hair fall and nourish your hair from root to tip. This shampoo works to fortify weak and brittle hair, reducing breakage and split ends, leaving you with visibly healthy and vibrant hair. The unique Dove Bio-Restore formula, a blend of amino acids and nourishing oils, penetrates deeply to repair damage from the inside out. Regular use of **Dove Hair Fall Rescue Shampoo** helps reduce hair fall and improve hair strength and resilience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Hair Fall Rescue Shampoo**

â­ Apply the shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage and rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ In case of contact with eyes, rinse well with warm water.
â­ Store in a cool place, away from direct sunlight.
â­ For best results, use with other Dove hair care products.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Hair Fall Rescue Shampoo**

â­ Enriched with Amino Acids.
â­ Contains nourishing oils for deep hydration.
â­ Infused with Vitamin Shots for hair health.
â­ Reduces hair fall by up to 98%.
â­ Makes hair visibly fuller and healthier.
â­ Gentle formula, suitable for daily use.

#Dove #HairFallRescue #AntiHairFall #StrongHair #SaudiHairCare #HealthyHair #HairLoss #HairNourishment #ThickerHair #DoveProducts

description_en:
If you are worried about hair fall, youâ€™re probably looking for a solution thatâ€™s going to give you visibly fuller hair*. Thatâ€™s exactly why we created a shampoo for the job. **Dove Shampoo Hair Fall Rescue** is specially formulated to target hair fall** and nourish your hair from root to tip. So all youâ€™ll need to worry about is how youâ€™re going to style your fuller-looking hair*.

The formula fortifies hair strands, working to reduce hair fall** by up to 98%. **Dove Shampoo Hair Fall Rescue**, with Nutrilock actives, deeply nourishes to help minimise breakages, for hair that is strong and beautiful every time you use it.

So gentle, **Dove Shampoo Hair Fall Rescue** can be used every day to make hair healthy.

â­ Makes hair visibly fuller

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Shampoo Hair Fall Rescue**

â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Shampoo Hair Fall Rescue**
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Dimethiconol, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Perfume, Glycol Distearate, Carbomer, Gluconolactone, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Amodimethicone, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Cocamide MEA, TEA-Sulfate, Sodium Sulfate, Trehalose, Cyclotetrasiloxane, PEG-45M, Magnesium Nitrate, Trideceth-12, Cetrimonium Chloride, Cyclopentasiloxane, Lysine HCl, Climbazole, Zinc Gluconate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Dimethyl Palmitamine, Silica, Magnesium Chloride, Acetic Acid, BHT, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, PPG-9, Disodium EDTA, DMDM Hydantoin, Phenoxyethanol, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Sodium Benzoate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 15985, CI 19140.

description_en:
Experience superior cleanliness and ultimate care with **Dove Antibacterial Hand Wash**. This unique formula combines effective germ-fighting power with Dove's deep moisturizing properties, leaving your skin soft and refreshed after every wash. **Dove Antibacterial Hand Wash** is specially designed to maintain your skin's natural moisture barrier and nourish it, with a rich lather that ensures superior cleanliness and ideal care for your hands.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Antibacterial Hand Wash**
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply a generous amount of the wash to your hands.
â­ Rub your hands thoroughly for at least 20 seconds to ensure comprehensive cleanliness.
â­ Rinse off with water and enjoy clean, soft hands.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Antibacterial Hand Wash**
â­ Nutrium Moisture Technology.
â­ Gentle skincare ingredients.
â­ Nourishing formula.
â­ Effective antibacterial agents.

description_en:
Achieve incredibly smooth and shiny hair with **Dove Daily Care Shampoo 2 in 1**. This innovative shampoo combines deep cleansing with superior hydration thanks to its unique formula featuring Pro-Moisture Complex, making it the perfect choice for your daily hair care routine. Ideal for dry and tired hair, it nourishes your strands from root to tip, imparting unparalleled strength and shine, and making styling easier after every wash. Save time and effort with the 2-in-1 shampoo and conditioner formula that delivers cleansing and softness in a single step.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Daily Care Shampoo 2 in 1**:

â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo to your scalp and hair.
â­ Gently massage your scalp to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water until all shampoo residue is removed.
â­ For best results, use regularly.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.
â­ If the product gets into the eyes, rinse them well with warm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Daily Care Shampoo 2 in 1**:

â­ Pro-Moisture Complex.
â­ Gentle cleansing and moisturizing formula.
â­ Hair nourishing ingredients.
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Fragrance, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Glycerin, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Polyquaternium-10, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Coconut Extract.

#Dove #Shampoo #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairMoisture #SoftHair #Conditioner #StrongHair #DailyCare #SaudiArabia

Discover the secret to beautiful skin with **Dove Bar Beauty Cream White**. Specifically formulated for all skin types, it offers a superior care experience with its signature Â¼ moisturizing cream, leaving your skin softer, smoother, and more radiant.

Mild, plant-based cleansers help your skin retain its natural moisture, unlike regular soap that can leave skin feeling dry. **Dove Bar Beauty Cream White** leaves your skin feeling soft and refreshed after every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Bar Beauty Cream White**:

â­ Rub the moisturizing bar generously between your wet hands to create a rich, creamy lather.
â­ Gently massage the lather all over your skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Get ready to conquer the world with beautiful, glowing skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Bar Beauty Cream White**:

â­ Ph-balanced and sulfate-free formula.
â­ Â¼ moisturizing cream.
â­ Mild plant-based cleansers.

description_en:
Achieve the volume and softness your hair deserves with **Dove Lavender Thickness Conditioner**.

The **Dove Lavender Thickness Conditioner** is the ultimate solution for dull, lifeless hair. Infused with soothing lavender extract, this conditioner deeply nourishes every strand, giving your hair a fuller, thicker appearance and a refreshing, long-lasting scent. Enjoy soft, manageable, and healthy-looking hair with every wash.

â­ Enriched with soothing lavender extract.
â­ Boosts hair thickness and provides a fuller look.
â­ Deeply moisturizes hair, leaving it exceptionally soft.
â­ Detangles and smooths hair for easy styling.
â­ Suitable for all hair types, including color-treated hair.
â­ Gentle formula for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Lavender Thickness Conditioner**:
â­ After shampooing, apply a generous amount to damp hair.
â­ Gently massage the conditioner, focusing on the ends.
â­ Leave on for 1-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Lavender Thickness Conditioner**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Lavender Extract
â­ Glycerin
â­ Cetrimonium Chloride
â­ Preservatives

#DoveConditioner #ThickHair #Lavender #HairCare #HealthyHair #SoftHair #HairGoals #HairProducts #DoveLavender #ShinyHair

title_ar: Ø¯ÙˆÙ ØµØ§Ø¨ÙˆÙ†Ø© Ø¨Ø²Ø¨Ø¯Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙŠØ§ ÙˆØ§Ù„ÙØ§Ù†ÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ§ - 160 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Indulge in soft, hydrated skin with the luxurious **Dove Shea Butter & Vanilla Bar Soap**.

Nourish your body and mind with this pH-balanced, sulfate-free beauty bar, designed to pamper your skin and leave you feeling as beautiful as you truly are. The **Dove Shea Butter & Vanilla Bar Soap** combines gentle, plant-based cleansers with Dove's signature 1/4 moisturizing cream for softer, smoother, healthier-looking skin, unlike ordinary soaps that can strip moisture. 

â­ Deeply moisturizes the skin.
â­ Infused with Shea Butter and Vanilla for a pampering experience.
â­ Gentle formula suitable for all skin types.
â­ Helps retain skin's natural moisture.
â­ Leaves skin feeling soft, smooth, and glowing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Shea Butter & Vanilla Bar Soap**:
â­ Rub the **Dove Shea Butter & Vanilla Bar Soap** generously between wet hands.
â­ Massage the creamy, smooth, rich lather all over your skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly for beautifully radiant skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Shea Butter & Vanilla Bar Soap**:
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Stearic Acid, Sodium Palmate, Aqua, Lauric Acid, Sodium Isethionate, Sodium Stearate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sodium Chloride, Zinc Oxide, Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, Tetrasodium EDTA, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Alumina, Citric Acid, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Alcohol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 15985, CI 77891, CI 19140.

#Dove #DoveSoap #SheaButter #Vanilla #Skincare #SkinMoisture #SoftSkin #Beauty #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Give your hair the ultimate care it deserves with **Dove Conditioner Intensive Repair** (340 ml). Achieve stronger, healthier, and more luminous hair with this innovative conditioner.

â­ **Advanced Repair Formula:** Enriched with Keratin Repair Complex, it deeply penetrates to repair damaged hair from root to tip.
â­ **Revives Vibrancy:** Brings life back to dry, dull hair by intensely moisturizing, improving elasticity, and reducing frizz.
â­ **Superior Shine & Smoothness:** Leaves your hair feeling silky smooth with a natural shine, without weighing it down, making it easy to manage.
â­ **Damage Protection:** Helps minimize hair breakage and split ends, giving you stronger, more resilient hair against external factors.
â­ **Suitable for All Hair Types:** Whether your hair is dry, damaged, or normal, this conditioner is gentle yet effective.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Conditioner Intensive Repair**
â­ After shampooing, apply a generous amount of the conditioner to damp hair.
â­ Massage gently, focusing on the mid-lengths and ends.
â­ Leave on for 1-3 minutes to allow the ingredients to work.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with warm water for instant results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Conditioner Intensive Repair**
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Keratin Amino Acids
â­ Glycerin
â­ Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine
â­ Preservatives and Fragrance.

#Dove #DoveConditioner #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairRepair #SoftHair #ShinyHair #HairMoisture #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate refreshment with **Dove Refreshing Cucumber Shower Gel**. This moisturizing body wash combines NutriumMoistureâ„¢ with mild cleansers to help your skin retain its natural moisture, leaving you with softer, smoother skin after just one shower. The caring formula in this **Dove Refreshing Cucumber Shower Gel** helps maintain your skinâ€™s moisture barrier while delivering natural skin nourishment that goes deep into the surface layers of your skin, leaving it feeling clean and refreshed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Refreshing Cucumber Shower Gel**:
â­ Pour a drop onto your hands or a loofah.
â­ Gently lather all over your body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Refreshing Cucumber Shower Gel**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Parfum, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, NutriumMoistureâ„¢, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate.

title_ar: Ø¯ÙˆÙ Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙŠÙˆÙ…ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø±ØŒ 340 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the secret to healthy, soft hair with **Dove Daily Care Conditioner**. This conditioner, designed for everyday use, gently nourishes your hair and provides optimal hydration without weighing it down. Thanks to its unique Moisture Lock Technology, it helps retain moisture, leaving your hair incredibly soft and easy to manage. It reduces frizz and enhances natural shine, giving you a feeling of vitality and freshness every day. Whether your hair is dry, oily, or normal, **Dove Daily Care Conditioner** is the perfect choice for achieving the best results.

â­ Rich daily nourishment for all hair types.
â­ Moisture Lock Technology to keep hair hydrated and soft.
â­ Lightweight and non-greasy formula.
â­ Detangles and reduces frizz for easier styling.
â­ Adds healthy, natural shine to hair.
â­ Suitable for dry, oily, or combination hair.
â­ Leaves hair with a refreshing scent.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Daily Care Conditioner**:
â­ After shampooing, apply a generous amount to damp hair.
â­ Gently massage, focusing on the mid-lengths and ends.
â­ Leave in for 1-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
â­ For best results, use daily with Dove Daily Care Shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Daily Care Conditioner**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol (conditioning agent)
â­ Dimethicone (provides smoothness and shine)
â­ Glycerin (moisturizer)
â­ Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine (detangler and conditioner)
â­ Preservatives to ensure the product remains safe and effective.
â­ Fragrance (optional)

#Dove #Conditioner #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairHydration #SoftHair #ShinyHair #SmoothHair #HairGoals #BeautyRoutine

description_en:
Experience brighter, smoother underarms with **Dove Deo Roll On Even Tone Blossom**. This roll-on provides superior antiperspirant protection for up to 48 hours, while caring for your underarm skin with its unique formula.

The **Dove Deo Roll On Even Tone Blossom** features a refreshing floral scent that lasts, and its moisturizing ingredients help to soothe skin and reduce irritation from shaving, leaving you with smooth, even-toned underarms.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Deo Roll On Even Tone Blossom**:
â­ Apply daily by swiping the roller ball onto your skin 4-6 times under each arm.
â­ Do not use on broken skin.
â­ Discontinue use if rash or irritation occurs.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Deo Roll On Even Tone Blossom**:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex GLY
â­ Stearyl Alcohol
â­ C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate
â­ PPG-14 Butyl Ether

â­ Butylphenyl Methylpropional
â­ Citronellol
â­ Geraniol
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Hydroxycitronellal
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool

description_en:
Experience beautifully soft and smooth underarms with **Dove Go Fresh Cucumber & Green Tea Antiperspirant Spray**. This refreshing spray offers a unique blend of up to 48 hours of antiperspirant protection and a long-lasting fresh scent. Its formula, enriched with Â¼ moisturising cream, helps to nourish your delicate skin and recover from any irritation caused by shaving, leaving your underarms noticeably softer in just 3 days. Start your day with a feeling of freshness and confidence with the superior care of **Dove Go Fresh Cucumber & Green Tea Antiperspirant Spray**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Go Fresh Cucumber & Green Tea Antiperspirant Spray**
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Spray onto clean, dry underarms.
â­ Keep the can away from direct sunlight and heat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Go Fresh Cucumber & Green Tea Antiperspirant Spray**
â­ Contains Â¼ moisturising cream for skin care.
â­ Cucumber and green tea extracts for natural comfort and freshness.
â­ Antiperspirant formula for lasting protection.

#DoveDeo #CucumberGreenTea #Antiperspirant #Skincare #BodyCare #Freshness #DoveSaudi #BeautyTips #DeodorantSpray #FeelGood

title_ar: Ø¯ÙˆÙ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ù„Ù„Ø¬Ø³Ù… 250 Ù…Ù„ - Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ù†Ø§Ø¹Ù…Ø© ÙˆØ±Ø·Ø¨Ø©
description_en:
Achieve soft, silky skin with **Dove Beauty Cream**. This luxurious body cream features a lightweight, nourishing formula that deeply moisturizes, leaving your skin feeling soft and smooth all day long. Indulge in radiant, healthy-looking skin with every application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Beauty Cream**:
â­ Best used after a bath or shower, morning or night.
â­ Massage the rich cream generously into your skin.
â­ Pay particular attention to dry areas like heels, knees, and elbows.
â­ For external use only. If skin irritation occurs, discontinue use.
â­ In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with water.
â­ If irritation persists, consult a doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Beauty Cream**:
â­ Water/Aqua, Stearic Acid, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Mineral oil, Glyceryl stearate, Petrolatum, Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed butter, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Cetyl Alcohol, Potassium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Fragrance/Parfum, Methylparaben, Carbomer, Propylparaben, Disodium EDTA, Tocopherol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Amyl Cinnamyl, Anise Alcohol, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Isoeugenol, Limonene, Linalool.

#Dove #Moisturizer #Skincare #BodyHydration #SoftSkin #DoveBeauty #DeepMoisture #SkinGlow #BodyCream #DailyCare

title_ar: Ø¯ÙˆÙ Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ø¨Ø²ÙŠØª Ø§Ù„Ø£ÙÙˆÙƒØ§Ø¯Ùˆ ÙˆØ®Ù„Ø§ØµØ© Ø§Ù„Ø¢Ø°Ø±ÙŠÙˆÙ† - 400 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Strengthen your hair and restore its vitality with **Dove Shampoo with Avocado Oil & Calendula Extract**. Inspired by ancient beauty rituals, this shampoo is infused with nourishing Avocado Oil and soothing Calendula Extract, renowned for their potent hair-strengthening properties. This powerful formula helps to reduce hair fall from the very first wash, promoting healthier, more resilient hair.

â­ Strengthens hair and reduces hair fall from the first wash.
â­ Enriched with Avocado Oil and Calendula Extract.
â­ Inspired by the beauty rituals of Central American women.
â­ Helps protect hair from damage and signs of aging.
â­ Provides deep hydration and healthy shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Shampoo with Avocado Oil & Calendula Extract**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply a generous amount of shampoo to your scalp and hair.
â­ Gently massage to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse the shampoo thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, use regularly with Dove conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Shampoo with Avocado Oil & Calendula Extract**:
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth sulphate, Dimethiconol, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Perfume, Glycerin, Glycol Distearate, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulphonate, TEA-Sulphate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Cocamide MEA, Citric Acid, Mica, Hydroxypropyl Methyl Cellulose, Titanium Dioxide, Disodium EDTA, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-45M, Sodium Benzoate, Lysine HCl, PPG-9, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Extract, Trehalose, Zinc Gluconate, Sodium Sulphate, Gluconolactone, Linalol, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Geraniol.

#Dove #DoveShampoo #HairCare #AvocadoOil #CalendulaExtract #HairFall #StrongHair #HairMoisture #HairBeauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience a refreshing cleanse and deep hydration with the **Dove Reviving Bar Soap**, expertly crafted for all skin types. Infused with the invigorating scent of pomegranate and the soothing aroma of lemon verbena, this soap bar is enriched with 1/4 moisturizing cream to nourish your skin from within.

Say goodbye to dry, tight skin and hello to unparalleled softness with **Dove Reviving Bar Soap**. Its mild, sulfate-free formula gently cleanses while helping your skin retain its natural moisture, leaving it looking healthier and more radiant. Dermatologist-recommended for daily care, it's the perfect choice for every skin type.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Reviving Bar Soap**:
â­ Wet your hands and lather the moisturizing bar generously between them.
â­ Massage the creamy, smooth lather all over your skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water and enjoy clean, soft, glowing skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Reviving Bar Soap**:
â­ Contains 1/4 moisturizing cream.
â­ Mild, sulfate-free formula.
â­ Pomegranate and Lemon Verbena extracts.
â­ Gentle, plant-based cleansers.

#Dove #DoveSoap #Skincare #GlowingSkin #Moisturizing #HydratingSoap #DoveForSkin #DailyCare #Beauty #SkinHydration

description_en:
Experience the full power of your hair with **Dove Daily Care Shampoo** 590ml. Specially formulated for normal hair, it nourishes your strands with an Advanced Moisture Complex, providing up to 10x more resilience against daily damage from styling and brushing. This effective shampoo helps detangle hair and instantly improve manageability, while working to smooth and protect it from everyday wear and tear. Indulge your hair with daily care that brings vitality and radiance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Daily Care Shampoo**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply a suitable amount of shampoo and lather well into the scalp.
â­ Rinse the hair completely.
â­ Repeat if necessary.
â­ For best results, use daily.
â­ If product gets into the eyes, rinse well with warm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Daily Care Shampoo**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin.
â­ Dimethiconol, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Glycol Distearate, Carbomer.
â­ Gluconolactone, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose.
â­ Cocamide MEA, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Sodium Sulfate.
â­ Mica, Trehalose, TEA-Sulfate, PEG-45M, Silica.
â­ Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, PPG-9, Disodium EDTA.
â­ Phenoxyethanol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.
â­ CI 15985, CI 19140, CI 77891.

description_en:
Discover ultimate softness with the **Dove Beauty Cream Bar White Value Pack**. Indulge in deeply moisturized and nourished skin with our unique formula, enriched with Â¼ moisturizing cream. This value pack includes 4 bars of **Dove Beauty Cream Bar White**, each weighing 125gm, ensuring long-lasting hydration for healthy, radiant skin.

The **Dove Beauty Cream Bar White** is more than just a soap; it's a skincare experience that combines gentle cleansing with deep hydration. Its pH-balanced, sulfate-free formula helps retain your skin's natural moisture, leaving it feeling soft, smooth, and glowing. Perfect for all skin types, it cleanses gently without stripping moisture, making it your go-to for daily skincare.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Beauty Cream Bar White**:
â­ Rub your **Dove Beauty Cream Bar White** generously between wet hands to create a rich lather.
â­ Massage the creamy, smooth lather all over your skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Beauty Cream Bar White**:
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Stearic Acid, Sodium Palmitate, Sodium Stearate, Water, Sodium Isethionate, Lauric Acid, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Parfum (Perfume), Glycerin.
â­ Sodium Chloride, Zinc Oxide, Tetrasodium Edta, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Alumina, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Cl 77891.

description_en:
Experience ultimate refreshment with **Dove Go Fresh Body Wash**, meticulously crafted to provide your skin with superior softness and a long-lasting refreshing scent. Featuring a unique formula that blends NutriumMoistureâ„¢ technology with natural extracts, **Dove Go Fresh Body Wash** deeply nourishes your skin, leaving it softer and smoother than ever before.

â­ Delivers softer, smoother skin.
â­ Refreshing scent revitalizes your senses and helps kick-start your day.
â­ Combines gentle cleansers with skin's natural nutrients.
â­ Suitable for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Go Fresh Body Wash**
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Apply a generous amount of body wash to a washcloth or directly onto your body.
â­ Lather and massage gently into skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Go Fresh Body Wash**
â­ Aqua (Water)

description_en:
**Dove Soap Coconut Milk 125 gm** is more than just soap; it's a luxurious skincare experience for all skin types. Its unique formula combines gentle cleansing with 1/4 moisturizing cream to give you softer, smoother, and healthier-looking skin. Inspired by the power of coconut milk, this soap deeply nourishes and hydrates your skin, leaving it radiant and full of vitality. Enjoy skin that glows with health and beauty with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Soap Coconut Milk 125 gm**:
â­ Gently rub the moisturizing soap bar between your wet hands to create a rich, creamy lather.
â­ Massage the lather all over your skin.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water.
â­ Get ready to feel confident with soft, glowing skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Soap Coconut Milk 125 gm**:
â­ Contains 1/4 moisturizing cream for deep nourishment.
â­ Mild plant-based cleansers to help skin retain its natural moisture.
â­ Coconut milk extract for added nourishment.
â­ Sulfate-free for a gentle formula on the skin.
â­ Ph-balanced for optimal skin care.

#Dove #Soap #CoconutMilk #Skincare #Moisturizing #SoftSkin #Beauty #BodyCare #SaudiArabia #SkinHydration

description_en:
Experience the ultimate hair transformation with **Dove Nourishing Oil Care Shampoo**. Specifically formulated to tame dry and frizzy hair, this deeply nourishing shampoo instantly leaves your locks soft, shiny, and manageable. With continuous use, it works to replenish your hair from within, promoting long-term health and vitality. Its unique formula is enriched with a natural origin blend of Amino Acids, Nourishing Oils, and Lipids, working in harmony with your hair's biology to repair damage from the inside out.

â­ Delivers superior softness and healthy shine.
â­ Eliminates frizz and enhances manageability.
â­ Deeply nourishes dry hair and repairs damage.
â­ Features a non-greasy formula for clean, soft hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Nourishing Oil Care Shampoo**:
â­ Thoroughly soak your hair with warm water.
â­ Pour a coin-sized amount of shampoo into your palm.
â­ Gently massage the shampoo into your scalp using your fingertips to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with plenty of water to remove all residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Nourishing Oil Care Shampoo**:
â­ Natural origin blend of Amino Acids.
â­ Nourishing Oils.
â­ Natural Lipids.

#DoveShampoo #DryHairCare #HairCare #SoftHair #HealthyHair #HairNourishment #HairOil #ShinyHair #HairSmoothing #DoveKSA

description_en:
Experience superior nourishment for your skin with **Dove Intensive Nourishing Care Cream**. This rich cream is specially formulated to provide deep hydration and intense nourishment, leaving your skin feeling incredibly soft and smooth with a lasting touch.

â­ Delivers deep hydration and intensive nourishment.
â­ Leaves skin irresistibly soft and smooth.
â­ Fast-absorbing formula without a greasy residue.
â­ Enjoy a gentle, long-lasting fragrance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Intensive Nourishing Care Cream**:
â­ Massage the body cream richly onto the skin of your entire body.
â­ Pay extra attention to heels, knees, elbows, and other dry spots.
â­ Allow the intensively nourishing body cream a few minutes to absorb into the skin before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Intensive Nourishing Care Cream**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Potassium Lactate, Dimethicone, Tapioca Starch, Cetearyl Alcohol, Lactic Acid, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Glyceryl Hydroxystearate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Arachidic Acid, BHT, Butyl.

title_ar: Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… Ø¯ÙˆÙ Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø²ÙŠÙˆØª Ø§Ù„Ù…ØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø±ØŒ 340 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover superior softness and healthy shine with **Dove Nourishing Oil Care Conditioner** (340ml). This rich conditioner is the perfect solution for deeply nourishing and hydrating your dry and damaged hair, thanks to its unique formula infused with precious natural oils like Argan Oil and Coconut Oil. **Dove Nourishing Oil Care Conditioner** helps restore your hair's vitality, making it softer, more manageable, and incredibly shiny. Enjoy healthy, strong, and vibrant hair with every use.

âœ¨ Key Product Features:
â­ Enriched with a blend of nourishing natural oils like Argan and Coconut.
â­ Restores superior softness and healthy shine to hair.
â­ Deeply hydrates hair, making it ideal for dry, dull, or damaged hair.
â­ Improves hair manageability and reduces frizz.
â­ Gentle on all hair types.
â­ Leaves hair with a refreshing and captivating scent.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Nourishing Oil Care Conditioner**:
â­ After shampooing, apply a generous amount to damp hair.
â­ Massage gently, focusing on the ends and mid-lengths.
â­ Leave in for 1-3 minutes to feel the benefits of deep hydration.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water for smooth, shiny hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Nourishing Oil Care Conditioner**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil
â­ Glycerin
â­ Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine
â­ Preservatives
â­ Fragrance (optional)

#DoveConditioner #NourishingOils #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairHydration #ShinyHair #SoftHair #ArganOil #CoconutOil #DoveKSA

description_en:
If your hair feels rough, frizzy, and difficult to manage, Dove Nourishing Oil Care Shampoo is your perfect solution to restore its vitality. Weâ€™ve drawn inspiration from the nourishing power of oils that have made damaged hair softer, smoother, shinier, and more manageable for years. This shampoo deeply nourishes dry hair, helps eliminate frizz, and leaves you with up to 100% smoother hair that's full of life. Formulated with Dove's next-generation nourishment hair care system, **Dove Nourishing Oil Care Shampoo** features a natural origin blend of Amino Acids, Nourishing Oils, and Lipids. It works with your hair's biology to repair damage from the inside out, providing complete, nourishing care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Nourishing Oil Care Shampoo**

â­ Apply a suitable amount of shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, use regularly with other Dove hair care products.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Nourishing Oil Care Shampoo**

â­ Natural origin blend of Amino Acids.
â­ Essential Nourishing Oils.
â­ Lipids for healthy hair.

description_en:
Experience ultimate softness with **Dove Shower Gel Coconut Almond 250ml with Loofah**. Inspired by Indian beauty rituals, this body wash combines nourishing coconut oil and creamy almond milk for a rewarding shower experience. Its unique formula gently cleanses your skin, leaving it softer and smoother after every wash, thanks to its blend of moisturizing cream and mild cleansers that help protect your skin's natural moisture.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Shower Gel Coconut Almond 250ml with Loofah**
â­ Apply a small amount onto a soft sponge or your palm.
â­ Gently rub your body to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse your body thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Shower Gel Coconut Almond 250ml with Loofah**
â­ Infused with nourishing Coconut Oil.
â­ Enriched with moisturizing Almond Milk.
â­ Mild cleansers that help protect skin's moisture.
â­ Inspired by the beauty rituals of Indian women.

description_en:
Experience effective protection and long-lasting freshness with the **Dove Clean Comfort Deodorant Stick**. This antiperspirant stick is specially formulated to provide you with 72 hours of odor protection, featuring an advanced, non-irritant formula. The **Dove Clean Comfort Deodorant Stick** is enriched with Vitamin E and Â¼ moisturizing cream to help keep your underarm skin smooth and protected from irritation, giving you a feeling of comfort and confidence all day long. It boasts a subtle, refreshing scent that lasts, and its compact size makes it perfect for on-the-go use. Committed to sustainability and animal welfare, the **Dove Clean Comfort Deodorant Stick** is PETA-certified cruelty-free and comes in recyclable packaging.

â­ Provides 72-hour protection against odor.
â­ Enriched with Vitamin E and Â¼ moisturizing cream for smooth skin.
â­ Non-irritant formula protects against irritation.
â­ Long-lasting, refreshing subtle scent.
â­ Perfect for on-the-go use.
â­ Cruelty-free and PETA-certified product.
â­ Recyclable packaging to support sustainability.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Clean Comfort Deodorant Stick**:
â­ Apply a thin layer to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Use as needed to protect against sweat and odor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Clean Comfort Deodorant Stick**:
â­ Carefully selected ingredients for high efficacy and skin gentleness.
â­ Vitamin E to promote skin health.
â­ Â¼ moisturizing cream to maintain skin's smoothness.

description_en:
Discover the revitalizing power of **Dove Hair Fall Rescue Conditioner** (340ml), expertly formulated to nourish and strengthen hair, combating hair fall due to breakage. Enriched with the signature Nutri-Complex and a blend of potent strengthening ingredients, this conditioner restores your hair's health, fortifying it from root to tip. Experience reduced hair fall from daily styling and environmental stressors, leaving your hair remarkably soft, smooth, and resilient.

â­ Effectively reduces hair fall by strengthening strands and preventing breakage.
â­ Features Dove's unique Nutri-Complex to nourish and fortify hair from within.
â­ Repairs and strengthens hair, making it more resistant to damage.
â­ Leaves hair feeling soft, smooth, and effortlessly manageable.
â­ Deeply hydrates and nourishes, minimizing susceptibility to breakage.
â­ Gentle formula suitable for daily use on all hair types.
â­ Imparts a refreshing, long-lasting fragrance.

**Dove Nourishing Oil Care Shampoo** features a unique blend of Weightless Nutri-Oils that gently cleanse your hair, leaving it instantly smoother and deeply nourished from within. Experience softer, more manageable, and healthier hair in the long run.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Nourishing Oil Care Shampoo**:
â­ Apply an adequate amount to wet hair.
â­ Lather gently.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, follow with Dove Nourishing Oil Care Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Nourishing Oil Care Shampoo**:
â­ A blend of Weightless Nutri-Oils.
â­ Non-greasy formula that doesn't weigh hair down.
â­ Moisturizing, smoothing, and deeply nourishing ingredients.

description_en:
Revitalize your hair with **Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo**.

Is your hair suffering from daily damage caused by styling or environmental factors? Discover the solution with Dove's innovative Bio-Restore formulation. This unique blend, enriched with amino acids, nourishing oils, and lipids, works in harmony with your hair's biology to repair damage from the inside out, providing superior nourishment and bringing your hair back to life.

Experience hair that is 100% healthy and vibrant, with hair that is easy to detangle and manage. The **Dove Intensive Repair** range deeply nourishes your hair and rebuilds dry and damaged areas, restoring your hair's natural beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo**:
â­ Wet hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo to the scalp.
â­ Gently massage to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse hair well with water.
â­ For best results, follow with Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner and Intensive Repair Oil Replacement Cream.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo**:
â­ Innovative Bio-Restore formulation.
â­ Nourishing amino acids.
â­ Natural oils.
â­ Essential lipids.
â­ Other hair care ingredients.

#Dove #DoveShampoo #HairCare #HealthyHair #DamagedHair #HairRepair #ShinyHair #StrongHair #HairProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover the secret to soft, radiant skin with the **Dove Pink Beauty Bar 125 gm**. Specifically designed for all skin types, this unique bar combines gentle cleansing power with 1/4 of Dove's signature moisturizing cream, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and revitalized. Say goodbye to the dry, tight feeling left by ordinary soap and embrace skin that feels soft and smooth all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Pink Beauty Bar**:
â­ Rub your **Dove Pink Beauty Bar** generously between wet hands to create a rich, creamy lather.
â­ Gently massage the lather all over your skin, paying attention to areas that need extra care.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water to reveal soft, glowing skin, ready to face the world with confidence.
â­ Dermatologist-recommended for gentle daily care for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Pink Beauty Bar**:
â­ Contains 25% moisturizing cream to maintain skin's natural moisture.
â­ Mild, plant-based cleansers for effective, non-stripping cleansing.
â­ pH-balanced and sulfate-free formula to preserve skin health.

#Dove #DoveSoap #Skincare #SoftSkin #SkinMoisture #BeautyProducts #Beauty #SkinHealth #DailyCare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Reveal the lasting vibrancy of your coloured hair with **Dove Shampoo Color Care 400 ml**. Specifically formulated for coloured hair, this shampoo features a unique Keratin Repair Actives technology to mend and protect, keeping your hair colour vibrant for up to eight weeks. **Dove Shampoo Color Care 400 ml** leaves your hair feeling silky smooth and brilliantly shiny with every wash, ensuring it looks and feels stronger and healthier day after day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Shampoo Color Care 400 ml**
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage into the scalp and hair to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, use regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Shampoo Color Care 400 ml**
â­ Infused with Keratin Repair Actives technology for coloured hair.
â­ Gentle formula designed to maintain colour vibrancy.
â­ Nourishes hair, leaving it exceptionally soft.

description_en:
Experience ultimate silky hair with **Dove** Nutritive Solutions Moisture Shampoo.

Daily styling, grooming, and sun exposure can lead to everyday wear and tear on your hair. But achieving silky hair doesn't have to be difficult. Did you know that with the right moisturizing shampoo, you can help protect your hair and keep it soft and manageable every day? We've created **Dove** Nutritive Solutions Moisture Shampoo to help moisturize, nourish, and protect, giving you softer hair thatâ€™s up to 5X smoother after the very first wash.

The unique formulation with Pro-Moisture Complex smooths and progressively nourishes deep inside, helping to make your hair healthier wash after wash. For comprehensive benefits, use with **Dove** Nutritive Solutions Moisture Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove** Nutritive Solutions Moisture Shampoo:
â­ Apply the shampoo to wet hair and lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, follow with Dove Nutritive Solutions Moisture Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove** Nutritive Solutions Moisture Shampoo:
â­ Water

description_en:
**Dove Beauty Cream Bar Pink Value Pack** is your ideal beauty bar for skin nourishment. Infused with Â¼ moisturizing cream, it gently cleanses your skin while preserving its natural moisture, leaving it feeling soft, smooth, and radiant. Unlike ordinary soaps that can leave your skin feeling dry and tight, this Dove beauty cream bar leaves it feeling soft and smooth. This nourishing formula helps replenish the natural nutrients your skin loses during cleansing, making it perfect for all skin types. Experience the difference of truly moisturized skin with every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Beauty Cream Bar Pink Value Pack**

â­ For best results, rub the **Dove Beauty Cream Bar Pink Value Pack** generously between your wet hands to create a rich lather.
â­ Massage the creamy, smooth lather all over your skin before rinsing thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Beauty Cream Bar Pink Value Pack**

â­ Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Stearic Acid, Sodium Palmitate, Sodium Stearate, Water, Sodium Isethionate, Lauric Acid, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Parfum (Fragrance), Glycerin.
â­ Sodium Chloride, Zinc Oxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Alumina, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Cl 77891.
