description_en:
Discover the nourishing power of **Dove Conditioner Avocado Strength**, the ultimate solution for weak and fragile hair needing renewal and vitality. Infused with precious avocado oil, this conditioner deeply hydrates, restores resilience, and strengthens hair from root to tip. Perfect for dry and damaged hair, it leaves your hair soft, shiny, and manageable, with a noticeable reduction in split ends.

â­ **Product Features:**
â­ Rich avocado oil infusion for superior nourishment and hair strengthening.
â­ Helps reduce hair breakage and split ends.
â­ Deeply moisturizes without weighing hair down, restoring softness and shine.
â­ Provides ultimate smoothness, improves manageability, and reduces frizz.
â­ Suitable for all hair types, especially weak and damaged hair.
â­ Safe for color-treated hair.
â­ Leaves hair with a pleasant and refreshing scent.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Conditioner Avocado Strength**:
â­ After shampooing, apply a generous amount to damp hair.
â­ Massage gently, focusing on the mid-lengths and ends.
â­ Leave on for 1-3 minutes to allow the ingredients to work.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
â­ For best results, use with Dove Avocado Strength Shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Conditioner Avocado Strength**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Avocado Oil (Persea Gratissima)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Cetrimonium Chloride
â­ Preservatives

#DoveHair #HairCare #StrongHair #AvocadoOil #HairMoisture #HealthyHair #WeakHairCare #SoftHair #SaudiBeauty #DoveHairCare

description_en:
Achieve shiny, silky hair with **Dove Nourishing Oil Shampoo**. Specially formulated to instantly tame frizzy, unruly hair and provide progressive nourishment for healthier hair.

â­ Gently cleanses your hair, instantly making it feel smoother and deeply nourishing from within.
â­ Leaves hair soft and manageable from the first use.
â­ The non-greasy formula helps to not weigh hair down.
â­ Treats dry, frizzy hair and smoothes up to 100% of roughness and controls frizz.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Nourishing Oil Shampoo**

â­ Apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly.
â­ For best results, follow up with Dove Nourishing Oil Care Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Nourishing Oil Shampoo**

â­ Formulated with Weightless Nutri-Oils that provide essential nourishment.
â­ Non-greasy formula ensures hair is not weighed down.

description_en:
Experience a luxurious cleanse with the **Dove Restoring Ritual Hand Wash with Coconut Oil & Almond Milk - 500ml**. This nourishing hand wash is infused with the goodness of coconut oil and almond milk, leaving your hands feeling incredibly soft, smooth, and delicately fragranced.

â­ Delivers superior softness and deep hydration to your hands.
â­ Enriched with the nourishing properties of coconut oil.
â­ Contains almond milk to soothe skin and enhance its suppleness.
â­ Refreshing coconut and almond milk scent that delights the senses.
â­ Economical 500ml bottle for long-lasting use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Restoring Ritual Hand Wash with Coconut Oil & Almond Milk - 500ml**:
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Dispense an adequate amount of the hand wash onto your palm.
â­ Gently lather and rub your hands together.
â­ Rinse your hands thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Restoring Ritual Hand Wash with Coconut Oil & Almond Milk - 500ml**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine.
â­ Sodium Benzoate, Parfum, Citric Acid, Styrene/Acrylamide Copolymer.
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Seed Extract.
â­ Nonfat Dry Milk, Trideceth-9, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil.
â­ Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Coumarin, CI 17200, CI 19140.

#Dove #HandWash #HandCare #HandMoisture #CoconutOil #AlmondMilk #SoftSkin #BodyCare #DoveProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience long-lasting freshness with **Dove Deo Spray Original**, your ultimate solution for up to 48 hours of superior antiperspirant protection. Enjoy a refreshing scent thanks to its unique formula that combines sweat protection with a moisturizing cream, helping sensitive underarm skin recover from the effects of shaving. Witness the difference yourself with smoother, even-toned underarm skin in just three days. **Dove Deo Spray Original** is your perfect choice for daily care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Deo Spray Original**

â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Hold the can 15 cm away from the underarm area and spray directly.
â­ For underarm use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Deo Spray Original**

â­ Enriched with 1/4 Moisturising Cream and Natural Caring Oils.
â­ Alcohol-free and paraben-free formula.
â­ Provides effective protection while being gentle on the skin.

Experience ultimate softness with **Dove Body Lotion with Coconut Oil 400ml**. Enriched with nourishing coconut oil, this lotion provides deep hydration and long-lasting nourishment, leaving your skin feeling velvety smooth and supple. Enjoy healthier, more radiant skin with every application.

â­ Focus on dry areas like knees and elbows.

description_en:
Give your dry, damaged hair the care it deserves with **Dove Argan Oil Shampoo**. Infused with nourishing Argan oil, this shampoo visibly repairs damaged hair and nourishes it from within. Experience soft, shiny, and manageable hair without feeling weighed down with continuous use of **Dove Argan Oil Shampoo**. Restore your hair's vitality and health with every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Argan Oil Shampoo**
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo to the scalp and hair.
â­ Gently massage to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse your hair with plenty of water until all shampoo residue is removed.
â­ For best results, use with Dove Argan Oil Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Argan Oil Shampoo**
â­ Argan Oil.
â­ Coconut Oil.
â­ Marula Oil.
â­ 100% naturally derived ingredients.

#Dove #DoveShampoo #ArganOil #DryHair #HairMoisture #HairCare #HealthyHair #Beauty #Hairstyles #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Indulge in moments of tranquility and calm with the **Dove Bar Soap Relaxing Lavender & Chamomile**. This luxurious soap is specially formulated to gently nourish your skin, leaving it feeling comfortable and refreshed, and is suitable for all skin types. Thanks to its unique formula that combines soothing lavender oil and moisturizing chamomile extract, along with Dove's signature Â¼ moisturizing cream, your daily skincare routine will transform into a luxurious home spa experience. Get ready for softer, more radiant, and healthier-looking skin with every use.

â­ Helps soothe and nourish the skin.
â­ Leaves skin feeling soft and hydrated.
â­ Sulfate-free formula gentle on the skin.
â­ Refreshing lavender and chamomile scent promotes relaxation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Bar Soap Relaxing Lavender & Chamomile**:
â­ Wet your hands thoroughly and rub the soap to create a rich, creamy lather.
â­ Gently massage the lather all over your body.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water.
â­ Enjoy clean, soft, and glowing skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Bar Soap Relaxing Lavender & Chamomile**:
â­ Lavender Oil.
â­ Chamomile Extract.
â­ Dove Â¼ Moisturizing Cream.
â­ Mild plant-based cleansers.
â­ Glycerin.

description_en:
Indulge your skin with the luxurious care it deserves with **Dove Beauty Cream**. This rich yet lightweight body moisturizer features a nourishing formula designed to leave your skin feeling soft and smooth. Experience deep hydration that keeps your skin glowing and healthy all day. Perfect for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Beauty Cream**:
â­ For best results, use **Dove Beauty Cream** after a bath or shower, morning or night (or both).
â­ Massage the rich cream generously into your skin â€“ pay particular attention to any dry areas like heels, knees and elbows.
â­ Suitable for use on the entire body.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Beauty Cream**:
â­ Water/Aqua
â­ Stearic Acid
â­ Mineral oil
â­ Glyceryl stearate
â­ Petrolatum
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Cetyl Alcohol
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed butter
â­ Fragrance/Parfum
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Other skin-nourishing ingredients.

description_en:
Discover the secret to healthy hair with **Dove Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Turmeric**. Inspired by Indian beauty rituals for treating damaged hair, this shampoo is enriched with coconut oil and turmeric, renowned for their incredible repairing properties for damaged hair.

Restore your hair's vitality and eliminate signs of damage with every wash. The **Dove Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Turmeric** formula is specially designed to deeply nourish and rebuild hair from root to tip, giving it superior softness and healthy shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Turmeric**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo to the scalp and hair.
â­ Gently massage to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse your hair well with water.
â­ For best results, use regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Turmeric**:
â­ Coconut Oil
â­ Turmeric
â­ Other nourishing ingredients for damaged hair repair.

**Dove Coconut Repair Conditioner** is the ultimate solution for damaged hair, with its expert formula working diligently to repair signs of damage, restoring your hair's smoothness and shine. It features a formula free from dyes, parabens, and sulfates, powered by a blend of moisturizing ingredients that deeply nourish the hair and help restore its vitality.

â­ Helps restore hair health and repair signs of damage.
â­ 100% sulfate-free with the repairing power of coconut and turmeric.
â­ Deeply moisturizes damaged hair, restoring its vitality and nourishment.
â­ Free from parabens and dyes for a safe care experience.
â­ Provides 100% nourishment for damaged hair.
â­ For healthy-looking, soft-feeling hair.

â­ After shampooing your hair, apply a small amount of the conditioner to the mid-lengths and ends.

â­ Coconut Oil
â­ Turmeric
â­ Other moisturizing ingredients

description_en:
Discover the secret to healthy, shiny hair with **Dove Daily Care Shampoo**.

**Dove Daily Care Shampoo** features an Advanced Moisture Complex, specially formulated for normal hair to bring it vitality and superior softness. Enjoy hair that's 10x more resilient to daily damage from styling and brushing.

â­ Makes hair 10x more resilient to daily damage.
â­ Instantly detangles hair and improves manageability.
â­ Designed to smooth hair and protect it from everyday wear and tear.
â­ Provides deep hydration, maintaining hair's health and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Daily Care Shampoo**:
â­ Apply an adequate amount to wet hair and gently massage the scalp.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, use daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Daily Care Shampoo**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Dimethiconol, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Glycol Distearate, Carbomer, Gluconolactone, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Cocamide MEA, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Sodium Sulfate, Mica, Trehalose, TEA-Sulfate, PEG-45M, Silica, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, PPG-9, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 15985, CI 19140, CI 77891.

title_ar: Ø¯ÙˆÙ Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ù…Ø±Ø·Ø¨ Ø®ÙÙŠÙ Ù„Ù„ØºØ§ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø±ØŒ 400 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Give your hair the care it deserves with **Dove Lightweight Moisturizing Shampoo**. We've formulated this nourishing shampoo with light natural oils to gently cleanse your hair, providing instant softness and deep nourishment. Enjoy silky, shiny, and easily manageable hair from the first wash, and with continuous use, your hair becomes healthier and stronger. Its non-greasy formula doesn't weigh down your hair, making it perfect for daily use.

â­ Delivers instant silky softness and shine.
â­ Deeply nourishes hair with continuous use.
â­ Controls frizz and makes hair easy to manage.
â­ Lightweight, non-greasy formula that doesn't weigh hair down.
â­ Harnesses the power of nourishing natural oils.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Lightweight Moisturizing Shampoo**:
â­ Apply a sufficient amount to wet hair.
â­ Gently lather to create a rich foam.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, use with Dove's nourishing conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Lightweight Moisturizing Shampoo**:
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Dimethiconol, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Chloride, Fragrance, Carbomer, Glycol Distearate, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Hydroxypropyl Tetrasodium Citrate, Mica, DMDM Hydantoin, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Cetrimonium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Magnesium Nitrate, Climbazole, Zinc Gluconate, Lysine HCl, PPG-9, Gluconolactone, Adipic Acid, Sodium Sulfate, Cellulose, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Ci.

Experience long-lasting freshness with **Dove Deo Spray Cucumber & Green Tea**. Enriched with a moisturizing and nourishing cream, **Dove Deo Spray Cucumber & Green Tea** helps sensitive underarm skin recover from shaving irritation, revealing beautifully soft underarms in just three days.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Deo Spray Cucumber & Green Tea**:
â­ Refreshing blend of cucumber and green tea.

â­ Effective antiperspirant ingredients.

Experience the ultimate hair care with **Dove Hair Fall Shampoo**, meticulously formulated to strengthen hair from root to tip and effectively combat hair fall.

â­ Rinse your hair well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Hair Fall Shampoo**:
â­ Enriched with Nutri lock actives.
â­ Nourishing formula for damaged hair.
â­ Helps minimize breakage and enhance hair strength.

description_en:
Discover the transformative power of **Dove** Intensive Repair Shampoo 190ml, expertly formulated to breathe life back into dry, damaged hair. This innovative shampoo works to reverse the signs of damage, from harsh environmental factors to heat styling and chemical treatments.

Enriched with the advanced Keratin Repair Complex, **Dove** Intensive Repair Shampoo deeply penetrates hair strands to nourish and strengthen from within. The result? Visibly healthier, more resilient, and radiant hair with every wash. It gently cleanses while deeply repairing damaged strands, leaving your hair feeling smoother, softer, and more manageable.

â­ **Keratin Repair Complex:** Boosts hair strength and reduces breakage.
â­ **Repairs Visible Damage:** Protects hair from future damage.
â­ **Deep Nourishment:** Hydrates dry, brittle hair for restored softness.
â­ **Smooths & Restores Shine:** Minimizes frizz and adds a healthy luster.
â­ **Gentle for Daily Use:** Suitable for all hair types, especially damaged hair.
â­ **For Stronger Hair:** Reduces split ends and improves manageability.
â­ **Pleasant Fragrance:** Leaves your hair feeling fresh and clean all day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove** Intensive Repair:
â­ Apply a small amount to wet hair and lather gently.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
â­ For best results, follow with Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove** Intensive Repair:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Keratin Amino Acids
â­ Glycerin
â­ Preservatives
â­ Fragrance (optional)

description_en:
Description: Daily factors like cleansing, styling, and sun exposure can impact your hair. But achieving silky, smooth hair is easier than you think with **Dove Moisturizing Shampoo**. This ultra-light moisturizing shampoo from Dove's Nutritive Solutions is specifically designed to help moisturize, nourish, and protect your hair, giving you up to 5x softer hair immediately after the first wash. With its unique formulation featuring the Pro-Moisture Complex, **Dove Moisturizing Shampoo** works to smooth and progressively nourish your hair deep inside, making it healthier with every wash.

For optimal results, use with a moisturizing conditioner from the same range.

â­ Delivers silky and smooth hair.
â­ Deeply moisturizes and nourishes hair.
â­ Protects hair from daily damage.
â­ Makes hair manageable.
â­ Provides up to 5x softer hair instantly.
â­ Contains Pro-Moisture Complex for progressive benefits.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Moisturizing Shampoo**

â­ Apply the shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Lather gently to create a rich foam.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, follow with a moisturizing conditioner from Dove's Nutritive Solutions range.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Moisturizing Shampoo**

â­ Water
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Dimethiconol
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Perfume
â­ Glycol Distearate
â­ Carbomer

#DoveShampoo #MoisturizingShampoo #SaudiHairCare #HairHydration #SoftHair #HealthyHair #HairStyling #SaudiBeautyProducts #DoveSaudi #ShinyHair

description_en:
Say goodbye to split ends with **Dove Split Ends Shampoo** 590ml, the ultimate solution for healthy and attractive hair. This innovative formula is specifically designed to deeply nourish your hair, visibly reducing split ends by up to 4 times less. Beyond gentle cleansing, **Dove Split Ends Shampoo** contains active fiber ingredients that penetrate the deepest layers of the hair to provide instant softness and long-lasting benefits. Enjoy stronger, smoother, and healthier-looking hair all the time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Split Ends Shampoo**

â­ Apply an adequate amount to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage onto the scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat for best results.
â­ Use daily to maintain hair health.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Split Ends Shampoo**

â­ Formula rich in active fiber ingredients.
â­ Ingredients that deeply nourish the hair.
â­ Gentle formula suitable for daily use.
â­ Helps reduce split ends by up to 4 times.

description_en:
Experience freshness and protection with **Dove Deo Spray Even Tone Blossom**.

**Dove Deo Spray Even Tone Blossom** is a long-lasting antiperspirant deodorant spray that provides up to 48 hours of protection. Its unique formula, enriched with Â¼ moisturizing cream, works to lighten and even out underarm skin tone, while reducing skin irritation from shaving. Enjoy a gentle floral scent that leaves you feeling refreshed and clean all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Deo Spray Even Tone Blossom**
â­ Shake the can well.
â­ Hold the can 15 cm from your underarm and spray.
â­ For underarm use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Deo Spray Even Tone Blossom**
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex GLY
â­ Stearyl Alcohol

description_en:
Revitalize your damaged hair with **Dove Super Keratin Conditioner**.

Is your hair suffering from dryness and damage due to daily routines and styling? Dove Super Conditioner offers a fast and effective solution in just one minute. Its unique keratin-infused formula nourishes and strengthens your hair, giving it superior softness and noticeable shine, making it 10x stronger.

âœ… Repairs damaged and dry hair in just 1 minute.
âœ… Contains a concentrated keratin formula for deeper repair.
âœ… Provides your hair with 10x strength, softness, and shine.
âœ… Ideal for daily use as a nourishing treatment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Super Keratin Conditioner**
â­ Pour a coin-sized amount onto your palm.
â­ Apply through wet hair from middle to end, avoiding the roots.
â­ Leave it on for 1 minute.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Use it as a replacement for or after your regular conditioner.
â­ For best results, use with Dove Shampoo and other Dove hair products.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Super Keratin Conditioner**
â­ Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Behentrimonium Chloride, Dipropylene Glycol, Parfum, Glycerin.
â­ Amodimethicone, Citric Acid, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Citrate, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.
â­ Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Magnesium Nitrate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil.
â­ Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride.
â­ Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein (HVP), Methylisothiazolinone.
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool.

Revitalize your skin with **Dove Men+Care Extra Hydrating Face Wash**. Formulated with our unique MICROMOISTURE technology to maintain skin hydration, **Dove Men+Care Extra Hydrating Face Wash** cleanses away dirt and oil without over-drying your skin. The ultra-light gel formula rinses cleanly and leaves your skin feeling refreshed and revitalized.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Men+Care Extra Hydrating Face Wash**
â­ Wet your face.

â­ Rinse your face thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Men+Care Extra Hydrating Face Wash**

description_en:
Experience unparalleled softness with **Dove Nourishing Oil Shampoo**.

Specially formulated to provide intensive care for dry, frizzy hair, making it softer and more manageable from the very first use. With continuous use, **Dove Nourishing Oil Shampoo** deeply nourishes your hair and repairs damage from within, thanks to its rich formula with a natural origin blend of Amino Acids, Nourishing Oils, and Lipids.

Enjoy healthy, vibrant hair, free from frizz, enhanced with Dove's advanced Bio-Restore technology. Its lightweight, non-greasy formula doesn't weigh hair down, making it perfect for daily use.

â­ Deeply nourishes dry hair and eliminates frizz.
â­ Provides superior softness and lively hair.
â­ Contains Amino Acids, Nourishing Oils, and naturally derived Lipids.
â­ Works with hair biology to repair damage from within.
â­ Formulated with Dove's advanced Bio-Restore hair care system.
â­ Non-greasy formula that keeps hair smooth and soft.
â­ Gently cleanses and is suitable for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Nourishing Oil Shampoo**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Apply a small, coin-sized amount of shampoo into your palm.
â­ Gently massage the shampoo into your scalp using your fingertips.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with plenty of water, ensuring all residue is removed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Nourishing Oil Shampoo**:
â­ A natural origin blend of Amino Acids.
â­ Nourishing Oils.
â­ Lipids.

#DoveShampoo #DryHairCare #HairCare #SoftHair #FrizzControl #HairNourishment #HealthyHair #DoveProducts #SaudiHairCare #DailyShampoo

Experience exquisite freshness with **Dove** Roll-On Deodorant in Coconut & Jasmine. Enjoy up to 48 hours of antiperspirant protection with a skin-friendly formula, enriched with **Dove**'s signature Â¼ moisturizing cream for deep hydration and ultimate underarm softness. It soothes skin after shaving, leaving it smooth and silky, with a warm coconut and jasmine scent that provides all-day freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove** Women's Roll-On Deodorant with Coconut & Jasmine, 50ml:
â­ Apply 4-6 swipes per underarm daily.
â­ Do not use on broken skin.
â­ Stop use if rash or irritation occurs.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove** Women's Roll-On Deodorant with Coconut & Jasmine, 50ml:
â­ Enriched with Doveâ€™s unique Â¼ moisturizing cream for superior skin care.
â­ Coconut extract for skin hydration and nourishment.
â­ Jasmine flower essence for a refreshing and captivating scent.
â­ Alcohol-free formula for gentle skin application.

Experience the revitalizing power of **Dove Shampoo** with Echinacea and White Tea, specially formulated to promote healthy hair growth. description_en:
Transform your hair with Dove Super Amino Nourishing Conditioner, expertly formulated for dry and frizzy hair. Our unique formula in **Dove Super Amino Nourishing Oil Care Conditioner** effectively smooths frizz and reduces flyaways, delivering up to 100% smoother hair in just 1 minute. Ideal for hair damaged by heat styling or color treatments, this conditioner provides deep hydration to restore vitality. Make your daily hair care routine a deeply nourishing experience with **Dove Super Amino Nourishing Oil Care Conditioner**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Super Amino Nourishing Oil Care Conditioner**
â­ For more beautiful, stronger hair, pour a coin-sized amount onto your palm.
â­ Apply through wet hair from mid-lengths to ends, avoiding the roots.
â­ Leave on for 1 minute, then rinse thoroughly.
â­ Use Dove Super Conditioner as a replacement for or after your regular conditioner for enhanced results.
â­ For best results, pair with Dove Shampoo and hair styling products.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Super Amino Nourishing Oil Care Conditioner**
â­ Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Behentrimonium Chloride, Dipropylene Glycol, Parfum, Glycerin, Amodimethicone, Citric Acid, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Citrate, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Magnesium Nitrate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Lysine HCl, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Methylisothiazolinone, Potassium Sorbate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool.

#Dove #HairConditioner #HairCare #HealthyHair #SmoothHair #FrizzControl #HairTreatment #DryHair #FrizzyHair #SaudiArabia

description_en:
DOVE Body Love, One Cream for face, hands & body, for 48hrs long-lasting deep moisturization, Nourishing Care, with Ceramide Restoring Serum, 250ml.

One indulgent cream that understands what your skin needs from top-to-toe. Dove Body Love One Cream Nourishing Care is enriched with a lightweight yet deeply nourishing formula that instantly melts into dry skin from head to toe. This indulgent cream is infused with Ceramide Restoring Serum and is designed to care for face, hands & body.

â­ **Dove Body Love Nourishing Care Cream** provides up to 48 hours of long-lasting and deep moisturization.
â­ Helps boost ceramide creation and strengthen the skin's barrier.
â­ Lightweight formula that instantly melts into dry skin.
â­ Dermatologist-tested and perfect for dry skin.
â­ PETA certified Cruelty-Free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Body Love Nourishing Care Cream**

â­ **Dove Body Love Nourishing Care Cream** is best used after a bath or shower, morning or night (or both).
â­ Massage the rich cream generously into your skin, paying particular attention to any dry areas like heels, knees and elbows.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Body Love Nourishing Care Cream**

â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cetyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Citric Acid.

Experience the nourishing power of **Dove Oil Replacement for Repairing Damaged Hair Ritual 300ml**, specially formulated for damaged hair. Enriched with glycerin, it instantly penetrates to where your hair needs it most. Deeply nourishes hair, strengthens every strand, and helps reduce breakage-induced hair fall while maintaining its natural volume and vitality. Enjoy healthier, stronger hair with every use of **Dove Oil Replacement for Repairing Damaged Hair Ritual 300ml**. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Oil Replacement for Repairing Damaged Hair Ritual 300ml**:
â­ Apply on wet hair.
â­ Gently massage from roots to ends.
â­ Leave in or rinse out as needed.
â­ For best results, use regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Oil Replacement for Repairing Damaged Hair Ritual 300ml**:
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Moisturizing and nourishing ingredients.
â­ Natural oils for added nourishment.
â­ Lightweight formula that doesn't weigh hair down.

Caution:
â­ For external use only.

description_en:
Achieve healthy, refreshed skin with **Dove Men+Care Oil Control Moisturizer**. Featuring a unique pore-minimizing technology that effectively removes excess oil to improve pore appearance, it provides deep hydration for men's skin all day long. **Dove Men+Care Oil Control Moisturizer** nourishes your skin, strengthens its moisture barrier, and leaves you feeling refreshed and protected without greasiness.

â­ Hydrate to replenish daily skin water loss.
â­ Nourish to provide skin nutrients.
â­ Fortifies to strengthen skin's moisture barrier.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Men+Care Oil Control Moisturizer**
â­ Apply a suitable amount to clean, dry skin.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use daily, morning and evening, for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Men+Care Oil Control Moisturizer**
â­ Aqua/Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Stearic Acid, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Isohexadecane, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Triethanolamine, Phenoxyethanol, Cetyl Alcohol, Silica, PEG-100 Stearate, Parfum/Fragrance, Carbomer, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Dimethiconol, Methylparaben, Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol, Propylparaben, Tocopheryl Acetate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Pyridoxine HCI, Sodium Carbonate, Propylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Butylated Hydroxytoluene, Sodium Chloride, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Eugenol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool.

title_ar: Ø¯ÙˆÙ Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø¬Ø§Ù„ Ù…Ø²ÙŠÙ„ Ø¹Ø±Ù‚ Ø³ØªÙŠÙƒ Ø¨Ø±Ø§Ø¦Ø­Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø£ÙˆÙƒØ§Ù„Ø¨ØªÙˆØ³ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø¨ØªÙˆÙ„Ø§ Ø§Ù„Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ© - Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© 48 Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø©
description_en:
Experience refreshing protection with the **Dove Men+Care Natural Eucalyptus & Birch Stick**. This aluminum-free deodorant is expertly crafted for men, offering an invigorating Eucalyptus and Birch scent with 48-hour odor protection. Enriched with plant-based moisturizers, it's gentle on your skin, protecting against dryness and discomfort. Enjoy a smooth application and lasting freshness with the **Dove Men+Care Natural Eucalyptus & Birch Stick**. Best used after bathing, it pairs perfectly with Dove Men+Care Eucalyptus + Cedar Body Wash for a complete grooming routine.

â­ Aluminum, alcohol, and paraben-free.
â­ Delivers 48-hour odor protection.
â­ Refreshing Eucalyptus and Birch scent.
â­ Enriched with plant-based moisturizers for skin care.
â­ Gentle and skin-friendly formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Men+Care Natural Eucalyptus & Birch Stick**

â­ Apply to underarms only after bathing or showering, once the skin is cool and dry.
â­ Twist the applicator to release the smooth deodorant stick.
â­ Glide on in even, light strokes for up to 48 hours of fresh odor protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Men+Care Natural Eucalyptus & Birch Stick**

â­ Dipropylene Glycol
â­ Water (Eau)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Sodium Stearate
â­ Poloxamine 1307
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Stearic Acid
â­ Simethicone
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ BHT
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ Benzyl Salicylate
â­ Citronellol
â­ Coumarin
â­ Geraniol
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool

#DoveMenCare #Deodorant #MensGrooming #EucalyptusBirch #AluminumFree #48HourProtection #LongLastingFreshness #Skincare #SaudiArabia #BodyCare

title_ar: Ø¯ÙˆÙ ØµØ§Ø¨ÙˆÙ†Ø© Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ø§Ù†ØªØ¹Ø§Ø´ 160 Ø¬Ù… - Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ù†Ø§Ø¹Ù…Ø© ÙˆÙ…Ù†ØªØ¹Ø´Ø©
description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Dove Bar Soap Fresh Touch**, specially formulated for all skin types to provide a unique care experience. This soap combines the moisturizing power of Dove's 1/4 moisturizing cream with refreshing cucumber and green tea extracts, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and healthy-looking. The gentle, sulfate-free formula helps your skin retain its natural moisture instead of stripping it away, giving you a lasting feeling of comfort and freshness. Enjoy radiant, healthy skin with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Bar Soap Fresh Touch**:
â­ Wet your hands and rub the bar generously between them to create a rich, creamy lather.
â­ Gently massage the lather all over your skin to cleanse and moisturize.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Get ready to conquer the world with beautiful, glowing skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Bar Soap Fresh Touch**:
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate
â­ Stearic Acid
â­ Sodium palmate
â­ Sodium Stearate
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Isethionate
â­ Lauric Acid
â­ Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate
â­ Sodium Palm Kernelate
â­ Parfum
â­ Sodium chloride
â­ Dipropylene Glycol
â­ Glycerin
â­ Zinc Oxide
â­ Propylene glycol
â­ Tetrasodium EDTA
â­ Citric acid
â­ Tetrasodium Etidronate
â­ Sodium benzoate
â­ Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone
â­ Benzyl alcohol
â­ Citronellol
â­ Coumarin
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool
â­ CI 19140
â­ CI 42090
â­ CI 77891

title_ar: Ø¯ÙˆÙ Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… Ù†ÙˆØªØ±ÙŠØªÙŠÙ Ø¶Ø¯ ØªØ³Ø§Ù‚Ø· Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± 180Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Over time, a busy routine and daily styling can take a toll on your hair. Think you don't have time to fit in an intensive hair treatment for damaged and dry hair? **Dove Super Ceramide Conditioner Hair Fall Rescue** makes it easy to give your hair the best daily care. It takes just a minute in your regular hair care routine to help your hair recover from damage caused by heat styling and color treatments, giving it a moisture boost. Get stunningly beautiful hair in just 1 minute with Dove Super Conditioner.

The concentrated and potent ceramide formula in **Dove Super Ceramide Conditioner Hair Fall Rescue** helps to reconstruct and strengthen extremely weak hair, making it 10X more resilient in just 1 minute! Ceramides leave your hair looking and feeling smoother and softer, and help to protect against further damage by sealing the cuticle.

Transform your hair care routine into a deeply nourishing treatment with just 1 minute of Dove's super conditioning care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Super Ceramide Conditioner Hair Fall Rescue**:
â­ For more beautiful, stronger hair: Pour a coin-sized amount of conditioner onto your palm.
â­ Apply to wet hair from the middle to the ends, avoiding the roots.
â­ Leave on for 1 minute, then rinse.
â­ Use Dove Super Conditioner after or as a replacement for your regular conditioner.
â­ For best results, use Dove Shampoo and hair styling products to help keep your hair in its best condition.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Super Ceramide Conditioner Hair Fall Rescue**:
â­ Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Behentrimonium Chloride, Dipropylene Glycol, Parfum, Glycerin, Amodimethicone, Citric Acid, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Citrate, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Magnesium Nitrate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Methylisothiazolinone, Ceramide NG, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool.

#Dove #HairCare #Conditioner #HairFallRescue #StrongHair #HealthyHair #HairTreatment #BeautyTips #HairGoals #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience the transformative power of **Dove Oil Replacement Thickening Ritual**, expertly crafted to enhance your hair's natural volume and vitality. Inspired by ancient French hair rituals, this unique formula blends the nourishing benefits of lavender oil and rosemary, renowned for their volumizing and fortifying properties. Achieve irresistibly soft, smooth, and radiant hair that you'll love to touch.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Oil Replacement Thickening Ritual**:
â­ Apply to wet hair for even distribution and optimal absorption.
â­ Use a moderate amount, adjusting based on hair length and thickness.
â­ Perfect for daily use to hydrate and thicken your locks.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Oil Replacement Thickening Ritual**:
â­ Lavender Oil: Known for its soothing and moisturizing properties.
â­ Rosemary Oil: Promotes scalp health and encourages hair growth.
â­ Glycerin: Provides deep hydration, leaving hair exceptionally soft.
â­ A rich formula that penetrates the hair for visible results.

Caution:
â­ For external use only.

description_en:
Discover the nourishing power of **Dove Shampoo with Matcha Green Tea & Rice Milk 400ml**, inspired by the gentle Japanese ritual of using matcha and rice milk blends. This shampoo effectively cleanses your hair from everyday pollutants, leaving it feeling refreshed and revitalized.

â­ Offers exceptional softness and shine.
â­ Deeply purifies the scalp.
â­ Long-lasting refreshing fragrance.
â­ Nourishing formula enriched with natural ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Shampoo with Matcha Green Tea & Rice Milk 400ml**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Apply a sufficient amount of shampoo and gently massage the scalp to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, follow with Dove conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Shampoo with Matcha Green Tea & Rice Milk 400ml**:
â­ Matcha Green Tea Extract.
â­ Nourishing Rice Milk.
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Glycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, PEG-45M, Lysine HCl, PPG-9, Silica, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Nonfat Dry Milk, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Germ Oil, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, CI 17200, CI 19140, CI 42090.

description_en:
Dove Shampoo Split Ends Rescue 400ml is your ultimate solution for strong, healthy hair. It effectively nourishes and protects hair from split ends, delivering up to 4x fewer split ends. Its gentle formula is suitable for everyday use, leaving your hair strong, smooth, and protected from split ends.

â­ Makes hair feel incredibly strong and smooth.
â­ Deeply nourishes and protects hair from damage and split ends.
â­ Provides up to 4x fewer split ends.
â­ Gentle formula suitable for daily use.
â­ Promotes hair health from root to tip.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Shampoo Split Ends Rescue**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo and gently massage the scalp.
â­ Rinse your hair well with water.
â­ For best results, use regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Shampoo Split Ends Rescue**:
â­ Formulated with fiber actives that work on the deepest level of hair.
â­ Contains nourishing ingredients that promote hair health.
â­ Gentle formula free from harsh chemicals.

#Dove #DoveShampoo #HairCare #HealthyHair #SoftHair #StrongHair #SplitEnds #ShinyHair #HairHydration #HairStyle

description_en:
Experience ultimate scalp care with **Dove Soothing Itchy Scalp Shampoo for Sensitive Scalp**. This shampoo is specifically formulated to calm an irritated scalp and relieve bothersome itching, leaving you with a feeling of comfort and freshness.

â­ Instantly soothes sensitive scalps.
â­ Effectively alleviates itchiness and dandruff.
â­ Provides deep hydration and superior softness to hair.
â­ Nourishes and strengthens hair from root to tip.
â­ Gentle enough for everyday use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Soothing Itchy Scalp Shampoo for Sensitive Scalp**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage the scalp to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water to remove all shampoo residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Soothing Itchy Scalp Shampoo for Sensitive Scalp**:
â­ Gentle formula with sage extract to calm the scalp.
â­ Enriched with hyaluronic acid for superior hydration.
â­ Contains natural ingredients that nourish the scalp and hair.
â­ Free from harsh chemicals that may cause irritation.

#Dove #Shampoo #HairCare #ScalpCare #HealthyHair #ItchRelief #DailyShampoo #HairHydration #SaudiArabia #HairBeauty

title_ar: Ø¯ÙˆÙ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø¨ÙˆØ¯ÙŠ Ù„ÙˆÙ Ù…Ø±Ø·Ø¨ Ø®ÙÙŠÙ Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© 250 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover superior skin nourishment with **Dove Body Love Light Hydrating Care Cream**. This all-in-one cream is your ultimate solution for hydrating your face, hands, and body, providing deep moisturization for up to 48 hours. Its refreshing and lightweight formula, specifically designed for face, hands, and body, absorbs instantly, delivering an intense boost of hydration to your skin from top to toe. Enriched with the unique Ceramide Restoring Serum, **Dove Body Love Light Hydrating Care Cream** helps boost ceramide creation, strengthen the skin's barrier, and enhance its moisture retention capabilities, leaving your skin beautifully glowing, refreshed, and soft for up to 24 hours with a non-greasy feel. Dermatologist-tested and suitable for all skin types, make every self-care moment count with **Dove Body Love Light Hydrating Care Cream**. At Dove, we believe in Body Love, and this cream is designed to help you show your body some love. Dove does not test on animals anywhere in the world and is PETA certified Cruelty-Free.

â­ Multi-use cream for face, hands, and body.
â­ Provides up to 48 hours of deep moisturization.
â­ Lightweight, refreshing, and instantly absorbed formula.
â­ Infused with Ceramide Restoring Serum to strengthen the skin barrier.
â­ Delivers up to 24 hours of lightweight, non-greasy hydration.
â­ Dermatologist-tested and suitable for all skin types.
â­ PETA certified Cruelty-Free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Body Love Light Hydrating Care Cream**
â­ Best used after a bath or shower, morning or night (or both).
â­ Massage the rich cream generously into your skin.
â­ Pay particular attention to any dry areas like heels, knees, and elbows.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Body Love Light Hydrating Care Cream**
â­ Aqua, Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Stearic Acid, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Isohexadecane, Glycol Stearate, Triethanolamine, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Cetyl Alcohol, Parfum, Carbomer, Polysorbate 80, Dimethiconol, Xanthan Gum, Sorbitan Oleate, Stearamide AMP, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 77891.

#Dove #Skincare #BodyMoisturizer #HydratingCream #SoftSkin #DeepHydration #FaceCare #HandCare #CrueltyFree #DoveSaudi

description_en:
Indulge your senses with the **Dove Shea Butter & Vanilla Soap Bar 135 Gm**, a luxurious soap that combines the softness of shea butter with the warmth of vanilla for a unique bathing experience that leaves your skin radiant and moisturized.

â­ Deeply nourishes skin with shea butter and shea oil.
â­ Leaves skin feeling soft, silky, and healthy-looking.
â­ The warm scent of vanilla and shea butter provides a soothing and pampering feeling.
â­ Contains Â¼ moisturizing cream and mild cleansers to protect skin's moisture.
â­ It's not a soap, it's a beauty bar that cares for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Shea Butter & Vanilla Soap Bar 135 Gm**:
â­ For external use only.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Shea Butter & Vanilla Soap Bar 135 Gm**:
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate
â­ Stearic Acid
â­ Sodium Palmitate

description_en:
Experience unparalleled softness and radiance with the **Dove Beauty Bar White**. Expertly formulated to provide your skin with deep, natural nourishment, this beauty bar helps maintain your skin's natural moisture balance throughout the cleansing process. Unlike regular soap bars that can strip your skin, **Dove Beauty Bar White** features ultra-mild cleansers, making it gentle enough for your face, body, and hands â€“ a perfect addition to your daily skincare ritual. Embrace the refreshing scent that revitalizes your senses and enjoy skin that feels softer, smoother, and more radiant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Beauty Bar White**:
â­ For external use only.
â­ Suitable for daily use on face, body, and hands.
â­ Wet the bar and lather to create a rich foam.
â­ Gently massage onto skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Beauty Bar White**:
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate.
â­ Stearic Acid.
â­ Lauric Acid.
â­ Sodium Palmate.
â­ Aqua.

description_en:
Experience the ultimate protection for your hair with **Dove Hard Water Defense Conditioner**. Expertly formulated to shield your locks from the damaging effects of hard water and environmental stressors, this conditioner delivers deep hydration and essential nourishment. Achieve softer, stronger, and more radiant hair with every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Hard Water Defense Conditioner**

â­ After shampooing, apply a generous amount of **Dove Hard Water Defense Conditioner** to damp hair, focusing on the mid-lengths and ends.
â­ Gently massage and leave on for 5-10 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For optimal results, use regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Hard Water Defense Conditioner**

â­ Aqua (Water).
â­ Cetyl Alcohol.
â­ Stearyl Alcohol.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Behentrimonium Chloride.
â­ Dimethicone.
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice.
â­ Tocopherol (Vitamin E).
â­ Fragrance (Parfum).

#DoveConditioner #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairProtection #HairMoisture #SoftHair #Beauty #KSA #SaudiBeauty #HairTreatment

Experience unparalleled freshness with **Dove Cooling Gel Cream 75ml**. Enjoy deeply nourished and hydrated skin thanks to the unique NutriDUO technology, which works to moisturize the deeper layers. This ultra-lightweight cream provides 24-hour hydration, while the fresh water blossom fragrance, with its delicate notes of jasmine, peony, and green tea, captivates your senses.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Cooling Gel Cream 75ml**
â­ For best results, massage the lightweight, cooling gel cream onto your skin as part of your daily skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Cooling Gel Cream 75ml**

â­ Contains natural skin nutrients.
â­ Features fresh water blossom, jasmine, peony, and green tea fragrance.

Caution & Warnings: For External Use Only.

description_en:
Discover superior skin care with the **Dove Pink Beauty Bar - Promotional Pack (4 x 135 Gm)**. Achieve soft, moisturized skin with every use as this beauty bar deeply nourishes your skin with its unique formula.

â­ Contains Â¼ moisturizing cream and ultra-mild cleansers.
â­ Delivers natural nourishment, helping your skin retain its moisture.
â­ Suitable for daily use on your face, body, and hands.
â­ Leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Pink Beauty Bar - Promotional Pack (4 x 135 Gm)**
â­ For external use only. Not edible.
â­ Keep away from children.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Pink Beauty Bar - Promotional Pack (4 x 135 Gm)**
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Stearic Acid, Sodium Palmate, Water, Lauric Acid, Sodium Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Kernelate, Glycerin, Fragrance, Sodium Chloride, Propylene Glycol, Zinc Oxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, Alumina, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, C14700, C17200, C77891.

description_en:
Indulge your senses with **Dove Soap Coconut Milk & Jasmine**, meticulously crafted to nourish and deeply moisturize, leaving your skin feeling soft, smooth, and healthy. Experience the comforting aroma of coconut milk blended with the delicate scent of jasmine petals, designed to bring you a moment of relaxation and rejuvenation with every use. Perfect for your daily skincare ritual.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Soap Coconut Milk & Jasmine**:
â­ For external use only.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
â­ Suitable for daily use on face, body, and hands.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Soap Coconut Milk & Jasmine**:
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Stearic Acid.
â­ Sodium Palmitate, Water/Aqua, Lauric Acid.
â­ Sodium Isethionate, Sodium Stearate.
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Palm Kernelate.
â­ Perfume/Parfum, Cocos Nucifera Fruit Extract.
â­ Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Zinc Oxide.
â­ Propylene Glycol, Tetrasodium EDTA, Tetrasodium Etidronate.
â­ Alumina, Pentylene Glycol, Sine Adipe Lac.
â­ Decylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol.
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate.
â­ Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene.
â­ Linalool, CI 14700, CI 17200, CI 77891.

description_en:
Dove Men+Care Fw Hydration effectively cleanses your skin, keeping it healthy and clean. Unlike regular soap that leaves skin dry, the unique **Dove Men+Care Fw Hydration** formula combines a mild cleanser with the same lipids naturally present in your skin, helping to minimize dryness. This face wash is ideal for men prone to dry skin, as it effectively cleanses and replenishes lost moisture to combat dryness.

â­ Effectively cleanses and is gentle on skin.
â­ Ultra-mild formulas clinically tested.
â­ Replenishes lost moisture with exclusive technology.
â­ Rinses off easily with no residue.
â­ Provides advanced protection for dry skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Men+Care Fw Hydration**
â­ Wet your face, apply face wash, and then rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Men+Care Fw Hydration**
â­ Water, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Stearic Acid, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine...

This gentle soap bar, infused with the lively scent of pomegranate and lemon verbena, is crafted to nourish your skin, leaving it feeling soft, smooth, and radiant. The **Dove Go Fresh Revive Beauty Bar** features Â¼ moisturizing cream and mild cleansers that help protect your skin's natural moisture barrier, ensuring a refreshed and hydrated feel after every wash. Elevate your daily shower routine with the invigorating essence of the **Dove Go Fresh Revive Beauty Bar**.

Experience freshness and hydration with **Dove Shower Gel Avocado Calendula 250ml + Loofah**. This formula, enriched with moisturizing cream and mild cleansers, works to protect your skin's moisture. Its light, refreshing hydration formula effectively nourishes your skin, while NutriumMoistureâ„¢ technology delivers natural nutrients that nourish deep into the surface layers of the skin. Enjoy softer, smoother skin with **Dove Shower Gel Avocado Calendula 250ml + Loofah**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Shower Gel Avocado Calendula 250ml + Loofah**

â­ Apply a suitable amount to the loofah or your hand.

description_en:
**Dove Pink Beauty Bar** is more than just a soap; it's a superior care experience for your skin. It combines gentle cleansing power with deep hydration to give you soft, fresh, and radiant skin. Its unique formula, specially designed for your skin, works to restore its natural moisture during cleansing, making it the perfect choice to add a touch of beauty and indulgence to your daily routine.

â­ Classic moisturizing formula.
â­ Contains Â¼ moisturizing cream and mild cleanser.
â­ **Dove** doesn't dry skin like soap can.
â­ Suitable for daily use on face, body, and hands.
â­ Leaves skin softer, smoother, and more radiant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Pink Beauty Bar**
â­ For external use only.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
â­ Not edible.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Pink Beauty Bar**
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Stearic Acid, Lauric Acid, Sodium Palmate, Aqua, Sodium Isethionate, Sodium Stearate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Kernelate, Glycerin, Parfum, Sodium Chloride, Propylene Glycol, Zinc Oxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 14700, CI 17200, CI 77891.

description_en:
Experience superior protection with **Dove Men+Care Deo Roll On Invisible Dry**, specifically designed for men to provide a feeling of freshness and confidence throughout the day. This innovative formula is tough on sweat and odor but gentle on your skin, thanks to its Â¼ Moisturiser Technology that protects against irritation. **Dove Men+Care Deo Roll On Invisible Dry** is dermatologically tested, ensuring it's a non-irritating formula even with regular use. Enjoy 48 hours of sweat and odor protection with a refreshing scent.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Men+Care Deo Roll On Invisible Dry**:
â­ Apply twice daily for optimal results.
â­ Apply generously to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Avoid using on irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Men+Care Deo Roll On Invisible Dry**:
â­ Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Steareth-2, Parfum, Steareth-20, Tocopheryl Acetate, Citric acid, Potassium lactate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
**Dove Soap Cucumber & Green Tea** is more than just soap; it's a skincare experience that combines freshness and hydration. Enjoy softer, brighter, and healthier-looking skin with every use. The blend of refreshing cucumber and nourishing green tea provides a long-lasting feeling of freshness, while our unique formula with Â¼ moisturizing cream and mild cleansers deeply nourishes your skin. Enjoy a refreshing start to your day or a relaxing end to your evening with this ultimate beauty bar for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Soap Cucumber & Green Tea**
â­ For external use only.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
â­ Not edible.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Soap Cucumber & Green Tea**
â­ Cucumis Sativus Fruit Extract (Cucumber).
â­ Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract (Green Tea).
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Â¼ Moisturizing Cream.
â­ Mild Cleansers.
â­ Contains: Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Stearic Acid, Sodium Palmitate, Sodium Stearate, Water/Aqua, Sodium Isethionate, Lauric Acid, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Perfume/Parfum, Sodium Chloride, Dipropylene Glycol, Zinc Oxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, Propylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Sodium Benzoate, Alumina, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 19140, CI 42090, CI 77891.

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Dove** Men Deo Spray Extra Fresh. Enjoy superior protection against sweat for up to 48 hours, combined with an invigorating scent that keeps you confident all day long. Formulated with Â¼ moisturiser technology, **Dove** Men Deo Spray Extra Fresh provides superior underarm care, helping to moisturize and reduce irritation after shaving, leaving your skin feeling soft and smooth. It features Dove's signature clean, refreshing scent for a feeling of lasting cleanliness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove** Men Deo Spray Extra Fresh:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Hold can 15 cm from the underarm and spray.
â­ For underarm use only.
â­ Avoid direct inhalation.
â­ Use in well-ventilated places with intermittent sprays.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Do not use on broken or irritated skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove** Men Deo Spray Extra Fresh:
â­ Butane
â­ Isobutane
â­ Propane
â­ Aluminum Chlorohydrate
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil
â­ Perfume
â­ Â¼ Moisturiser Technology for skin protection

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort with **Dove Anti-Dandruff Relief Conditioner**, specially formulated to deeply soothe and hydrate your scalp and hair. Its unique formula, enriched with Hyaluronic Acid and botanical Sage, works to provide instant softness and effectively treat dandruff. When used regularly with the Anti-Dandruff Relief Scalp Oil, your hair will become nourished and strong from root to tip, giving you a healthy and attractive look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Anti-Dandruff Relief Conditioner**
â­ Apply an adequate amount of the conditioner to wet hair after shampooing.
â­ Gently massage to distribute the conditioner throughout your hair and scalp.
â­ Leave the conditioner on for 10 minutes to allow its active ingredients to work fully.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water to remove any residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Anti-Dandruff Relief Conditioner**
â­ Hyaluronic Acid for deep hydration.
â­ Botanical Sage for scalp soothing.
â­ Nourishing ingredients to strengthen hair from root to tip.

#Dove #DoveConditioner #DandruffTreatment #HairCare #HealthyHair #HealthyScalp #HairHydration #SoftHair #HairProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate protection and superior comfort with **Dove Men +Care Deo Roll On Extra Fresh**. This deodorant is specially formulated for men to deliver powerful sweat protection without irritating the skin, making it the perfect choice for daily care. Thanks to its new and improved formula, **Dove Men +Care Deo Roll On Extra Fresh** provides our best protection ever, keeping your skin soft and healthy with its unique Â¼ Moisturiser Technology that protects against irritation. Dermatologically tested for effectiveness and gentleness on the skin, it offers 48-hour protection against sweat and odor, along with a long-lasting refreshing scent.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Men +Care Deo Roll On Extra Fresh**
â­ Apply twice daily for maximum freshness and protection.
â­ Suitable for everyday use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Men +Care Deo Roll On Extra Fresh**
â­ Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Steareth-2, Parfum, Steareth-20, Tocopheryl Acetate, Citric acid.
â­ Potassium lactate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
Discover purity and refreshment with **Dove Oil Control Soap Bar with Clay & Rose Water 135g**, specifically designed to deeply cleanse your skin while maintaining its natural balance.

â­ Perfect balance for oily and acne-prone skin.
â­ Gentle formula enriched with clay to purify pores and remove impurities.
â­ Rose Water soothes the skin and provides extra hydration.
â­ Leaves skin clean, soft, and refreshed.
â­ Suitable for daily use on face and body.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Oil Control Soap Bar with Clay & Rose Water 135g**:
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Lather **Dove Oil Control Soap Bar with Clay & Rose Water 135g** between your hands to create a rich foam.
â­ Apply the foam to your entire body, focusing on areas that need extra cleansing.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Oil Control Soap Bar with Clay & Rose Water 135g**:
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate
â­ Sodium Palmitate
â­ Sodium Stearate
â­ Stearic Acid
â­ Sodium Isethionate
â­ Lauric Acid
â­ Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate
â­ Water/Aqua
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Dipropylene Glycol
â­ Zinc Oxide
â­ Tetrasodium EDTA
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Tetrasodium Etidronate
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Clay
â­ Rose Water
â­ Fragrance

Experience the ultimate indulgence with **Dove Intensive Nourishing Body Cream**, your secret to beautifully soft and supple skin. This extra-rich, fast-absorbing cream penetrates deep to provide lasting moisture and nourishment.

â­ Delivers intense nourishment for dry and dehydrated skin.

â­ Quick-absorbing formula without a greasy residue.
â­ Ideal for daily use on the entire body.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Intensive Nourishing Body Cream**:
â­ Generously massage the cream into your skin all over your body.
â­ Pay extra attention to dry areas like heels, knees, and elbows.
â­ Allow a few minutes for the cream to absorb before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Intensive Nourishing Body Cream**:

description_en:
Achieve strong, smooth, and protected hair from split ends with **Dove Shampoo with Tips Re-Constructor Split Ends Rescue**. It nourishes and protects your hair's ends from breakage, giving you up to 4x fewer split ends. Its gentle formula is enriched with fiber actives that strengthen hair from within, making it suitable for everyday use. Give your hair the care it deserves with **Dove Shampoo with Tips Re-Constructor Split Ends Rescue**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Shampoo with Tips Re-Constructor Split Ends Rescue**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Massage a suitable amount of shampoo gently into your scalp and hair.
â­ Rinse well. Repeat if necessary.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Shampoo with Tips Re-Constructor Split Ends Rescue**:
â­ Formulated with fiber actives that strengthen hair.
â­ Gentle formula suitable for everyday use.

description_en:
Revitalize your hands with **Dove Hand Cream Coconut**, inspired by the beauty rituals of Central American women. This luxurious cream offers a deeply hydrating and invigorating experience for your skin. The fast-absorbing formula, enriched with nourishing avocado oil, instantly softens your hands, while its clean, fresh scent uplifts your senses.

Experience the result of dry-free, deliciously smooth, and supple skin that radiates a captivating fragrance. **Dove Hand Cream Coconut** is your secret to naturally beautiful and healthy-looking hands.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Hand Cream Coconut**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to clean hands.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Use as needed to maintain skin hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Hand Cream Coconut**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride.
â­ Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil.
â­ Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E).
â­ Other nourishing ingredients for deep hydration.

title_ar: Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… Ø¯ÙˆÙ Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„Ù…ØµØ¨ÙˆØº 350 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Keep your coloured hair vibrant with Dove Colour Care Conditioner 350ml, specially formulated to help maintain your hair's colour for longer. This conditioner nourishes and protects coloured hair, leaving it feeling silky and manageable. With its Vibrant Colour Lock technology, this Dove conditioner helps keep your hair colour vibrant for up to eight weeks.

â­ Especially created for coloured hair
â­ Helps keep hair colour vibrant for up to eight weeks
â­ Leaves coloured hair feeling silky and manageable every day
â­ Makes coloured hair feel smoother, helps with detangling and improves manageability
â­ Progressively nourishes with regular use

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Colour Care Conditioner 350ml**
â­ After shampooing, apply the conditioner between your hands and work it through wet hair.
â­ Smooth it from mid-lengths to ends, ensuring every strand is covered.
â­ Comb through with your fingers and rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Colour Care Conditioner 350ml**
â­ Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Perfume, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Gluconolactone, Trehalose, DMDM Hydantoin, Cyclotetrasiloxane, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Cetrimonium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Sulfate, Sodium Hydroxide, Magnesium Nitrate, Magnesium Chloride, Acetic Acid, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, CI 15985, CI 19140.

#Dove #DoveHair #ColourCare #ColouredHair #HairCare #HairConditioner #HairGoals #HealthyHair #HairTreatment #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Introducing **Dove Anti-Dandruff Shampoo for Daily Care**, your ultimate solution for healthy, flake-free hair with every wash. This shampoo features an advanced moisturizing complex designed to provide your scalp with the daily care it deserves. It effectively combats dandruff while delivering deep hydration for your hair.

â­ Delivers flake-free hair and superior care.
â­ Advanced moisturizing formula for healthy, radiant hair.
â­ Suitable for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Anti-Dandruff Shampoo for Daily Care**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo to your scalp and hair.
â­ Gently massage your scalp to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse your hair well with water.
â­ For best results, repeat the process and use the shampoo daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Anti-Dandruff Shampoo for Daily Care**:
â­ Water
â­ Gentle Cleansing Agents
â­ Advanced Moisturizing Complex
â­ Natural Scalp Care Ingredients
â­ Refreshing Fragrance

description_en:
Discover deep hydration with **Dove Micellar Water Beauty Moist**. This product is meticulously formulated to provide your skin with unparalleled freshness and softness, making it ideal for those experiencing dry and dehydrated skin. Enjoy a gentle yet effective cleansing experience that removes impurities without stripping your skin of its natural moisture.

â­ Gentle and effective micellar formula.
â­ Deeply moisturizes and leaves skin feeling soft.
â­ Suitable for dry and dehydrated skin types.
â­ Provides a refreshing and revitalizing sensation.
â­ Economical multi-pack for exceptional value.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dove Micellar Water Beauty Moist**
â­ Soak a cotton pad with the micellar water.
â­ Gently sweep over your face and neck to remove makeup and impurities.
â­ No rinsing required.
â­ Use daily, morning and evening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dove Micellar Water Beauty Moist**
â­ Purified Water.
â­ Vegetable Glycerin.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Chamomile Extract.
â­ Gentle Surfactants.

description_en:
Experience refreshing protection with **Dettol Sensitive Shower Gel & Body Wash**, specially formulated for your skin. This wash provides 100% superior germ protection, enhanced with a calming lavender and white musk fragrance to help you relax. Dermatologically tested, **Dettol Sensitive Shower Gel & Body Wash** maintains your skin's pH balance, leaving it feeling healthy and soft, while offering 8 hours of moisture thanks to added glycerine. It is free from TCC & Triclosan to ensure your family's health and hygiene.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Sensitive Shower Gel & Body Wash**
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Pour a sufficient amount of body wash onto your hands or a loofah.
â­ Lather up and massage all over your body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Sensitive Shower Gel & Body Wash**
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Parfum, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool.

#Dettol #ShowerGel #BodyWash #Lavender #WhiteMusk #SkinCare #GermProtection #Moisturizing #Hygiene #HealthySkin

Experience unparalleled protection with **Dettol Original Shower Gel & Body Wash**, specially formulated to keep your family healthy and hygienic. This body wash provides 100% better protection from illness-causing germs compared to non-antibacterial products, enhanced with a refreshing pine scent that aids relaxation and leaves your skin feeling soft and healthy. Its pH-balanced and TCC & Triclosan-free formula makes it a safe choice for daily care. **Dettol Original Shower Gel & Body Wash** is dermatologically tested to ensure maximum skin care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Original Shower Gel & Body Wash**

â­ Wet your skin with water.

â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Original Shower Gel & Body Wash**

â­ Formula enriched with Dettol's trusted germ protection.
â­ Refreshing natural pine fragrance.
â­ pH-balanced.
â­ Free from TCC & Triclosan.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

description_en:
Dettol Antiseptic Wipes offer ultimate protection from germs for your skin at home and on the go.

These wipes are pH neutral, meaning they don't interfere with your skin's natural protection, while the added emollients moisturize your skin. Enjoy hygienic and sterile hands without dryness or skin irritation, as they are alcohol-free.

â­ Provides superior germ protection.
â­ Maintains skin's natural pH balance.
â­ Moisturizes skin with added emollients.
â­ Alcohol-free and safe for sensitive skin.
â­ Leaves no stains or residue after use.
â­ Ideal for use anytime, anywhere: at work, on public transport, during driving, before eating out, during medical care, and in public restrooms.
â­ Dermatologically tested for effectiveness and safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol** Antiseptic Wipes:
â­ Open the resealable label and pull out a wipe.
â­ Close the label tightly to prevent drying out.
â­ Gently wipe the skin or surface to be cleaned.
â­ Dispose of the wipe after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol** Antiseptic Wipes:
â­ Purified Water.
â­ Moisturizing Agents.
â­ Gentle Preservatives.
â­ Proven Antiseptic Ingredients.

description_en:
Give your skin the care it deserves with **Dettol** Sensitive Shower Gel & Bodywash. Experience 100% better germ protection with this wash that combines Dettol's trusted power with a soothing lavender and white musk fragrance. Dermatologically tested, it maintains your skin's pH balance, leaving it healthy, soft, and moisturized for 8 hours. Formulated without TCC & Triclosan to ensure your family's well-being.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Sensitive Shower Gel & Bodywash**:
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Pour a suitable amount of **Dettol Sensitive Shower Gel & Bodywash** onto a loofah or directly onto your hand.
â­ Create a rich lather and gently massage over your body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Sensitive Shower Gel & Bodywash**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Sodium Salicylate, Sodium Benzoate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Tetrasodium Etidronate, PPG-2 Myristyl Ether, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Limonene, Linalool.

#Dettol #ShowerGel #BodyWash #Skincare #Moisturizing #Lavender #WhiteMusk #GermProtection #HealthySkin #BodyCareProducts

description_en:
Maintain your hygiene and protect your skin with **Dettol Original Antibacterial Skin Wipes**. These innovative wet wipes are specially designed to provide superior protection against illness-causing germs while gently moisturizing your skin. Thanks to their pH-balanced formula, **Dettol Original Antibacterial Skin Wipes** preserve your skin's natural balance and give you an instant feeling of freshness. They are ideal for cleaning hands, face, and neck anytime, anywhere, whether you're at home, in the car, at the office, or while traveling.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Original Antibacterial Skin Wipes**:
â­ Open the resealable lid.
â­ Pull out a wet wipe and clean your hands, face, and neck.
â­ Close the lid tightly after each use to keep the wipes moist.
â­ Suitable for daily use and whenever you need a quick, refreshing clean.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Original Antibacterial Skin Wipes**:
â­ Purified Water
â­ Glycerin
â­ Lauramidopropyl Betaine
â­ Benzalkonium Chloride
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Skin Moisturizing and Soothing Agents
â­ Mild Fragrance

Perfect for on-the-go use, at school, in the office, or during travel. Dermatologically tested to ensure maximum safety and effectiveness. Available in a resealable pack to maintain their freshness and moisture.

description_en:
Experience refreshing protection with **Dettol Cool Shower Gel & Body Wash**. This innovative body wash provides 100% better protection against illness-causing germs compared to non-antibacterial products, as tested against bacteria.

The **Dettol Cool Shower Gel & Body Wash** features a unique formula that combines Dettol's trusted germ protection with a crisp menthol fragrance to help your skin relax and protect it. It maintains your skin's pH balance, leaving it feeling healthy and soft. It offers 12 hours of odour protection and is free from TCC & Triclosan, ensuring your family's health and hygiene. Dermatologically tested for optimal skin care.

Explore Dettol's wide range of health and hygiene products.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Cool Shower Gel & Body Wash**
â­ Apply a sufficient amount of shower gel onto a loofah or directly onto your body.
â­ Lather well and gently massage it onto your skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Cool Shower Gel & Body Wash**
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Parfum (Menthol, Eucalyptus)
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Preservatives
â­ Emulsifiers

#Dettol #ShowerGel #BodyWash #Skincare #Freshness #GermProtection #Health #Beauty #Menthol #SaudiArabia

Experience superior softness and protection with **Dettol** Sensitive Liquid Hand Wash, featuring a calming Lavender & White Musk scent. Specially formulated to provide 100% better protection against illness-causing germs while keeping your skin moisturized and soft, thanks to its glycerine-enriched formula. The enchanting scent of Lavender and White Musk offers a refreshing and distinguished experience with every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol**:
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply enough handwash to cover all parts of your hands.
â­ Rub hands together, focusing on between fingers and under nails.
â­ Rinse hands thoroughly with water.
â­ Dry hands with a clean towel or air dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol**:
â­ Aqua

description_en:
Maintain your hygiene and well-being with **Dettol** Original Antibacterial Skin Wipes! These wet wipes are designed to offer superior protection against illness-causing germs, making them ideal for instant skin care anytime, anywhere.

Featuring a skin-friendly formula, these wipes are pH neutral and do not interfere with your skin's natural protective barrier. They also contain emollients that provide extra moisturization and an instant refreshing feel. Whether you're at home, in the car, at the office, or on a trip, **Dettol** wipes are your perfect choice for a quick clean-up of your hands, face, and neck.

The resealable lid ensures the wipes remain moist and do not dry out, guaranteeing their effectiveness every time. They are dermatologically tested to be safe and gentle on your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol**:
â­ Use one wipe to cleanse your hands, face, or neck.
â­ Use as needed for instant cleaning and protection.
â­ Re-seal the lid tightly after each use to maintain moisture.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol**:

Provide superior protection for your family with **Dettol Sensitive Liquid Handwash Pump**, featuring a soothing Lavender & White Musk scent. This handwash offers 100% better protection from illness-causing germs while keeping your hands soft and moisturized thanks to its formula enriched with glycerine and moisturizers. Enjoy the refreshing scent of lavender and white musk that leaves your hands delicately fragranced. Its pH-balanced and TCC & Triclosan-free formula is dermatologically tested to ensure skin care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Sensitive Liquid Handwash Pump**
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of the handwash to your hands.
â­ Lather and rub your hands together for at least 20 seconds, ensuring all surfaces are covered.
â­ Rinse hands thoroughly with water and dry them with a clean towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Sensitive Liquid Handwash Pump**
â­ Aqua
â­ Glycerin
â­ Moisturizers
â­ Lavender & White Musk Fragrance
â­ Other skin-friendly ingredients

description_en:
Experience ultimate germ protection with **Dettol** Antiseptic Wet Wipes, designed for your skin at home and on the go. These pH-neutral wipes maintain your skin's natural defense and are enriched with emollients to moisturize, all within an alcohol-free formula for safe sanitization, even on sensitive skin. Use them for instant clean-ups of hands, face, and neck anytime, anywhere to stay protected. Dermatologically tested to ensure effectiveness and safety on your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol** Antiseptic Wet Wipes:
â­ Open the re-sealable label and pull out a wipe.
â­ Carefully close the re-sealable label to prevent drying out.
â­ Wipe skin or surface hygienically clean and then dispose of the wipe.
â­ Use anytime, anywhere: in your workplaces, public transport, during driving, before eating outside, during medical care, and in public toilets.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol** Antiseptic Wet Wipes:
â­ Alcohol-free formula for safe sanitization.
â­ Emollients to keep skin moisturized.
â­ Gentle on skin and safe for use around children and food areas.

description_en:
Experience healthy, clean skin with the Dettol Skincare Shower Gel & Body Wash, Rose & Sakura Blossom scent.

Indulge your skin in a refreshing shower experience that leaves you feeling comfortable and revitalized. Dettol Skincare BodyWash & Showergel provides you with 100% better germ protection versus non-antibacterial products, while maintaining your skin's natural pH balance. This unique product combines Dettol's trusted germ protection with the delicate fragrance of rose and sakura blossom, leaving your skin soft, moisturized for up to 8 hours, and beautifully scented. Dermatologically tested and free from TCC & Triclosan, it offers complete peace of mind for your family.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol** Skincare Shower Gel & Body Wash, Rose & Sakura Blossom:
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of gel onto a loofah or directly onto your hands.
â­ Lather gently.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol** Skincare Shower Gel & Body Wash, Rose & Sakura Blossom:
â­ Aqua.
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate.
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Parfum.
â­ Rose Oil.
â­ Sakura Blossom Extract.
â­ Citric Acid.
â­ Sodium Benzoate.
â­ Potassium Sorbate.

title_en: Dettol Surface Disinfectant Spray, Morning Dew Scent - 450 ml
title_ar: Ø¨Ø®Ø§Ø® Ø¯ÙŠØªÙˆÙ„ Ù„ØªØ¹Ù‚ÙŠÙ… Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø³Ø·Ø­ Ø¨Ø±Ø§Ø¦Ø­Ø© Ù†Ø¯Ù‰ Ø§Ù„ØµØ¨Ø§Ø­ - 450 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
The **Dettol** Disinfectant Spray is your ultimate ally in protecting your family from harmful germs. Its unique formula is proven to effectively kill 99.9% of bacteria and viruses that may be present on surfaces you interact with daily, preventing the spread of illnesses. Beyond disinfection, it efficiently eliminates unpleasant odors by targeting odor-causing germs, leaving your home fresh and scented with the Morning Dew fragrance. This **Dettol** spray can be used on a wide range of surfaces, including door handles, telephones, shoes, sofas, mattresses, and even shower curtains, where it helps control mold and mildew. Recommended by doctors for your family's protection and to promote a healthy and safe environment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Spray Surface Spray Morning Dew Scent 450 ml**:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Hold the can 15-20 cm from the surface to be cleaned.
â­ Spray the surface until it is completely covered with mist.
â­ Allow the surface to dry naturally; no wiping is needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Spray Surface Spray Morning Dew Scent 450 ml**:
â­ Kills 99.9% of viruses and germs.
â­ Includes bacteria and fungi such as E. coli, Salmonella, Listeria, and Staphylococcus Aureus.
â­ Combats viruses like Rhinovirus (the leading cause of the common cold), Rotavirus (the leading cause of diarrhea in children), Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV), Adenovirus Type 2, Herpes Simplex Virus Types 1 & 2, Hepatitis A Virus, and Avian Flu Type H1N1.
â­ Deodorizes by killing germs that cause odor.
â­ Provides superior protection against the spread of harmful bacteria and viruses.
â­ Helps control mold and mildew on various surfaces.

#Dettol #DettolSpray #SurfaceSanitizer #HomeHygiene #Disinfectant #CleaningProducts #HealthAndBeauty #FamilyProtection #EffectiveSanitization #SaudiArabia
