description_en:
Experience superior protection and unparalleled cleanliness with the **Dettol Original Pine Scent Soap Bar**. This soap is formulated to provide 100% better protection from illness-causing germs, giving you the confidence and purity your skin deserves. Enjoy long-lasting freshness and an invigorating pine fragrance that leaves your skin feeling healthy and refreshed after every use.

**ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Dettol Original Pine Scent Soap Bar**
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Lather up the **Dettol Original Pine Scent Soap Bar**.
â­ Gently massage the lather onto your entire body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily for best results.

**ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Dettol Original Pine Scent Soap Bar**
â­ A powerful blend of antibacterial ingredients for superior protection.
â­ Natural pine extract for a refreshing scent.
â­ Free from TCC & Triclosan.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

#Dettol #Soap #BodyCare #Hygiene #Health #FreshScent #Pine #SaudiArabia #SelfCare #HealthySkin

description_en:
Indulge your senses and enjoy ultimate freshness and protection with **Dettol Fresh** Shower Gel & Body Wash. This wash provides you with a refreshing shower experience along with 100% better protection from germs compared to non-antibacterial products, as tested against bacteria. The **Dettol Fresh** shower gel combines Dettol's trusted germ protection with a refreshing citrus and orange blossom fragrance, leaving your skin protected and relaxed. This body wash maintains your skin's pH balance, leaving it feeling healthy and fresh. The antibacterial shower gel offers 12 hours of odour protection and is free from TCC & Triclosan to keep your family healthy & hygienic. It is dermatologically tested.

â­ 100% Protection: Provides 100% better protection from illness-causing germs.
â­ Odour Protection: Offers 12 hours of complete odour protection.
â­ Amazing Fragrance: Refreshing Citrus and orange blossom scent leaves your skin feeling healthy & fresh.
â­ No TCC & Triclosan: Another reason to relax and feel at ease.
â­ Dermatologically Tested: Keeps your skin smooth and healthy.
â­ pH Balanced: Dettolâ€™s trusted germ protection is pH-balanced.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Fresh**:
â­ Wet your body with water.
â­ Pour a generous amount of shower gel onto a washcloth or directly onto your body.
â­ Lather up and gently massage over your body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Fresh**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, PPG-2-MEE, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
**Dettol Original Liquid Handwash Pump**, with its invigorating pine scent, is your first line of defense against germs. Enjoy superior protection and lasting health for your family. This trusted handwash combines Dettol's potent germ-killing power, offering 100% better protection from illness-causing germs, with a natural pine fragrance to leave your hands clean, soft, and moisturized.

â­ 100% better protection from illness-causing germs.
â­ Leaves hands smooth and healthy thanks to its pH-balanced formula.
â­ Free from TCC & Triclosan, ensuring your family's safety.
â­ Features a natural pine fragrance for a refreshing experience.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Original Liquid Handwash Pump**:
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Pump the dispenser to get the right amount of handwash.
â­ Lather and rub your hands together for at least 20 seconds, ensuring all surfaces are covered, including between fingers and under nails.
â­ Rinse your hands thoroughly with water.
â­ Dry your hands with a clean towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Original Liquid Handwash Pump**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Parfum
â­ Pinus Sylvestris Leaf Oil
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Disodium EDTA

title_ar: Ø¯ÙŠØªÙˆÙ„ Ù…Ù†Ø§Ø¯ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ø¹Ù‚Ù…Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© 10 Ù…Ù†Ø§Ø¯ÙŠÙ„
description_en:
Keep your skin clean and protected from germs anytime, anywhere with **Dettol Antiseptic Sensitive Wet Wipes**. These wipes, specially formulated for sensitive skin, maintain your skin's natural pH balance with their alcohol-free formula and emollients that moisturize your skin without causing dryness or irritation. Ideal for instant clean-ups of your hands, face, and neck, ensuring ultimate protection on the go. Dermatologically tested for proven effectiveness and safety.

â­ Provides ultimate germ protection for your skin at home and on the go.
â­ Maintains skin's natural pH balance without interfering with its natural protection.
â­ Contains emollients to moisturize your skin.
â­ Sterilizes and sanitizes without the need for water.
â­ Alcohol-free, making them ideal for sensitive skin.
â­ Leaves skin clean and refreshed without any stains or residue.
â­ Safe for use around children and food areas.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Antiseptic Sensitive Wet Wipes**:
â­ Open the re-sealable label and pull out a wipe.
â­ Close the label tightly to prevent the wipes from drying out.
â­ Wipe skin or surface hygienically clean, then dispose of the wipe.
â­ Use anytime, anywhere: in your workplace, public transport, during driving, before eating out, during medical care, and in public restrooms.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Antiseptic Sensitive Wet Wipes**:
â­ Effective and antiseptic formula.
â­ Natural moisturizers.
â­ Alcohol-free.
â­ Skin-friendly preservatives.

#Dettol #AntisepticWipes #Sanitization #PersonalHygiene #Skincare #DettolProducts #Antibacterial #GermProtection #SaudiArabia #Riyadh

description_en:
Safeguard your family from cold & flu viruses with **Dettol** Antibacterial Disinfectant Spray. This All-in-One wet spray protects against a wide range of bacteria, viruses, and fungi such as E.Coli, Staphylococcus Aureus, MRSA, Adenovirus, Influenza Type A (H1N1), Respiratory Syncytial Virus, Salmonella, and Listeria. The all-purpose cleaner spray sanitizes, disinfects, and deodorizes hard surfaces and upholstery while imparting a fresh lavender fragrance. With no bleach and the presence of ethanol as a helping agent, it also acts as an antibacterial spray to help you eliminate unwanted microorganisms. Disinfect your belongings like school bags, gaming chairs, headphones, laptop bags, travel bags, and water bottles for germ-free protection every time. Explore **Dettol**'s other product ranges.

**Key Features:**
â­ Kills 99.9% of viruses and germs
â­ Deodorises by killing odor-causing germs
â­ Recommended by Doctors
â­ Helps protect your family from illness by preventing the spread of harmful bacteria & viruses
â­ Controls mold & mildew on mattresses, pillows, & shower curtains
â­ Controls 99.9% of viruses and germs including: Bacteria & Fungi: E. coli, Salmonella, Listeria, Staph. Aureus Viruses: Rhinovirus, Rotavirus, Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV), Adenovirus Type 2, Herpes Simplex Virus Types 1 & 2, Hepatitis A Virus, Avian Flu Type H1N1.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol**:
â­ Shake can well.
â­ Hold can 15-20cm from pre-cleaned surface and spray surface until covered with mist.
â­ Allow it to dry.
â­ No need to wipe.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol**:
â­ Contains Ethanol as a primary active ingredient.
â­ Natural Lavender fragrance.
â­ Non-ionic surfactants and other active ingredients for cleaning and disinfection.

#Dettol #Disinfectant #Spray #Cleaning #Sanitizer #Health #HomeCare #FamilyHealth #SaudiArabia #CleanHome

description_en:
Introducing **Dettol Antiseptic Hand Sanitizer Gel Floral Essence 50 ml**, your ultimate solution for clean hands anytime, anywhere. **Dettol Antiseptic Hand Sanitizer Gel Floral Essence 50 ml** effectively kills 99.9% of germs, providing reliable protection even without water. Its unique formula leaves your hands clean, refreshed, and non-sticky, making it ideal for everyday on-the-go use for the whole family. Whether you're in the car, office, or traveling, **Dettol Antiseptic Hand Sanitizer Gel Floral Essence 50 ml** is your perfect companion for keeping your hands clean and safe.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Antiseptic Hand Sanitizer Gel Floral Essence 50 ml**:
â­ Ensure hands are free from grease or visible dirt before application.
â­ Dispense an adequate amount onto one palm.
â­ Rub both hands together, covering all surfaces, including between fingers, around nails, and fingertips.
â­ Continue rubbing for at least 30 seconds until the gel is completely absorbed and hands are dry.
â­ Do not touch food or anything else until your hands are fully dry.
â­ Use in your workplaces, public transport, during driving, eating out, during medical care, and in public restrooms.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Antiseptic Hand Sanitizer Gel Floral Essence 50 ml**:
â­ Ethanol
â­ Aqua
â­ Glycerin
â­ Carbomer
â­ Triethanolamine
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate
â­ Rose Flower Extract
â­ Parfum

#DettolSanitizer #HandSanitizer #HandHygiene #GermProtection #Health #Prevention #Antiseptic #SaudiArabia #HandCare #DettolKSA

description_en:
Make every wash a refreshing experience with **Dettol Skincare Liquid Handwash Pump**, specially formulated to care for your skin while providing unmatched germ protection.

The **Dettol Skincare Liquid Handwash Pump** combines Dettol's trusted germ protection with the fragrant scent of Rose and Sakura Blossom, leaving your hands soft and moisturized. Its pH-balanced formula and absence of TCC and Triclosan make it an ideal choice for keeping your family healthy and hygienic. Dermatologically tested to ensure your hands remain smooth and healthy after every use.

â­ 100% Protection from illness-causing germs.
â­ Moisturizes skin with added glycerine and moisturizers.
â­ Refreshing Rose and Sakura Blossom fragrance that lasts.
â­ Free from TCC & Triclosan.
â­ Dermatologically tested for skin care.
â­ pH-balanced to maintain skin softness.
â­ Comes in an easy-to-use pump bottle.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Skincare Liquid Handwash Pump**
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Dispense an adequate amount of handwash onto your hands.
â­ Lather and rub your hands thoroughly for at least 20 seconds, covering all surfaces.
â­ Rinse your hands well with water.
â­ Dry your hands with a clean towel or allow them to air dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Skincare Liquid Handwash Pump**
â­ Aqua.
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Parfum.
â­ Citric Acid.
â­ Sodium Benzoate.
â­ Sodium Chloride.
â­ Limonene.
â­ Linalool.

description_en:
Experience superior protection and ultimate care for your hands with the **Dettol Hand Sanitizer Original Jacket 50 ml**. This effective sanitizer is designed to eliminate 99.9% of germs and bacteria, ensuring you and your family have clean and healthy hands anytime, anywhere, even without water. Perfect for everyday on-the-go use, whether in the car, office, or during travel, it provides a refreshing and confident feeling.

â­ Effective germ protection of 99.9%.
â­ Fast-drying, non-sticky gel formula.
â­ Ideal for use anywhere, anytime.
â­ Leaves hands feeling refreshed and clean.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Hand Sanitizer Original Jacket 50 ml**
â­ Wash hands with soap and water if heavily soiled.
â­ Dispense an adequate amount of gel onto the palm of one hand.
â­ Rub your hands together, ensuring all surfaces are covered, including between fingers and under nails.
â­ Continue rubbing for at least 30 seconds until the sanitizer is completely dry.
â­ Do not touch anything until your hands are fully dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Hand Sanitizer Original Jacket 50 ml**
â­ Alcohol (specific percentage not listed).
â­ Aqua.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Carbomer.
â­ Triethanolamine.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Aloe Vera Extract.

description_en:
Introducing **Dettol** Multi-Purpose Disinfectant Spray in the refreshing Crisp Breeze scent, your ultimate solution for a protected and hygienic home. This powerful spray is proven to kill 99.9% of germs, bacteria, and viruses that cause illness and unpleasant odors, ensuring a safe and clean environment for your family. It's perfect for use on a variety of surfaces, from doorknobs to furniture and fabrics.

â­ Kills 99.9% of viruses, germs, and disease-causing bacteria.
â­ Deodorizes by eliminating the source of odor.
â­ Recommended by doctors for its trusted efficacy.
â­ Protects your family from the spread of illness and harmful bacteria.
â­ Controls mold and mildew on various surfaces like upholstery.
â­ Crisp Breeze scent leaves a long-lasting freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol** Multi-Purpose Disinfectant Spray:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Hold the can 15-20 cm away from the surface to be cleaned.
â­ Spray the surface until it is well covered with mist.
â­ Allow it to dry completely. No wiping is needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol** Multi-Purpose Disinfectant Spray:
â­ Formulated with a powerful germ and virus-killing agent.
â­ Contains effective and safe disinfecting ingredients for surface use.
â­ Infused with a crisp breeze fragrance.

description_en:
Discover the power of cleanliness with **Dettol Skincare Liquid Handwash**, your ultimate partner in maintaining healthy and protected hands.

Experience 100% better germ protection with **Dettol Skincare Liquid Handwash**, expertly crafted to blend Dettol's trusted germ protection with the enchanting scent of rose and sakura blossom. This handwash not only shields your hands but also leaves them feeling moisturized and soft after every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Skincare Liquid Handwash**
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Dispense an adequate amount of the handwash onto your hands.
â­ Lather and rub your hands thoroughly for at least 20 seconds, ensuring all surfaces are covered.
â­ Rinse your hands with clean water.
â­ Pat your hands dry with a clean towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Skincare Liquid Handwash**
â­ pH-balanced formula to maintain skin softness.
â­ Enriched with glycerine and moisturizers for hydrated hands.
â­ Free from TCC and Triclosan.
â­ Refreshing rose and sakura blossom fragrance.
â­ Provides 100% protection against illness-causing germs.

description_en:
Discover the potent disinfecting power of **Dettol Antiseptic Antibacterial Liquid 750ml**, the ultimate solution for maintaining your family's and home's hygiene. This concentrated antiseptic liquid acts as your first line of defense against germs and bacteria, offering effective protection against infections from cuts, scratches, and insect bites. It can also be used as an all-around household disinfectant for surfaces, laundry, and more, making it an essential product for every home.

### ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Antiseptic Antibacterial Liquid 750ml**

*   **For First Aid:** Dilute 1 part of **Dettol Antiseptic Antibacterial Liquid 750ml** with 20 parts of water to disinfect cuts, scratches, and insect bites.
*   **For Personal Hygiene:** Add a small amount to your bathwater or use for handwashing to ensure superior cleanliness.
*   **As a Household Disinfectant:** Use diluted with water to clean surfaces, fabrics, and floors to eliminate germs.

### ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Antiseptic Antibacterial Liquid 750ml**

*   Concentrated antiseptic solution providing effective protection against germs and bacteria.
*   Dermatologically tested formula, gentle on the skin, to keep your skin smooth and healthy.

Also available in other sizes to meet all your needs.

#Dettol #Antiseptic #Disinfectant #Hygiene #Cleanliness #Health #HomeCare #Skincare #SaudiArabia #HouseholdCleaners

Experience superior germ protection with **Dettol Original Liquid Handwash Pump, Pine Scent, 400ml**. This handwash is formulated to provide 100% better protection from illness-causing germs, while keeping your hands soft and moisturized with its refreshing pine fragrance. Its pH-balanced formula ensures healthy, smooth skin with every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Original Liquid Handwash Pump, Pine Scent, 400ml**
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of handwash to your hands.
â­ Lather well with hands to create a rich foam.
â­ Rinse hands thoroughly with water.
â­ Dry your hands with a clean towel.

description_en:
Experience superior germ protection with **Dettol Fresh** liquid handwash, featuring a refreshing Citrus & Orange Blossom scent. This pH-balanced formula provides 100% better germ protection while keeping your skin smooth and healthy with every wash. Enjoy long-lasting cleanliness and a fresh scent that leaves your hands clean and revitalized all day. Perfect for daily use to maintain your family's health and hygiene.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Fresh**:
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Pump an adequate amount of handwash onto your hands.
â­ Gently lather and rub your hands for at least 20 seconds, ensuring all surfaces are covered, including between fingers and under nails.
â­ Rinse your hands thoroughly with water and pat them dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Fresh**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Isopropyl Butyl Ether
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Parfum
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Potassium Sorbate
â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ Tetrasodium EDTA
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Aloe Vera Extract
â­ Citrus & Orange Blossom Fragrance

description_en:
Experience superior freshness and cleanliness with **Dettol Shower Gel Cool** in a 250 ml size, specially formulated to provide you with trusted germ protection and a refreshing menthol scent.

**Dettol Shower Gel Cool** features a pH-balanced formula that maintains your skin's moisture barrier, leaving it soft and healthy. It offers effective protection against body odor for a full day, making it ideal for hot summer climates. The product also comes with a complimentary loofah for an enhanced cleansing experience.

**ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Dettol Shower Gel Cool**
â­ For best lather, pour a small amount into your hand or onto a loofah and massage over your body.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse eyes thoroughly with water.
â­ If swallowed, seek medical advice immediately and show this container or label.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

**ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Dettol Shower Gel Cool**
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Sodium Coco Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycol Distearate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamide, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Salicylic Acid, Citric Acid, Parfum, Sodium Citrate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Polyquaternium-7, Sodium Benzoate, Citronellol, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Propylparaben, Methylisothiazolinone.

#Dettol #ShowerGel #Cool #Freshness #Cleanliness #Skincare #BathProducts #Health #Moisture #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience a refreshing and protective cleanse with **Dettol Bathing Soap with Lavender & White Musk - 165g**. This soap is formulated to provide 100% better protection from germs, while keeping your skin soft and moisturized thanks to glycerin and the enchanting lavender & white musk fragrance. It's your ideal choice for maintaining your family's daily health and hygiene.

â­ 100% protection from illness-causing germs.
â­ Moisturizes skin with added glycerin and moisturizers.
â­ Invigorating lavender & white musk fragrance for healthy, soft skin.
â­ Free from TCC & Triclosan for skin safety.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Bathing Soap with Lavender & White Musk - 165g**:
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Rub the soap on your hands or a loofah to create a rich lather.
â­ Gently cleanse your body, focusing on areas needing extra attention.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Bathing Soap with Lavender & White Musk - 165g**:
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Lavender Fragrance.
â­ White Musk Fragrance.
â­ Moisturizers.
â­ Natural Soap Base.

description_en:
Experience refreshing cleanliness and trusted protection with **Dettol Original Shower Gel & Body Wash**. This shower gel offers superior 100% protection against illness-causing germs while maintaining your skin's pH balance, leaving it healthy and soft. Enjoy the invigorating pine fragrance that helps you relax and feel refreshed all day long. **Dettol Original Shower Gel & Body Wash** is TCC & Triclosan-free, ensuring your family's safety, and is dermatologically tested to be suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Original Shower Gel & Body Wash**:
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Pour a small amount into your hands or a loofah.
â­ Lather and gently massage all over your body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Original Shower Gel & Body Wash**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Parfum
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Tetrasodium EDTA
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Potassium Sorbate
â­ Pine Leaf Oil
â­ May contain: CI 42090, CI 19140

Experience refreshing protection with **Dettol Skincare Shower Gel & Body Wash, Rose & Sakura Blossom Scent**. This shower gel offers 100% better germ protection, infused with the relaxing and rejuvenating scent of rose and sakura blossom. Its pH-balanced formula maintains your skin's health and provides 8 hours of moisture, leaving your skin feeling soft and healthy. Dermatologically tested and free from TCC & Triclosan, it ensures unparalleled hygiene for you and your family.

â­ Lather well and cleanse your body.

description_en:
Experience superior protection and cleanliness with **Dettol Skincare Antibacterial Skin Wipes**. Designed to simplify your skincare routine, these wipes offer 100% protection from illness-causing germs. With their pH-neutral formulation, they do not interfere with your skinâ€™s natural protection, while emollients work to deeply moisturize your skin, providing an instant feeling of freshness. These wipes are perfect for quick clean-ups of your hands, face, and neck, and can be used anytime, anywhere â€“ at home, in the car, office, or while traveling. They are dermatologically tested and come in a resealable pack to keep them moist and prevent drying out.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Skincare Antibacterial Skin Wipes**:
â­ Use the wipes for instant clean-ups of your hands, face, and neck.
â­ Ideal for use at home, in the car, office, or on the go.
â­ Ensure the pack is tightly sealed after each use to maintain the wipes' moisture.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Skincare Antibacterial Skin Wipes**:
â­ Emollients to moisturize the skin.

â­ Purified water.

description_en:
Discover refreshing comfort with **Dettol Shower Gel Sensitive 250 ml**. This shower gel is specifically formulated for your sensitive skin, providing 100% better protection against illness-causing germs while maintaining your skin's pH balance. Enjoy a rich formula infused with a luxurious lavender and white musk fragrance, leaving your skin soft, healthy, and moisturized for up to 8 hours thanks to added glycerine. **Dettol Shower Gel Sensitive 250 ml** is free from TCC & Triclosan and dermatologically tested to ensure maximum care and safety for your family. Get rid of body odor instantly and enhance your feeling of freshness throughout the day.

â­ 100% superior germ protection.
â­ 8-hour long-lasting moisture with glycerine.
â­ Soothing lavender & white musk fragrance.
â­ Gentle formula free from TCC & Triclosan.
â­ Dermatologically tested.
â­ pH balanced for healthy skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Shower Gel Sensitive 250 ml**
â­ Wet your body with water.
â­ Pour a suitable amount of gel onto your hands or a washcloth.
â­ Lather the gel onto your body to create a rich foam.
â­ Rinse your body thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Shower Gel Sensitive 250 ml**
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Glycerin
â­ Parfum (Lavender & White Musk)
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Preservatives (e.g., Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate)

#Dettol #ShowerGel #SensitiveSkin #Moisturizing #BodyCare #Hygiene #SkinHealth #Lavender #WhiteMusk #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Dettol Original Bathing Soap**, featuring a refreshing pine scent, designed to provide superior germ protection. Discover the power of cleanliness and health with every use.

â­ 100% protection from illness-causing germs.
â­ Antibacterial formula offers trusted protection.
â­ Natural pine fragrance leaves your skin feeling healthy and fresh.
â­ Free from TCC & Triclosan, making it a safe choice for the family.
â­ Dermatologically tested for gentleness on the skin.
â­ Also explore other Dettol skincare and body care products.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Original Bathing Soap**:
â­ Wet your body with water.
â­ Use **Dettol Original Bathing Soap** to create a rich lather.
â­ Gently massage the lather onto your skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Original Bathing Soap**:
â­ Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Aqua, Parfum, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium Phytate, Titanium Dioxide, Tree Oil, Pine Oil, Limonene, Linalool.

#Dettol #DettolSoap #BathingSoap #GermProtection #Skincare #HealthAndHygiene #PineScent #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia #DailyCleanliness

description_en:
Experience superior hygiene and skin nourishment with **Dettol Skincare Bathing Soap**. This exceptional soap bar offers 100% better protection against illness-causing germs, ensuring your family stays healthy. Enriched with moisturizing glycerine and a delicate Rose & Sakura Blossom scent, **Dettol Skincare Bathing Soap** leaves your skin feeling soft, healthy, and beautifully fragrant. Dermatologically tested and free from TCC & Triclosan, it provides a gentle yet effective cleanse, making it an ideal choice for daily use. Elevate your bathing routine with the trusted protection and refreshing scent of **Dettol Skincare Bathing Soap**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Skincare Bathing Soap**:
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Lather the **Dettol Skincare Bathing Soap** between your hands.
â­ Apply the lather generously all over your body.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily for optimal hygiene and skin health.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Skincare Bathing Soap**:
â­ Glycerine: For deep moisturization.
â­ Rose Oil: For a pleasant fragrance and antioxidant properties.
â­ Sakura Blossom Extract: For skin soothing and a refreshing scent.
â­ Gentle Cleansing Agents.
â­ Additional Moisturizers.

description_en:
Discover the antiseptic power of **Dettol Antiseptic Antibacterial Disinfectant Liquid**, your ultimate solution for personal hygiene, first aid, and household disinfection. **Dettol Antiseptic Antibacterial Disinfectant Liquid** acts as your first line of defense, killing 99.9% of illness-causing germs and bacteria, providing you with the protection you need and maintaining a healthy environment for you and your family.

Our concentrated formula offers effective protection against germs and helps prevent infections from cuts, scratches, and insect bites. It can also be used as a household disinfectant for various surfaces, in laundry, or even added to bathwater for personal hygiene. Its enhanced formulation is suitable for all skin types and helps you retain smooth, clear, germ-free skin, leaving a fresh pine fragrance.

â­ Concentrated disinfectant liquid provides effective protection against germs and bacteria.
â­ Helps protect against infections from cuts, scratches, and insect bites.
â­ Can be used as a household disinfectant for surfaces and in laundry.
â­ Added to bathwater to kill germs and bacteria and treat pimples and dandruff.
â­ Leaves you feeling fresh and clean with a refreshing pine fragrance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Antiseptic Antibacterial Disinfectant Liquid**:
â­ For personal hygiene and bathing: Dilute 1:180 in water.
â­ For sterilizing wipes, underwear, and clothes: Dilute 1:36 in water.
â­ For disinfecting floors and hard surfaces: Dilute 1:18 in water. Surface should be air-dried before use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Antiseptic Antibacterial Disinfectant Liquid**:
â­ Chloroxylenol (0.3% w/v)
â­ Pine Oil
â­ Castor Oil
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ Sodium Carbonate
â­ Purified Water

description_en:
Experience unparalleled protection with **Dettol Original Bathing Soap**. This soap provides 100% better protection from illness-causing germs, making it your ultimate choice for maintaining your family's health and hygiene. With its antibacterial formula and invigorating pine scent, **Dettol Original Bathing Soap** leaves your skin clean, healthy, and fresh all day long.

**Dettol Original Bathing Soap** is free from TCC & Triclosan and dermatologically tested to ensure maximum safety and efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Original Bathing Soap**
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Use the soap to create a rich lather.
â­ Gently massage the lather onto your body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Original Bathing Soap**
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Palm Acid
â­ Palm Kernel Acid
â­ Aqua
â­ Parfum
â­ Glycerin
â­ Tetrasodium EDTA
â­ Salicylic Acid
â­ Geraniol
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool
â­ CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and protection with **Dettol** Cool Shower Gel & Body Wash. This product is specifically formulated to provide 100% better protection against germs compared to non-antibacterial products. **Dettol** body wash offers trusted germ protection and a refreshing Menthol & Eucalyptus fragrance to help you relax and feel revitalized. It maintains your skin's pH balance, leaving it feeling healthy and soft, and provides up to 12 hours of odour protection. Free from TCC & Triclosan to ensure your family's health and hygiene, and dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol** Cool Shower Gel & Body Wash

â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Pour a small amount of shower gel onto a washcloth or directly onto your body.
â­ Lather up and gently massage over your skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol** Cool Shower Gel & Body Wash

â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Glycerin
â­ Parfum (contains Menthol & Eucalyptus)
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Potassium Sorbate
â­ EDTA
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride (HPG)
â­ Polyquaternium 10
â­ Bisabolol
â­ Vitamin E
â­ D&C Yellow No. 10
â­ D&C Green No. 5

#Dettol #ShowerGel #BodyWash #Hygiene #Health #Freshness #Protection #BodyCare #Skincare #Moisturizing

description_en:
Experience unparalleled hygiene and freshness with **Dettol** Shower Gel Fresh. This refreshing citrus-scented body wash effectively protects your skin from germs, leaving it soft and healthy, especially in hot weather. This **Dettol** shower gel comes with a complimentary loofah for enhanced cleansing. Explore the range of available fragrances and sizes for a complete shower experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Shower Gel Fresh 250 ml With Loofah**:
â­ Apply a small amount of shower gel into your palm or onto the loofah.
â­ Gently lather over your body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact, rinse eyes with plenty of water.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Shower Gel Fresh 250 ml With Loofah**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate

description_en:
Experience refreshing protection with **Dettol Instant Cool Bathing Soap**. This antibacterial soap offers 100% superior protection against illness-causing germs, along with guaranteed odor protection to keep you confident all day long. Its invigorating Menthol and Eucalyptus scent leaves your skin feeling healthy, clean, and instantly refreshed. **Dettol Instant Cool Bathing Soap** is dermatologically tested and free from Triclosan & TCC, making it a safe choice for you and your family. Discover ultimate cleanliness with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Instant Cool Bathing Soap**
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Gently lather the soap to create a rich foam.
â­ Cleanse your body with the lather and rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Instant Cool Bathing Soap**
â­ Menthol: Provides an instant cooling and refreshing sensation.
â­ Eucalyptus: Known for its purifying and invigorating properties.
â­ A blend of safe skin-cleansing ingredients.
â­ Free from Triclosan & TCC.

description_en:
Ensure comprehensive protection for your family with **Dettol Multi-Purpose Disinfectant Spray**.

â­ All-in-one spray to sanitize, disinfect, and deodorize.
â­ Protects your family from germs, bacteria, and cold & flu viruses.
â­ Bleach-free formula that controls and prevents mould, mildew, and their odours.
â­ Controls and prevents mould and mildew on mattresses, pillows, and shower curtains.
â­ Disinfect your everyday items like school bags, laptops, headphones, and water bottles.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Multi-Purpose Disinfectant Spray**:
â­ Spray directly onto the surface to be disinfected or onto bags and various items.
â­ Leave for one minute to ensure effective disinfection.
â­ Wipe the surface or let it air dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Multi-Purpose Disinfectant Spray**:
â­ Contains Ethanol as an active ingredient.
â­ Free from bleach.
â­ Refreshing citrus fragrance.

#Dettol #Disinfectant #Sanitizer #Hygiene #Cleaning #Health #Home #SaudiArabia #Spray #Citrus

description_en:
Experience superior cleanliness and protection with **Dettol Shower Gel Original 250 ml With Loofah**. Dettol's Original Body Wash with its pine fragrance and pH-balanced formula provides Dettol's trusted germ protection, cleansing and protecting your skin for a healthy, clean, and refreshing feeling every day. It comes with a complimentary loofah for added hygiene.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Shower Gel Original 250 ml With Loofah**:
â­ For a rich lather, dispense a small amount of gel onto your hand or a loofah.
â­ Gently massage your body for effective cleansing.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse eyes thoroughly with water.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Shower Gel Original 250 ml With Loofah**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Coco-Sulfate Sodium, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycol Distearate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamide, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Salicylic Acid, Citric Acid, Parfum, Sodium Citrate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Polyquaternium 7, Sodium Benzoate, Citronellol, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Propylparaben, Methylisothiazolinone.

#Dettol #ShowerGel #Hygiene #SkinCare #Health #RefreshingScent #SaudiArabia #OnlineShopping #Deals #SelfCare

description_en:
Discover the invigorating freshness and reliable germ protection of Dettol Activ-Botany Hand Wash Green Tea & Bergamot 400ml. This liquid hand wash combines Dettol's trusted germ protection with a refreshing Green Tea & Bergamot fragrance, designed to be gentle on your skin. It provides effective defense against illness-causing germs and is made with 100% plant-derived ingredients, free from TCC & Triclosan, making it perfect for daily use to keep your family healthy and hygienic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Activ-Botany Hand Wash Green Tea & Bergamot**:
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Dispense an adequate amount of hand wash onto your palms.
â­ Rub your hands together to create a rich lather, ensuring all surfaces are covered.
â­ Rinse your hands thoroughly with water.
â­ Dry your hands with a clean towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Activ-Botany Hand Wash Green Tea & Bergamot**:
â­ 100% Plant-Derived Ingredients
â­ Green Tea Extract
â­ Bergamot Oil
â­ Dettol's Trusted Germ Protection
â­ Skin-Gentle Formula
â­ Free from TCC and Triclosan

#Dettol #HandWash #GreenTea #Bergamot #Hygiene #CleanHands #GermProtection #Skincare #SaudiArabia #HealthyLiving

description_en:
Experience unparalleled protection with Dettol Original Shower Gel & Body Wash. Enjoy 100% trusted germ protection with this Dettol body wash, specifically formulated to keep your skin healthy and hygienic. This shower gel combines Dettol's germ-fighting power with a natural pine fragrance to soothe your senses and provide a long-lasting feeling of freshness. It features a pH-balanced, TCC & Triclosan-free formula, making it gentle on your skin and suitable for daily use. Give your family the protection they deserve with **Dettol**, the ultimate choice for hygiene and health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Original Shower Gel & Body Wash**:
â­ Wet your body with water.
â­ Apply a suitable amount of shower gel onto a washcloth or directly onto your skin.
â­ Lather gently to create a rich foam.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Original Shower Gel & Body Wash**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Parfum, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Bisulfite, Tetrasodium EDTA, Benzyl Alcohol, Sorbic Acid, Limonene, Linalool, CI 19140, CI 42090.

#Dettol #ShowerGel #BodyWash #Hygiene #Health #Skincare #HealthAndBeauty #PersonalCare #SaudiArabia #Freshness

description_en:
Experience superior skin protection with **Dettol Antiseptic Wipes Refreshes Skin**. pH neutral, these wipes do not interfere with your skin's natural protection, while emollients moisturize your skin. Enjoy germ-free cleaning without dryness or irritation, as **Dettol Antiseptic Wipes Refreshes Skin** are completely alcohol-free. With a water-like texture, they leave no stains or residue after use, making them ideal for daily use and family protection. Dermatologically tested for effectiveness and safety on skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Antiseptic Wipes Refreshes Skin**:
â­ Open the re-sealable label and pull out a wipe.
â­ Close the re-sealable label carefully to prevent drying out.
â­ Wipe the skin or surface hygienically clean.
â­ Dispose of the wipe after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Antiseptic Wipes Refreshes Skin**:
â­ Alcohol-free formula.
â­ Moisturizing agents for soft skin.
â­ Effective germ-killing cleaning agents.

description_en:
Give your family unparalleled protection with **Dettol Active Botany Hand Wash Lavender & Chamomile 400ml**. This liquid wash offers effective protection against illness-causing germs, with a gentle, skin-friendly formula enhanced by a soothing lavender and chamomile fragrance. It's the perfect choice to keep your hands healthy and clean all day long.

â­ Powerful germ defence to keep your family healthy.
â­ 100% plant-derived formula for peace of mind.
â­ Lavender & Chamomile fragrance for a refreshing and calming sensation.
â­ Free from TCC & Triclosan, suitable for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Active Botany Hand Wash Lavender & Chamomile 400ml**
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply a suitable amount of **Dettol Active Botany Hand Wash Lavender & Chamomile 400ml** to your hands.
â­ Lather well for 20 seconds, ensuring all surfaces are covered.
â­ Rinse your hands thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Active Botany Hand Wash Lavender & Chamomile 400ml**
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Glycerin
â­ Lavender Extract
â­ Chamomile Extract
â­ Parfum
â­ Preservatives

description_en:
Experience superior cleanliness with **Dettol Active Botany Hibiscus & Rosewater Liquid Hand Wash 400ml**. This hand wash combines Dettol's trusted germ protection with the delicate floral scents of rosewater and hibiscus, providing you with consistently clean and fragrant hands. Its unique formula is 100% plant-derived, making it gentle on the skin while eliminating 99.9% of germs. Enjoy a refreshing and hydrating experience with every wash, perfect for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Active Botany Hibiscus & Rosewater Liquid Hand Wash 400ml**:
â­ Apply a small amount to wet hands.
â­ Lather thoroughly.
â­ Rinse off with water.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes; if contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Active Botany Hibiscus & Rosewater Liquid Hand Wash 400ml**:
â­ Soothing Rosewater.
â­ Natural Hibiscus Extract.
â­ 100% Plant-Derived Ingredients.
â­ TCC and Triclosan-Free Formula.

description_en:
Experience invigorating freshness and superior germ protection with **Dettol Fresh Bathing Soap, Citrus & Orange Blossom Scent, 165g**. This soap offers 100% better protection from illness-causing germs, leaving your skin feeling clean and refreshed with a delightful citrus and orange blossom fragrance. Dermatologically tested and free from TCC & Triclosan, it ensures optimal care for your skin and your family's. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Fresh Bathing Soap, Citrus & Orange Blossom Scent, 165g**:
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Lather the soap bar with water to create a rich foam.
â­ Gently massage the lather onto your skin to cleanse.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Fresh Bathing Soap, Citrus & Orange Blossom Scent, 165g**:
â­ Vegetable Glycerin.
â­ Palm Oil.
â­ Coconut Oil.
â­ Citrus & Orange Blossom Fragrance.
â­ Water.
â­ Aloe Vera Extract (for moisturizing).
â­ Vitamin E (antioxidant).
â­ Active antibacterial agents.

description_en:
Introducing **Dettol Fresh** Handwash, your ultimate shield against illness-causing germs. Experience 100% better germ protection with every wash, infused with an invigorating citrus and orange blossom fragrance that offers guaranteed odour protection. **Dettol Fresh** is formulated to maintain your skin's natural pH balance, leaving your hands smoother and healthier with each use. It's free from TCC & Triclosan, ensuring your family stays healthy and hygienic. Make handwashing a vital part of your routine for personal well-being and a cleaner environment with **Dettol Fresh**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Fresh**
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of the handwash.
â­ Lather and rub hands thoroughly for at least 20 seconds, covering all surfaces.
â­ Rinse hands well with water.
â­ Dry hands with a clean towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Fresh**
â­ 100 Percent better protection from illness-causing germs.
â­ Refreshing citrus and orange blossom scent.
â­ pH-balanced formula to keep skin smooth and healthy.
â­ Free from TCC & Triclosan.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

description_en:
Keep your hands clean and protected from germs with **Dettol Antispetic Hand Sanitizer Gel Instant Spring Fresh 50 ml**. This instant sanitizer offers 100% better germ protection, ensuring you stay healthy at all times. With its rinse-free and non-sticky formula, you can carry and use it anywhere, anytime â€“ at work, before eating, while traveling, or when using public restrooms. Enjoy a feeling of freshness and protection with **Dettol Antispetic Hand Sanitizer Gel Instant Spring Fresh 50 ml**.

â­ **Product Features:**
â­ Provides instant on-the-go protection.
â­ Kills 99.99% of germs without the need for water.
â­ Non-sticky formula leaves hands feeling clean and refreshed.
â­ Safe and effective for the whole family.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Antispetic Hand Sanitizer Gel Instant Spring Fresh 50 ml**:
â­ Remove any greasy matter or foodstuff from hands before use.
â­ Dispense a dime-sized amount onto the palm of one hand.
â­ Rub hands together, covering all surfaces, including between fingers and around nails.
â­ Continue rubbing for at least 30 seconds until hands fully absorb the product and the sanitizer dries.
â­ Avoid touching anything until your hands are completely dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Antispetic Hand Sanitizer Gel Instant Spring Fresh 50 ml**:
â­ Advanced formula for effective germ killing.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients to keep skin soft.
â­ Refreshing spring fresh scent.

description_en:
Discover powerful protection with **Dettol Antiseptic Antibacterial Liquid**, designed to be your first line of defense against germs. Whether for first-aid, maintaining personal hygiene, or disinfecting your home, **Dettol Antiseptic Antibacterial Liquid** offers unparalleled protection. Enjoy smooth, clear, germ-free skin with its enhanced formulation suitable for all skin types.

â­ Concentrated antiseptic solution providing effective protection against germs & bacteria.
â­ Dermatologically tested to help protect against infection from cuts, scratches, and insect bites.
â­ Ideal for use as a household disinfectant on surfaces or in laundry.
â­ Can be added to bathing water to kill germs and enhance personal hygiene, also usable for treating pimples & dandruff.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Antiseptic Antibacterial Liquid**:
â­ For personal hygiene: Dilute 1:180 in water.
â­ Laundry: To sanitize clothes, dilute 1:36 in water.
â­ Floors and hard surface disinfection: Dilute 1:18 in water and let it air dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Antiseptic Antibacterial Liquid**:
â­ Contains Chlorocresol 4.8g per 100ml.
â­ Contains Terpenes Oil 9.0g per 100ml.
â­ Contains Castor Oil Soap (Castor) 11.2g per 100ml.
â­ Contains Castor oil 1.3g per 100ml.
â­ Contains Sodium Cyclamate 0.77g per 100ml.
â­ Contains Caramel E150 (E150) 0.07g per 100ml.

description_en:
Provide your family with unparalleled protection with **Dettol Active Botany** Soap in Lavender & Chamomile. This 100% plant-derived antibacterial soap combines Dettol's germ-fighting power with the soothing scent of lavender and chamomile. It leaves your skin feeling soft, nourished, and refreshed all day, free from TCC and Triclosan for the health and safety of your loved ones.

â­ Effective protection against germs and bacteria.
â­ 100% plant-derived ingredients for a natural experience.
â­ Leaves skin soft and moisturized with a refreshing lavender and chamomile scent.
â­ Free from TCC and Triclosan for complete peace of mind.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Active Botany**:
â­ Wet the product with water, lather onto skin, and rinse thoroughly.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Active Botany**:
â­ Contains 100% plant-derived ingredients.
â­ Natural Lavender fragrance.
â­ Soothing Chamomile extract.

description_en:
Achieve sparkling clean surfaces and spotless mirrors in your bathroom with **Dettol Healthy Bathroom Cleaner Spray 500 ml**. This powerful all-purpose cleaner is expertly formulated to cut through grease and grime, leaving your bathroom brilliantly clean and refreshed.

â­ Kills 99.9% of germs, providing Dettol's trusted protection against disease-causing germs.
â­ Removes tough bathroom dirt, soap scum, and limescale with 100% effectiveness.
â­ Brightens surfaces, bringing a brilliant shine to your bathroom.
â­ Leaves a fresh, lasting fragrance for a clean and hygienic environment.

Experience ultimate freshness with **Dettol Hydra Cool Shower Gel**, expertly crafted to provide an immediate cooling and revitalizing sensation. This body wash combines Dettol's superior germ protection with an invigorating Cucumber & Icy Menthol fragrance, leaving your skin healthy, soft, and refreshed all day long. Featuring a pH-balanced formula and free from TCC & Triclosan, it's a safe choice for your family. Enjoy 100% better germ protection and a double cooling sensation that keeps up with your active lifestyle.

description_en:
Experience refreshment and tranquility with **Dettol Active Botany Shower Gel Lavendar & Chamomile 700ml**. This gel provides effective germ protection with its antibacterial formula, blended with a calming Lavender & Chamomile fragrance to soothe your senses. Made from plant-derived ingredients, it leaves your skin refreshed and healthy while maintaining its pH balance. Free from TCC & Triclosan, making it a safe choice for your family.

Product Features:
â­ Effective protection against illness-causing germs.
â­ Plant-derived ingredients with a soothing Lavender & Chamomile scent.
â­ Free from TCC & Triclosan and dermatologically tested.
â­ Gentle on the skin and maintains its pH balance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Active Botany Shower Gel Lavendar & Chamomile 700ml**:
â­ For the best lather, place a small amount onto a shower puff or your palm.
â­ Gently massage onto the entire body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Keep out of reach of children unless under adult supervision.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with cold water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Active Botany Shower Gel Lavendar & Chamomile 700ml**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Salicylate, Citric Acid, Limonene, Linalool, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract.

#Dettol #ShowerGel #Lavender #Chamomile #Skincare #Hygiene #Health #Freshness #SaudiArabia #BodyCare

description_en:
Give your skin the care it deserves with **Dettol Active Botany Hand Wash Lavender & Chamomile 200ml**. This hand wash is designed with a unique formula that combines effective germ protection with skin gentleness, making it the perfect choice for your family. Enjoy the calming scent of lavender and chamomile with every wash, knowing your hands are getting deep clean, free from harmful chemicals.

â­ Provides powerful protection against illness-causing germs.
â­ Made from 100% plant-derived ingredients.
â­ Features a soothing and refreshing lavender and chamomile scent.
â­ Gentle on skin and dermatologically tested.
â­ Free from TCC and Triclosan, making it safe for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Active Botany Hand Wash Lavender & Chamomile 200ml**
â­ Apply an adequate amount of hand wash to your wet hands.
â­ Lather your hands thoroughly, ensuring all surfaces are covered.
â­ Rinse your hands well with clean water.
â­ Dry your hands with a clean towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Active Botany Hand Wash Lavender & Chamomile 200ml**
â­ 100% Plant-Derived Ingredients.
â­ Lavender Extract.
â­ Chamomile Extract.
â­ Aqua.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Gentle Surfactants.

#Dettol #HandWash #Lavender #Chamomile #Hygiene #Skincare #PersonalCare #Health #Antibacterial #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience unparalleled refreshment with **Dettol Hydra Cool** Antibacterial Bar Soap, specially formulated to provide superior protection and deep cleansing. Overcome the daily effects of exhaustion and fatigue with the instant freshness offered by the blend of invigorating cucumber and icy menthol scent. This soap offers you 100% better germ protection, ensuring you and your family have unmatched health and hygiene.

**Dettol Hydra Cool** combines Dettol's trusted germ-fighting power with a unique formula that cools the skin, leaving a long-lasting fresh sensation. Enjoy a tangible icy coolness, knowing that this soap is free from harmful ingredients like TCC and Triclosan, and is dermatologically tested to ensure the utmost care for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Hydra Cool**
â­ Wet the product with water.
â­ Apply directly to the skin.
â­ Lather well.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Hydra Cool**
â­ Formula derived from natural ingredients for trusted germ protection.
â­ Unique blend of refreshing cucumber and icy menthol fragrance for a 2x cooling experience.
â­ Free from TCC and Triclosan.

#Dettol #Soap #HydraCool #Antibacterial #Freshness #CucumberMenthol #Hygiene #Health #BodyCare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience unparalleled hygiene and protection with **Dettol Antiseptic Solution**, your family's ultimate defense. This iconic antiseptic liquid offers comprehensive germ protection, making it an essential in every household. Use it with confidence for first aid, personal hygiene, and sanitizing your entire home for a healthy and safe environment. Trusted by medical professionals for generations, **Dettol Antiseptic Solution** provides reliable germ-killing power.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Antiseptic Solution**:
â­ For Personal Use:
    * Bathing: Add 1-2 full capfuls to your bath for a hygienic and refreshing experience.
    * Not recommended for babies under 9 months unless under medical advice.
â­ For Household Use:
    * Floors and Hard Surfaces: Mix 2 full capfuls in a bucket of water.
    * Toilets and Drains: Use the diluted solution.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Antiseptic Solution**:
â­ Contains an effective, proven formula for killing germs.
â­ Non-toxic and gentle on skin when used as directed.

Renew your senses and refresh your skin with **Dettol Fresh Bathing Soap, Citrus & Orange Blossom Scent**. This bar is crafted to provide you with superior 100% germ protection, ensuring a healthy start to your day. **Dettol Fresh Bathing Soap, Citrus & Orange Blossom Scent** combines Dettol's trusted germ-killing power with effective odor protection, enhanced by a refreshing citrus and orange blossom fragrance that leaves your skin clean and revitalized. Dermatologically tested and free from Triclosan and TCC, it offers optimal care for your skin. Explore our wide range of Dettol products for complete family care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Fresh Bathing Soap, Citrus & Orange Blossom Scent**:

â­ Cleanse your body thoroughly.
â­ Rinse with water.

â­ Sodium Citrate.
â­ Tetrasodium Etidronate.
â­ Aqua.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Palm Oil.
â­ Parfum.
â­ Limonene.
â­ Linalool.
â­ Geraniol.

Experience superior freshness and cleanliness with the **Dettol Active Botany Soap Greentea & Bergamot 150g 2+1 Free**. This body soap is specially formulated to gently cleanse your skin, removing dirt and impurities. Enriched with antioxidant-rich green tea extract and refreshing bergamot oil, it leaves your skin with a long-lasting, pleasant fragrance. Enjoy healthier, revitalized skin with every wash.

â­ Deeply and gently cleanses the skin.
â­ Rich in antioxidants from green tea for skin protection.
â­ Refreshing bergamot scent for a revitalizing feel.
â­ Free from TCC & Triclosan.
â­ 100% plant-derived ingredients.

description_en:
Immerse yourself in a refreshing experience with **Dettol Active-Botany Shower Gel Hibiscus & Rosewater**. This bodywash offers effective germ protection with its antibacterial formula and plant-derived extracts, providing a long-lasting feeling of freshness. **Dettol Active-Botany Shower Gel Hibiscus & Rosewater** combines Dettol's trusted germ protection with the soothing scent of Hibiscus and refreshing Rosewater, making it ideal for daily use. It helps maintain your skin's pH balance, leaving it healthy and soft. Dermatologically tested and free from TCC & Triclosan, it ensures you and your family stay clean and healthy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Active-Botany Shower Gel Hibiscus & Rosewater**:
â­ For the best lather, place a small amount of body wash onto a shower puff or your palm.
â­ Gently massage onto the entire body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Active-Botany Shower Gel Hibiscus & Rosewater**:
â­ Plant-derived ingredients for long-lasting freshness.
â­ Hibiscus and Rosewater extracts for a soothing and refreshing scent.
â­ pH-balanced formula that is gentle on the skin.
â­ Free from TCC and Triclosan.

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and tranquility with **Dettol Active Botany Shower Gel Lavender & Chamomile**. This specially formulated shower gel combines Dettol's trusted germ protection with the calming essence of lavender and the soothing properties of chamomile. It leaves your skin feeling clean, refreshed, and moisturized, while maintaining its natural balance. Perfect for daily use, ensuring a hygienic and revitalizing bath for the entire family.

Product Features:
â­ Effective protection and defense against illness-causing germs.
â­ Infused with plant-derived ingredients for a relaxing Lavender & Chamomile fragrance.
â­ Dermatologically tested, TCC & Triclosan-free for your family's well-being.
â­ pH-balanced and gentle on the skin, leaving it feeling healthy and soft.
â­ Suitable for everyday use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Active Botany Shower Gel Lavender & Chamomile**:
â­ For the best lather, place a small amount of body wash onto a shower puff or your palm.
â­ Massage gently onto your body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Pat your skin dry with a soft towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Active Botany Shower Gel Lavender & Chamomile**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Glycerin
â­ Parfum
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil
â­ Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract

#Dettol #ShowerGel #Lavender #Chamomile #Skincare #BodyWash #HealthySkin #Hygiene #Relaxing #DailyRefresh

description_en:
Experience superior cleanliness and freshness with **Dettol Active Botany Hand Wash Hibiscus & Rosewater 200ml**. This liquid soap is specially formulated to provide trusted germ protection while keeping your skin soft. Its unique, nature-inspired formula combines the antioxidant properties of hibiscus and the refreshing scent of rosewater for an exceptional cleaning experience.

â­ Gently cleanses and removes illness-causing germs.
â­ 100% plant-derived formula.
â­ Refreshing hibiscus and rosewater fragrance leaves your hands delicately scented.
â­ Free from TCC & Triclosan, making it suitable for daily use.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Active Botany Hand Wash Hibiscus & Rosewater 200ml**
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Pump a suitable amount of soap onto your hands.
â­ Lather well by rubbing your hands together.
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly for 20 seconds.
â­ Rinse hands with water and pat dry with a towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Active Botany Hand Wash Hibiscus & Rosewater 200ml**
â­ Water
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Glycerin
â­ Fragrance
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Hibiscus Extract
â­ Rosewater
â­ 100% Plant Derived Ingredients

This powerful cleaner with a refreshing lemon scent eliminates 99.9% of germs, leaving your home surfaces sparkling and clean. Its unique formula effectively cuts through grease and grime, making it the perfect solution for maintaining a healthy and fragrant environment in your home.

â­ Kills 99.9% of germs and bacteria.
â­ Leaves a long-lasting fresh and clean lemon fragrance.
â­ Effectively removes everyday dirt and grease.
â­ Provides exceptional shine and brightness to surfaces.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Healthy Home Lemon All Purpose Cleaner Spray 500 ml**:
â­ Spray directly onto the surface to be cleaned.
â­ Wipe the surface with a clean cloth or sponge.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Healthy Home Lemon All Purpose Cleaner Spray 500 ml**:
â­ Water

â­ Fragrance
â­ Preservatives

description_en:
Keep your hands clean and 99.9% germ-free with **Dettol Antiseptic Hand Sanitizer Gel Floral Essence 200 ml**. Designed for on-the-go everyday use, this sanitizer provides fast, effective protection without water, making it an ideal solution for mums and families needing on-the-go protection. It leaves your hands feeling refreshed and non-sticky, giving you peace of mind anytime, anywhere.

**Product Features:**
â­ Effective on-the-go protection.
â­ Kills 99.9% of germs without the need for water.
â­ Fast-drying, non-sticky formula.
â­ Refreshing floral essence scent.
â­ Ideal for use in the car, office, picnics, travel, and more.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Antiseptic Hand Sanitizer Gel Floral Essence 200 ml**:
â­ Apply a dime-size amount to the palm of one hand.
â­ Rub hands together, covering all surfaces, including between fingers and around nails.
â­ Continue rubbing for at least 30 seconds until hands are completely dry.
â­ Do not touch food or anything until your hands are fully dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Antiseptic Hand Sanitizer Gel Floral Essence 200 ml**:
â­ Ethyl Alcohol for effective sanitization.
â­ Water.
â­ Glycerin to maintain skin hydration.
â­ Carbomer for gel consistency.
â­ Triethanolamine for pH adjustment.
â­ Fragrance extracts with floral essence.

#Dettol #HandSanitizer #HandHygiene #InstantSanitizer #GermProtection #FloralEssence #HealthAndBeauty #CareProducts #SaudiArabia #Riyadh

description_en:
Experience a refreshing and cooling bath with **Dettol Hydra Cool Shower Gel**. This antibacterial body wash provides 100% better germ protection compared to non-antibacterial products, featuring an invigorating scent that combines Cucumber & Icy Menthol for a long-lasting fresh and cool sensation. **Dettol Hydra Cool Shower Gel** maintains your skin's pH balance, leaving it healthy and soft, and is free from TCC & Triclosan to ensure your family's well-being.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Hydra Cool Shower Gel**:
â­ For the best lather, place a small amount of body wash onto a shower puff or your palm.
â­ Massage onto the body then rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Hydra Cool Shower Gel**:
â­ Combines Dettol's trusted germ protection with a splashing Cucumber and icy Menthol fragrance for a refreshing sensation.
â­ Delivers 2x cooling sensation and leaves skin feeling healthy and soft.
â­ pH balanced and free from TCC & Triclosan.

Experience Dettol's reliable protection with **Dettol Active Botany Hibiscus & Rosewater Soap**, specially formulated to leave your skin feeling supple and nourished. This antibacterial soap is 100% plant-derived and features a refreshing Hibiscus & Rosewater fragrance for a delightful bathing experience. **Dettol Active Botany Hibiscus & Rosewater Soap** provides effective germ protection without TCC & Triclosan, making it the ideal choice for your family's health and hygiene. Discover nature's power with Dettol.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Active Botany Hibiscus & Rosewater Soap**
â­ Wet the product with water.

description_en:
Discover the power of cleanliness with **Dettol Antiseptic Disinfectant Liquid**. This multi-purpose disinfectant provides reliable germ protection across surfaces, tools, and high-touch areas used daily. Clinically proven to eliminate 99.9% of germs, bacteria, and viruses, it helps create a cleaner and safer environment in your home or workspace.

**Dettol Antiseptic Disinfectant Liquid** boosts your daily cleaning routines, as a small amount of water turns your regular mopping, surface wiping, or laundry rinse into a mighty germ-fighting task. It's suitable for every corner of your space, from kitchens to living rooms, workspaces to storage areas, use it anywhere hygiene and superior protection are needed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dettol Antiseptic Disinfectant Liquid**
â­ Use diluted with water for cleaning surfaces and floors.
â­ Add to rinse water for disinfecting laundry.
â­ Use for disinfecting tools and high-touch areas.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dettol Antiseptic Disinfectant Liquid**
â­ Chloroxylenol (4.8g per 100ml)
â­ Pine Oil (13.2g per 100ml)
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol (4.4g per 100ml)
â­ Distilled Water
â­ Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ Caramel (E150)
â­ Castille Soap (active ingredient)

description_en:
Experience crystal-clear vision with **Diva Multi-Purpose Contact Lenses Solution**. This innovative solution is expertly formulated to cleanse and disinfect your contact lenses, effectively removing germs and dirt for all-day comfort. It's the perfect, safe choice for all types of contact lenses, providing superior care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Diva Multi-Purpose Contact Lenses Solution**

â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before handling lenses.
â­ Place lenses in their designated case.
â­ Fill the case with the solution to the recommended level.
â­ Soak lenses for at least 4 hours (or as per lens case instructions).
â­ Replace solution with fresh solution after each use.
â­ Use for 3 months after opening.
â­ Keep away from children.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Diva Multi-Purpose Contact Lenses Solution**

â­ Multi-purpose solution for cleansing and disinfecting contact lenses.
â­ Contains active agents that remove germs and dirt.
â­ Suitable for all types of contact lenses.

description_en:
Fantasy became reality and the colors of life are mixed with femininity with **Diva Amande Monthly Colored Contact Lenses**. Express your femininity with these nature-inspired lenses; they are smooth and comfortable to wear, giving you a sense of confidence and beauty. These colored contact lenses for monthly use are the perfect choice to highlight the beauty of your eyes and add a touch of magic to your look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Diva Amande Monthly Colored Contact Lenses**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before touching the lenses.
â­ Place the lens on the tip of your index finger.
â­ Gently open your upper and lower eyelids with your other hand.
â­ Carefully place the lens onto the cornea of your eye.
â­ Avoid wearing lenses while sleeping or in dusty environments.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Diva Amande Monthly Colored Contact Lenses**:
â­ Prime Quality Contact lenses (43% water, Polymacon 57%).
â­ Immersed in sterilized saline solution.

description_en:

â­ Natural and comfortable experience for your eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Diva Cedar monthly contact lenses**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water.

description_en:
Discover your natural beauty with **Diva Contact Lenses Moon**. These monthly lenses are designed to give you a captivating look that blends natural elegance with feminine luxury. Enjoy superior comfort and renewed confidence with every glance. **Diva Contact Lenses Moon** turn your imagination into reality, adding a touch of harmonious color to your daily life, enhancing your allure, and giving you a unique sense of beauty. They are the perfect choice for those seeking unparalleled distinction and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Diva Contact Lenses Moon**

â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before touching the lenses.
â­ Gently place the lens on the tip of your index finger.
â­ Carefully open your upper and lower eyelids using the fingers of your other hand.
â­ Look straight ahead and place the lens directly onto the cornea.
â­ Gently close and then open your eyes to ensure the lens is settled.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Diva Contact Lenses Moon**

â­ High-quality contact lenses made from Polymacon (57%).
â­ Contains an optimal hydration level (43% water).
â­ Immersed in a sterile saline solution to maintain moisture and safety.

description_en:
Discover your natural beauty with **Diva Olivian Monthly Contact Lenses**. These monthly lenses are designed to give you a captivating natural color that blends femininity with nature-inspired life hues. **Diva Olivian Monthly Contact Lenses** are exceptionally soft and comfortable for wear, providing you with a lasting sense of confidence and beauty all day long. Immerse yourself in a unique experience that expresses your personality with complete assurance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Diva Olivian Monthly Contact Lenses**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before touching the lenses.
â­ Gently place the lens on the tip of your index finger.
â­ Use your other hand to gently open your upper and lower eyelids.
â­ Place the lens directly onto the cornea of your eye.
â­ Avoid wearing lenses while sleeping or in dusty environments.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Diva Olivian Monthly Contact Lenses**:
â­ High-quality contact lenses made from Polymacon (57% water, 43% material).
â­ Immersed in a sterile saline solution.

description_en:
Fantasy meets reality with **Diva** colored contact lenses, meticulously crafted to express your femininity with a natural and captivating touch. Inspired by nature's allure, these lenses boast superior softness and exceptional comfort, instilling an unparalleled sense of confidence and beauty throughout your day. **Diva** monthly disposable contact lenses are your ultimate choice for refreshing your look with enchanting colors that blend seamlessly with your eyes, realizing the dream of natural beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Diva** Midnight:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water.
â­ Place the lens on the tip of your index finger.
â­ Gently open your upper and lower eyelids using other fingers.
â­ Look straight up and carefully place the lens onto your cornea.
â­ Ensure the lens is correctly oriented before insertion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Diva** Midnight:
â­ Prime quality contact lenses.
â­ Contains 43% water for comfortable hydration.
â­ Made from Polymacon (57%).
â­ Immersed in sterile saline solution to maintain quality.

description_en:
Fantasy has become reality, and life's colors are blended with femininity with **Diva Contact Lenses Lamir**. Express your true femininity with these nature-inspired lenses, distinguished by their superior softness and exceptional comfort during wear. **Diva Contact Lenses Lamir** grants you an unparalleled sense of confidence and beauty, making every glance an expression of your unique elegance. They are more than just lenses; they are a touch of magic that adds a special sparkle to your eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Diva Contact Lenses Lamir**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before touching the lenses.
â­ Gently place the lens on the tip of your index finger.
â­ Use other fingers to gently open your upper and lower eyelids.
â­ Carefully place the lens onto the pupil of your eye (the cornea).
â­ Ensure the lens is in the correct orientation before wearing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Diva Contact Lenses Lamir**
â­ High-quality monthly contact lenses.
â­ Made from safe and comfortable materials for the eyes.
â­ Available in a unique design that gives you a natural and attractive look.

â­ One pair of lenses for monthly use.

description_en:
Turn fantasy into reality with **Diva Contact Lenses Lava**, where life's colors blend with femininity, allowing you to express yourself with confidence and beauty.

**Diva Contact Lenses Lava**'s shades blend masterfully with your natural eye color, inspired by nature's softness, giving you a captivating and smooth look. Enjoy unparalleled comfort and say goodbye to eye strain with these lenses designed for monthly use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Diva Contact Lenses Lava**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before handling lenses.
â­ Gently place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Carefully open your upper and lower eyelids.
â­ Position the lens onto the cornea of your eye.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Diva Contact Lenses Lava**
â­ Prime quality contact lenses (43% water, 57% Polymacon) immersed in sterile saline solution.
